original: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! is too high in the line of succession
§Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! is of too lowly rank for a regular marriage
translation: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§!地位过低，不能进行普通婚姻

original: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! has the power to press my claims
§Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! is unable to press my claims

translation: 已经策划了一个类似的阴谋

original: We like your enemies too much
translation: 本座非常中意你的敌人

original: We like you more than your enemies
translation: 比起你的敌人，本座更中意你
§Y你能建设省份里的提升设施！§!

original: The following counties run a risk of having a revolt:\n$LIST$
translation: 下列省份有叛乱的危险：\n$LIST$

original: If your ruler dies now the game will end!

translation: 以下头衔将在继承时失去：\n$LIST$

translation: 你应该为这些头衔提名继承人：\n$LIST$

original: The following titles can be created:\n$LIST$
The following titles can be usurped:\n$LIST$
You should get married\n§GClick to go to Character View§!

original: $HEIR$ should get married\n§GClick to go to Character View§!
The following children need a guardian:\n$LIST$
The following adult sons do not hold any land:\n$LIST$

original: The following betrothed characters can get married:\n$LIST$
There are vassals with worrisome lines of succession.\nOn death, their titles might pass from your Realm:\n$LIST$

original: The following vassals can join our war against our former liege:\n$LIST$
translation: 以下封臣可以被召唤来对抗我们的前君主：\n$LIST$

original: The following Plots have become available:\n$LIST$
This Casus Belli can be used by §Y$CLAIMANT$§! to press the claim on the §Y$TITLE$§!
This Casus Belli can be used by §Y$CLAIMANT$§! to press the claim on the §Y$TITLE$§!
This Casus Belli can be used by §Y$PRESSER$§! to press §Y$CLAIMANT$'s§! claim on the §Y$TITLE$§!
translation: §Y$PRESSER$§!可以用这个宣战理由帮§Y$CLAIMANT$§!夺取§Y$TITLE$§!

original: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! has been granted the right to invade the §Y$TITLE$§!. If successful, the titles to all currently occupied holdings will be seized.
translation: §Y$CLAIMANT$§!有权利入侵§Y$TITLE$§!。如果成功，所有正被占领地产的头衔都将被夺取。

original: §Y$TARGET$§! has been excommunicated, a just cause for war if ever there was one!
translation: §Y$TARGET$§!已被绝罚，这是个很难得的战争理由！

original: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can attempt to declare independence from §Y$TARGET$§!
§Y$TARGET$§! has tried and failed to imprison §Y$CLAIMANT$§!, which has resulted in an armed conflict
translation: §Y$TARGET$§!未能成功拘禁§Y$CLAIMANT$§!，引发了一场武装冲突

original: The §Y$TITLE$§! is, de jure, a vassal of §Y$CLAIMANT$'s§!, which is cause enough for war.
translation: §Y$TITLE$§!在法理上属于§Y$CLAIMANT$§!，这给了我们发动战争的充足理由。

original: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to change the succession law in the §Y$TITLE$§! to seniority!
translation: §Y$CLAIMANT$§!可以发动战争以将§Y$TITLE$§!的继承法改为年长者继承！

original: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to change the succession law in the §Y$TITLE$§! to primogeniture!
translation: §Y$CLAIMANT$§!可以发动战争以将§Y$TITLE$§!的继承法改为长子继承！

original: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to change the succession law in the §Y$TITLE$§! to feudal elective!
translation: §Y$CLAIMANT$§!可以发动战争以将§Y$TITLE$§!的继承法改为选举继承！

original: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can use this Casus Belli to seize all titles held by the infidel, §Y$TARGET$§!, within the de jure §Y$TITLE$§!.
translation: §Y$CLAIMANT$§!可以用这个宣战理由夺取异教徒§Y$TARGET$§!在§Y$TITLE$§!法理内的所有领地。

original: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to change the succession law in the §Y$TITLE$§! to gavelkind!
translation: §Y$CLAIMANT$§!可以发动战争以将§Y$TITLE$§!的继承法改为均分继承！

original: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to lower Crown Authority in the §Y$TITLE$§!
translation: §Y$CLAIMANT$§!可以发动战争以削弱在§Y$TITLE$§!的王权

original: $ORDER$$SECOND_ADJ$ Civil War to lower Crown Authority
This would describe it if it was a true story..
translation: 如果是一个真实的故事，这个将会描述它……

original: Tales of your misdeeds are told from Ireland to Cathay.
translation: 你的恶行从爱尔兰到契丹无人不知，无人不晓。

original: Your low character is the subject of Greek plays.
translation: 你下贱的品行有如希腊戏剧的主角一般。

original: May your humors rot in your living body.
translation: 愿你的体液在躯体里朽烂。

original: May your years be short and miserable.
translation: 愿你的一生短暂而不幸。

original: May you be sewn up alive in the belly of a dead camel.
translation: 愿你活活被缝进死骆驼的肚子里！

original: You child of a mangy dog.
Blessings upon you and your House.
Your wisdom and mercy are legendary.
translation: 您的智慧与仁德广为传颂。

original: May you live in harmony and contentment.
Consumption is an older name for the terrible scourge of Tuberculosis.
translation: 肺痨就是结核病的旧称，得了这病犹如遭受天罚。

original: Typhoid Fever, or Slow Fever, is loose in this county.
translation: 伤寒，也被称作慢性热，正在这个省份蔓延。

original: Epidemic Typhus or Camp Fever, is rampant.
translation: 流行性斑疹伤寒，也被称作露营热，正在蔓延。

original: The Pale Rider has brought the Black Death to this county.
translation: 苍白骑士将黑死病带到了这个省份。

original: There is an epidemic of Measles in this county.
translation: 麻疹正在这个省份迅速蔓延。

original: Smallpox has struck this county, killing almost half of those infected.
translation: 天花袭击了这个省份，造成将近半数感染者死亡。
疫情已经蔓延到 $NUM$ 个省份

$WHERE$地区的原著居民$DIRECTION$ $VALUE$ 敌意值。

translation: $WHERE$将$DIRECTION$神圣罗马帝国不可分割的一部分。\n
人口为$SIZE$的殖民地已经在$WHERE$建立。\n

translation: 一个有$SIZE$单位的蛮族部落将出现在$WHERE$。\n

original: $WHO$ will no longer be governor of $WHERE$.\n
$CHAR$ becomes a member of the $FAMILY$ family.\n

§Y$WHERE$§! gets '§Y$WHAT$§!' until §Y$DATE$§!, giving the following effects:
$EFFECT$

Only the Pope may appoint Bishops\n
translation: 只有教宗可以任命主教\n

Vassals can now fight each other.\n
Vassals can no longer wage war.\n
Vassal titles can no longer pass outside the Realm through inheritance\n
translation: 封臣头衔不能被外国人继承\n

original: Vassal titles can now pass outside the Realm through inheritance\n
translation: 封臣头衔现在能够被外国人继承\n

translation: 你可以任命军队指挥官。\n

The $JOB$ title is no longer hereditary\n
An infant named §Y$NAME$§! appears at the court of §Y$EMPLOYER$§!.\n

translation: 随意撤回异教徒的头衔\n

original: Revocation of infidel titles no longer free\n
translation: 不能随意撤回异教徒的头衔\n

original: Revocation of titles no longer free\n
Duration of Disease increased by $VAL$ months.\n
translation: 患病时间增加了 $VAL$ 月。\n

translation: 患病时间减少了 $VAL$ 月。\n

In the $PHASE$ phase this flank will do an average damage of §Y$AVERAGE$§W per soldier and day

original: In the Skirmish phase the armies will stay at a distance\n§YArchers§W, §YHorse Archers§W and §YLight Cavalry§W excel in the §YSkirmish Phase§W
translation: 在射击阶段两军将保持距离\n§Y弓箭手§!，§Y弓骑兵§!和§Y轻骑兵§!擅长§Y遭遇阶段§!

original: In the Melee phase the armies are locked in close combat\n§YHeavy Infantry§W, §YPikemen§W and §YKnights§W excel in the §YMelee Phase§W
translation: 在肉搏阶段两军面对面厮杀\n§Y重步兵§W，§Y长枪兵§W和§Y骑士§W擅长§Y肉搏阶段§W

original: In the Pursue phase one of the armies has routed and the other one is chasing them down\n§YKnights§W, §YLight Cavalry§W and §YHorse Archers§W excel in the §YPursue Phase§W
translation: 在追击阶段败军溃散，胜者追亡逐北\n§Y骑士§!，§Y轻骑兵§!和§Y弓骑兵§!擅长§Y追击阶段§!

original: After a lineage of $NUMCHARS$ characters your line has ended with the death of the heirless $ENDCHAR$.
translation: 历经$NUMCHARS$代统治者后，你的家族于无后的$ENDCHAR$处终结。

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Capet, descended from Robert the Strong who was a power figure during the reign of Charles the Bald. His descendants would be Kings of France in 1066. Although by 1322 the main line would die out, cadet branches still ruled in 1337 as Kings of France, Portugal, Naples, Hungary and Navarre. Cadet branches would also hold the Duchies of Brittany, Burgundy, Bourbon, Provence and Achaea. One further cadet branch would hold the dignity of Emperor as Latin Emperors of Constantinople. Truly the greatest dynasty of medieval Europe.
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$超过卡佩家族。卡佩家族由秃头查理的重臣强者罗贝尔所创建。他的后代在1066年获得法兰西王位。尽管在1322年时主支绝嗣，卡佩家族的旁系分支依然在1337年时拥有法兰西，葡萄牙，那不勒斯，匈牙利和纳瓦拉的王位。其他分支还拥有布列塔尼，勃艮第，波旁，普罗旺斯和亚该亚公爵头衔。一个更远的分支是君士坦丁堡拉丁帝国的皇帝。这真是中世纪欧洲史最伟大的家族。

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House von Habsburg. On the face of it, things were not looking very good for the Habsburg family in 1066. As minor Swiss counts, their status inside the Empire was fairly negligible compared to great territorial magnates of 11th century Germany. A policy of tactical marriages saw the family lands expand steadily, and it was during the chaos that gripped the Empire in the late 13h and early 14th century that the family were elected to the office of Holy Roman Empire. Although unable to hold the office they were able to use this a springboard to secure the Duchy of Austria for the dynasty. With this power base, the family would go on to dominate the politics of Central Europe until 1918.
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$超过哈布斯堡家族。一开始，在 1066 年，哈布斯堡家族前景十分暗淡。比起十一世纪日耳曼诸多呼风唤雨的庞大家族，哈布斯堡只是一个瑞士的小伯爵，在帝国内部无足轻重。但是一连串精心策划的政治联姻使家族领地不断扩大，最终在十三世纪末十四世纪初的大混乱中被选为神圣罗马帝国皇帝，获得了帝国的统治权。尽管皇位并不长久，哈布斯堡还是借机攫取了奥地利公爵头衔。依靠奥地利，哈布斯堡家族在中欧的统治持续到了 1918 年。

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Rurikovich, descendants of the Swedish Viking Rurik who established a state in Rus (now in modern Russia and Ukraine) in the 9th century. The policy of dividing lands between heirs led to the state fragmenting and the various family groups would feud with each other. This left them too divided to cope with the 13th century Mongol invasion. The great principalities fell one by one to Batu, the grandson of Genghis Khan, and were forced to pay tribute to the victorious Mongols. The family itself survived and would rise again...
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$超过留里克家族。九世纪时，来自瑞典的维京人留里克在罗斯（今天的俄罗斯和乌克兰）建立了一个国家。在继承人中分割领地的政策导致了国家的分裂和不同支系之间的争斗不休。这使他们在十三世纪时过于分裂，无法抵挡住蒙古入侵。成吉思汗之孙拔都逐个征服了这些公国，强迫他们向蒙古人纳贡。不过留里克家族还是保存下来了，等待着重新崛起的时机…………

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House d'Ivrea, a dynasty with illustrious ancestors, but by 1066 very much down on its luck - from Kings of Italy to minor counts in Burgundy. It looked like a dynasty whose day had passed. Then came a lucky marriage and the Kingdoms of Castile and Leon passed into the family holdings, turning House d'Ivrea again into one of the key players on the European stage.
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$超过伊夫雷亚家族。伊夫雷亚家族有着杰出的祖先，但在1066年，尽管他们取得了从意大利国王到勃艮第伯爵的头衔，却仍然在走下坡路。看起来这个家族已经过气了，不过一次幸运的联姻后卡斯蒂利亚和莱昂将王冠拱手送上，使伊夫雷亚家族重新成为欧洲舞台上的关键角色之一。

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Piast. The eponymous founder of this dynasty was by legend a wheelwright before becoming King of Poland. The family held Poland throughout the period, and despite the Kingdom being split were able to unite the country and make Poland strong again. Other members of the Dynasty were part of the Holy Roman Empire as Dukes of Silesia. In 1337 Poland was ruled by its greatest Piast King and preparing to advance against the Mongols.
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$超过皮亚斯特家族。皮亚斯特家族的创建者在成为波兰国王之前据说是个轮匠。尽管波兰王国四分五裂，皮亚斯特家族还是在这一时期稳居王位，并逐渐将波兰变得统一而强盛。家族的其他成员包括神圣罗马帝国的西里西亚公爵。在1337年，有史以来最伟大的国王卡齐米日三世统治着波兰，正在秣马厉兵准备反击蒙古汗国。

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Komnenos. If we exclude Isaac, who had launched a successful coup to become Emperor in 1057, the Komnenos family were loyal servants of the Byzantine Empire. In the chaos following the Seljuk victory at Manzikert, the Komnenos family followed that proud family tradition and launched another coup. For the next 100 years the dynasty would halt the decline of the Byzantine Empire under what we know as the Komnenian restoration. Ironically, the family would be toppled in a palace coup, but they would continue to rule as Emperors in Trebizond
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$超过科穆宁家族。如果我们将1057年通过政变成为皇帝的伊萨克一世排除在外，科穆宁家族一直是拜占庭帝国的忠诚仆人。在曼奇刻尔特惨败于塞尔柱人之后的大混乱中，科穆宁家族坚守其引以为傲的家族传统，发动了另一场政变。在接下来的100年里，科穆宁家族遏制住了拜占庭帝国的衰落，为帝国带来了所谓的科穆宁复兴。讽刺的是，科穆宁家族同样被宫廷政变所推翻，不过他们在小亚细亚的特拉比松建立了新的帝国。

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Plantagenet, who started off as a cadet branch of the elder house of Anjou. Geoffrey, the founder of the dynasty, was left with the family lands in France when his father went off to Jerusalem to become King. The Plantagenet family had a power base in France, and through marriages inherited the Kingdom of England and large parts of France. The French inheritance would lead to an ongoing conflict with France and the Hundred Years War.
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$超过金雀花家族。金雀花家族是安茹家族的分支。家族创建者若弗鲁瓦在父亲从法国动身前往耶路撒冷加冕为王后脱离了本家。金雀花家族的核心领地在法国，通过联姻继承了英格兰国王和法国的大片领土。不过，在法国继承的领地最终引发了与法兰西国王的冲突，最后演变为百年战争。

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Estrid. Coming to the throne in Denmark in 1047, the house of Estrid was one of only two royal families to still hold kingdoms in 1337. Although there were several attempts at expansion, Denmark only gained small amount of land in Estonia, as most would be gained and then lost. The dynasty itself managed to survive and prosper in an era of chaos and turmoil, which is no mean feat.
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$超过伊里温家族。伊里温家族于1047年成为丹麦国王。到1337年，这个家族是仅有的两个仍保持着王位的家族之一。尽管几次试图扩张，丹麦只成功得到了爱沙尼亚的几块领地，其他的扩张最终归于失败。家族本身生命力倒是十分顽强，在混乱和骚动的时代始终屹立不倒，这毫无疑问是一项伟大的业绩。

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Welf, a dynasty very much down on its luck in 1066. By 1100 that had all changed. Control of two of the most powerful duchies in Germany and substantial lands in Italy made them the second most powerful family in Germany after the Hohenstaufen. One member of the Welf family would even gain the title of Emperor, but in the struggles would also weaken the family and much of the lands would be lost. The family would consolidate its holdings in Northern Germany as Dukes of Brunswick and remain a player in Imperial politics.
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$打败了韦尔夫家族。韦尔夫家族在1066年还是个运气不佳的小家族。到了1100年，一切都变了。家族拥有了日耳曼的两个最有实力的公爵头衔和意大利的大片领土，在日耳曼是仅次于霍亨斯陶芬家族的第二大家族。韦尔夫家族的一个成员还曾经试图称帝，在这次不成功的尝试中家族的力量大为削弱，很多领地也因此丧失。之后，作为布伦瑞克公爵，韦尔夫家族巩固了在北日耳曼的根基，继续活跃在帝国的政治舞台上。

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House de Genève, who were counts of Geneva in 1066. The house held this territory throughout the period and were still counts of Geneva in 1337. They never managed to climb any higher, but at the same time were able to cling onto their holdings.
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$超过日内瓦家族。1066年，日内瓦家族拥有日内瓦伯爵头衔。到了1337年，日内瓦家族仍然是日内瓦伯爵。他们从未试图扩张，与此同时他们也牢牢掌握住了自己的领地。

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House von Zähringen, who were powerful landholders in Southern Germany and holders of the Duchies of Verona and Carinthia, which made the Zähringen family a key power holder in Germany. A failed rebellion against the Emperor saw these titles stripped from the family and other parts of the family lands would be inherited by other dynasties, leaving the family lands shrunk to a few holdings in Swabia.
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$超过扎林根家族。扎林根家族是南德意志强大的领主，也是维罗纳和克恩滕公爵。这使其成为德意志的关键家族之一。这些头衔在一场针对皇帝的失败叛乱后被剥夺，其他领地也在联姻中被其他家族继承，最后只剩下在斯瓦比亚的几块大大缩水的领地。

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House de Montfort, who were small scale land holders in France. Through marriage and service the family gained estates in both Normandy and England. It was under the zealous but cruel Simon de Montfort the Elder that the family ascended. Through his participation in the Albigensian Crusade the family would add substantial estates in the South of France. The family reached the height of its power through his son Simon de Montfort the Younger, who became de facto ruler of England. However, all this would prove fleeting and by 1337 the family would have lost it all and gone extinct in the male line.
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$超过德·孟福尔家族。德·孟福尔家族是法国的小领主，后来通过联姻和受封，在诺曼底和英格兰都得到了领地。在狂热而残暴的老西蒙·德·孟福尔时期，家族开始跻身高位。通过参与对阿尔比派异端的十字军，家族获得了法国南部的大片领土。他的儿子，小西蒙·德·孟福尔，带领家族攀上权力的最高峰，成为实际上的英格兰统治者。不过权力和财富很快烟消云散，到了1337年，德·孟福尔家族不仅失去了所有的领地，而且断绝了男性后裔。

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House Babenberger, which is not to be confused with the slightly more famous von Babenbergs of Austria. This cadet branch of house Capet held minor titles in Franconia. History probably wouldn't remember them if it wasn't for the more famous family with a similar name.
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$击败巴本堡家族。别把它和奥地利著名的冯·巴本堡家族弄混了，这个卡佩家族的分支在弗兰克尼亚有个小头衔。若不是他们与著名家族有着类似的名字，历史可能根本不会记住他们。

original: It seems the young women no longer have the power to seduce me.
translation: 看起来这个年轻女人不再能使我喜欢上她了。

original: I just don't feel lustful anymore
translation: 我再也不会喜欢上美色了

original: A diet of bread and water does not satisfy me any more. I need something else, something delicious and filling.
translation: 仅有面包和清水的饮食并不能使我满意。我需要一些别的东西，一些美味的食物和饭后甜点。

original: I have broken my fast with wine and quail
I no longer find joy in stuffing myself with fine wines, red meat and rich sauces. I think I need a diet.
translation: 我再也不能在每天大量喝优质葡萄酒以及吃大量的红肉和昂贵的调料的饮食中感到快乐。我想我需要节食。

original: Money didn't make me happy, nor did respect.
translation: 金钱既不能让我得到快乐，也不能让我得到尊重。

original: I think I need something else in my life
translation: 我想我的生命中需要其他东西

original: Work has become boring and the hours of the day drag on.
translation: 工作变得越来越无聊，每天的时间变得越来越难熬。

original: Diligence may be a virtue, but it's exhausting!
translation: 勤奋或许是一种美德，但我已经精疲力竭了！

original: I feel spirited and restless. Maybe some work might calm me down?
translation: 我感到魂不守舍，或许做一些工作会让我平静下来？

original: I am sick of always being kind to everyone!
translation: 每天对一群人保持和善真恶心！

original: I should be happy with what I've got, not everyone is as privileged as I am.
translation: 我应该为我所得到的感到高兴，并不是所有人都像我一样拥有特权的。

original: I have started to feel that 'turn the other cheek' is just stupid.
translation: 我开始觉得容忍他人是愚蠢的。

original: The constant surges of adrenaline and increased heart rate makes me weary. It's not as fun being angry as it used to be.
translation: 急剧上升的肾上腺素和心跳使我感到疲倦.暴怒再也不像过去那样有趣了。

original: I am pretty great, after all.
I think I should be proud of myself
translation: 我应该为自己感到自豪

original: 'Tis hard to feel proud when one has nothing to be proud of.
translation: 当一个人没有什么优点值得感到自豪的话，他很难会为自己感到自豪。

original: Why should I be proud of myself?
I have grown tired of the young men who try to seduce me.
translation: 我对那些不断试图诱惑我的年轻人感到厌倦。

original: Sometimes, it's easier to lie than to hurt people with a truth.
translation: 有时候，比起用真相伤害别人，还是撒谎容易一些。

original: Lies do hurt people. The truth... I think I can handle the truth.
translation: 谎言确实会伤人。真相……我想我能应付得了。

original: I did not understand fear before, but once you have felt your leg shake and teeth chatter with fear, then it is hard to remain brave.
translation: 我之前并不知道何为害怕，一旦当你恐惧得双腿颤抖牙齿抖动，你将很难继续勇敢下去。

original: This does not make me a coward, does it?
translation: 这并不能让我变成一个懦夫，不是吗？

original: Fear has loosened its grip on me, and I stand tall against the things I used to fear.
translation: 我不再像以前那样感到恐惧，并且我正在努力克服我以前感到恐惧的事情。

original: No one can call me craven anymore
translation: 再也没有人可以叫我懦夫了

original: I crave solitude, I no longer seek the company of others.
translation: 我渴望独处，我不再寻求别人的陪伴。

original: My confidence has grown and I don't feel so awkward anymore.
translation: 我的信心在不断增加，我再也不会感到尴尬了。

original: There must be more to life than this!
translation: 生命中必然有比这更重要的东西！

original: I have trumped everyone and am the best [From.GetTitle] ever!
translation: 我已经超过了所有人，我是有史以来最棒的[From.GetTitle]！

original: Justice is a harsh mistress and I can't love her anymore.
translation: 正义是一位刻薄的主人，我不会再喜欢她。

original: Someone told me I'm arbitrary and I wish to change that.
translation: 有人说我很武断，我希望改变他们这种看法。
这对我而言很好，不是吗？

original: My favorite subject does not interest me anymore and I can't speak about it with the same zeal as before.
translation: 我最喜欢的东西再也不能引起我的兴趣，我再也不会像以前一样充满热情的谈论它。
之前我真的很无聊，居然喜欢那种东西

original: Perhaps the glass is fuller than I believed it to be.
translation: 或许杯子里的水比我想的要多。

original: ...as long as it does not overflow
The feeling of being watched and followed seem to have disappeared overnight!
translation: 那种被监视的感觉似乎在一夜之间消失了！

original: Several assassinations and 'loans' later, I don't know if I'm still able to trust anyone.
translation: 经过几次暗杀和「贷款」之后，我不知道还可以信任谁。

original: Why are they trying to hurt me?
translation: 为什么他们试图伤害我？

original: Every day, the cook chases me out of the kitchen, but not before I've stuffed myself and my pockets full of biscuits.
translation: 每天厨师都会把我赶出厨房，但我的嘴巴和口袋里早已塞满了饼干。

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I eat far too much and has declared the kitchens off limits!
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]认为我吃的太多了，并声称我需要节食！

original: I had better eat with moderation, or I'll end up looking like my fat nanny...
translation: 我最好少吃点，不然会变得和我的保姆一样胖……

original: My [GetFromRelation] is worried about my health and wants me to eat more.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]担心我的健康并希望我多吃点。

original: I don't want to get fat though.
No, you can't have them, they are mine!
translation: 不，你不能动它们。这些东西是我的！

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] won't have me turn into a 'mean and selfish little moneygrubber'.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]不希望让我变成一个卑鄙又自私的小财迷。

original: If you play with me I'll let you play with my toys.
translation: 如果你陪我玩的话，我会让你玩我的玩具。

original: My [GetFromRelation] told me I should never let my lessers have what is mine... but my friend was just going to borrow some toys!
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]告诉我不能让自己的东西被他人拿走，但我的朋友打算向我借一些玩具！

original: I hate Latin, I hate History and I won't do my homework!
translation: 我讨厌拉丁文，讨厌历史，我不想做我的家庭作业！

original: I'll just take a nap instead
My [GetFromRelation] is furious at my 'lazy nature' and will keep a closer eye on my studies from now on.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]对我懒惰的本质很恼火，并且从现在开始会严厉地叮嘱我学习。

original: I always do my homework and my chores before I go and play.
translation: 我总是先做好作业和家务再去玩。

original: My [GetFromRelation] explained to me that I am taking life far too seriously and need to relax.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation] 对我说我对待生活太过严苛，并且说我需要放松。

original: It's not fair, even peasant children have nicer things than I do!
translation: 这不公平，即使是农民的孩子也有比我更好的东西！

original: My [GetFromRelation] gave me a stern talking to about the deadly sin of envy.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]对我进行了一次关于嫉妒这个罪孽的致命性危害的谈论。

original: I still NEED that wooden sword!
Most people have good hearts. A stranger is just a friend I have yet to meet.
translation: 大多数人都有一颗善良的心，陌生人是还没有见面的朋友。

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] took me over the knee and beat me with a stick for my trusting and weak nature.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]利用我轻信和懦弱的本质，把我摁在他的膝盖上用木棒打我。

original: I take it back, some people are evil.
translation: 我会报复的，有些人真是魔鬼。

original: That kid mocked me! I cannot be blamed for punching him in the face and giving him a nosebleed...
translation: 那小子戏弄我。我把拳头打在了他脸上，并打的他流出了鼻血，没人可以为此指责我……

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is not pleased with my temper. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] gave me the switch!
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]对我的脾气很不满意。[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]要求我改善！

original: Let the little fools whisper and snigger behind my back. I can wait... revenge is a dish best served cold.
translation: 让那个小傻瓜在背地里讥笑我吧。我可以等待……复仇是最美味的佳肴。

original: [From.GetFirstName], my [GetFromRelation], chastised me for my cold patient nature. 'Show some spirit, damn you!' [From.GetSubjectPronoun] shouted.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]，斥责我病弱的体质。「精神点，该死的！」[From.GetSubjectPronoun]大喊了起来。

original: I stand head and shoulders above the other children, and why should I pretend otherwise?
translation: 我比其他的孩子优秀的多，我和他们不一样，我为何要伪装？

original: Today, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] called me an arrogant braggart and told me the story of Icarus and Daedalus.
translation: 今天，我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]称我是傲慢的吹牛的人，并给我讲了伊卡洛斯和代达罗斯的故事。

original: Why show off, when everything I have, I have been given?
translation: 为什么要炫耀，当我拥有一切的时候，我还需要什么？

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is not impressed with my humility. 'Stand tall when you deserve it', [From.GetSubjectPronoun] explained.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]对我的谦虚的态度并没有留有什么印象。「站直了，当你问心无愧的时候」，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]解释道。

original: People are so easy to manipulate! A smile, a tear, the right inflection, and they will rush to do my bidding.
translation: 人们是那么的容易操纵！一个微笑，一滴眼泪，适当的影响，他们就会争着当我的棋子。

original: My evil [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] promised that for every lie I tell, I'll get a rap from the rod.
translation: 我那邪恶的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]告诉我每一次撒谎我都将受到报应。

original: I will never lie again! Ouch...!
I find religion fascinating, especially when the priests talk of heathens and infidels, and how they shall be struck down!
translation: 我对宗教着迷了，特别是当牧师说到异端和异教徒的，以及为什么应该打倒异教徒的时候！

original: I was reading the [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] when my [GetFromRelation] took it away, telling me to ease off and go outside and play.
translation: 我正在阅读[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]然后我的[GetFromRelation]拿走它，让我到外边放松一下。

original: Sometimes, people get upset by my honest opinions. 'Yes, you look fat.' 'You have a big nose.' It's just the truth!
translation: 有时候人们会因为我对他们提出的正确意见感到悲伤。「你看起来太胖了。」「你的鼻子太大了。」这些都是事实！

original: I tell it as I see it
translation: 我只是说出了我看到的东西而已

original: At length, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] lectured me on the necessity of white lies and the virtues of omission.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]详细地对我说明善意谎言的必要性，以及糊涂是福的道理。

original: So my tongue won't turn black?
translation: 所以我的舌头不会烂掉喽？

original: I don't like climbing trees, I'm afraid of spiders and I won't go near the graveyard. Does that make me a craven?
translation: 我不喜欢爬树，我害怕蜘蛛，我也不会去墓地附近。这会使我变成一个懦夫吗？

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] talked me into touching a spider today, it was icky and I squealed but didn't run away.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]让我触摸一只蜘蛛，它很讨厌，我尖叫了起来但我并没有逃跑。

original: I climb the highest trees, visit the graveyard at midnight and collect spiders and snakes.
translation: 我爬到了最高的树上，在午夜时刻去墓地捉蜘蛛和蛇。

original: One of the snakes bit me this morning. My poor [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] cursed my recklessness and made me promise to stop messing around with vermin.
translation: 今天早上我被蛇咬了。我差劲的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]斥责了我的鲁莽，并让我承诺不再接触这些危险的东西。

original: I can't look a stranger in the eye without blushing or looking down.
translation: 在与陌生人对视的时候，我总是会年红或者低下头去。

original: When I refused to greet the guests, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] spanked me and locked me in my room without dinner.
translation: 当我拒绝向客人问好的时候，我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]打了我的屁股，并将我关在屋里，连晚饭都没让我吃。

original: Inquisitive, curious and friendly, I always am the first to greet strangers.
translation: 我总是友好的，好奇的向陌生人问好。

original: I rushed to meet the guests and got to the hall before my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. For that, I earned a spanking.
translation: 我冲过去迎接客人，并在我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]之前进入大厅。因此，我被打了屁股。

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] must be jealous, why else would [From.GetSheHe] punish me for being ambitious?
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]肯定是嫉妒了，不然为什么[From.GetSheHe]会因为我的野心惩罚我？

original: My friends dream of riches, power and fancy things, but I don't even wanna grow up!
translation: 我的朋友做梦都想得到财富，权力以及其他幻想中的事情，但我甚至都不想长大！

original: I am happy with what I have
My ears are still ringing with my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s harsh words. I need to grow a spine and get some ambition.
translation: 我的耳朵里现在还充斥这我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]的严厉的话语。我需要长大并有自己的抱负。

original: I do whatever strikes my fancy. Such as smashing this fine glass goblet!
translation: 我做一切我喜欢的事情。比如打破这个精致的玻璃酒杯！

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] took the strap to me for smashing the goblet.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]在我打破玻璃酒杯之后拿着鞭子走向了我。

original: I see that it was wrong now
I always make sure the children get equal parts when the cook gives us sweetmeats, full-cream milk or anything else.
translation: 当我们拿到糖果，牛奶或其他东西的时候，我始终保证每个孩子分到的一样多。

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] chided me for my obsession with fairness, explaining that justice is simply word invented by human with too much time on their hands.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]斥责我太过沉迷于正义，并且说正义只是人类发明的无聊的借口。

original: People are naive fools, laughing, dancing and nodding like puppets to the false tune played by priests and noblemen. Charlatans all!
translation: 人们都是天真的傻瓜，像小狗一样被教士和贵族们愚弄着。都是骗子！

original: The priest bored me to tears with a sermon, then told my [GetFromRelation] about my cynicism. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] tried beating it out of me...
translation: 这个牧师烦得我想哭，然后他告诉了我的[GetFromRelation]我的愤世嫉俗。[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]因此试图改变我的态度……

original: Haha, look at that rat trying to walk with broken legs! Roly poly little rat!
translation: 哈哈，看那只断了腿的耗子试图逃跑！真是有趣的小老鼠！

original: My ears are still ringing from the slap [From.GetTitledFirstName] gave me over that rat.
translation: 因为那只小老鼠，我的[From.GetTitledFirstName]给了我一耳光，我到现在还在耳鸣。

original: Maybe the stablemaster knows more about horses than I do, I'm not that interested anymore anyway.
translation: 或许马夫比我更了解马，我对这个没有兴趣了。

original: I need a new hobby. Oh, a bible!
translation: 我需要一个新的爱好。啊，圣经！
奇怪的东西在我体内觉醒了

original: I know I should not be drawn to other men but I can't seem to help it. Should I deny my feelings and be as the church and world wants me to be?
translation: 我知道我不应该喜欢上其他男人，但我无法克制自己。我应该拒绝这份感情吗？像教会和世界希望的那样过完一生？

original: I know I should not be drawn to other women but I can't seem to help it. Should I deny my feelings and be as the church and world wants me to be?
translation: 我知道我不应该喜欢上其他女人，但我无法克制自己。我应该拒绝这份感情吗？像教会和世界希望的那样过完一生？

original: I can run around wild and do whatever I want. Without any guardian, I set my own moral standards!
translation: 我到处游荡，做着我想做的事情。没有任何人约束我，我行我素！

original: We have children at the court that has no guardian handling their education. They run a risk of becoming spoiled brats.
translation: 我们的宫廷里有孩子缺乏监护人教育。他们可能会成为小混混。

original: I guess I have to take care of it myself then.
translation: 我想我不得不亲自监护他们。

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] practically lives in the kitchens, the little glutton!
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]某种程度上是住在厨房里了，小馋鬼！

original: Heh, eat and be merry child!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] hardly eats anything for fear of turning fat.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]因为害怕变胖几乎不敢吃东西。

original: Hold up [From.GetFirstName] as an example for the court!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is a charitable little rascal, [From.GetSheHe] just gave [From.GetHerHis] newest toy to the smith's son.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]是一个善良的孩子，[From.GetSheHe]刚刚把[From.GetHerHis]最新的玩具给了铁匠的孩子。

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is not exerting [From.GetReflexivePronoun] in [From.GetPossPronoun] studies. I am starting to despair.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]不能尽[From.GetPossPronoun]力去学习。我感到绝望。

original: [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is just dense. What can I do?
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] does [From.GetHerHis] homework and is always on time for [From.GetHerHis] lessons.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]按时完成[From.GetHerHis]作业，[From.GetHerHis]课从不迟到。

original: Praise [From.GetObjectPronoun] in front of the court.
The child needs to lighten up!
I had to break up a fight between my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] and another child today. [From.GetFirstName]'s heart is filled with envy...
translation: 今天我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]和另一个孩子差点打起来，我不得不强行拉开他们。[From.GetFirstName]的心里充满着嫉妒……

original: The other children are just selfish
Envy is the deadliest of sins!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has a tender and loving soul, trusting everyone in the castle. I fear [From.GetSheHe] will get hurt someday.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]温柔善良，信任城堡里的每个人。我怕[From.GetSheHe]某天会因此受到伤害。

original: Those who love get love in return!

translation: 让大家都知道什么是美德[From.GetSubjectPronoun]。

original: Tender soul? I'll give [From.GetObjectPronoun] a tender back!
translation: 温柔的，我同样会报 [From.GetObjectPronoun]以温柔！

original: The cook complained to me about my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s temper tantrums. Apparently [From.GetSubjectPronoun] punched her son in the face. Again.
translation: 厨师向我抱怨我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]的坏脾气。很明显[From.GetSubjectPronoun]又一次打了她儿子的脸。
那孩子看起来很有精神！

original: Patience is a virtue, but sometimes it gets on my nerves. My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] never loses [From.GetPossPronoun] temper, always waiting patiently for a chance to retaliate.
translation: 耐心是一种美德，但有时会让我心烦。我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]从来不会发[From.GetPossPronoun]脾气，总是耐心的等待一个报复的机会。

original: Hold up [From.GetFirstName] as an example for the court!
I'll bring out the fire in [From.GetObjectPronoun]!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is modest and humble, never showing off or bragging.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]很谦虚，从不炫耀或吹嘘。

original: That's no way to get ahead!
With the birch, [From.GetSheHe] will speak the truth!
Pray that [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will show [From.GetHerHim] the light
My little [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] always has [From.GetPossPronoun] nose in the scriptures, and spends all [From.GetPossPronoun] time among the priests.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]总是沉迷于[From.GetPossPronoun]圣经中，而且[From.GetPossPronoun]一直和牧师们呆在一起。

original: I will not raise a zealot!
translation: 我不希望培养出一个狂信者！

original: The lady almost ran me down as I entered the hall. Tearfully she told me that my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] had insulted her again.
translation: 在我走进大厅的时候，这个女士差点撞到我。她哭着对我说我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]再次侮辱了她。

original: But, my dear lady, you ARE fat!
translation: 但是，我亲爱的女士，你*确实*胖啊！

original: Tell [From.GetFirstName] that honesty has its bounds...
The smallest spider makes my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] squeal and run for cover. This has started to worry me.
translation: 这只小蜘蛛使我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]大声尖叫并到处乱躲。这让我很担心。

original: Spiders? I can't abide them either!
Some fears are good, but there are limits
translation: 有些恐惧是好的，但要有限制

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] was bitten by a snake this morning! The brave little fool keeps seeking out danger.
translation: 今天早上我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]被蛇咬了！那个勇敢的小傻瓜总是找危险的事做。

original: Every time my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] meets a stranger, [From.GetSheHe] looks like [From.GetSheHe] might faint.
translation: 每次我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]遇见陌生人，[From.GetSheHe]看起来就像马上要晕倒一样。

original: The [From.GetLadLass] is just a bit shy
Shyness can be cured by the birch!
Shyness is a terrible curse, I'll talk with [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 羞怯是一个可怕的诅咒，我会和[From.GetHerHim]谈一谈。

original: When guests arrive, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is the first to greet them and shower them with questions.
translation: 当客人到达之后，我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]第一个问候了他们并请教了他们一些问题。
向宫廷里每一个人介绍[From.GetHerHim]！

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is aiming for the stars, the ambitious little brat.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]志在星辰大海，这个野心勃勃的小子。

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] lacks all passion and ambition, perfectly content with [From.GetHerHis] lot in life.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]完全没有激情和雄心，非常满足于[From.GetHerHis]现有生活。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is impulsive and seems unable to tell right from wrong. What should I do with my wayward [GetFromRelation]?
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]很冲动，不能明辨是非。我该如何处置我任性的 [GetFromRelation]？

original: How about a pat on the head?
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] makes sure everyone gets exactly the same amount of whatever sweets the cook gives the children.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]保证每个人都能分到同样多的糖果。

original: Time to explain how the world works
translation: 该给他讲讲一些潜规则了

original: I fear my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is too cynical for [From.GetHerHis] age.
translation: 我担心我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]太愤世嫉俗，与[From.GetHerHis]年龄不相称。

original: I caught my young ward [From.GetTitledFirstName] torturing a rat behind the stables today...
translation: 我今天发现我任性的[From.GetTitledFirstName]在马棚后面折磨一只耗子……

original: With the birch, [From.GetSheHe] will learn better!
I managed to blame the monks at a nearby monastery for one of my more sensuous songs of courtly love.
translation: 我设法将我众多情歌中的一首表达细腻情调的情歌思路归咎于附近修道院的僧侣们。

original: After a pleasant evening with a... very special friend of mine, I found my purse empty. Luckily, I didn't carry that much gold with me.
translation: 在一个愉快的晚上，我和一个…特殊的朋友在一起，我突然发现钱包不见了，幸好里面没有多少金子。

original: I will not visit that brothel again
translation: 我再也不会去那所妓院了

original: I have arranged a small tournament for my own enjoyment. I chose the most beautiful lady at the tournament and she accepted me as her champion.
translation: 我已经安排了一个小小的骑士比赛以愉悦自己。在比赛中，我选择一位最美丽的女士，她接受了我作为她的冠军。

original: I will fight, and I will win, for your honor must be protected
translation: 我会战斗，并取得胜利，因为你的荣誉必须得到保护
我的妻子就是我的荣誉！

original: I do not dare fight though.
Oh, how much joy I've had from Ovidius. Clearly there must be something divine in his great writing. But why do I feel so guilty?
translation: 哦，真令人高兴，我已经拿到了奥维德的大作。他字里行间中充满着灵性。可是我怎么觉得那么内疚？

original: One of my knights is embroiled in a deep argument with one of his rivals about who is the legal heir to a small plot of land. This has a risk to turn into a feud in my demesne, so I have to make a judgement.
translation: 我的一个骑士与他的仇敌正为一小块封地的继承权而争吵。这可能在我的领地上引发混乱，我必须作出裁决。

original: Spend time and money investigating the truth.
translation: 花费时间和金钱在调查真相。

original: One of our vassals, a notoriously glutton, has invited us to a banquet. Naturally we attended, in a vain hope to improve feudal relations, but the banquet could have fed several villages.
translation: 我的一位封臣是个臭名昭著的贪吃鬼，他邀请我们参加一个宴会.我们自然去了，徒劳的想要改善我们的主从关系，但是我发现这个宴会足够让数个村子的人吃饱。

original: Scold our host for his sins.
Keep quiet, and pray God will forgive our sin.
translation: 保持安静，并祈求上帝宽恕我们的罪孽。

original: Words of my pledged chastity has reached the Pope who sent a courier with a letter of approval and his blessing.
translation: 教宗听说了我的禁欲誓言，他派信使送来了一封信，在信中他对我的做法表示了支持和祝福。

original: This is a sign that I should be celibate!
Does the Pope think I will grant him my lands?
translation: 难道教宗认为我会把我的领地送给他么？

original: Thank God quietly in the chapel...
translation: 在礼拜堂里静静地感谢主……

original: Word of my pledged chastity has reached the Pope who have a sent a devout priest to guide me even closer to God.
translation: 教宗听说了我的禁欲誓言，他派来一名虔诚的神父来引导我更加接近主。

original: With the presence of an old and experienced scholar in the court, there is much to learn about the aspect of chastity and how this virtue leads us close to God.
translation: 一位年老而富有经验的学者加入了我的宫廷，要我学习很多东西，包括要怎样去保持贞洁以及这种美德是如何使我们更加靠近主。
愚蠢的建议，我拒绝接受！

original: Every time I reject one of the desirable women who throws themself in my way, the others increases their efforts. Do they wish for me to burn in hell?
translation: 每当我拒绝了一位欲求不满的女性的求爱，又会有其他人向我示爱。她们难道想让我下地狱承受烈火焚身的痛苦么？

original: I will not give in to temptation.
One of the lovely ladies that have been throwing herself at me has finally cornered me in private, and there is no honorable way to get out of this.
translation: 终于，一位向我示爱的可爱小姐在私下场合把我逼入了绝境，我找不到体面的方法离开这里.

original: God, have mercy on my soul.
My chastity has lead my rivals to question my masculinity.
translation: 我的贞洁的行为使得我的对手开始质疑我的男子气概。

original: The rumors regarding me and my 'alleged' chastity has grown into ridicule. Something have to be done, or my reputation as a strong [Root.GetManWoman] and [Root.GetTitle] will suffer.
translation: 关于我以及我那「所谓的」禁欲誓言的流言已经变得十分荒唐可笑。我必须做些什么，否则的话，作为一个强力的[Root.GetManWoman]以及[Root.GetTitle]，我的声誉将会受损。

original: Pay someone to spread stories about my manliness
translation: 付钱让人传播我的男子气概的故事

original: Declare my love for my Wife
translation: 宣布我对我妻子的挚爱

original: I love a good feast at my castle and I spared no expenses when I arranged the feast, the table was filled with geese, pork, cheese and plenty of wine. I doubt my guests left my halls with empty bellies.
translation: 我喜欢在我城堡里举行的一场成功的宴会，这场宴会没花费我一分钱，餐桌上摆满了烤鹅，猪肉，奶酪和足够的葡萄酒。我想我的客人们不可能空腹离开我的宴会。

original: But my guests had to pay to come.
translation: 但是我的客人们需要付钱来参加.

original: I made sure the wine flowed and the plates were never empty. Some of us might had a bit more fun than the others and woke with a terrible headache, but it was surely worth it.
translation: 我确保没有酒瓶和盘子是空的.我们中的一些人比其他人吃喝得更畅快一些，虽然第二天起来会有严重的头痛，但是这绝对是值得的.

original: Everyone told me it had been a fantastic night!
translation: 每个人都告诉我这是一个美妙的夜晚！

original: Some wanted to congratulate me in person
translation: 有人想要亲自对我表示祝贺

original: Truth be told, I never thought I would ever really like [From.GetTitledFirstName], but when [From.GetSheHe] held a great banquet we got drunk together and I had a good time.
translation: 说实话，我从来没想过我会真的喜欢上[From.GetTitledFirstName]，但是[From.GetSheHe]举办了一场伟大的宴会，我们一起喝得大醉，我必须承认我过得十分愉快.

original: One of my courtiers have always acted a bit odd around me, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] seems to have relaxed a bit after the banquet. [From.GetSheHeCap] almost seems friendly now.
translation: 我的一位廷臣在我身边的时候总是表现的有些奇怪，但在这场宴会之后[From.GetTitledFirstName]看起来放松了一些。[From.GetSheHeCap]现在看上去对我十分友善。

original: When I was younger, no one could defeat me at the tournaments nor in battle. Nowadays, I can barely mount my stallion. This is clearly not a healthy lifestyle...
translation: 当我年轻的时候，没人能在比武大会或是战场上击败我.现在，我只能勉强骑上我的战马.这显然不是一种健康的生活方式……

original: My obesity and my hunger for food has left me with no desire left in my body. All that is left to me is to eat, eat and eat!
translation: 我的肥胖以及我对食物的渴求让我的身体里没有留下其他的欲望，除了吃，吃，还是吃！

original: Watching [From.GetTitledFirstName] eat is revolting! And [From.GetSheHe] eats all the time!
translation: 看着[From.GetTitledFirstName]吃东西让人恶心！而且[From.GetSheHe]无时无刻不在吃！

original: I better let [This.GetHerHim] know that gluttony is not attractive
translation: 我最好让[This.GetHerHim]知道贪吃使他不讨人喜欢

original: It was devastating to hear [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s harsh critique: how my constant eating and bad table manners is revolting to everyone and that I severely need a diet!
translation: 收到[From.GetTitledFirstName]的严厉批评对我来说实在是太可怕了，他说我的不停进食以及餐桌上的丑态让每一个人反胃，我急需减肥！

original: That is hurtful! Why would you tell me this?
translation: 这太伤人了！你为什么要告诉我这些？

original: In front of a tatty beggar's bowl a coin glittered. I snatched it from the mud before he could react and ignored his furious curses.
translation: 在一个衣衫褴褛的乞丐的碗前有一枚硬币闪闪发光，我抢在他反应过来之前从泥里捡起了硬币，并无视了他的激烈咒骂。

original: And some fool had just given him the money
translation: 刚刚施舍给他这枚硬币的人是个傻瓜

original: I sacrificed one of my oldest friends today because of my greediness. One of my friend's enemies offered me a bribe I couldn't resist.
translation: 今天我为我的贪婪出卖了一位老朋友，他的敌人用一大笔我无法抗拒的金钱买通了我.

original: I won more than I lost
The priest had to prod me with the collection bag several times before I gruffly put a coin in it.
translation: 神父不得不拿钱袋戳了我好几次，我这才没好气的往里面放了一个硬币.

original: Attempt to steal some from it.
Being charitable is about loving other human beings and forgiving them the trespasses they do to us.
translation: 仁慈就是爱其他的人并宽恕他们对我们的侵害.

original: Caring for the sick and infirm is one of the duties of charity. There are people in our court that needs our help.
translation: 关心生病和虚弱的人是一种仁慈的责任.在我们的宫廷里有人需要我们的帮助.

original: One part of being charitable is to harbor the homeless. Several villages have been destroyed in a storm, and the peasants need somewhere to live.
translation: 仁慈还包括收留无家可居的人们。有数座村庄被风暴摧毁，这些农民急需住的地方。

original: I can let them stay in one of my castles.
translation: 我可以让他们住进我的一座城堡中。

original: There is just no place for them...
translation: 刚好没有收留他们的地方……

original: Being charitable means that you have to love the sinner and admonish them for their sins.
translation: 仁慈意味着爱有罪的人并对他们的罪行进行训诫。

original: It is a duty to their eternal life.
translation: 这份责任将永远伴随着他们。

original: I don't want to upset them.
Thomas of Aquinas teaches us that upholding the virtue of Charity means to bear wrongs patiently. There are some people who dislike me personally and wish me bad luck, but I forgive them.
translation: 圣托马斯·阿奎那教导我们要保持慷慨这一美德，意思就是要耐心的容忍错误.有些人因个人原因而不喜欢我，但是我原谅他们。

original: I bow my head in prayer.
I can not follow those teachings...
translation: 我无法按照这些教导去做……

original: While walking together with [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] and discussing my finances, we met a couple of beggars. I knew [Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHe] did not approve of alms, but the young mother with no shoes and a wailing baby could not be ignored.
translation: 在同[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]一起散步并谈论我的财政状况的时候，我们遇到了一对乞丐.我知道[Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHe]不同意施舍的行为，但是我无法无视这个年轻的没有鞋子穿的母亲以及哇哇大哭的婴儿。

original: It was just enough for something to eat
translation: 只是施舍一些让他们果腹的食物

original: I squirm and almost feel sick every time I see [From.GetTitledFirstName] hand out another shiny gold coin to yet another filthy and lice infested beggar.
translation: 每当看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]向肮脏的长满跳蚤的乞丐施舍闪亮的金币的时候，我都感到恶心快要吐出来了.

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is a good example to me
I should tell [This.GetHerHim] how I feel about [This.GetHerHis] generosity!
translation: 我应当告诉[This.GetHerHim]我对[This.GetHerHis]慷慨抱有什么看法！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has a problem with my generosity towards the poor.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]质疑我对于穷人的慷慨大方。

original: Maybe I should be less charitable
translation: 也许我应该少做一点慈善

original: I have minimized the amount of work I need to do each day by delegating most of my workload onto my courtiers.
translation: 通过把大部分的工作负担委派给我的廷臣，我每天要做的工作量减到了最小。

original: The less I work, the more time I can spend with the people I really care about.
translation: 我工作的越少，就有越多的时间陪我真正关心的人一起度过.
更加聪明的工作，而不是更加刻苦

original: My slothfulness has caused part of my castle to deteriorate. I delegated the care of my castle to someone unworthy.
translation: 我的懒惰使得我城堡一部分的情况开始恶化.我把管理城堡的工作交给了无能的人.

original: My relations with [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is strained. To uphold the virtue of diligence it is vital to show loyalty and steadfastness.
translation: 我同[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的关系有些紧张.为了保持「勤勉」这一美德，展示忠诚和毅力是至关重要的。

original: Bend my knee to my liege.

Being a feudal lord means working hard at keeping your personal relations with your vassals at an acceptable level. Sometimes though, they seem to have grudges against me, and I must work at eliminating those and instill proper loyalty.
translation: 做好一位封建领主意味着努力把你和封臣之间的个人关系保持在友好的水平。可是有时他们看上去对我有所怨恨，我就必须消除这些怨念并灌输应有的忠诚。

original: Be an example to my vassals!
translation: 为我的封臣们做好榜样！

original: Talk about feudal obligations to them.
translation: 同他们讲讲封建的义务.

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is such an inspiring person. [From.GetSheHeCap] is such a diligent ruler, that I wish I could be the same.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]是一个能够鼓舞人心的人.我想成为像[From.GetSheHeCap]一样勤勉的统治者.

original: I will do whatever it takes.
translation: 无论付出什么代价我都会去这样做.

original: Sounds like too much work for me.
translation: 要这样做的话，工作有些太多了。

original: Following the teachings of divinely inspired thinkers, a diligent human should strive for peaceful resolutions. I have members of my court who do not see eye to eye, and my duty as their liege is to arbitrate their disputes.
translation: 按照圣徒们的教导，一个勤勉的人应当努力寻求和平解决问题的方法.我的宫廷里有两人意见不一，作为他们的领主我的责任是对他们的纠纷进行仲裁.

original: It was a lot of talk, but well worth it.
There are always things that need to be done when it comes to expanding and improving a castle.  With the proper planning, and diligent work, I can make sure the work becomes more efficient.
translation: 想要扩建一座城堡总是有许多事情要做.合理的计划和勤奋的工作，可以保证事半功倍.

original: Since I am such a diligent person, I make sure that everything is as good as it can be.  When it comes to my fighting men, I can focus on one of two things.
translation: 我是一个勤勉的人，我尽力让每件事情都做到尽善尽美.关于我的部队有两件事情要做，但我要选择一件来将我的精力集中在上面.

original: The morale of my retinue is the most important.
translation: 我近卫军士气是最重要的。

original: I have fallen to the temptation of slothfulness. There are things I have neglected in my castle, things that should have been done, but I postponed them.
translation: 我被懒惰引诱而堕落.我把我的城堡中本应完成的许多事情推后了.

original: May God have mercy on my soul.

There is always a place at my table and a warm spot in front of the hearth for all the old men and women who have served me before and now have nowhere else to go. Their stories delight everyone and I see no need for them to be forgotten after long lives of hard work for me.
translation: 对于那些曾经为我服务过，现在又无处可去的老人，我的家门总为他们敞开。他们的故事使每一个人感到愉悦，我认为不应忘记这些长期为我辛勤工作的人们。

original: Some courtiers think it's good, too
translation: 有的廷臣也认为这是一件好事情

original: The kindness of [From.GetTitledFirstName] is an example to us all. [From.GetSheHeCap] takes care of [From.GetHerHis] servants as they grow old and incapable of anything but the simplest of chores.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]的善良是我们所有人的榜样。当[From.GetHerHis]仆人年纪变老，只能做简单的家务之后，[From.GetSheHeCap]就会负起照顾他们的责任。

original: I should tell [This.GetHerHim] [This.GetSheHe]'s almost too kind
translation: 我应该告诉[This.GetHerHim]，[This.GetSheHe]有些过于善良了

original: I almost blushed when [From.GetTitledFirstName] expressed [From.GetHerHis] admiration over my generosity and kindness!
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]表示[From.GetHerHis]对于我的慷慨善良的敬仰时，我的脸差点红了！

original: Thank you for those kind words!
My courtiers fear me, they fear my outbursts of anger whenever they disobey and disappoint me.
translation: 我的廷臣们害怕我，当他们违背我以及让我失望的时候，我爆发的愤怒让他们恐惧。
虽然，他们很少做这样的事。

original: I was a little bit surprised when a courtier asked if he could be the one to haggle with the merchants for once. I agreed, glad that someone else took the responsibility to discuss, haggle and threaten the merchants to a fair deal.
translation: 一位廷臣问我这一次可否让他来和商人们讨价还价，我感到有点吃惊。我同意了，很高兴有人能为了公平的交易去同商人争论，砍价甚至威胁他们。

original: I just hope this works out fine
translation: 我只希望有个好的结果

original: I was talking to the merchant about his latest shipment of goods and tried to be diplomatic. For some reason he felt confident enough to try and cheat me on what was rightly mine, even if I hadn't paid him yet...
translation: 我同这个商人谈论他新运来的那批货物，努力显示我的老练。某种原因使他相信他可以欺骗我并获取我的利益，即使我还没付钱给他……

original: A merchant tried to trick [From.GetTitledFirstName]! I had to interfere and I made sure he would never try that one on me or [From.GetFirstName] ever again...
translation: 一个商人想要对[From.GetTitledFirstName]耍花招！我不得不干预，让他再也不敢在我或者[From.GetFirstName]面前这样做……

original: I gave the priest such a scolding today when he dared ask me, his rightful liege and lord, for a donation! Isn't he living on my sufferance? Haven't I allowed him to collect money himself from his parish?
translation: 今天神父向我索要捐款，作为他的领主，我严厉斥责了他。他难道不是因为我的容许才能在这里生活么？难道我没有允许他自己从教区敛财么？

original: I overheard [From.GetTitledFirstName] when [From.GetSheHe] told the priest to sod off. The man only asked for a small donation for the orphanage!
translation: 我无意中听到了[From.GetTitledFirstName]和神父的对话。[From.GetSheHe]却让神父滚开。他只是为孤儿要一笔小小的捐款！

original: As I exited the church I heard [From.GetTitledFirstName] mention my scolding of the priest to a couple of [From.GetHerHis] friends, sounding distressed and angry. I walked closer and as I approached them, [From.GetTitledFirstName] started showering me with insults before I even had a chance to explain.
translation: 当我走出教堂的时候我听到[From.GetTitledFirstName]向[From.GetHerHis]几个朋友提及我斥责神父的事情，听起来感到哀伤和愤怒.我走近他们试图解释，但[From.GetTitledFirstName]不给我开口的机会就用大量的言辞来侮辱我。
那就没什么好解释的了！

original: After my scolding of the priest I left fuming with anger and was ready to slap whoever it was that touched my arm to stop me. In front of me stood [From.GetTitledFirstName], who told me that the priest certainly deserved the scolding, given all I had done for him and the church.
translation: 在斥责神父之后，我满头怒气的离开了，这时谁要是敢抓住我的胳膊阻止我离开的话，我就敢扇他耳光。[From.GetTitledFirstName]站到我面前，告诉我神父受到了应得的责备。

original: Yes, that was what I thought
My mood swings, mostly from good-tempered to wroth, have made my courtiers fear me a little bit too much. It has caused me to lose prestige.
translation: 我的喜怒无常使得我的廷臣们有点过于害怕我了.这使我的威信扫地.

original: The holy book tells us that 'The patient man shows much good sense, but the quick-tempered man displays folly at its height'. There are people in my court who are quick to anger, and who may need a patient voice to calm them down.
translation: 圣经教导我们「缓于发怒的人，必甚有见识；脾气暴躁的人，必大显愚昧」.在我的宫廷里有些人十分易怒，需要有见识的人来帮他们冷静下来.

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is reasoning with us about our anger.
The virtue of patience teaches us about endurance through moderation. By moderation in our life, health will improve.
translation: 七美德之一的「耐心」教导我们通过节制自身的欲望来忍耐.节制可以使我们身体健康.

original: As St. Paul teaches us, 'Be patient with all. See that no one returns evil for evil, rather, always seek what is good for each other and for all'.
translation: 圣保禄教导我们：「你们要谨慎，无论是谁都不可以恶报恶.或是彼此相待，或是待众人，常要追求良善.」

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent an emissary to me, saying [From.GetSheHe] has forgiven us some imagined slights.  I do not know what [From.GetHerHis] reasons are, but I will accept [From.GetHerHis] message.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]派来一位密使，告诉我[From.GetSheHe]已经原谅我们的怠慢。虽然我不知道[From.GetHerHis]原因是什么，但是我会接受[From.GetHerHis]消息。

original: By upholding the virtue of Patience, God teaches us to show mercy to sinners. What greater way to show mercy, than to forgive the greatest sinner, and pray with him or her for their salvation.
translation: 通过保有耐心这一美德，主教导我们对有罪的人要有一颗慈悲的心。还有什么方式能比宽恕最大的罪人并和他一起祈求救恩更能显示慈悲呢。

original: Pray with the sinner in the chapel tonight.
translation: 今晚同罪人一起在礼拜堂祈祷.
为他们的灵魂独自祈祷.

original: Our sins have not gone unnoticed. My liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName] is inviting me to join [From.GetHerHim] in the chapel in an attempt to save my soul tonight.
translation: 有人注意到了我们的罪孽。我的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]邀请我今晚去礼拜堂和[From.GetHerHim]一起来忏悔我们的罪。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] came to the chapel, with tears in [From.GetHerHis] eyes. We spent the night in prayer, until the sun went up. Praying desperately for the mercy of God..
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]来到礼拜堂，[From.GetHerHis]眼中噙着泪花。我们祈祷了一整夜，直到太阳升起，努力祈求主的宽恕……

original: I spent the night alone in the chapel, praying hard for the salvation of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHe] never showed up.
translation: 一整夜我独自一人呆在礼拜堂里，为拯救[From.GetTitledFirstName]的灵魂而努力祈祷.[From.GetSheHe]却一直没有来。

original: My God have mercy on [From.GetHerHis] soul.
I believe I can do great things so therefore I have put my mind to actually implement my ideas.
translation: 我相信我有做大事的才能，因此我尽心尽力的去实现我的想法.

original: I have a great idea but no money to make my dream real. One of the travelling merchants who regularly visits [Root.Location.GetName] has shown interest in my idea but always changed his mind whenever I ask him to invest in it.
translation: 我有一个伟大的计划，但是没有钱去实现它.一个经常来[Root.Location.GetName]的旅行商人对我的计划有些兴趣，但是每当我要求他投资的时候，他总会改主意.
但是……这确实是一个伟大的计划！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] had been trying to convince the merchant to invest in one of [From.GetHerHis] ideas for several weeks but he had always refused, until today. The idea was actually quite good but I dared not give [From.GetTitledFirstName] the coins myself, instead I had given the merchant the coins needed and told him to pretend to be convinced and then invest in the idea.
translation: 几周以来，[From.GetTitledFirstName]一直在试图说服这个商人在[From.GetHerHis]一个计划上面投资，但总是被拒绝.这个计划确实很好，但是我不敢自己给[From.GetTitledFirstName]钱，而是把所需的钱给了这个商人，让他假装被说服同意投资。

original: I hope this will keep [From.GetHerHim] happy and occupied.
translation: 我希望这能让[From.GetHerHim]高兴并且不感到无聊。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] got someone to invest in one of [This.GetHerHis] ideas

The merchant had apparently changed his mind and promised to finance my idea so I could begin working on it. I have a feeling [From.GetTitledFirstName] had something to do with the merchant's change of mind but I can care less.
translation: 那个商人明显的改了主意并且同意资助我的计划，所以我可以开工了。我想这与[From.GetTitledFirstName]有关，但是我可以不去管它。

original: I will start working on it immediately!
Someone laughed at me! I will find the culprit and make him or her choke on their laughter!
translation: 有人嘲笑我！我会找到罪魁祸首然后塞住他嘲笑的嘴脸！

original: Who dares laughing at me? Who!?

I knew [From.GetTitledFirstName] was too proud for [From.GetHerHis] own good, but I accidentally managed to hurt [From.GetHerHis] pride and [From.GetSheHe] lashed out at me and called me many bad things. I don't know if I can forgive [From.GetHerHim] for those harsh words...
translation: 我知道[From.GetTitledFirstName]对[From.GetHerHis]自己的优点过于自傲了，但是我无意中伤害到了[From.GetHerHis]自尊，[From.GetSheHe]对我破口大骂并且说了很多难听的话.我不知道我会否原谅[From.GetHerHim]如此恶劣的言辞……

original: I won't ever talk to [This.GetTitledFirstName] again!
When I found out who it was who had laughed at me, I tried to swallow my pride but I choked on it and it managed to escape. Now [From.GetTitledFirstName] won't talk to me...
translation: 当我发现到底是谁在笑话我的时候，我试图吞下我脆弱的自尊心，但我失败了。现在[From.GetTitledFirstName]再也不会和我说话了……

original: I stayed behind when a couple of my friends went hunting as I have never been able to see blood without fainting. Their hunting luck was good and we feasted on wild boar meat that evening.
translation: 当我和两个朋友去打猎的时候，我呆在后方，因为我见到血会晕倒。他们打猎的运气不错，我们那天晚上大吃了一顿野猪肉。

original: I fainted when I saw the boar's face covered with bloody froth
translation: 当我看见覆盖在野猪脸上的血沫时我晕了过去

original: Everyone else ran off to chase the alleged thieves who had stolen a very valuable object from our church. Instead of following them, I went to the church and discovered the chalice hidden behind one of the benches.
translation: 我们教堂里丢失了一样重要的物品，所有人都跑去追赶嫌疑犯。我没有跟他们一起去，我走进了教堂找到了藏在一张条凳后面的圣血杯。

original: I have had times when the cowardice of [From.GetTitledFirstName] made me doubt [From.GetHerHim]. But the way [From.GetSheHe] handled the situation when everybody else ran in different directions to try and catch a chalice thief made me reevaluate [From.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 以前[From.GetTitledFirstName]的怯懦让我对[From.GetHerHim]有所怀疑。但是在其他人都四处乱跑试图寻找偷窃圣血杯的犯人时，[From.GetTitledFirstName]解决问题的方法使我对[From.GetSheHe]重新进行评价。

original: The priest had just misplaced the chalice
translation: 神父把圣血杯放错地方了

original: If no one else tells [This.GetTitledFirstName] [This.GetSheHe] did good, I will
translation: 如果没人告诉[This.GetTitledFirstName]，[This.GetSheHe]做的很好，就让我来告诉吧

original: I had not really expected anyone to truly care about the missing chalice, at the time it seemed more like an excuse to make as much noise and tumult as possible. I was proven wrong when [From.GetTitledFirstName] shook my hand and thanked me for finding the chalice.
translation: 我并没有期待有人会真的在意丢失的圣血杯，看起来它更像一个鼓噪骚动的借口。但是当[From.GetTitledFirstName]同我握手感谢我找回了圣血杯的时候，我发现我想错了。

original: Well... ehum... it was nothing, really
translation: 那个……嗯……这不算什么，真的不算什么

original: The sound of blade against blade makes me shiver and the fierce roars from the fighting men makes me want to run and hide.
translation: 剑锋撞击的声音让我瑟瑟发抖，搏斗双方的咆哮吓得我只想逃跑藏起来.

original: Enough with your nagging! You can come along
translation: 受够了你的唠叨！跟着来吧!

original: There is no way you'll join us!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] saved me from a huge bear!
The beast was huge, bigger than any bear I had ever seen. I fought him bravely but only managed to slay him after he wounded several of my men.
translation: 那头熊体型硕大，比我以前见过的任何一头熊都要巨大.我和它英勇搏斗并杀死了它，但我的几个手下为此负了伤。

original: I was one of the first to saddle my horse and chase after the bandits who had stolen one of the valuable chalices from our church. When I returned, exhausted and with filthy clothes, I was told the old priest had simply misplaced the chalice.
translation: 我是第一个翻上马鞍追赶强盗的人，他们偷走了一只重要的我们教堂的圣血杯。当我疲惫不堪，满身污秽的返回的时候，我被告知圣血杯只是被老神父放错地方了。

original: He appreciated my effort, at least
translation: 至少他对我的努力表示感谢

original: While searching for a lost chalice, I came upon a band of rogues who robbed me!
translation: 在找寻丢失的圣血杯时，我遇到了一帮歹徒，他们抢劫了我！

original: For the past two years, [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has risked [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] life countless of times. A broken leg, a nearly fatal wound and an accident that might have left [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] blind has not slowed [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] down.
translation: 在过去两年中，[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]无数次的拿[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]生命去冒险。一条断腿，一道几乎致命的伤口和一次差点让[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]失明的事故并没有阻止[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]。
但是冒险太让我热血沸腾了！

original: I was especially invited to my friend's sermon and it was a catastrophe! The poor man stumbled, lost his words and it was all an incomprehensible mess.
translation: 我被特别邀请参加我的朋友的布道会，但是那是场彻头彻尾的灾难！那个可怜的人说话卡壳了，不知道说些什么了，讲出的话乱七八糟的，理解不能。

original: I didn't dare tell him that
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants an opinion on his sermon
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]想听一些关于他的布道的意见

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] seemed to appreciate my first sermon, even if [From.GetSheHe] did not put it in so many words. [From.GetTitledFirstName] just nodded and smiled when I asked if [From.GetSheHe] liked it.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]好像挺欣赏我的初次布道，即使[From.GetSheHe]并没有太多的言辞。[From.GetTitledFirstName]只是在我问[From.GetSheHe]是否喜欢我的讲经时点头微笑。

original: I did not dare tell [From.GetTitledFirstName] what I thought about [From.GetHerHis] sermon, so I just smiled and nodded nervously when [From.GetTitledFirstName] talked to me.
translation: 我不敢告诉[From.GetTitledFirstName]我对[From.GetHerHis]布道有什么看法，所以在[From.GetTitledFirstName]同我交谈的时候我只是局促的微笑点头。
尽管如此，[From.GetSheHeCap]看起来还是挺喜欢我的

original: An important guest arrived today and was most insulted when I, struck with tongue-tiedness, was unable to greet him.
translation: 今天一位重要客人到访，但是由于我患上了结舌，我没能很好的接待他。

original: I have avoided my courtiers for so long, one of them has started to mistrust me.
translation: 很长时间以来，我一直在躲避我的廷臣们，有个廷臣已经开始不信任我了。
我的羞怯使我绊手绊脚

original: It is impossible to try and get a hold of [From.GetTitledFirstName]! [From.GetSheHeCap] always has some sort of excuse to get away from me, ignores me or even hides from me!
translation: 想要留住[From.GetTitledFirstName]是不可能的！[From.GetSheHeCap]总是有借口摆脱我，无视我或者躲着我！

original: I am not that scary, right?
translation: 我并不是那么可怕，难道不是么？

original: After ducking out of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s sight, I realized that [From.GetSheHe] must have seen me and felt ridiculous. Oddly, the [From.GetManWoman] ignored me and seemed to have stopped taking notice of me.
translation: 在逃离[From.GetTitledFirstName]视线之后，我意识到[From.GetSheHe]一定已经看见我了并觉得我可笑。奇怪的是，这个[From.GetManWoman]无视了我，似乎不会再留意我了。

original: I always knew my ambition would help me reach great places and to acquire some wealth during the way is always a nice bonus.
translation: 我知道我的雄心会助我迈向伟大，而在此过程中获取财富是种不错的奖励。
黄金！钻石！矿石！额，等等我……

original: I have risen so fast to the top that other people regard me with envy.
translation: 我晋升速度太快了，其他人都很嫉妒我。

original: Could they be any more envious!
[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s ambition has helped [From.GetHerHim] get where [From.GetSheHe] wanted to go.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]的野心帮助[From.GetHerHim]到达任何[From.GetSheHe]想去的地方。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] begged me to help [From.GetHerHim] become as successful as me. It was almost disgusting how [From.GetSheHe] admired my ambition and success.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]祈求我帮[From.GetHerHim]变得像我一样成功。[From.GetSheHe]对我的野心和成就的羡慕几乎令我作呕。

original: I'll teach you but I gotta charge you.
translation: 我将要教你而不是控告你。

original: I told the priest about my ambitions and asked if there were anything he could do to help me.
translation: 我告诉神父我的雄心壮志，并且问他可否做些什么来帮助我。

original: I know that one of my slothful courtiers is capable of more than he realizes. I want to push the courtier into being more ambitious, I believe there's great potential in that one.
translation: 我知道我的一位懒惰的封臣比他自己意想之中的更有能力。我想让他变得更野心勃勃，我相信他有很大的潜力。

original: It is for both our best
translation: 这对我们双方来说都是最好的

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is driven to be more ambitious
I don't need to do this
It's hard being friends with someone more ambitious than yourself, and lately [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been pushing me to exert my talents beyond my limits.
translation: 同比你更有野心的人为友很难，最近[From.GetTitledFirstName]一直在驱使我发挥出超乎我极限的才能。

original: It is for my own good
It is apparently annoying to be friends with someone more ambitious than yourself, why else would [From.GetTitledFirstName] ignore me?
translation: 同比你更野心勃勃的人为友显然使人烦恼，否则为什么[From.GetTitledFirstName]会无视我？

original: [From.GetSheHeCap]'s got a green-eyed monster on [From.GetHerHis] shoulder
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]在[From.GetHerHis]肩膀上找到个绿眼的怪物

original: My subtle ways of pushing [From.GetTitledFirstName] into showing [From.GetHerHis] true potential has worked wonders! It is as if [From.GetSheHe] has realized how fun it can be to be ambitious.
translation: 我以巧妙的方法推动[From.GetTitledFirstName]展现[From.GetHerHis]真正潜力获得巨大成功！似乎[From.GetSheHe]已经感受到野心勃勃带来的快乐了。

original: I give myself a pat on the back
I am happy with my place in life, I can't think of anything I would rather do than just take care of myself and my friends.
translation: 我对我的生活感到十分幸福，我想不出除了关心自己和朋友之外还有什么值得我做的事情。

original: Being around [From.GetTitledFirstName] makes me feel calm and satisfied. The contentedness of [From.GetHerHim] is contagious and all the world's trouble seem less frightening.
translation: 在[From.GetTitledFirstName]周围使我感到宁静和满足.[From.GetHerHim]的知足常乐会传染，世上所有的困难看起来都不那么可怕了。

original: I have feared for [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s sanity, [From.GetSheHe] has not been [From.GetHerselfHimself] lately. To help ease [From.GetHerHis] problems, I made [From.GetHerHim] join me in the garden to relax and just talk about whatever [From.GetSheHe] needed to talk about.
translation: 我担心[From.GetTitledFirstName]是不是精神失常了，[From.GetSheHe]最近表现的不像[From.GetHerselfHimself]. 为了缓解[From.GetHerHis]病情，我让[From.GetHerHim]和我一起到花园里放松一下，只谈论[From.GetSheHe]需要谈论的话题。
这之后，[From.GetTitledFirstName]感到压力减少了

original: I would be content with visiting the church every other Sunday, but if I don't show up the priest scolds me and tells me I should set a better example for my subjects.
translation: 我每隔一周去一次教堂就满足了，但是如果我没有去，神父就会斥责我并告诉我应该为我的臣民树立一个良好的榜样。

original: My content lifestyle costs a bit, but I don't mind paying for it.
translation: 令我满意的生活方式花费有些多，但是我并不介意在它上面花钱。

original: It's not that expensive after all

Yesterday I found a book and read it for a while, then I put it somewhere and went for a walk in the garden, vaguely thinking I should get back to it later. Today, I found the book again but couldn't remember what it was about so I started reading it again.
translation: 昨天我发现了一本书并且读了一会儿，然后我就把它放在什么地方去花园里散步了，模模糊糊的想着我晚些时候再看它。今天，我又找到了这本书，但是忘了它写的是什么了，所以我就从头开始读了。
我对我的生活很心满意足

original: Someone in your court thinks you should be more ambitious
translation: 你宫廷中的某人认为你应该更加野心勃勃

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] just drifts around, doing nothing productive and nothing interesting. If only [From.GetSheHe] could get off [From.GetHerHis] butt and be more ambitious!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]整天四处游荡，什么有用或者有趣的事情都不做。要是[From.GetSheHe]能够打起[From.GetHerHis]精神变得更有抱负就好了！

original: I shall talk to [This.GetTitledFirstName] about [This.GetHerHis] lack of ambition
translation: 我应该和[This.GetTitledFirstName]谈谈关于[This.GetHerHis]缺乏抱负一事

original: There are people who think I should be more ambitious and find something to strive towards.
translation: 有人认为我应该更野心勃勃并找到奋斗的目标。

original: My subjective opinions have always given me more praise than criticism.
translation: 我的封臣都是些马屁精。

original: Who knew being arbitrary could be good?
translation: 谁知道任意妄为也可以成为优点呢？

original: I stood by the stained glass windows and tried to look through them when the priest approached me and asked me what I thought about them. A courtier by my side spoke before I managed to say some very unfair opinions about the multitude of colors used.
translation: 我站在彩色玻璃窗旁边，试图透过它们向外看去，这时神父走近我并问我对它们的看法。在我准备说玻璃用了太多的色彩之前，站在我身旁的一位廷臣抢在我说出这不公正的意见之前开口。

original: It saved me, but only for a minute.
translation: 这救了我，但是只有很短的时间。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is too arbitrary to voice [From.GetHerHis] own opinion!
translation: 在表达[From.GetHerHis]意见的时候，[From.GetSheHeCap]太武断了！

original: It was a bit flattering, really

translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]看起来认为我的意见很有价值！

original: The priest thought it to be unfair
translation: 神父认为这意见太不公正了

original: When [From.GetTitledFirstName] had told the priest what [From.GetSheHe] thought about the stained glass windows, both looked inquiring at me until I managed to croak something appraising about the windows, using some of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s opinions. The priest seemed satisfied and [From.GetTitledFirstName] beamed at me.
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉神父[From.GetSheHe]对彩色玻璃窗户的意见如何之后，他们都看着我等着我说话，我设法用[From.GetTitledFirstName]的观点来赞美这些窗户。神父看起来满意了，[From.GetTitledFirstName]对着我眉开眼笑。

original: It seems like I've got an admirer
translation: 似乎我得到了一个崇拜者

original: My arbitrariness just cost me several gold coins!
translation: 我的任性刚刚让我损失了好几个金币！

original: I tend to let female thieves and bandits get away with lighter sentences than men. I might condemn a woman to a few months in prison whilst a man might get one of his hands chopped off.
translation: 我倾向于对女性窃贼和强盗做出较轻的宣判。我可能只判处一个女性数月监禁，而相同罪行的男性也许会被砍掉一只手。

original: I have noticed that [From.GetTitledFirstName] favors female thieves over male ones, giving the women lighter sentences. Men often loses one hand while women get condemned to a couple of months in jail.
translation: 我注意到[From.GetTitledFirstName]相对男性窃贼来说更倾向于女性窃贼，给她们定较轻的罪名。男性通常会丢掉一只手，而相同罪行的女性只被判数个月监禁。

original: I have no problem with that
[From.GetTitledFirstName] seems upset with my arbitrary nature.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]看上去对我任意妄为的天性感到失望了。

original: I didn't think anyone had noticed that I give lighter sentences to women than men, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] was all in favor of giving men more severe punishments than women.
translation: 我认为没有人发现我给女性定罪比男性轻，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]完全赞成给男性比女性更严重的惩罚。

original: I could not help but overhear the stablemaster and a courtier's animated discussion. Something about a horse and a payment due today, but the courtier insisted on paying the stablemaster later that week.
translation: 我忍不住偷听马厩总管和廷臣的激烈争论。关于买马的钱要在今天支付，但廷臣坚持再晚些时候付钱给马厩总管。

original: The argument is resolved between [This.GetTitledFirstName] and the stablemaster
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]和马厩总管之间的争论得到了解决

original: A rather heated discussion between myself and the stablemaster caught [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s attention and after listening to us both [From.GetSheHe] settled the matter between me and the stablemaster in a fair way. I got the horse, the stablemaster got the coin.
translation: 我和马厩总管之间的一场激烈争论引起了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的注意，在听取我们双方意见之后，[From.GetSheHe]用公平的方式解决了我们之间的这场争端.我得到了那匹马，马厩总管得到了钱。

original: I settled the matter between [From.GetTitledFirstName] and my stablemaster, I tried to be as just as I could.
translation: 我解决了[From.GetTitledFirstName]和我的马厩总管之间的争端，我尽我最大的努力保持公正。

original: They still won't speak with each other...
translation: 他们仍然不会再同对方讲话……

original: A murmur was heard through the room when I judged the felon to death. It was a just sentence, if perhaps a bit harsh.
translation: 当我判决这名重犯死刑的时候，我听到屋内的一声咕哝。这个判决是公正的，但可能有点重了。

original: I was about to lose a bet and although I felt inclined to cheat, I had to be just even though it cost me some gold.
translation: 我打赌就要输了，虽然我很想作弊，虽然输掉会让我损失一些金币，但我还是做出了公正的行为。

original: Word stood against word, the farmer's against a courtier's about damage caused to the farmer's house by a cow owned by the courtier.
translation: 一句接着一句，这个农民和一位廷臣争论他房子的损失，损失是由这位廷臣的奶牛引起的。
这个农民应该得到补偿

original: Fine, I'll pay for the reparations!
translation: 好吧，我来支付这笔赔偿！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] made me pay for the damages!
I was prepared to pay for the damages...
[From.GetSheHeCap] was happy to pay for the reparations
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was not happy with my decision.
Did [From.GetSheHe] really wish to pay for the reparations?
[From.GetSheHeCap] should just pay for the reparations
I'm sorry but that cookie looked suspicious!
translation: 很抱歉但是这饼干看起来有些可疑！

original: One cynical comment after another... I could not take it anymore, I even tried to bribe [From.GetTitledFirstName] so [From.GetSheHe] would shut up and stop firing cynical remarks at me!
translation: 一个接一个的冷嘲热讽……我再也受不了了，我甚至尝试贿赂[From.GetTitledFirstName]让[From.GetSheHe]闭嘴不再对我吹毛求疵！
别说了！别说了，求求你了！
这些钱给你，你这个愤世嫉俗的[This.GetManWoman]

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] wants me to stop being cynical. That is a promise I will not be able to hold but I won't disturb [From.GetHerHim] anymore.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]想让我停止冷嘲热讽，我无法实现这种承诺，但是我不会再烦扰[From.GetHerHim]了。

original: I hope that is enough, but probably not
translation: 我希望这些钱就够了，但是也许还不够

original: My cynical comments have made people look at things my way. I have created more cynics.
translation: 我冷嘲热讽的言语使其他人也开始用我的方式看待问题，我制造了更多愤世嫉俗的人。

original: No way they will keep up with me
translation: 他们不要妄图能够跟上我的脚步

original: Everybody lies and the courtiers in [Root.Location.GetName] are no exception. One of them dared to speak up and tell me I'm too cynical and not everybody lies.
translation: 所有人都撒谎，[Root.Location.GetName]的廷臣也不例外。他们中的一员竟然敢大声说我太愤世嫉俗了，并不是每一个人都撒谎。

original: Then I knew they all lied!
translation: 然后我就知道，他们都撒谎了！

original: I have grown tired of the cynical ways of [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetHerHis] conviction that everybody lies.
translation: 我已经厌倦了[From.GetTitledFirstName]愤世嫉俗的方式和[From.GetHerHis]说教，认为所有人都撒谎。

original: For example, I never lie... ehum...
translation: 举个例子，我就从不撒谎……额……

original: After [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me not everybody lies I almost started laughing. I told [From.GetHerHim] that if [From.GetSheHe] could prove that, I would start believing in mankind again.
translation: 在[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我并不是每一个人都撒谎之后，我差点笑出声来。我告诉[From.GetHerHim]如果[From.GetSheHe]能够证明这点我就会重新开始相信人类。
这是有可能发生的，是不是？

original: I expressed my views on the whole religion and 'God' thing a bit too loud and got into a lot of trouble with a priest because of it.
translation: 我对全体宗教以及「主」的问题发表了我的看法，我的声音有些大，被一个神父听见了，因此我有大麻烦了。

original: I watched, partly horrified, partly filled with admiration, as the blasphemer was dragged out of the dining hall and into [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s prison.
translation: 当亵渎者被拖出大餐厅，扔进[From.GetTitledFirstName]的监狱的时候，我在一旁看着，有些害怕，又有些钦佩。

original: It was the right thing to do
I was still shaking with rage at the pagan's blasphemous words when [From.GetTitledFirstName] took the opportunity to whisper: 'Good work' in my ear.
translation: 我还在因为这个原始宗教徒的亵渎言论而愤怒的颤抖，[From.GetTitledFirstName]借机在我耳边轻声说：「干得好！」。

original: Thank you, I really needed that!
If I had known this sooner...
There's always something to do in the [Root.Religion.GetName] church. The more time I spend there, the more I appreciate the calm and I feel more connected to my God.
translation: 在[Root.Religion.GetName]的教堂里总是有事情要做。在里面呆的时间越久，我就越享受这种宁静，我和上帝的联系也越发紧密。

original: Is there anything else I can do?

Ever since [From.GetFirstName] became engaged in the church's different activities, or, rather, started following every order from the priest and wasting time, [From.GetSheHe] has stopped spending time with me.
translation: 自从[From.GetFirstName]开始忙于教会的各种活动，并且听从神父的每一个指示而浪费时间，[From.GetSheHe]就不再花时间和我在一起了。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is obsessed and I will tell [This.GetHerHim] that!
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]太过于沉湎于教会事务了，我要告诉[This.GetHerHim]这一点！

original: I have had little time for [From.GetTitledFirstName] since I became engaged in the church's different activities.
translation: 自从我开始忙于教会的各种活动，我就没有时间陪[From.GetTitledFirstName]了。

original: The church is a greedy thing who always need more alms but I have deep pockets and it's for a good cause.
translation: 教会是贪婪的，总是索要更多的施舍，但是我财力雄厚，而且这是为了一个美好的目的。
金钱换来的是灵魂的救赎……

original: Something is rotten in [Root.Location.GetName]! I have had suspicions about a plot, maybe an assassination or something... horrifying unraveling in front of my unseeing eyes and I will find out what is going on!
translation: 在[Root.Location.GetName]，情况有些古怪！我怀疑有阴谋正在酝酿，可能是一场刺杀或者其他的阴谋……我的眼前一片迷茫，有什么恐怖的事情在等着我，我会找出到底发生了什么！

original: I think I have found the culprits!
translation: 我想我已经找到罪魁祸首了！

original: At least [From.GetSheHe] calmed down a bit
You got us! Please don't hurt us...
translation: 你抓住我们了！请不要伤害我们……

original: I caught the cook and [From.GetTitledFirstName] plotting against me! When I confronted them they denied it at first but broke down eventually and confessed that they were planning to humiliate me, how they planned to do that they refused to say.
translation: 我抓住了密谋反抗我的厨子和[From.GetTitledFirstName]！当我和他们对质的时候，他们起初否认有阴谋，最后他们撑不住了，承认他们计划让我出丑，但是拒绝回答如何去做。

original: I forgave them, even though it was hard
translation: 虽然很想惩罚他们，但是我最终还是原谅了他们

original: Every time I ride out to hunt, I hear an arrow whiz past me, and it is only because I anticipate it that I can avoid it. No one else seems to notice it, and I have stopped trying to convince my friends that it is real.
translation: 每次出去骑马打猎，我都能听到一支箭尖啸着从我身边经过，这是因为我能够提前发现并且及时躲过。没有其他人注意到这个，而我也停止努力说服我的朋友们这是真实的。

original: I have never found the arrow...
translation: 我从来没有找到过箭头……

original: My supper was brought to me by a courtier I almost trust, but the smell and the color of the soup was highly suspicious. After tasting it, I threw the bowl at the courtier, narrowly missing with just an inch or two.
translation: 我的晚饭是由我信赖的廷臣带过来的，但是它的味道和颜色十分可疑。在尝过它之后，我把碗扔向廷臣，只偏了那么一两英寸。

original: Are you trying to poison me?!
I have put up with the accusations, the distrust and especially [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s paranoia, but everyone has a breaking point and I will soon reach mine.
translation: 我忍下了指控，不信任特别是[From.GetTitledFirstName]的妄想症，但是每个人的忍耐都是有限度的，我很快就要到达临界点了。

original: I better tell [This.GetHerHim] I won't put up with [This.GetHerHis] paranoia any longer!
translation: 我要告诉[This.GetHerHim]我不会再忍受[This.GetHerHis]妄想症了！

original: The thrown bowl and my accusations about [From.GetHerHim] trying to poison me greatly upset [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I fear I might have lost my friend's respect.
translation: 扔出去的碗以及我对[From.GetHerHim]想要下毒的指控使[From.GetTitledFirstName]感到极大的不满，我恐怕要失去朋友的尊重了。

original: My friend became aghast when I told him that I had sent the miller's boy to a nearby city with my finest stallion. 'You will never see that horse again', he said, utterly convinced.
translation: 当我告诉我的朋友，我派磨坊主的男孩骑着我最好的公马去临近的城市这件事的时候，他感到十分惊讶，并且十分确定地说：「你再也见不到那匹马了」。

original: But he was wrong, of course
I was fed up with a courtier's constant nagging about a decrepit bridge in need of fixing and decided to inspect it myself.
translation: 廷臣告诉我有一座桥经久失修，我受够了他的唠叨，我要亲自视察一下这座桥。
那座桥以经被检查过了

original: The bridge I wanted [From.GetTitledFirstName] to inspect burst under [From.GetHerHis] unwary feet and [From.GetSheHe] only just managed to grab hold of my hand and the edge of the broken bridge. I saw how [From.GetHerHis] fingers began to slip and, grasping [From.GetHerHis] wrists, ordered [From.GetHerHim] to let go of the bridge and as [From.GetSheHe] did exactly that, I pulled as hard as I can and dragged [From.GetHerHim] back to safety.
translation: 我想让[From.GetTitledFirstName]看的桥在[From.GetHerHis]脚下断裂了，他太不小心了。[From.GetSheHe]勉强抓住了我的手和断桥的边缘。我看见[From.GetHerHis]手指开始滑落，我抓住[From.GetHerHis]手腕，让[From.GetHerHim]放开抓着桥的手，当[From.GetSheHe]这样做了以后，我使出吃奶的劲才把[From.GetHerHim]拽回来。
