original: If I had not trusted [From.GetTitledFirstName], I wouldn't be alive. I was hanging from the broken edge of the bridge with my one hand and the other was firmly held by [From.GetFirstName]. The bridge was about to break when [From.GetSheHe] told me to let go of the bridge and as I did that [From.GetSheHe] pulled me up onto the bridge and saved me.
translation: 如果我没有信任[From.GetTitledFirstName]的话，我就不会活着回来了。我一只手挂在断桥的边上，另一只手被[From.GetFirstName]紧紧抓住.桥就要完全断开了，[From.GetSheHe]告诉我放开抓着桥的手，当我这么做了之后，[From.GetSheHe]将我拉到了桥上，拯救了我的生命。

original: It was a bad idea to lend money to a person I had never met before, but I trusted the man and his idea so I gave him some money to help him make his dream come true.
translation: 借钱给陌生人是一个馊主意，但是我相信这个人和他的计划，所以我资助他一些金钱来帮助他梦想成真。

original: I was a bit distracted when I handed my buzzard to a courtier, I was watching another of my birds who were about to catch another rabbit and did not realize that the eager courtier had no clue of what to do with the buzzard.
translation: 当我把我的猎鹰交给身边廷臣的时候有些分心，我正看着另外一只鹰，它就要抓住另外一只野兔了，我没有注意到他不知道怎么拿着猎鹰。

original: I must tell [This.GetTitledFirstName] that I lost [This.GetHerHis] buzzard
translation: 我必须告诉[This.GetTitledFirstName]我把[This.GetHerHis]猎鹰弄丢了

original: This is the last time I trust someone with my birds! [From.GetTitledFirstName] was supposed to give my buzzard to the falconer but slipped and lost [From.GetHerHis] grip of the bird and it escaped.
translation: 我再也不会相信任何人去帮我拿鹰了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]想要把我的猎鹰交给养鹰者，但是[From.GetHerHis]手滑了一下，没抓住让它给跑了。

original: I will never see her again!
My celibacy is starting to get on my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s nerves and [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] advances are getting a bit desperate and annoying.
translation: 我的禁欲行为开始刺激我的[Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife][Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]的神经，而且[Root.Spouse.GetHerHis]示爱开始变得有点迫切和烦人了。

original: I won't give in to [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] temptations!
Okay, but just for one night...
translation: 好吧，但是只有一个晚上……

original: Who am I kidding? I can't resist [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]!
translation: 我在骗谁呢？我无法拒绝[Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]！

original: It feels like weeks since someone touched me! [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s celibacy and dismissal of my advancements makes me feel unwanted.
translation: 感觉已经有很久没有人触碰我了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]的禁欲以及对我求爱的拒绝让我感觉我是多余的。

original: Maybe I should try it [From.GetHerHis] way?
translation: 或许我应该用[From.GetHerHis]方式试一试？
向[Root.GetTitledFirstName]询问有关禁欲的话题？

original: The idea of celibacy has always appealed to me but I would really like to talk about it with someone before I make up my mind and decide if I would venture down the road of abstinence.
translation: 独身的想法始终召唤着我，然而在我狠下决心步入禁欲的生活道路之前我真的希望能和谁好好聊聊。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is asked about [This.GetHerHis] vow of celibacy
Maybe I should live a little before making this decision
translation: 或许我应该过段时间再做这个决定

original: A young [From.GetManWoman] asked me many questions about celibacy, why I had decided to take this vow and if I had any advice on what [From.GetSheHe] should do. I told [From.GetTitledFirstName] that the decision was [From.GetHerHis] own and that celibacy was not for everyone.
translation: 一个年轻的[From.GetManWoman]问了我许多关于独身的问题，为什么我会发这样的誓言，以及我对[From.GetSheHe]应该怎么做有什么建议。我告诉[From.GetTitledFirstName]决定是由[From.GetHerHis]自己来做，独身并不适合所有的人。

original: That smug 'holier than thou' smile [From.GetTitledFirstName] always have when [From.GetSheHe] sees me is devastating for my self-confidence. It is as if [From.GetSheHe] knows a dirty secret about me no one else knows about, and all I want to do is scream that nobody is perfect and everyone can fall, but some have a higher horse to fall from and I hope [From.GetTitledFirstName] will learn that!
translation: 每当[From.GetTitledFirstName]看见我，[From.GetSheHe]的脸上总会浮现出自以为是的笑容，这种笑容摧残着我的自信心。就好像[From.GetSheHe]知道一个不应该有人知道的关于我的阴暗秘密，而我只想大喊没有人是完美的，所有人都有可能马失前蹄，只不过有的人会从更高的地方摔下来，我希望[From.GetTitledFirstName]能够记住这一点！

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s smile will be wiped from [This.GetHerHis] face!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to wipe the smug smile off my face when [From.GetSheHe] confronted me about it. I accidently spilled some of the secrets I know and [From.GetSheHe] scoffed at them, telling me that 'everyone has sired or conceived a bastard' which is not exactly true but still made me feel...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]提及我脸上的得意的笑容，[From.GetSheHe]试图将它从我脸上抹掉。我不小心说出了一些我知道的秘密，[From.GetSheHe]哈哈大笑，并告诉我「每个人都想有一个或认为有一个私生子」，虽然这不完全正确但仍然让我感到……

original: It has come to my knowledge that one of my courtiers could teach me more about history and other subjects I feel I have neglected.
translation: 我感到以前忽视了历史和其他一些学科，我听说有一个廷臣可以教我更多关于这些学科的知识。

original: Ask nicely if [my_courtier.GetSheHe] could teach me
translation: 有礼貌的询问[my_courtier.GetSheHe]是否可以教我

original: Bribe the courtier into teaching me
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is going to ask me any minute now if I can teach [From.GetHerHim] more about the subjects [From.GetSheHe] lacks knowledge of.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]问我可不可以教[From.GetHerHim]更多，[From.GetSheHe]对一些学科感到知识匮乏。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] asked nicely if I could teach [From.GetHerHim]
After numerous lessons I grew a bit bored but endured several more before [From.GetTitledFirstName] declared that [From.GetSheHe] could not teach me any more.
translation: 在许多节课程之后我感到有些厌烦了，但是我又忍耐了几节课直到[From.GetTitledFirstName]宣布[From.GetSheHe]再也没有什么可教的了。

original: Our shared love for books should help me win the friendship of a stubborn courtier. I should be able to find the booklover in the library...
translation: 我和一位固执的廷臣都喜欢看书，这可以帮助我赢得他的友谊。我想我可以在图书馆找到这个书虫……
一个可以一起谈论书籍的人！

original: Seek the stubborn courtier in the library
translation: 在图书馆寻找这位固执的廷臣

original: I should leave the courtier alone
translation: 我想我还是不打扰这位廷臣了

original: While reading one of my favorite books in the library, a book of hours from [Root.Location.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] entered with much ado. Irritated, I put the book back in its proper place and tried to leave without [From.GetTitledFirstName] taking notice, but [From.GetSheHe] managed to intercept me and started talking about the book of hours I had read.
translation: 我正在图书馆里看我最喜欢的书，我在[Root.Location.GetName]花了很长时间读它，[From.GetTitledFirstName]进来烦扰我。我生气了，我把书放回它的位置想趁[From.GetTitledFirstName]没注意离开，但[From.GetSheHe]还是截住了我并且开始谈论这本我已经读了很久的书。
走开！你这个令人厌烦的[From.GetManWoman]！

original: I didn't know [From.GetSheHe] liked books! That's great!
translation: 我不知道[From.GetSheHe]这么喜欢看书！这太好了！

original: When I got to the library I intercepted [From.GetTitledFirstName] just when [From.GetSheHe] was about to leave. Desperate, I saw that the book [From.GetSheHe] had been reading was one of my own favorites, the book of hours from [From.Location.GetName] and asked what [From.GetTitledFirstName] thought about it.
translation: 当我到达图书馆的时候，我截住了[From.GetTitledFirstName]，[From.GetSheHe]刚要离开。我看到[From.GetSheHe]刚才读的书正是我最喜欢看的，我在[From.Location.GetName]花了很长时间读这本书，于是我问[From.GetTitledFirstName]对这本书什么看法。

original: I think I got through to [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
[From.GetSheHeCap] was as polite but aloof as always

Did that child of mine like myths and legends or is it more interested in history? I choose between a book filled with fascinating legends and one, somewhat dryer tome filled with history about battles and politics.
translation: 我的孩子是喜欢神话传说还是喜欢历史故事？我在两本书之间选择，一本写的是有趣的传说，而另一本是枯燥的战争和政治历史书。

original: It is always interesting when my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] is trying to interest [From.GetHerselfHimself] in me. Wonder what it'll be this time...
translation: 每当我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]试图用[From.GetHerselfHimself]的方式取悦我的时候，我总会感到非常有趣。好奇这次会是什么呢……

original: Myths and legends? What am I, five?!
translation: 神话和传说？你以为我还是五岁小孩么？！
我最喜欢神话和传说了！

original: I was not entirely sure if my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] enjoyed the stories I told [From.GetHerHim], but I kept reading until we both were nearly asleep.
translation: 我不是特别确定我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]是否喜欢我讲给[From.GetHerHim]听的故事，但是我一直读到我们都快要睡着了。

original: My [GetFromRelation] was apparently embarrassed by my choice of bedtime story
translation: 显然，我的[GetFromRelation]对我选的睡前故事感到难堪

original: A new load of books arrived and I can barely fit the new books in the overcrowded library. Maybe it is time to build a new one?
translation: 来了一批新书，我的图书馆已经放不下了。也许该建一个新图书馆了？

original: Maybe I should relocate some of the books to our bedchamber?
translation: 或许我应该把一些书放到我们的卧室去？

original: I do feel I have enough books now
translation: 我认为我已经有足够多的书了

original: If I remove this wall I could get plenty more space for my books
translation: 如果把这面墙去掉，我就有足够的空间放书了

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName], whose room you are planning to redo, would not like that
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]不喜欢你重新布置房间的行为

original: I had patience with [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s obsession with books until they started to invade our bedchamber.
translation: 我能够忍受[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]对于书的痴迷，但是我无法忍受这些书侵占我们的卧室空间。

original: I had noticed that [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s obsession with books had increased during these last weeks, but I hadn't realized to what degree until I overheard [From.GetHerHim] talking to a master building about demolishing the wall between my rooms and the library in order to get more space for [From.GetHerHis] books!
translation: 我注意到[From.GetTitledFirstName]对于书的痴迷与日俱增，但是我没想到已经到了这种程度，我偷听到[From.GetHerHim]与建筑师谈论拆除我的房间与图书馆之间的墙来为[From.GetHerHis]书腾地方！

original: Time to pack my bags, I guess
translation: 我想我应该收拾我的包裹了

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] believes I am obsessed with books! I am not a book addict! I just love reading them, smelling them, caressing them...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]认为我太过痴迷于书籍了！我并没有书瘾！我只是喜欢读书，喜欢闻着书的香气，喜欢爱抚着书页……

original: My favorite rose bush was about to burst into bloom with the largest, reddest and most beautiful rosebud opening its petal last. I decided to give it to someone, but who?
translation: 我最喜欢的玫瑰丛就要开花了，最大最红最美丽的玫瑰花苞会在最后打开它的花瓣。我想把它送人，但是送给谁好呢？

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is given the most beautiful rose from [Root.GetFirstName]'s garden
translation: [Root.GetFirstName]的花园里最美丽的玫瑰花被送给了[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]

original: That pretty little thing might like the rose...
translation: 那个漂亮的小东西也许喜欢这朵玫瑰……

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is given the most beautiful rose from [Root.GetFirstName]'s garden
translation: [Root.GetFirstName]的花园里最美丽的玫瑰花被送给了[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I will keep it for myself
[From.GetTitledFirstName] gave me a pretty rose from [From.GetHerHis] garden. It smelled as beautiful as it looked.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]送给我一朵摘自[From.GetHerHis]花园的玫瑰花，又漂亮，又芬芳。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] loved the rose and thanked me profusely. I think I was this close to get a peck on the cheek but [From.GetSheHe] must have realized that that wouldn't be proper, making [From.GetHerHim] blush almost as red as the rose and then [From.GetSheHe] almost ran away.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]喜欢这朵玫瑰并且衷心感谢我。我差一点得到一个颊吻，但是[From.GetSheHe]一定是意识到不妥，[From.GetHerHim]脸一下子就红得好似这朵玫瑰一样，然后[From.GetSheHe]几乎是一路小跑的离开了。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not seem happy at all when I presented [From.GetHerHim] with the rose. Despite its fragrance and beauty [From.GetTitledFirstName] thanked me stiffly and left as soon as possible.
translation: 当我呈给[From.GetHerHim]玫瑰花的时候，[From.GetTitledFirstName]看起来并不高兴。尽管这朵花又香又漂亮，[From.GetTitledFirstName]只是生硬的对我表示感谢然后匆忙离开了。

original: I don't think [From.GetSheHe] liked the rose
translation: 我想[From.GetSheHe]不喜欢这朵玫瑰花

original: No matter what I tried my vegetables and flowers never sprouted and grew as large and beautiful as one of my courtiers'.
translation: 我的一位廷臣善于种植，不论我如何努力，我都不能使我的蔬菜长得像他的一样大，鲜花长得像他的一样美丽。

original: I shall have the secrets of the garden!
translation: 我要得到他的花园里隐藏的秘密！

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] and the secret of the cow's manure
My garden is wilting before my eyes! Please help!
translation: 我的花园正在我眼前枯萎！请帮帮我！

original: I will buy the secret from the courtier!
translation: 我要从这个廷臣手里买到他的秘密！

original: No! I will save my garden myself!
translation: 不！我要自己拯救我的花园！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s garden looks miserable, the vegetables are wilting and the flowers are unable to spread their petals due to lack of water and nutrients. My garden, however, prospered and was bound to give me a rich harvest
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]的花园太悲剧了，因为缺少水分和养料，蔬菜正在枯萎，鲜花无法绽放。而我的花园一片繁荣，我一定会有一个好收成

original: And now [From.GetTitledFirstName] demands I tell my secret!
translation: 现在[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求我告诉他我的秘密！

original: The stinking secret will be revealed!
translation: 臭气熏天的秘密将要被揭开了！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me what my secret was
[From.GetSheHeCap] was so desperate [From.GetSheHe] paid me to reveal my secret
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]心情十分急切，[From.GetSheHe]付钱给我让我告诉他我的秘密

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] revealed a stinking secret to [From.GetHerHis] green fingers, [From.GetSheHe] uses manure from cows and sheep to give [From.GetHerHis] plants nutrients that they supposedly need.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]向我透露了[From.GetHerHis]种植技巧，一个散发着恶臭的秘密。[From.GetSheHe]用牛羊粪便来为[From.GetHerHis]植物提供养料。

original: Will my vegetables and flowers stink as much as this muck?
translation: 我的蔬菜和鲜花会变得像这些牛粪一样臭气熏天么？

original: A new sort of roses has arrived to [Root.Location.GetName] by the means of a travelling merchant. The price he demanded for it was outrageous but I was still tempted to buy it as his description of the damask rose were that of a rose most fragrant and roseate in color.
translation: 旅行商人给[Root.Location.GetName]带来一种新品种的玫瑰。他要求的价格太高了，但是我还是被他的描述所吸引买下了它，他说这种突厥蔷薇是最香的玫瑰，而且它的颜色是最正宗的玫瑰色。

original: I hope my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] will love the rose, too
translation: 我希望我的[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]也会喜欢这种玫瑰

original: It will look divine among the other roses
translation: 在其他玫瑰的掩映下，它会看起来是非凡的

original: Although, I must admit the new Damask rose is adorable and complements our garden, the price [From.GetFirstName] paid for it was intimidating.
translation: 虽然我必须承认这种新的突厥蔷薇令人喜爱而且充实了我们花园，但是[From.GetFirstName]为此花费的金钱太吓人了。

original: I must make sure [From.GetSheHe] doesn't spend all our money on such frivolous things
translation: 我必须确认[From.GetSheHe]没有在这种无意义的东西上把我们的钱花光

original: If it makes [From.GetHerHim] happy, I should encourage it
translation: 如果这让[From.GetHerHim]感到高兴，我就应该支持这件事

original: The new Damask rose is adorable and complements the garden, but the price [From.GetTitledFirstName] paid for it was intimidating.
translation: 这种新的酒红色玫瑰令人喜爱而且会充实花园，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]为此花费的金钱数目太吓人了。

original: It's such a frivolous thing to spend money on
translation: 在这种无意义的东西上毫无花钱的必要
我为什么要为此介意呢？

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] chided me about the Damask rose I had bought. Even if [From.GetSheHe] loved it and thought it complemented the garden, the price had been too costly.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]在我买淡红色玫瑰这件事情上责备了我. 虽然[From.GetSheHe]喜欢它而且认为它是对花园里品种的补充，但是它的价钱实在是太高了。

original: It's my garden and I'll do what I want with it!
translation: 这是我的花园，我想干什么就干什么！

original: Fine! I won't buy any more expensive plants
translation: 好的！我以后不会再买昂贵的植物了

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] praised the new rose but was astounded when I let slip how much it had cost. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me I should be more careful with money, even if the rose complemented the garden it had cost a little bit too much to justify it.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]对新玫瑰花赞不绝口，但是当我无意中说出它花费几何的时候，他感到十分震惊。[From.GetSheHeCap]告诉我应该更加慎重的使用金钱，即使这种玫瑰可以补充花园里的品种，它的价钱也有些过高了。

original: It's my money and I'll do what I want with it!
translation: 这是我的钱，我想买什么就买什么！

original: Yes, I know and I won't do it again
translation: 好的，我知道了，以后不会再这样做了

original: A beehive in one of the hollow trees in the garden should be filled with honey by now. As the bees had started to behave aggressively and had stung several people from my court, I decided to remove the nest and salvage the honey.
translation: 花园里那个空心树中的蜂巢如今应该装满蜂蜜了。因为蜜蜂变得狂躁，叮了几个宫里人，我决定拿下蜂巢，收走蜂蜜。

original: I need someone to help me in my next scheme! A wonderful book has been discovered by a close friend of mine but he refuses to give or sell it to me!
translation: 我的好友发现了一本好书，但他既不送我，也不卖我，接下来我要找人好好商量商量！

original: I will bribe someone to help me!
I don't think anyone wants to help me

I had also heard about the book [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s friend had found when he inventoried his father's library. Unfortunately, this friend refused to sell the book to [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I despaired of ever getting to read it.
translation: 我也听说了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的朋友打扫他父亲的图书馆时发现的书。可惜的是这朋友拒绝出售书给[From.GetTitledFirstName]，我也对读这本书不抱什么希望了。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] demands that I help [From.GetHerHim] obtain the book!
[From.GetSheHeCap] asked nicely if I could help [From.GetHerHim] obtain the book

With our united efforts it was a cinch to procure the book from my friend. [From.GetTitledFirstName] had been a bit sceptical to my plan first but [From.GetHerHis] desire to lay hands on the book overcame [From.GetHerHis] fear of getting caught.
translation: 在我们的共同努力下，搞到朋友的这本书就是小菜一碟，[From.GetTitledFirstName]开始对我的谋划曾有一丝犹疑，但[From.GetHerHis]握书在手的欲望胜过了[From.GetHerHis]担心被捕的忧惧。
这本书最终到了我的手里！

original: I knew one of the courtiers was a member in a highly secret group called 'The Esoteric [Root.Religion.GetName]' and as a mystic this sounded fascinating! I wanted in, no matter what the price might be.
translation: 我获知我的一个廷臣是一个非常隐秘的组织「秘仪[Root.Religion.GetName]」的成员，这种神秘如磁石般吸引我，无论付出什么代价我都要加入。

original: I will keep nagging until I get in!
The group is not for the pious!

I have tried to keep 'The Esoteric [Root.Religion.GetName]' a secret from [From.GetTitledFirstName] but [From.GetHerHis] curiosity and an unfortunate coincidence made [From.GetHerHim] aware of the group. I felt compelled to include [From.GetTitledFirstName] or else 'The Esoteric [Root.Religion.GetName]' might not be a secret anymore.
translation: 我努力在[From.GetTitledFirstName]面前保守「秘仪[Root.Religion.GetName]」的秘密，但[From.GetHerHis]好奇心和不幸的巧合让[From.GetHerHim]意识到了这个组织的存在。我感到吸纳[From.GetTitledFirstName]入会的迫切性，否则「秘仪[Root.Religion.GetName]」就再也不是个秘密了。

original: I will scare [From.GetHerHim] away with a dangerous initiation
translation: 我要用个危险的入会考验吓跑[From.GetHerHim]

original: A skill-based initiation should scare [From.GetHerHim] away
translation: 一个极具技术性的考验会让[From.GetHerHim]知难而退

original: Maybe [From.GetSheHe] will tire and stop inquiring
translation: 也许[From.GetSheHe]倦怠了就不刨根问底了

original: My inquiries led me to [From.GetTitledFirstName] and when I started bombarding [From.GetHerHim] with questions [From.GetSheHe] tried to convince me there was no such thing as 'The Esoteric [Root.Religion.GetName]' but I kept going until [From.GetSheHe] gave up. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me that I needed to go through a dangerous initiation to become a member of the group.
translation: 我深究的线索指向了[From.GetTitledFirstName]，当我不断地问着[From.GetHerHim]各种问题时，[From.GetSheHe]还在让我相信根本就没有什么「秘仪[Root.Religion.GetName]」，但在我坚持下[From.GetSheHe]说了实话。[From.GetSheHeCap]告诉我要通过一个危险的考验才能加入他们。

original: My inquiries led me to [From.GetTitledFirstName] and when I started bombarding [From.GetHerHim] with questions [From.GetSheHe] tried to convince me there was no such thing as 'The Esoteric [Root.Religion.GetName]' but I kept going until [From.GetSheHe] gave up. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me that I needed to go through a skill-based initiation to become a member of the group.
translation: 我深究的线索指向了[From.GetTitledFirstName]，当我不断地问着[From.GetHerHim]各种问题时，[From.GetSheHe]还在让我相信根本就没有什么「秘仪[Root.Religion.GetName]」，但在我坚持下[From.GetSheHe]说了实话。[From.GetSheHeCap]告诉我要通过一个技术性考验才能加入他们。

original: I did not think [From.GetTitledFirstName] would agree to the initiation and I had a hard time figuring out what [From.GetHerHis] initiation should be like. I decided that, despite what I had told [From.GetTitledFirstName], I would give [From.GetHerHim] a skill-based dangerous initiation: [From.GetSheHe] would have to handle alchemical substances and make a love potion!
translation: 我可不认为[From.GetTitledFirstName]会同意接受考验，我绞尽脑汁琢磨[From.GetHerHis]考验应该是什么。最终我决定了，不论我以前告诉过[From.GetTitledFirstName]什么，我要给[From.GetHerHim]出一个危险与技巧并存的考验：[From.GetSheHe]需要接触些炼金用药物并制出一种迷情药！

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] made an excellent love potion! It even worked!
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]制出了强力迷情药！确实给力！

original: Still, I won't let [From.GetHerHim] become a member
translation: 我仍然不会让[From.GetHerHim]成为我们中的一员

original: It was hard and dangerous work, the alchemical compounds was both flammable and poisonous and I feared the love potion would not be good enough, might even poison or kill those who ingested it. It was tested on a swineman and a milkmaid, who immediately fell in love and into the hay stack.
translation: 这是个危险而艰难的工作，炼金的药品混合后又有毒又易燃，我还怕炼出来的迷情药不够纯正，也许还会把吃下这玩意的人毒害掉。我试着用在一个猪倌和一个挤奶女工身上，干柴遇烈火，两人立马滚进干草堆了。

original: I'm a proud member of 'The Esoteric [Root.Religion.GetName]'!

I don't know what went wrong with the love potion, the alchemical compounds did not react to each other as I was used to. It poisoned the swineman and milkmaid we tried it on, nobody died but they had to stay in bed for a week or two...
translation: 我不知道迷情药出了什么问题，炼金的药品混合后没像以前一样互相反应。试药的猪倌和挤奶女工中毒了，虽然没人送命可他俩必须卧床休养一两周……

original: Small blue butterflies flies around my head and their tickling wings makes me laugh.
translation: 小巧的蓝蝴蝶绕着我飞来飞去，它们那轻巧的翅膀让我开怀。

original: When the last drop of the potion had ran down my throat and nothing spectacular had happened, as in it making me violently sick or blow me to pieces, I opened my eyes and took a deep breath. I felt wonderful!
translation: 我喝尽了最后一滴药，没有什么明显的反应，不像我生病时那种翻江倒海的痛苦那么明显。但我睁开眼深吸了一口气，感觉还是非常好！

original: I encrypted the formula for the health potion so well that even I had trouble deciphering it. The main ingredient were mercury, if I understand my scribbling notes correctly.
translation: 我给特效药配方加密语加到我自个都破解不了。如果我辨认便条上潦草的字迹无误的话，我想主要配方应该是水银。

original: I want to test it on someone!

I warned [From.GetTitledFirstName] that the potion wasn't perfect! When I tried to decipher my own decryptions I did not manage to get the right measurements for the ingredients and so I had to guess.
translation: 我警告过[From.GetTitledFirstName]这药并不完美！我曾努力破解密语但还是没得出组成正确配方的材料，因而我只能靠猜。

original: The potion worked like a charm, [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me [From.GetSheHe] had never felt so good ever before!
translation: 这药像咒语一样有效，[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]从未如此舒畅过！

original: A metal worker named Perillos introduced a new invention of his today: a brazen bull. Intrigued by the design, I asked him to demonstrate it for me and the result was terrifying!
translation: 今天，一个叫佩里俄斯的工匠介绍了他的新发明：黄铜牛。因为对黄铜牛的设计很好奇，便要求他来为我演示一下，结果令我毛骨悚然！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] bought a brazen bull today! The terrifying torture device was demonstrated and the agonising screams of its victim converted to the sound of an infuriated bull bellowing echoed throughout the courtyard.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]今天买下了一个铜牛！这恐怖的刑具已被演示使用过了，受害者歇斯底里的惨叫被转变成公牛的怒吼，回荡在庭院里。

original: I hope [From.GetSheHe] won't use it on me!
translation: 我希望[From.GetSheHe]别把这家伙用在我身上！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not like the brazen bull at all, [From.GetSheHe] ordered me to get rid of it!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]根本不喜欢铜牛，[From.GetSheHe]命令我扔掉它！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] congratulated me on the purchase of a brazen bull, [From.GetSheHe] thought it would inspire fear in our enemies!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]祝贺我购下铜牛，[From.GetSheHe]认为它会让我们的敌人闻风丧胆！

original: I decided to investigate if [From.GetTitledFirstName] had come to [From.GetHerHis] senses and gotten rid of the brazen bull.
translation: 决定探查下[From.GetTitledFirstName]是否改变了[From.GetHerHis]态度并扔掉了铜牛。

original: No matter what I did to my prisoner, he refused to admit anything! Frustrated, I left him in the hands of a courtier only to return half an hour later finding a written confession with the prisoner's signature on it!
translation: 无论我怎么拷打我的犯人，他就是不招供。气死我了，我把他交给廷臣讯问，结果半小时后犯人就在供状上签字画押！

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] might reveal the secret torture method
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]也许会揭示审讯方法的秘密

original: Fine! Then you can handle the torturing for now!
translation: 没问题！你现在就能掌握审讯的诀窍了！

original: Look, I'll give you lots of gold if you teach me
translation: 如果你肯教我，我就给你一大笔钱，怎么样

original: When [From.GetTitledFirstName] had left the torture chamber and its victim in frustration over the man's stubborn silence, I decided to try my old skills on him. It did not take long before I had a written confession with the man's signature on it and [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s gratitude.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]因犯人顽固的沉默而感到沮丧，气急败坏地离开了刑讯室.我决定试试我的看家本领，没多久我就得到了犯人签字画押的供状和[From.GetTitledFirstName]的感谢。

original: The nerve! [From.GetSheHe] demanded that I taught [From.GetHerHim]
[From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me nicely if I could teach [From.GetHerHim]
I will never reveal the secret torture methods!
translation: 我将永远保守这种刑讯方法的秘密！

original: The gold [From.GetSheHe] gave me will give [From.GetHerHim] the knowledge [From.GetSheHe] desires
translation: [From.GetSheHe]给我黄金，我教授给[From.GetHerHim][From.GetSheHe]渴望的知识

original: I need a confession from one of my prisoners or else I have to release him. I would prefer not to have to use torture on him but maybe the mere threat would make him speak up!
translation: 我需要从我的某个犯人或我不得不释放的人得到一份供状，比起用刑，他也许仅仅见识一下这种撕心裂肺的恐惧就会顺利招认！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is notorious for [From.GetHerHis] torture methods and the mere description of what would be done to me if I did not confess was enough to make me wet my pants in horror.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]凭借[From.GetHerHis]刑讯方法而臭名远扬，我仅仅是听听他审讯时上刑的描述就会直冒冷汗，如果我不招供的话，后果不敢想象。

original: I confess, please don't do that to me!
translation: 我招了！求您千万别用那玩意！

original: Would my prisoner [From.GetTitledFirstName], despite the colorful description of all the horrors that would be inflicted on [From.GetHerHim] if [From.GetSheHe] did not confess, refuse and force me to make reality of my threats?
translation: 我的犯人[From.GetTitledFirstName]，如果在我给[From.GetHerHim]动了五花八门的大刑后，[From.GetSheHe]要是吃尽苦头但还不招供，会不会迫使我动一动那真正的恐惧？

original: I almost felt disappointed when [From.GetTitledFirstName] confessed
translation: 我快要失望的时候[From.GetTitledFirstName]才招供

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to confess! Sharpen my tools!
It is time to pass my legacy to my child! The torture methods I have refined, the secrets only I and other master impalers know and the use of instruments of torture.
translation: 我改进的行刑方法，而如何使用这些乐器般的刑具方法的秘密只有我和行刑师知道，该把它们作为一份遗产留给孩子了.

original: I hope the child will follow in my footsteps!
translation: 我希望孩子以后能遵循我的脚步！

original: A child is asked to follow in [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s menacing footsteps
translation: 一个孩子被要求步入[This.GetTitledFirstName]的险恶的道路

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] asked me if I wanted to watch a prisoner being tortured. [From.GetSheHeCap] wants me to become a master torturer, a Impaler, just as [From.GetSheHe] [From.GetHerselfHimself].
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]询问我想不想看犯人行刑，[From.GetSheHeCap]想让我成为一个心狠手辣的人，就如同[From.GetHerselfHimself]一样。

original: Of course! Do I get to use the brazen bull on someone then?
translation: 当然！接下来我就可以用铜牛让别人尝点苦头么？
这这这太恐怖了！我决不这样做！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is a natural! I would never have anticipated how fast [From.GetSheHe] learned the use of the instruments of torture and how [From.GetSheHe] came up with ingenious new ways of using them!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]是个天才！我从未想到[From.GetSheHe]学会这些刑具使用这么快，并且[From.GetSheHe]还发明了一些玩刑具的更巧妙的新花样！

original: I am so proud of you, my [GetFromRelation]!

The disgust in [From.GetFirstName]'s face when I asked [From.GetHerHim] if [From.GetSheHe] wanted to watch me torture a prisoner was answer enough. My [GetFromRelation] would never follow in my footsteps!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]脸上的厌恶和作呕在我问[From.GetHerHim]的时候显露无疑，[From.GetSheHe]不想看给犯人动刑。我的[GetFromRelation]不会跟从我的足迹的！

original: I have been challenged to a duel! Although I am a great duelist, I still find the need for some training and the finest second in [Root.Location.GetName].
translation: 我被挑战决斗！虽然我是决斗大师，我仍然有必要做一些训练并且找一位[Root.Location.GetName]里最好的副手。

original: The greatest second will be mine!
I will ask the greatest second if he's willing to help me
translation: 我要求请最好的助手，如果他愿意帮我的话

original: For some gold he'll be willing to be my second!
translation: 给他一些钱，他将愿意当我的助手！

original: I have no need for a second!
Through rumors I learned that [From.GetTitledFirstName] had been challenged to a duel and [From.GetSheHe] will probably ask me to be [From.GetHerHis] second.
translation: 通过传言我获知[From.GetTitledFirstName]卷入一场决斗，[From.GetSheHe]很有可能叫我做[From.GetHerHis]助手。

original: I could not say no when [From.GetSheHe] asked so nicely!
translation: 当[From.GetSheHe]这样恳切地请求我没有办法拒绝！

original: A couple of gold coins and I agreed to be [From.GetHerHis] second
translation: 看在两个金币的份上我同意做[From.GetHerHis]助手

original: My opponent withdrew from the duel! I was able to learn something new from [From.GetTitledFirstName] though, so it did not feel too unnecessary to have troubled [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 我的敌手退出决斗了！我仍然从[From.GetTitledFirstName]那里学到一些新招式，所以这次烦劳[From.GetHerHim]仍属必要。
无论如何还是要谢谢你！

original: I could not stand being insulted even one more time, so I slapped my insulter and thus, the glove was thrown.
translation: 我不能再次忍受这种侮辱，所以我掌掴了无礼者，连手套都扇飞了.

original: The minute [From.GetHerHis] hand hit my cheek I knew [From.GetTitledFirstName] challenge was serious. A duel, not to the death but to the first drop of blood spilled, is a matter of pride and honor!
translation: [From.GetHerHis]手狠狠地打上了我脸颊，那一刻我认清了[From.GetTitledFirstName]挑战是严肃的。一场决斗，不是为决生死，而是为决流出的第一滴鲜血，这事关荣誉与尊严！

original: There would be no honor in defeating you!
translation: 击败你又不是什么光彩的事！

original: The first blood was spilled by me and as we both had agreed that was as far as we would take it I honorably refrained from plunging my sword into [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heart.
translation: 我割出了第一滴鲜血，这既然是我们都认同的适可而止的程度，我就优雅地抽回了刺向[From.GetTitledFirstName]心脏的利剑。

original: I refused to surrender when [From.GetTitledFirstName] drew the first blood by cowardly slice my face from cheek to chin! Almost blinded by the blood I tried to keep fighting but the seconds caught hold of me and made me surrender.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]仅仅怯懦地在我脸颊和下巴首先划出一滴血，我才不会屈服！鲜血激发了我的斗志，我想继续努力战斗，但助手们抓住我并迫使我屈服。

original: That coward [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to fight me! I won by default but it was a bitter victory.
translation: 那个胆小鬼[From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝和我较量！我因缺席而获胜，但这样的胜利实属无奈。

original: Not a week goes by without me challenging or getting challenged by someone to a duel. It is mostly friendly duels, just something we do to have a bit of fun, to distract us from duties and responsibilities.
translation: 基本每个星期我都会主动或被动地加入一些决斗，一般是友好的决斗，仅仅是为了找点乐子，来暂时缓解一下日常生活的负担和苛责。

original: Of course, not everyone agrees with that!
translation: 当然，又不是每个人都同意！

original: Whenever I seek my [From.GetFirstName] I find [From.GetHerHim] either challenging someone to a duel or fighting someone in a duel. I shouldn't worry, the duels are never so serious that someone will get seriously wounded, it's mostly to first blood but still..
translation: 不论多会儿我寻找我的[From.GetFirstName]时，我都发现[From.GetHerHim]不是在挑动别人参加决斗就是正在和人决斗。我不该担心，这些决斗不是你死我活，也没有人受重伤，一般是见血即止但仍有例外……

original: I should ask [From.GetHerHim] to stop duelling
I shouldn't interfere, the duelling makes [From.GetHerHim] happy
translation: I我不该插手，这些决斗使[From.GetHerHim]开心

original: Although the duels between [From.GetTitledFirstName] and whoever [From.GetSheHe] has challenged or been challenged by never ends with one of the duelists severely wounded, only with smaller cuts and bruises, I still fear for [From.GetHerHis] life.
translation: 虽然[From.GetTitledFirstName]和[From.GetSheHe]挑动或被挑动的人之间的决斗从不以有人重伤而收场，通常只有很小的割伤和淤血，我依然担心[From.GetHerHis]生命安全。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is happy, why should I interfere?

I had just finished a friendly duel and was on my way to my bedchamber for a change of clothes when [From.GetTitledFirstName] said [From.GetSheHe] wanted a word with me. As I had feared, [From.GetSheHe] asked me to be more careful and not accept nor challenge anyone to a duel for some time, preferably for ever.
translation: 我刚打完一场决斗走在会卧室换衣服的路上，这时[From.GetTitledFirstName]说[From.GetSheHe]想和我谈一谈，不出我所料，[From.GetSheHe]要求我多当心，并且最近不要参加任何决斗，当然，最好是永远。

original: Give up the one thing I live for? Never!
translation: 放弃我生活乐趣的源泉？决不！

original: Fine, but just for a year, okay?
translation: 行，但再给我宽限一年，怎么样？

original: The city of [duel_location.GetName] is famous for its swords and the people wielding them. I had been wanting to test my skill against a local or two, but I was minding my own business when a local noble indicated I had insulted him by throwing down his glove in front of me.
translation: [duel_location.GetName]以其生产的剑和使用剑的人民出名。我曾经希望能够与当地的一两个人进行比试以验证我的技能，而当时有一个当地的贵族说我侮辱了他并且在我的面前扔下了他的手套并要求决斗。但是那时我正在专注于自己的事情，

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] chooses the weapon for the duel
I did not like the look of [From.GetTitledFirstName] and challenged [From.GetHerHim] to a duel. [From.GetSheHeCap] accepted and was gracious enough to allow me to choose weapon for the duel.
translation: 我不喜欢[From.GetTitledFirstName]的目光并挑动[From.GetHerHim]加入决斗.[From.GetSheHeCap]接受并且很有礼貌的允许我挑选武器.

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has chosen the weapon for the duel: a moorish cannon
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]选好了决斗的武器：一门摩尔大炮

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has chosen the weapon for the duel: swords
I laughed out loud when [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s second told me what kind of weapon we would use in the duel: a moorish cannon!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]的助手告诉了我两人决斗用的武器：摩尔大炮，立时我就笑趴下了！

original: If that's what [From.GetSheHe] want to use...
What kind of foolishness is this?! I refuse!
translation: 要多蠢才能这样做？！我拒绝！

original: It sounds disgusting but if that what [From.GetSheHe] choose...
translation: 听起来真恶心，但也许[From.GetSheHe]选的就是这个……

original: I changed my mind, I won't fight you
translation: 我改主意了，我不想与你战斗

original: As a devoted Hunter, I have filled my castle with many trophies from the wild beasts I have hunted and killed myself. Still, there is a place above my fireplace waiting for a special trophy: the head of a white hart.
translation: 身为一个专业的猎人，我的城堡里放满了各种各样我亲自猎捕搏杀的猛兽做战利品.不过我的壁炉上面仍等待着一件特殊的战利品的到来：白雄鹿首.

original: The best hunter must help me fill the empty place!
translation: 最好的猎人必须帮我填补上这一空缺！

original: A skillful hunter might step forward
translation: 经验丰富的猎人也许会挺身而出

original: Please, I need the best hunter alive to help me!
translation: 求求你，我需要现存最好的猎手来帮我！

original: If it is gold you want I'll give you gold!
translation: 如果你想要金子，我就给你就是了！

original: I will find the white hart someday...
translation: 我总有一天要找到白色的雄鹿……

original: I heard [From.GetTitledFirstName] is looking for a skilled hunter who could help [From.GetHerHim] hunt down a white hart as its head is the last trophy [From.GetSheHe] yearned for.
translation: 我听说[From.GetTitledFirstName]在寻找经验丰富的猎人来帮[From.GetHerHim]猎捕一头白雄鹿，它的头是[From.GetSheHe]渴望已久的仅缺的战利品.

original: Somehow, [From.GetSheHe] found me and now demands my help!
translation: 不知怎么回事，[From.GetSheHe]找到了我并且请求我帮助！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] helps [This.GetTitledFirstName] track and hunt a white hart
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]帮助[This.GetTitledFirstName]追踪并猎捕一只白雄鹿

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] promised gold to anyone who would help [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]许诺给愿意帮[From.GetHerHim]的任何人金子做报酬！

original: I could never have done it without [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s hunting skills! After several day looking for trails and droppings we finally found a clear track. The white hart seemed to wait for my arrow and merely shivered when it pierced its heart.
translation: 没有[From.GetTitledFirstName]的狩猎经验我不可能完成这一目标！在寻找了几天足迹和排泄物之后，我们终于清楚地追踪到了它，白雄鹿像在等着我们一样一动不动，仅仅是在箭头射穿了它的心脏时全身颤抖了一下.

original: The head looks great above the fireplace!
translation: 兽首放在壁炉上方看起来好极了！

original: As I oversaw the hunting party's last preparations I realized we were one man short.
translation: 督查了游猎宴会最后的准备工作，我意识到我们还缺一个人.

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is invited to join the hunt
Maybe one of my children wants to join us?
translation: 也许我的一个孩子想加入我们？

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is invited to join the hunt
My work as a [Root.GetJobTitle] is never done, so when [From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me if I wanted to join the hunting party I hesitated before I answered [From.GetHerHim]:
translation: 作为一个[Root.GetJobTitle]我的工作忙得焦头烂额，所以当[From.GetTitledFirstName]问我是否想加入游猎宴会时，我犹豫着不知道怎么答复[From.GetHerHim]：

original: If it pleases my [From.GetLordLady], then I'll join you
translation: 如此，既是[From.GetLordLady]能开心的话，我会加入你们

original: There is too many things I need to get done, my [From.GetLordLady]
translation: 我有太多工作要做呀，我的[From.GetLordLady]

original: My [GetFromRelation] asked me if I wanted to join [From.GetHerHim] on the hunt. It would be several hours on horseback, not knowing if any game would be found nor if there would be any real hunt.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]询问我是否想加入[From.GetHerHim]去狩猎。也许要骑几个小时马，不知道有没有什么好玩的游戏，也不知道是否能真的打打猎。

original: Ask me another time, I'm busy

[From.GetTitledFirstName] joined us for the hunt and almost immediately we found the tracks of a large herd of deer. Almost everyone managed to kill some game and [From.GetTitledFirstName] killed two.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]加入了我们的狩猎，很快我们发现了一群鹿的行踪。所有人都准备着猎鹿取乐，[From.GetTitledFirstName]也收获了两只的战果。

original: I was disappointed to hear that [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not want to join the hunt, but it was probably for the best. Some hours after we finally had found some game to hunt, it started to rain and the tracks disappeared completely. We returned empty-handed.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]不想加入狩猎令我很失望，不过这样也好。几个小时后我们发现了一些猎物，正准备搭弓射箭时天公不作美，降雨让猎物的踪影消失的一干二净。我们只好空手而归。

original: A huge boar keeps me out of the forest, a wild beast whose grunting and squealing is heard throughout the forest whenever anyone dares to set foot in its territory. I cannot hunt and the swineherds cannot let their swine graze within the forest without being attacked.
translation: 一头硕大的野猪让我止步于森林边上，无论何时，什么人胆敢涉足于此探险，都要听到这种怪兽穿透层层密林发出的尖利的呼哧与嘶叫。我没办法狩猎，猪群可不会对其成员受伤坐视不管。

original: My marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] should be able to deal with this
translation: 我的军事总管[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]应有能力解决此事

original: Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] is given the task of dealing with the boar
translation: 军事总管[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]接受了捕猎野猪的任务

original: My spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] should be able to deal with this
translation: 我的间谍总管[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]应有能力解决此事

original: Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] is given the task of dealing with the boar
translation: 间谍总管[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]接到了干掉野猪的任务

original: When I approached the forest the boar started squealing and grunting, but did not show himself. [From.GetTitledFirstName] had sent me out with one order: 'Kill the boar!'
translation: 当我靠近森林时那野猪开始嘶叫，但并未现身。[From.GetTitledFirstName]已经给我下达了命令：「杀掉野猪！」

original: I'd rather hire a professional hunter
translation: 我更愿意请个专业的猎人

original: Even the dogs I brought with me recoiled when they heard the angry boar snarling and squealing menacingly.
translation: 即使是我带来的恶犬，听到野猪的尖嚎也畏缩不前，只是威胁地狂吠。

original: The boar fought bravely but we killed him at the end
translation: 野猪拼命抵抗，但我们最后还是干掉了它

original: No one will think less of me if I hire someone to do this, right?
translation: 我要雇人来做的话，没人会看扁我吧？

original: The boar's death cry could be heard miles away and when [From.GetTitledFirstName] returned from the successful hunt I greeted [From.GetHerHim] warmly. The cook took the boar away to prepare it for the feast.
translation: 野猪临死的哀嚎几里远处都听得到，当[From.GetTitledFirstName]成功完成猎捕回来时，我对[From.GetHerHim]致以热情的问候.厨师抬走野猪，去准备丰盛的筵席去了。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] had paid a professional hunter to kill the boar
[From.GetTitledFirstName] lost a limb to the beast!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]与野猪搏斗中失去一条胳膊！

original: I waited eagerly for [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s return but when [From.GetSheHe] entered without the boar I could not hide my discontent.
translation: 我热切地盼望[From.GetTitledFirstName]的归来，但当[From.GetSheHe]没能带着野猪回来时我掩饰不住内心的不满。

original: Do I have to do everything myself?!
translation: 无论什么事都得我亲自去做吗？！

original: Take that useless [From.GetManWoman] away from my sight!
translation: 让那个没用的[From.GetManWoman]离我远远的！

original: Now I have to pay a real hunter for this simple task!
translation: 现在我必须花钱请一个真正的猎人来做这个「简单」的任务！

original: My [Root.GetMyChancellorName], [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName], is scared of the Wild Hunt!
My Marshal, [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName], is scared of the Wild Hunt!
translation: 我的军事总管，[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]，惧怕荒野狩猎！

original: My Steward, [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName], is scared of the Wild Hunt!
translation: 我的财政总管，[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]，惧怕荒野狩猎！

original: My Spymaster, [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName], is scared of the Wild Hunt!
translation: 我的间谍总管，[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]，惧怕荒野狩猎！

original: Did you really try to scare me, [From.GetTitledFirstName]?

There were no real black horses in the stable, so we took the darkest ones and muddied them down, making sure when they had any white marks that they were covered. Then we all dressed in black and fetched the blackest dogs before we rode out to scare [From.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 马厩里没有真正算得上全黑的马，所以我们把马涂色，确保马身上所有白的地方都涂得乌黑.然后我们都穿着黑衣，牵来最黑的狗，骑行出去吓唬[From.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: My poem went all wrong, the feeling I wanted to express lost among the words and the result was just a piece of spoiled pergament. This failure made me question my passion for writing poetry, even more so as the new poet at court had demonstrated his superior memory and mastery only yesterday.
translation: 我的诗意境完全走了样，我想表达的充盈感情一写出来就变得索然无味，只是浪费了一张羊皮纸.这次失败让我连写诗的热情都开始怀疑，就在昨天宫里有位新诗人展示了他卓越的记忆力和诗歌的天赋，使我倍受打击。

original: Poet, make this piece of poetry better, now!
translation: 诗人，把这首诗写的再优美点，快点！

original: The poet will teach you the art of poetry
translation: 这位诗人将教授你写诗歌的诀窍。

original: Poet, could you please help me? This piece of poetry is rubbish!
translation: 诗人，你能帮帮我吗？这首诗糟糕透了！

original: The sweet sound of money should make him eager to help me
translation: 钱币的诱惑会使他乐于帮我

original: I don't want him to think less of me as a poet!
translation: 作为一个诗人，我可不想让他看低我！

original: Wherever I went, I would find [From.GetTitledFirstName] brooding over yet another of [From.GetHerHis] unfinished poems. I was not surprised when, after seeing [From.GetTitledFirstName] trying to tear up the parchment by hand, [From.GetSheHe] waved me forward when [From.GetSheHe] saw me and handed me the parchment.
translation: 不管我去哪，我都能发现[From.GetTitledFirstName]构思着[From.GetHerHis]又一首未完成的诗。我看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]试着用手撕碎羊皮纸，[From.GetSheHe]也看见了我，于是[From.GetSheHe]招呼我过去并把羊皮纸递给了我。

original: It was irritating when [From.GetSheHe] demanded my help
It was flattering when [From.GetSheHe] humbly asked for my help
translation: [From.GetSheHe]谦恭地请求我的帮助时我觉得很谄媚

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] helps [From.GetTitledFirstName] find the poet inside of [From.GetHerHim]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]帮助[From.GetTitledFirstName]找回了藏在[From.GetHerHim]心中的诗情

original: Who can resist the sweet sound of gold?
I couldn't have done it without you!
translation: 没有你的帮助我没法完成它！

original: A farmer told me how his boar had managed to break into his neighbor's hoggery and the result was seven small piglets. Now his neighbor demanded compensation he can't afford and they need me to tell them what to do.
translation: 一个农民告诉我他家的公猪设法钻进邻家的猪圈并弄死了七只小猪崽。现在他的邻居要求赔偿，但他赔不起，想让我裁决他们的纠纷。

original: Give the neighbor four of the piglets
translation: 给邻居四只小猪崽抵债

original: Keep one piglet each, the rest belongs to me
translation: 一边留一只猪崽，剩下的都归我

original: The thief was apprehended not long after he had robbed me and as he was caught in the county of [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] he was set to trial at [Root.Host.GetHerHis] court.
translation: 强盗在抢劫我不久之后就在[Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName]被逮捕，他被送往[Root.Host.GetHerHis]法庭审判。

original: The thief will get what he deserves!
translation: 这个贼会得到他应有的惩罚！

original: Mercy, cried the thief when [From.GetTitledFirstName] confronted and accused him of being the robber.
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]对证并指控其抢劫时这个贼痛哭流涕，真可怜。
他只是个微不足道的小蟊贼

original: Throw him into the deepest dungeon and let him rot!
translation: 把他扔进最深的地牢，让他慢慢腐烂！

original: Hang him, that ought to teach him a lesson
translation: 绞死他，这是对他最好的教训

original: I cannot wait until I hear what the thief's punishment is!
translation: 我等不及听到判决的结果！

original: His hands was cut off! How horrible!
translation: 他的手被砍掉了，好恐怖！

original: Without hands he will never steal again!
translation: 没了手他就再也不会偷东西啦！

original: Poor thing! Thrown into that ghastly prison...
translation: 可怜的家伙！被投进阴森可怖的地牢……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks that I was just and gave the thief a suitable punishment.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]认为我秉公执法，给了这个贼适当的惩罚。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thought the punishment to be too harsh, I should have been more merciful.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]认为这惩罚太残忍了，我本应该更宽容点。

original: Is this the thanks I get?
A group of robbers calling themselves the Band O'Brothers have been brought before me. The long list of all their crimes does not put them in good light.
translation: 一伙自称「兄弟连」的强盗被逮到我面前，一长串的罪行指控对他们极其不利。

original: Why would I care about some petty thieves?
translation: 我为什么要关心一帮无关紧要的蟊贼？

original: Make them suffer before they die!
Such crimes will not go unpunished!
translation: 这样的罪行必须得到惩罚！

original: My spouse [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] is unfaithful! I'm certain about this!
translation: 我的配偶[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]对我不忠，我确信这点！

original: I should ask [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] to help me!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has dragged [From.GetHerHis] unfaithful spouse [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] before me and insists I should punish [From.Spouse.GetHerHim].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]带着[From.GetHerHis]不忠的配偶[From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]来到我面前并坚持要我惩罚[From.Spouse.GetHerHim]。

original: This is a waste of my time
translation: 这简直是在浪费我的时间

original: A couple of days in the dungeon will do [From.Spouse.GetHerHim] good
translation: 地牢里关两天对于[From.Spouse.GetHerHim]比较好

original: The issue is taken care of
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is not happy about the punishment
[From.Spouse.GetSheHeCap] will be locked in the stock
[From.GetTitledFirstName] decided not to punish [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] for [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] infidelity!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]决定不惩罚[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]。这仅仅是[Root.Spouse.GetHerHis]不忠而已！

original: I am being punished for being unfaithful to [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]!

Poachers have been seen in [Root.Location.GetName] so I should probably send my spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] and my marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] to investigate the matter.
translation: 偷猎者在[Root.Location.GetName]出没，所以我也许该派我的间谍总管[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]和我的军事总管[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]前去调查此事。

original: They have more important things to do
translation: 他们有更重要的事去做

original: Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] and Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] will search for poachers
translation: 间谍总管[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]和军事总管[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]将搜寻偷猎者

original: I took two poachers in the act! Two young boys, who looked as if they never eaten a decent meal in their lives, had two dead rabbits and a live one in a snare.
translation: 我当场抓住两个偷猎者！两个面黄肌瘦，看起来一顿饱饭没吃过的年轻人，他们手里有两只死兔子，还有一只活兔子掉到陷阱里。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] caught two young poachers in my forest with a couple of dead rabbits at their belts and a live one in a snare.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]在我的森林里抓住了两个年轻的偷猎者，他们打了两只兔子，还有只活的掉在陷阱了。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is informed about the poacher's punishments
The law demands their death by hanging
They must be starving! Release them
translation: 他们一定是饥饿难耐才这么做，放了他们吧

original: Kill them and mount their tarred heads above the gates!
translation: 杀掉他们，把他们涂满沥青的头颅挂在城门上！

original: I wonder what kind of punishment the poachers will get...
translation: 我想知道偷猎者会受到什么样的惩罚……
这是个可以接受的惩罚

original: They are to be hanged? That is too harsh!
translation: 他们即将被绞死？这也太残忍了吧！

original: I hope I can change [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s mind!
translation: 我想我可以改变[This.GetTitledFirstName]的想法！

original: Hope the loss of their ears learnt them a lesson
translation: 希望他们能吸取耳朵被割的教训

original: Cutting their ears off? That's barbaric!
translation: 割掉他们的耳朵？真野蛮！

original: The only good poacher is a dead poacher
translation: 死掉的偷猎者才是好偷猎者

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] approves of my just treatment of the poachers.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]赞许我对于偷猎者公正的裁决。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] tried to protest against the poacher's punishment, but it was too late. [From.GetSheHe] thought I should have been more merciful.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]试图抗议对偷猎者的裁决，但为时已晚。[From.GetSheHe]认为我本应表现得更宽容些。

original: Cattle has mysteriously disappeared from herds all throughout my land. Luckily, my bailiff found the rustlers.
translation: 我领地的牛群里莫名其妙地少了一头牛。幸运的是，我的牧场总管查到了偷牛贼。

original: The cattle has been returned, no sanction needed
translation: 牛已经找回来了，不需要处罚了

original: Thievery is punished by cutting off the hands...
Another day, I would have spared their lives. Not today.
translation: 某天我会饶他们一命，但今天我不会。

original: The coldest, darkest cell is reserved for scum like this!
translation: 最阴冷潮湿黑暗的囚房就是为这种人渣准备的！

original: I managed to stop the enraged villagers before they did anything hasty to the young, beautiful woman they accused of witchery.
translation: 暴怒的村民要对一个被控使用巫术的年轻漂亮的女人做出什么草率的事，我设法阻止了这一行为。

original: She hasn't done anything wrong, release her!
She should be put to the ordeal by water
She will confess her sins after some time in the torture chamber
translation: 她过段时间将在行刑室里供认她的罪过

original: Someone so beautiful must be a witch!
translation: 这么漂亮的女人一定是女巫！

original: The priest accuses a couple of villagers of blasphemy after he heard them take the Lord's name in vain. The blacksmith did it when he hit his thumb with the hammer, the stablemaster when a horse kicked him and the cook when a rat fell into the stew.
translation: 牧师指责一对农人夫妇犯亵渎罪，因为他听到他俩假上帝之名口出秽言。铁匠用锤子敲到拇指时也这么说，马厩管家当马踢到他时也这么说，厨师在老鼠掉到炖肉里时还会这样说。

original: A couple of days in the dungeons should be fine
Only the cook should be punished, I could have been poisoned!
translation: 我只惩罚厨子，我可能已经被毒害过啦！

original: This is a disgrace! They should be hanged!
translation: 这真是耻辱！他们要被绞死！

original: It all happened so quickly I barely registered the events. A noble had been attacked and was dragged away from us by the kidnappers!
translation: 事情来得太突然，我只能勉强记下经过。一个贵族被袭击并被劫匪绑架了！

original: The kidnappers overpowered me and made sure I could not call for help by stuffing a filthy rag into my mouth! Luckily, they did not get far away with me, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and the guards managed to free me and capture them.
translation: 劫匪打晕了我，在我嘴里塞上了脏兮兮的破布，使我无法呼救！幸运的是，他们没带我走多远，[From.GetTitledFirstName]和侍卫赶来救下了我并抓住了他们。

original: Make sure they are severely punished!
translation: 他们要受到确实的严惩！

original: I owe my thanks to [This.GetTitledFirstName] and my guards
translation: 我向[This.GetTitledFirstName]和我的侍卫们致以诚挚的感谢

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was subject to an attempted kidnapping today and [From.GetSheHe] is clearly shocked by the experience.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]今天遭受了一次未遂的绑架，[From.GetSheHe]对这次经历深感震惊。

original: The offenders will be dealt with according to the law.
Put the offenders in the darkest dungeon, never to be released
translation: 把犯罪者投入最阴暗的地牢，永世不得释放

original: A rumor about a spy sneaking around in my own castle was confirmed this morning when I caught him red-handed.
translation: 间谍在我城堡周围潜伏的传言今晨被证实，我当场抓住了他。

original: Should I throw him into the dungeon?
I will kill him with my bare hands
The peasants told the whole castle about a 'dragon' they saw in the forest and now the eager young men keep nagging me about a true dragon hunt.
translation: 几个农夫告诉全城堡的人他们在森林里看见一条「龙」，眼下一些热血年青人纠缠着我进行一次真正的猎龙。

original: Some gold might shut them up
translation: 花点钱也许能让他们闭嘴

original: Fearsome dragon, thou doth not scare me
translation: 巨龙威怖哉，汝能奈我何

original: I will kill it and hang its head over the hearth
translation: 我要把它杀掉，把头挂在我壁炉之上

original: The falconer is expecting me as a new hunting bird has arrived and awaits my inspection.
translation: 驯鹰人得到了一只新猎鹰，并期待着我前去观评。

original: Just tell him I am busy
I need to go hunting right now!
Is it bigger than a chicken?
translation: 这鹰会比小鸡大一点么？

original: It will probably cost too much
The wolves' territory has crept closer to the castle and more sheep, pigs and chickens vanish each day.
translation: 狼群的威胁一天天接近城堡，每天有越来越多的羊，猪和鸡消失。

original: The wolves are not to blame
Every village will fight them together!
Give me my sword, I'll deal with them
translation: 拿我的剑来，我去会会它们
可笑的模仿罢了，还有什么呢？

original: While pondering over the guest list for the banquet, I wondered if I should invite one of my friends.
translation: 在考虑这次宴会的宾客名单时，我在想是否应该邀请我的一个朋友。

original: My friend [From.GetFirstName] has invited me to a grand banquet.
translation: 我的朋友[From.GetFirstName]邀请我参加一场盛大的宴会。
我勉为其难地参加一下吧

original: Lots o'people and lots o'food... Good!
translation: 好多人，好多吃的……太好了！

original: It wasn't until several weeks after the banquet I heard about it and wondered why I was not invited. Aren't [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I friends?
translation: 直到宴会结束几周之后我才得知这件事，并且很纳闷为何没被邀请。难道[From.GetTitledFirstName]和我不是朋友么？

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] confronted me about me not inviting [From.GetHerHim] to the banquet.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]因为我没有邀请[From.GetHerHim]参加宴会而和我见面。

original: I did not want you there!
Peddlers selling all sorts of food, clothing, exotic spices and luxuries such as glass and jewels filled the town square with their wares and shouts.
translation: 小贩在贩卖各种食物，衣物，来自异国的香料，还有诸如宝石和玻璃一类的奢侈品。城镇广场上到处是他们的商品，到处能听到他们的叫卖声。

original: There are a couple of things I need...

translation: 在些小玩意儿上浪费钱……

original: I don't like the merchants, but their wares are fine
translation: 我不喜欢这些商人，但他们的货物很不错
集市对所有人来说都很有趣！

original: I think fairs should be banned
translation: 我认为集市应该被禁止

original: The coldblooded destrier and the warmblooded charger ambled towards each other, their riders preparing to crush their lances against each other. I watched the destrier crash to the ground with its rider crushed beneath him.
translation: 一边是冷血的坐骑，一边是热血的战马，彼此扬蹄奔向对手，骑手挺起长矛，准备刺向对方。我看到战马不小心失蹄摔倒在地，骑手也紧随其后颠下战马。

original: Are they deliberately trying to kill themselves?
Ha! I could have done it better
translation: 哈！我本来可以表现得更好

original: A horse! A horse! My kingdom for a horse!
translation: 一匹马！一匹马！我的王位换一匹马！

original: Let my doctor take a look at him
translation: 让我的医生给他看一看

original: The week before the tournament was a stressful one. Stands for the spectators had to be erected, the knights who arrived needed housing and my armor had to be refitted.
translation: 比武大会赛前一周最为紧张。观众看台要搭起来，赶来参赛的骑士要安排住处，我的盔甲也得修理一下。

original: Of course, I won't win anything
This is what I have been waiting for!

translation: 比赛结束后将敞开供应美酒！

original: Jesters, minstrels, acrobats and dancers, all have gathered to perform at the festival. Inviting noises, tempting scents and alluring sights tries to lure people to various stands, performers and tents.
translation: 马戏小丑、云游歌者、杂耍行家、舞蹈演员，齐聚一处在节日上表演。邀约的乱声，撩人的香气，迷魅的景致把人们引向各种各样的舞台、大帐篷和表演场。

original: The dancers are actually pretty good
I must invite that minstrel to sing for me!
translation: 我要邀请吟游诗人为我献歌一曲！

original: I saw a vassal with his stunning young wife by his side at the feast. I decided to make a toast to the lovely couple...
translation: 我在宴会上看到我的封臣与他绝美的妻子。我决定向这对恩爱的夫妇敬一杯酒……

original: I hope you will live long and happy lives together...
I thought the groom would drop dead when you consummated the wedding\n
translation: 我还以为你们完婚的时候新郎会活活「高兴死」呢\n

original: Your wedding was nice, but I dare say this feast is better!
translation: 你们的婚礼很完美，但我敢说今天的宴会更完美！

original: A travelling poet who calls himself a 'bard' arrived today.
translation: 一个自称「骚客」的吟游诗人今天来到这儿。
一个什么都不会的无名小子，切！

original: If he does anything wrong I will break every bone in his body
translation: 只要他张狂一点我就让他粉身碎骨

original: As long as he stays away from me...
translation: 把他赶紧轰走，越远越好……

original: He can stay for as long as he likes
translation: 只要他愿意，想呆多久就呆多久

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] reacts to [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s feelings towards the bard
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]对于[Root.GetTitledFirstName]对这个吟游诗人态度的反应

original: Maybe he can help me with my poetry...
I introduced a bard to [From.GetTitledFirstName] today and I do hope [From.GetSheHe] liked his poetry and songs.
translation: 我今天向[From.GetTitledFirstName]引荐了一位吟游诗人，我确实希望[From.GetSheHe]喜欢他的诗文和歌谣作品。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] threatened to break the poet's bones!

translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]尖酸的表现真是恶心死我了！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] asked the bard for help with [From.GetHerHis] poetry!
I will thank [This.GetTitledFirstName] for [This.GetHerHis] great behavior!
translation: 我要感谢[This.GetTitledFirstName]，就为他[This.GetHerHis]博爱的行为！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName], who had introduced the bard to the court, was not pleased with me promising to break the bard's bones. I tried to explain that I would only break the bones if the bard tried to do something unpleasant, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not accept that explanation.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]把诗人引入宫廷的人，对我威胁杀掉诗人的言行很是不满。我只是打算在诗人做出什么不敬的行为之后我才杀他，我试图解释一下，但[From.GetTitledFirstName]没接受我的解释。

original: I just wanted to protect everybody...
I found out that [From.GetTitledFirstName] had introduced the bard to the court and I told [From.GetHerHim] how much I appreciated that. Finally someone who can sing!
translation: 我了解到[From.GetTitledFirstName]将诗人引入了宫廷，我向[From.GetHerHim]表达我对这种举动的赞许之情。终于，有人可以放声吟唱了。

original: A man claiming to be a lord who disappeared seven years ago has found his way to my castle. He sings of the fair queen of Elfland and some say his songs are prophetic...
translation: 一个家伙声称是七年前失踪的领主，现在回到了他的家，也就是我的城堡。他歌咏着仙境的仙后，有的人说他的歌咏确有预示……

original: Just an old drunk. Throw him out!
translation: 一个老醉鬼而已，把他轰出去！

original: I have no reason to believe him
He's finally found his way home then!
translation: 他最终找到了回家的路！

original: I'd love to hear him sing!

A troubadour and his wife the trobairitz has arrived from Occitania. Their performances range from vulgar satires to political sirventes and everything in between, including songs and poems of courtly love.
translation: 一位行吟诗人和他同为行吟诗人的妻子自阿基坦尼亚地区而来。他们的表演从最脍炙人口的街巷讽刺诗到阿基坦尼亚地区流行的政治谏喻诗，以及描述宫闱之恋的诗文与歌谣，包罗万象。

original: I hope they do not dare write any satires about me!
translation: 我希望他们是不敢写讽刺我的东西的！
我希望他们会唱「鹰之歌」！

original: I remember those two, they came here last year!
translation: 我记得他们俩，去年还来过！

original: They will be paid well, I assure you
translation: 我保证他们将得到丰厚的犒赏。

original: They use snake oil to do that
translation: 他们通过使用蛇油来完成

original: Keep an eye on them, I do not trust them
translation: 睁大眼睛看，我可不相信他们真能这样

original: Their skills are fascinating but unsettling
translation: 他们的技艺精彩绝伦但使人不安

original: Hope he didn't dislocate his shoulder
translation: 希望他别把肩弄脱臼了

original: I thought the food was superb, the wine mediocre and the dancers beautiful. Some of the more inebriated guests joined the dancers in a quadrille.
translation: 食物味道极佳，酒味过于平淡，舞者则很绚目。一些喝得醉醺醺的客人加入了跳方舞的队列里。

original: I think I'll join them too
translation: 我觉得我也该加入他们

original: Dance only leads to... well, you know
I thought I wouldn't have to dance!
translation: 之前我以为我不用跳舞了！

original: [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] wants to dance, but I think I will keep on drinking
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]想跳舞，但我觉得我还是继续喝酒比较好

original: They do look like they are having fun
translation: 他们看上去玩的很愉快

original: I think I'll need to pay them better
translation: 我觉得我得多付点钱给他们

original: I wonder how he does that
translation: 我在想他是怎么做到的

original: Keep him on a short leash, if he does anything...
translation: 盯着他，如果他做了什么出格的事……

original: Training a bear can't be too hard
We had a jolly great time dressed up as wild men, dancing chained together and appearing shaggy and hairy from head to foot. Too bad the fun was interrupted when a careless person set us on fire!
translation: 我们打扮成野人，从头到脚都毛茸茸的，然后排成一行跳着舞蹈。本来玩的挺愉快的，结果一个人不小心把我们身上点燃了！

original: The pain... but it was worth it
I was saved from any greater harm by a courtier
translation: 在朝臣的帮助下，我没受多少伤

original: Some fool poured spirits over me!
A book without a title was pushed into my hands by a hooded man clad in midnight blue. Something was said, but was lost in the confusion. The book was still there.
translation: 深夜中，一本没有标题的书被一个带着帽子的男子塞入了我的手中。我在后面喊着他，但是他很快的消失了。留下了困惑的我。

original: It wants me to read it....

The book is gibberish, but also enlightening. But, even if I struggle with some chapters, its mystery still engrosses me. Something is concealed in the book's language and I am determined to find out what.
translation: 这本书大多是胡言乱语，但是也颇让人启发……但是，即使我努力的去读，有些章节对我仍很神秘。这本书的字里行间肯定藏了些什么，而我会把它们找出来的。

original: The secret will soon be mine! Muhahaha... *cough* *cough*
translation: 秘密很快就会被我找到了！木哈哈哈哈……*咳咳* *咳咳*

original: Intense study of the book will follow
The book will be studied thoroughly

The 'secret' within the book still eluded me after several weeks of intense study, wasted time and wasted ink! The man couldn't be anything but a maniac, filling precious parchment with malarkey and incomprehensible symbols.
translation: 经过几个月的认真研究，这本书的「秘密」依然不为我所知，纯粹是浪费时间和墨水！那个家伙不过是个疯子，珍贵的羊皮纸上尽是各种乱码和不知名的符号。

original: I learned to love books instead

It took me several weeks before the mystery of the book revealed itself to me. The gibberish parts were encoded and after many hours trying to decipher the code, I managed to break it and construct a key to make the book easier to read.
translation: 我花了几个星期的时间才弄明白本书的奥秘。那些乱码都是加密的，在几个小时的尝试后，我成功地解开了密码，让这本书更容易阅读了。

original: The mystery is still not solved...
A rather nettlesome neighbor keeps sending me envoys begging for money or demanding tribute. I feel rather confused about his arbitrary ways and I am not sure what I should do.
translation: 一个相当棘手的邻居一直派使节来要求我给钱或者向他表示敬意。我对他的专横十分疑惑，也不知道该怎么做。

original: I will send him these roses
Nail the envoy's hats to their head!
translation: 把使节的帽子钉到他们脑袋上！

original: My nettlesome neighbor has been rather quiet since I sent him his envoys back with their hats nailed to their heads.
translation: 自从我把帽子钉到使节脑袋上以后，我那烦人的邻居消停多了。

original: Wonder what happens if I do like this...
translation: 想想如果我愿意这么做会发生什么……

original: A new punishment has been conceived
translation: 一个新的惩罚方式已经构思好了

original: A letter arrived from my nettlesome neighbor not many days after the astonished envoys returned home. He was most grateful and deeply touched by the red roses I sent him.
translation: 惊讶的特使回去后没几天，我那烦人的邻居的信就到了。他对我送给他的玫瑰表示十分感激，并深受感动。

original: They finally came to good use
translation: 他们最终起到了好的作用

original: Maybe I should grow more roses?
translation: 也许我得种更多的玫瑰？

original: The respect and prestige I got after nailing the hats to the envoys' heads has whetted my appetite. I have sent for a skilled torturer who will teach me more about torture and impalement.
translation: 在我将帽子钉入特使的头部之后，我获得了尊敬和威望，也增加了我的胃口。我请来了一个熟练的行刑人，他将教我更多关于酷刑和刺穿的内容。

original: My garden is the apple of my eye, my pride and joy. I distrust my gardener and would spend every hour of the day in my garden if I could.
translation: 我的花园是我的心头肉，我的自豪与喜悦。我不相信我的园丁，并会花尽可能的每天都呆在我的花园里。

original: If I could, I would spend all my time in the garden
translation: 如果我可以，我会把所有的时间都用在花园里

original: I love my garden, but there are other things in life too
translation: 我爱我的花园，但是生活中也有其他的事情

original: My eager courtship of a certain lady has gotten me nowhere, her icy response can cool even the warmest heart. I will not give up, there must be something I can do to win her affection.
translation: 我对某位女士的热情追求让我无地自容，她冰冷的回答可以冷却最火热的心灵。我不会放弃的，一定有什么可以让我获得她芳心的方法。

original: My icy lady does not thaw...
I will perform heroic deeds of valor!
translation: 我会做一些英勇的英雄事迹！

original: The heroic deeds has finally made the ice lady mine!
translation: 英雄事迹终于让冰美人属于我了！

original: The heroic deeds leaves her cold...
translation: 英雄事迹让她更加冷淡了……

original: My attempts to make her mine have been to no avail. She is as frosty as the lord of winter himself.
translation: 她对我的求爱毫无回应。她就像冬季那样冷淡。

original: I struggled with the poem for several days and with a trembling heart, I sent it to her. Her response was warm and lovely, it seemed the ice princess finally has thawed.
translation: 我纠结了几天，写出了诗，带着颤抖的心送给了她。她的反应温和可爱，似乎冰美人最终解冻了。
我的感觉是语言难以表达的！

original: I did not tell my heart's desire about my decision to perform heroic deeds of valor to win her heart but I started seeing her at every tournament, every duel I fought. She started smiling at me and laughed when I defeated my opponents in her name.
translation: 我无法说出话我心中的感觉，我决定弄些英雄事迹来赢得她的心。每场比赛，我的每次战斗我都能看到她。她开始朝我微笑，每次当我击败对手后，她更是高兴不已。

original: Her heart has thawed for me!

The largest, most prestigious tournament will take place in a county not far from here. The small victories I have won to make my special lady fall in love with me seem trivial now and I feel I have to win this so she will love me forever.
translation: 最大，最负盛名的比赛将发生在离这里不远的一个领地。曾经获得的些许胜利，虽然让我的女神爱上了我，但是现在我觉得必须获得这次胜利让我的女神永远爱我。

original: My best will not be enough, I must win!
translation: 我的最好还不够好，我必须赢！

original: For every poem I write and she receives, a bigger piece of her heart belongs to me. I have selected a couple of my and apparently her favorites and given to the monks to have them illustrated and written down properly.
translation: 我不断寄给她情诗，她的心也慢慢属于了我。我选择了我最喜欢的也是她最喜欢的，然后送到修士那，要求他们演绎并写成诗歌。

original: I hope she will like it
The prestigious tournament just ended, with me as the sole winner. I could hardly believe it as the lady of my heart kissed me chastely on my cheek.
translation: 最富盛名的比赛刚刚结束，我成为了唯一的赢家。我不敢相信我心爱的女士在我的脸颊上留下了纯洁的吻。

original: Can I stop doing this now?
translation: 现在我可以不这么做了吗

original: I was mortified and then furious as the monk told me that they had liked my poetry so much they had produced several copies and sold them. The lady of my heart did not seem to care though, she just kissed me sweetly and thanked me but said she already got a copy.
translation: 那些修士们告诉我，他们太爱我的诗了，于是他们就复制了几个副本并拿去出售。我听了以后恼羞成怒.那位我心爱的女士似乎不太在乎，她甜蜜地吻了我并谢谢了我，尽管她说她已经拿到副本了。

original: I should be furious, but I am just happy
translation: 我应该生气，但是我却很开心

original: My work tasks bore me, conversations with my courtiers bore me, everything bores me! I need something new and exciting in my life.
translation: 我繁重的工作，跟朝臣们的虚与委蛇，都让我不堪重负！我需要一些新玩意让我的生活兴奋起来。

original: Some hunting will cheer me up
translation: 打打猎也许能让我振奋一下

original: Perhaps I should send for a new bird...
translation: 也许我可以试试新的猎鹰

original: The hunt was a huge disappointment, no game in sight and my horse threw me off.
translation: 打猎的结果让人无比失望，没找到猎物，而且我的马把我摔到了地上。

original: The new bird had not been properly trained, it attacked one of the dogs and had to be killed before it released its grip on the poor, wailing hound.
translation: 新的猎鹰还没有完全训练好，它攻击了我的一只狗，在它的利爪杀死狗之前，狗发出了悲惨的叫声。

original: Rabbit after rabbit was caught, killed and brought to me by my new bird.
translation: 一只又一只兔子被我的新猎鹰抓住杀掉了。

original: I feel more relaxed now, I can do my tasks, talk to my courtiers and do other things without feeling too bored. Maybe I should hunt more often?
translation: 我现在觉得轻松多了，我可以继续我的工作，跟我的朝臣扯扯淡，做事情也不会带着负担。也许我得多打打猎，不是吗？

original: The new bird is almost too perfect. I enjoy every hunt with her, and the cook has trouble finding new recipes for rabbit.
translation: 新猎鹰几乎是完美的。我跟它在一起打猎是一种享受，我的厨师用来烹调兔子的配料都不够了。

original: A new bird has arrived in the mews and a new book on the art of writing poetry is in the library.
translation: 一只从没有见过的鸟儿飞到了马厩，图书馆里有一本关于诗歌写作艺术的新书籍。

original: I should start reading the book
I should take her out for a hunt
This book about poetry is really boring. It is filled with do's and do not's and I just want to throw it out the window.
translation: 这本关于诗歌的书实在无聊。里面全是胡说八道，我都想把它从窗口扔出去。

original: The poetry book is really inspiring! I can feel creativity bursting through my body.
translation: 这本诗集实在太有意思了！让我脑中蹦出无数的灵感。

original: The new bird was more aggressive than the ones I'm used to. It killed many rabbits but was unwilling to relinquish its catch - it even attacked me when I tried to pry one away!
translation: 这只新猎鹰比我以前的那只更具有攻击性。它杀死了许多兔子，但不愿放弃它捕获的猎物——在我试图探查一个猎物时，它甚至攻击我！

original: My modest attempts to write poetry was never meant to be published in any way, but wherever I go, bards and minstrels are reciting or singing my poems.
translation: 我写的诗歌从来不打算以任何方式发表，但无论我走到哪里，吟游诗人都在朗诵和歌唱我的诗篇。

original: My poetry was never meant for others!
translation: 我写诗从来就不是为了这些！

original: The church preaches celibacy and my friends try to lure me into hedonism by showing me the pleasures of life. I can't really decide if I want to enjoy life or wait for heaven...
translation: 教会宣扬独身，而我的朋友们试图用生活的乐趣引诱我信奉享乐主义。我真的不能确定我到底是想享受生活，或进入天堂……

original: I hope celibacy doesn't bore me too much
translation: 我希望独身不会让我厌烦

original: A waste of money, a waste of time but oh so good it felt! The pleasures of life makes everything feel less tiresome and more... delightful!
translation: 这浪费金钱又浪费时间，但是这个感觉实在无法让我抗拒！使一切都不那么讨厌，让一切都令人愉快！

original: The first few days felt manageable but then I started notice the other sex and felt envious of those who could indulge in sinful activities.
translation: 前几天我感觉情况良好，但我开始注意其他性感的女性，开始羡慕那些可以沉迷在罪恶活动中的人。

original: Just thinking of celibacy makes me shiver but at the same time, something seem amiss in my life. What is this emptiness inside of me?
translation: 就是想想独身就让我发抖，但同时，我的生活似乎有些不对劲。这是我内心的空虚？

original: I need to take a few days contemplating this
The temptations are everywhere! The inviting glances, the luscious bodies and the alluring fragrances...
translation: 诱惑到处都是！邀请的眼神，甘美的肉体和诱人的香水……

original: No! I will not give in!
After a long, long, long time it feels as if I could bear to live in complete celibacy for the rest of my life.
translation: 很长很长很长一段时间后，我感觉好像能承受下半辈子的独身生活了。

original: This lifestyle of utmost pleasure and joyous life suits me perfectly. This can be nothing but heaven.
translation: 这种极度的愉悦和欢快的生活方式非常适合我。这只可能是天堂。

original: I should contemplate this some more
A strange, reddish-pink rash appeared on my palms and soles not long ago along with a fever and headache. Some parts of the rash has developed abscesses and is both ugly and itchy.
translation: 一些奇怪的，粉红色的皮疹，出现在我的手掌和脚掌上，伴随着发烧和头痛。皮疹的某些部分已开始脓肿，破裂和发痒。

original: The rash disappeared and took the headache and fever with it.
translation: 皮疹消失了，头痛和发烧也康复了。

original: First I lost my eyebrows and eyelashes, then my nose deformed. People fear me and I must hide my face as to not cause hysteria among others.
translation: 一开始，我失去了我的眉毛和睫毛，然后我的鼻子变形了。人们讨厌我，我必须遮住我的脸以免造成他人之间的恐慌。

original: A man approached me and I tried to duck away from him, not let him see my disfigurement. He told me he had a cure and sold me a potion for only 25 gold coins.
translation: 一名男子走近我，我试图避开他，不让他看到我毁容的脸。他告诉我他有一瓶药能够治好我，只要25金。

original: The voices in my head are telling me to do horrible things!
translation: 在我脑海中的声音让我做可怕的事情！

original: I was later told that my strange behavior and fear of the moon was caused by the voices in my head. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] managed to clear my head of voices and now I have total silence.
translation: 后来我被告知，我奇怪的行为和对月亮的恐惧是因为我脑海中的声音造成的。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]设法清除我的脑海中的声音，我现在获得了彻底的安静。

original: I am speaking in tongues, screaming obscenities at random times, most often when the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] preaches and am sometimes lying on the ground writhing in apparent pain. I seldom remember these things and people believe me to be possessed.
translation: 我会时不时地胡言乱语，尖声说些污言秽语，最常见是当[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]宣教时，我会躺在地上痛得打滚。事后我还很少记得发生了什么，人们相信我被恶魔附体了。

original: Vade retro satana!'\n\nThe priest's exorcism worked beautifully, I haven't spoken in tongues or screamed obscenities for several days!
translation: 撒旦退散！\n\n神父的驱魔起效了，我不再胡言乱语或尖叫了！

original: My moodiness and tendency to lash out at people is getting worse. I sleep too little and can't seem to stop worrying.
translation: 人们的抨击让我变得越来越情绪低落。我睡得很少并时刻担心着。

original: This is a lot of pressure...
The world will not weigh me down anymore, I have a new spring in my step, joy in my heart and a smile on my face.
translation: 世界不会再让我难受了，新的春天走入的了我生活，让我心中的充满喜悦，脸上绽放笑容。

original: After a couple of days just spending some time doing things I love, hunting, reading and visiting friends, life does not seem as grey as it did before.
translation: 我花一些时间做我喜欢的事，狩猎，阅读，访友，生活并不像以前那样灰暗。

original: I don't feel too well, something is wrong with me. I am burning up with fever, my nose is running and my head feels as if someone is banging something hard against it.
translation: 我觉得我不太清醒，一定有什么不对劲。我不断流鼻涕，发烧就像身上着了火，我的头感觉就好像被人在用力敲打一样。

original: This cough is killing me! It started as chest pain and shortness of breath, then I started coughing up phlegm and now blood!
translation: 咳嗽让我想死！我感到胸痛，气短，然后我就开始咳嗽，开始是痰现在是血！

original: Something is very wrong with me
When the hot cautery touched the open wound, I couldn't hold the scream back. I cursed the doctor who only laughed, told me to take it easy and not pick on the wound.
translation: 当热烙铁碰到了我裸露的皮肤时，我忍不住尖叫了。我诅咒那些一边笑话我，一边的告诉我要放轻松而不是治疗伤口的医生。

original: The old wound has finally healed, leaving a pretty grotesque scar behind.
translation: 终于，旧的伤口已经愈合，留下了相当怪诞的疤痕。

original: My body may be sapless and infirm, but my mind is as healthy as ever!
translation: 我的身体也许精神萎靡，体弱多病，但我的心灵跟过去一样健康！

original: Who are you? Oh, of course.
Where am I? Who are these people? Oh, pretty colors...
translation: 我在哪里？这些人都是谁哦？啊，好美的颜色……

original: I haven't coughed for days and the pain is gone. Fate has granted me reprieve.
translation: 我已经不咳嗽了，疼痛也消失。命运判了我死缓。

original: I feel weak as a babe, but the cursed fever has finally broken!
translation: 我觉得我像一个婴儿般虚弱，但这诅咒的发烧终于结束了！

original: The spots are receding and the fever has broken. Am I really cured?
translation: 斑点和发烧消失了。我真的治好了？

original: I am alive... I AM ALIVE!
It takes more to kill me than measly measles!
translation: 那些可怜的小斑点想杀我，早着呢！

original: I think I made it through this cursed disease.
translation: 我想我撑过了这该死的疾病。

original: Slaying the king of the forest demands proper celebration with wine, singing and...
translation: 杀死森林之王后，我们需要庆祝会，酒，歌声……

original: A small kitty is demanding your attention.
translation: 一只小猫咪引起了你的注意。

original: Narrowly avoiding capture by the forces of [From.GetTitledFirstName], I am now forced to raise the banner of rebellion.
translation: 为避免被[From.GetTitledFirstName]抓获，我被迫举起叛乱的旗帜。

original: My guards failed to capture [From.GetTitledFirstName], who has now raised [From.GetPossPronoun] flag in rebellion!
translation: 我的卫兵未能抓住[From.GetTitledFirstName]，现在[From.GetPossPronoun]举起了叛乱的旗帜！

original: My liege has seen fit to throw me in the dungeon. My life might be forfeit.
translation: 我的领主认为把我扔到地牢更合适。我性命堪忧。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is now safely locked away in my dungeon, awaiting [From.GetPossPronoun] fate...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]被安全地锁在我的地牢里，等待[From.GetPossPronoun]命运……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to avoid my guardsmen and has fled to the court of [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]设法躲开了我的卫兵，并已逃到[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的宫廷

original: I have been released from the dungeons of [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 我已从[From.GetTitledFirstName]的地牢中被释放出来！

original: My neck rests uneasily on the headsman's block as I await eternity. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has seen fit to end my life.
translation: 我的脖子不安地面对刽子手，我在等待着终结。[From.GetTitledFirstName]已经觉得是时候结束我的生命了。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to spare my wretched life and banish me from the realm.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]已决定结束我的悲惨生活，把我放逐出他的领地。

original: I woke up to loud shouts in the hallway outside my chambers. My guards had slain a would-be assassin, but another one got away.
translation: 我在房外走廊的惊呼中醒来。我的卫士杀了一个刺客，但另一个逃走了。

original: My hired killers failed to slay [From.GetTitledFirstName], but my involvement remains unknown.
translation: 我请来的杀手刺杀[From.GetTitledFirstName]失败了，但是他不知道是我干的。

original: Three assassins disguised as pages jumped me on my way to my chambers. The guards saved my life, but not before I was stabbed in the side.
translation: 三个刺客在我回房间时跳了出来想杀我。卫兵救了我的命，但是我被刺伤了。

original: The pain is almost too much to bear. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] curse the assailant who maimed me and managed to escape!
translation: 疼痛太让我难受了。愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]诅咒那个要杀我的人！

original: On the bright side, they did maim [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: 从好的方面看，他们让[From.GetHerHim]残废了！

original: My trusty cook caught one of the kitchen staff poisoning my wine! Under torture, he admitted that [From.GetTitledFirstName] had paid him.
translation: 我信赖的厨师抓住了一个试图向我酒中下毒的厨房帮工！在严刑拷打下，他承认[From.GetTitledFirstName]曾付给他钱。

original: My assassins failed to kill [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Even worse, they divulged my name!
translation: 我的刺客刺杀[From.GetTitledFirstName]失败了。更糟的是，他们透露了我的名字！

original: This will not help my reputation
I woke up to find a shadowy figure climbing in through the window. I yelled for help and the guards burst in, seizing the assassin just as he stabbed me in the shoulder.
translation: 我醒来时，发现一个朦胧的身影正爬过窗口。我大声求救，卫兵破门而入，就在他刺中了我的肩膀的那一刻抓住了刺客。

original: My new chambermaid attacked me with a nasty little dagger. She took an eye out before the guards could subdue her. Before her speedy execution, she gave up the name of her employer - [From.GetBestName].
translation: 我的新侍女用一个小匕首袭击了我。在卫兵制服她之前，她刺瞎了我的眼睛。在她被处决之前，她说出了她的雇主的名字——[From.GetBestName]。

original: The hooded assassin got me! My vision is fading fast. May my kin avenge me!
translation: 蒙面刺客刺中了我！我的视线模糊了。愿我的家族帮我报仇！

original: Joyous news! [From.GetTitledFirstName] died choking on [From.GetPossPronoun] blood, not knowing the name of [From.GetPossPronoun] killer.
translation: 好消息！[From.GetTitledFirstName]死于[From.GetPossPronoun]咳血，没人知道[From.GetPossPronoun]凶手是谁。

original: I must make sure the assassins stay silent...
translation: 我必须让刺客永远闭嘴……

original: I am dying! The veal was laced with poison! Such excruciating pain... but I die knowing who murdered me.
translation: 我要死了！牛肉有毒！这种疼痛真是难以忍受……但我知道是谁谋杀我的。

original: Good news! [From.GetTitledFirstName] died green and bloated like a toad. Unfortunately, the poisoner was apprehended and tortured until he blabbed my name.
translation: 好消息！[From.GetTitledFirstName]死了，全身都是绿色的脓疮，就像一只癞蛤蟆。不幸的是，投毒者被逮捕和折磨，直到他供出了我的名字。

original: My spymaster is planning retribution against [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] for having attempted the assassination of [From.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 我的间谍总管计划报复[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]对[From.GetTitledFirstName]的暗杀。
