original: Ask our Liege to settle this.
translation: 要求我们的领主解决这一问题。

original: It's better to forgive and forget.
Our liege will evaluate our request.
translation: 我们的领主会评估我们的要求的。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is asking us to deal with an assassination attempt inside our realm.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]要求我们处理在我们领地内的暗杀企图。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has judged that our rival now have a legitimate claim on our title.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]决定，现在我们的对手对我的头衔的要求是合法的。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has granted us a claim on our rival for their vile assassinations.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]授权让我们对我们的对手卑鄙的刺杀进行索赔。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has ordered the arrest of our rival for their vile assassinations.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]已下令逮捕卑鄙暗杀我们的竞争对手。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] refuse to deal with our problems with a rival inside [From.GetHerHis] realm.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝处理我们和在他境内的[From.GetHerHis]竞争对手之间的问题。

original: It seems my amorous adventures have resulted in a child - little [From.GetFirstName] is my spitting image.
translation: 看来我的恋爱冒险生下了孩子——小[From.GetFirstName]是我滥情象征。

original: Lady [This.GetFirstName], the mother, is most pleased
[This.GetTitledFirstName], the mother's husband, is most displeased...
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]作为这位母亲的丈夫是最不高兴的……

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has not only cheated on me, but has legitimized his accursed spawn!
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]不仅背着我偷情，还把他那该死的小畜生合法化了！

original: My sweet [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has acknowledged the bastard child he had with some slut.
translation: 我的爱人[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]承认了他与某位荡妇的私生子。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] refuses to acknowledge our baby as his.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝承认我们的孩子是他的。

original: The baby, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is surely my husband's bastard, though darling [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] denies it.
translation: 那个婴儿[From.GetTitledFirstName]，肯定是我丈夫的私生子，虽然[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]否认

original: I am surely with child... my husband will be pleased.
translation: 我有孩子了……我丈夫会很高兴的。

original: Unmarried and pregnant... The fates have cursed me!
translation: 未婚怀孕……这是命运的诅咒！

original: Oh dear, I must be with child. Will my husband believe it is his?
translation: 天啊，我一定是怀孕了。我丈夫会认为是他的孩子吗？

original: Fate smiles upon me, my wife [From.GetFirstName] is pregnant!
translation: 命运向我微笑，我的妻子[From.GetFirstName]怀孕了！

original: My [GetFromRelation] is pregnant, but I was away, wasn't I?
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]怀孕了，但我应该不在家啊？

original: I am starting to think [From.GetTitledFirstName] might fancy me...
translation: 我开始认为[From.GetTitledFirstName]可能看上了我……

original: I awaken to the sound of my door creaking open... It's [Root.Liege.GetTitle] [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]!
translation: 我被门打开时的吱吱呀呀声惊醒了……是 [Root.Liege.GetFirstName][Root.Liege.GetTitle]！

original: Lady [From.GetFirstName] screamed and made a fuss in front of my own guards!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]尖叫起来，在我的卫兵面前大惊小怪！

original: My liege has a child in need of a guardian and mentor...
translation: 我的领主有一个孩子需要的监护人和导师……

original: Send a letter to my liege

My liege, I hope fate finds you well! A child needs a proper guardian, and nothing would please me more than to offer my services as a mentor and tutor, if it pleases thee.\nYour humble vassal\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我的领主，愿命运眷顾你！一个孩子需要一个适当的监护人，没有什么能成为他的导师更让我高兴的了，如果这也同样让您高兴的话。\n您卑微的仆人\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Send a letter to the vassal gracefully accepting the offer
translation: 写信感激你的封臣并同意他的请求

original: Send a letter to the vassal gracefully declining the offer
translation: 写信感激你的封臣但拒绝他的请求

original: My dear [This.GetTitle], your offer is most reasonable. We trust the child will be safe in your hands and will receive a proper upbringing. May our friendship last forever!\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 亲爱的[This.GetTitle]，你的提议是十分合理的。我们相信孩子会在你手中十分安全，并会受到合适的教养。祝我们的友谊万古长青！\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: My dear [This.GetTitle], your offer is deeply appreciated. However, we have someone else in mind as a guardian for our child. Peace be with you!\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 亲爱的[This.GetTitle]，十分感激你的提议.。但是，我们已经另有人选作为我们的孩子的监护人。愿你平安！\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I managed to flee from imprisonment but my escape from 'justice' caused me to become exiled and I cannot return to the country ever again.
translation: 我设法逃离了监禁，但从「正义」之中逃脱使我成为了被流放者，以后再也不能返回该国。

original: After months of fights, arguments and tears, my spouse suggested separate bedchambers.
translation: 经过几个月的殴斗，争吵和泪水，我的配偶建议分居。

original: My new wife disgusts me! I cannot stand it anymore, I should annul our marriage!
translation: 我的新妻子令我厌恶！我再也不能忍受了，我要离婚！

original: I don't ever want to see you again!
No, wait! I changed my mind...
My spouse ended our marriage on grounds of non-consummation! I will not put up with this, I am [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 我的配偶以婚姻不圆满为理由结束了我们的婚姻！我不能接受这个，我是[Root.GetTitledFirstName]！
我的[Root.Religion.GetName]神父听到了我的祷告！

original: I asked my [Root.Religion.GetName] father to annul my marriage but he had already been snared by the lies of my former wife! He told me to take her back or else he would place my lands under an interdict.
translation: 我要求[Root.Religion.GetName]神父撤销我的婚姻，但他已经被我前妻的谎言欺骗了！他告诉我要带她回去，否则他查禁我的土地。

original: It irks me that my own son will not inherit the title! My husband's heir must be removed, but how?
translation: 我的儿子不能继承头衔让我气愤！我丈夫的继承人必须死，但是该怎么做？

original: Your husband finds out about the poisoning
translation: 你的丈夫发现有人下毒

original: A courtier finds out about the poisoning
translation: 一个廷臣发现有人下毒

original: Your husband accuses you of the death of his heir
translation: 你的丈夫指责你应为他继承人的死亡负责

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] accuses you of the death of heir's death
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]指责你应为继承人的死亡负责

original: My son and heir [Root.Heir.GetTitledFirstName]'s sudden illness could be the signs of poisoning! I know my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] well enough to suspect her, her ambition has always been that her son would inherit my title!
translation: 我的儿子也是继承人[Root.Heir.GetTitledFirstName]突如其来的疾病可能是下毒的迹象！我知道我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]有重大嫌疑，她一直希望她的儿子继承我的头衔！

original: I will forgive her this little mishap
translation: 我会原谅她的这个小事故的

original: A courtier snuck up behind me and grabbed my arm. He hissed that he had seen me pour something into the heir's glass of milk only hours before he fell ill and wants some sort of bribe to keep quiet about the poisoning!
translation: 朝臣悄悄在我身后，抓住我的胳膊。他悄悄说道，他看到我向继承人的牛奶加了点东西，仅数小时以后，他就病倒了。他希望一些贿赂，作为中毒事件的封口费！

original: Whatever it is he wants, he'll get it!
I still have some poison left...
My son died today, poisoned by his own stepmother! I cannot ignore the fact that my beloved [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] was cold-blooded enough to murder my son in favor of her own son.
translation: 今天我的儿子死了，被自己的继母毒死了！我不能忽视的事实是，我亲爱的[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]是冷血到能够为了自己的儿子而去谋杀我的儿子。

original: Surely she didn't understand what she did?
translation: 她一定不明白她做了什么？

original: My husband's son is dead! The only cloud on my otherwise blue sky is the courtier who claims he saw me poisoning the heir repeatedly until he died.
translation: 我丈夫的儿子死了！唯一可惜的是有个朝臣声称他看到我不断地对继承人下毒，直到他死去。

original: [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] threw me into the dungeon, accusing me of poisoning [Root.GetHerHis] son!
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]将我投入地牢，指责我毒死了[Root.GetHerHis]儿子！

original: This is not how it should end!

My dear [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] blames my confused head for the poisoning, [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] seem to think I believed the poison was a miracle cure for his son's illness. I will let [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] believe that.
translation: 我亲爱的[Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife][Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]责怪我不想事，[Root.Spouse.GetSheHe]似乎认为我相信这毒药是为儿子治病的灵丹妙药。我会让[Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]相信的这点。

original: I knew I would get away with it
translation: 我知道我不会被怀疑的

original: After both my son and my courtier had fallen ill with the same symptoms and no one else had been affected, one of the serving girls told me in confidence that she had seen my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] pour a drop of something suspiciously poisonous into the flagon of mulled wine my son and courtier had shared. Did my spouse deliberately poison my son, and, perhaps accidentally, my courtier?
translation: 我的儿子和我的朝臣同时得了相同的症状的病，而其他人并未被感染。一个女仆自信地告诉我，她看到我的[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]倒了一些可疑东西倒到酒壶里，那个酒壶后来被我的儿子和朝臣共用。难道是我的配偶故意毒害我的儿子，然后偶然毒死了我的朝臣？

original: Then she will spend the rest of her life imprisoned!
translation: 她将在监狱中度过余生！

original: I will not show her any mercy!
translation: 我不会让她任意摆布的！

original: She clearly did not know what she was doing...
translation: 她显然不知道她在做什么……

original: Only one thing can explain my son [Root.Heir.GetFirstName]'s sickness: poison! I talked to several of my courtiers and servants who confirmed my suspicion: they all recalled my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] giving [Root.Heir.GetFirstName] something to eat or drink just before [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] fell ill.
translation: 我的儿子[Root.Heir.GetFirstName]的病只有一种解释：中毒！我和我的几个廷臣的交谈证实了我的怀疑：他们都记得我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]在[Root.Heir.GetFirstName]病倒之前给了[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]吃的东西。

original: May she rot in the Dungeon!
May she one day realize what she has done
translation: 希望她有一天意识到她做了什么

original: I have no mercy for poisoners!
[Root.Spouse.GetSheHeCap] would never do such a thing!

I feel that [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is too affectionate towards a [Root.Spouse.GetManWoman] in the court and is starting to neglect me in favor of that [Root.Spouse.GetManWoman]! The love [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] showers [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] favorite with is beyond measure, I do hope they don't have a illicit and sinful union!
translation: 我觉得[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]对宫廷里的某个[Root.Spouse.GetManWoman]十分着迷，并开始为了那个[Root.Spouse.GetManWoman]开始忽略我！[Root.Spouse.GetSheHe]向[Root.Spouse.GetHerHis]挚爱抛洒的爱是是无法衡量的，我希望他们不要有非法和罪恶的勾当！

original: Mayhap I read too much into this, surely [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] loves me!
translation: 也许我想太多了，[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]肯定爱着我！

original: I need to talk to someone, see if someone else has noticed this!
translation: 我需要和别人谈谈，似乎有人已经注意到这一点了！

original: The whispers in court about me having favorites and 'showering them in a love that is beyond measure' and that I am having a 'illicit and sinful union' with a [Root.GetManWoman] at the court has grown in strength, with my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] as one of the gossipers! I need to stop these rumors before they reach the ears of my religious leader.
translation: 关于我和[Root.GetManWoman]偷情的闲言碎语越来越多，又有人说我和其他人之间有「非法和罪恶的勾当」，我的[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]也相信了这些话。我必须在它们进入我的宗教领袖的耳朵之前阻止这些谣言。

original: It had not escaped [From.GetFirstName] that I have favorites among the people of the court, but the things [From.GetSheHe] accused me of took my breath away. Me, having a 'illicit and sinful union' with a [Root.GetManWoman]? [From.GetFirstName] demands that I shower [From.GetHerHim] with the same love and attention I allegedly show my favorites.
translation: 我和廷臣的爱情没有逃过[From.GetFirstName]的眼睛，但[From.GetSheHe]的指责让我喘不过气来，我和[Root.GetManWoman]有「非法和罪恶的勾当」？[From.GetFirstName]的要求我向他[From.GetHerHim]表示同样的爱和关注，就像我向我的最爱一样。

original: I will show you that no one matters as much to me as you do!
translation: 我爱你胜过其他所有人！

original: Who I decide to shower with attention is none of your business!
translation: 我向谁示爱不关你的事！

original: When I had finished talking, [From.GetFirstName] looked at me for a long time. I grew more nervous with each passing minute, wishing I hadn't used the words 'illicit and sinful union' about [From.GetHerHis] relation with that [From.GetManWoman].
translation: 当我说完后，[From.GetFirstName]看着我很长一段时间。每过一分钟，我变得更加紧张，我真希望我刚才没用「非法和罪恶勾当」这样的字眼来描述那个[From.GetManWoman]与[From.GetHerHis]关系。

original: [From.GetFirstName] promised to pay me more attention!
[From.GetFirstName] refused to even consider paying me more attention!

The humiliation still burns through my body! I never meant for the gossip to reach [From.GetFirstName]'s ears, I only needed to talk to someone about my loneliness and my fear of [From.GetFirstName] having a love affair with a [From.GetManWoman], but the harsh words and the loathing in [From.GetHerHis] eyes made me wish I never uttered a word about my suspicions.
translation: 屈辱煎熬着我的身体！我从来不希望八卦传到[From.GetFirstName]的耳朵里，我没有别的意思，只想找个人谈谈我的寂寞和对[From.GetFirstName]与[From.GetManWoman]恋情的恐惧，但苛刻的话和[From.GetHerHis]眼神中的厌恶让我希望我从来没有说出我的怀疑。

original: I don't know if [From.GetHerHim] will ever forgive me...
translation: 我不知道[From.GetHerHim]是否会原谅我……

original: The thoughts of how I'll never be reunited with my family keeps tormenting me, how someone of my stature could possibly be locked up in a horrid place such as this is beyond me. In the depths of my despair the news reach me, my [outside_spouse.GetFirstName] is trying to have me released!
translation: 我一直为再也不能与家人团聚而感到忧心忡忡，我也想不通，像我这么有声望的人怎么能被关在这么可怕的地方。正当我处于极度绝望的时候，好消息传来，[outside_spouse.GetFirstName]正在全力营救我出去！

original: I do anything I can to make [outside_spouse.GetHerHis] work easier
translation: 我竭尽全力使得[outside_spouse.GetHerHis]工作容易些。

original: I try to get in contact with [outside_spouse.GetHerHim], ordering [outside_spouse.GetHerHim] to speed things up
translation: 我试图与[outside_spouse.GetHerHim]联系，命令[outside_spouse.GetHerHim]加快进行。

original: Who cares? It's not like [outside_spouse.GetSheHe]'ll succeed
translation: 管他呢？看上去[outside_spouse.GetSheHe]不会成功

original: Fine! But I want the gold to be delivered immediately!
translation: 好吧！不过，我要马上拿到钱！

original: Your insolence bores me. Into the dungeon with you!
translation: 你的傲慢让我厌烦。滚进地牢去吧！

original: After my encouraging letter to [prisoner_spouse.GetTitledFirstName] [prisoner_spouse.GetSheHe] managed to send me a letter in return begging me to try and release [prisoner_spouse.GetHerHim] as soon as possible.
translation: 在我的鼓励信寄给[prisoner_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]后，[prisoner_spouse.GetSheHe]设法回信给我，恳请我尝试尽快解救[prisoner_spouse.GetHerHim]。

original: I will send a firm but respectful letter to [prisoner_spouse.GetHerHis] captor
translation: 我将发出一封严正而且恭敬的信给[prisoner_spouse.GetHerHis]看押者。

original: I'm in the study doing research when the news reach me. [prisoner_spouse.GetSheHeCap]'s dead. [prisoner_spouse.GetTitledFirstName] died in prison before I was able to have [prisoner_spouse.GetHerHim] released.
translation: 当我正埋头苦干搞研究时消息传了过来。[prisoner_spouse.GetSheHeCap]去世了。我还没来得及将[prisoner_spouse.GetHerHim]救出来，[prisoner_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]就死在监狱里。

original: I'll never be able to stop blaming myself
Stupid [prisoner_spouse.GetManWoman]! Here I am trying to save [prisoner_spouse.GetHerHim], how dare [prisoner_spouse.GetSheHe] die on me?
translation: 愚蠢的[prisoner_spouse.GetManWoman]！我正在全力救[prisoner_spouse.GetHerHim]出去，[prisoner_spouse.GetSheHe]怎么敢就这样死了？

original: I blame [prisoner_spouse.GetHerHis] family for this! They did nothing!
translation: 我为这事谴责[prisoner_spouse.GetHerHis]家族！他们什么也没做！

original: I was released from the dungeons of [prisoner_host.GetTitledFirstName]!
I'm so happy I could cry!
I was yet again thrown into the dungeons...

Dear [outside_spouse.GetTitledFirstName], I strongly suggest you give up on the idea you might be able to rescue [prisoner_spouse.GetTitledFirstName] from [prisoner_spouse.GetHerHis] imprisonment and I will not be easily persuaded to release [prisoner_spouse.GetHerHim]. You may never see [prisoner_spouse.GetHerHim] if you do not stop your ridiculous attempts of freeing [prisoner_spouse.GetTitledFirstName].\n\n[prisoner_host.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 亲爱的[outside_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]，我强烈建议你放弃你可能把[prisoner_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]从[prisoner_spouse.GetHerHis]牢狱中救出来的想法，而且我也不是那么容易被说服而释放[prisoner_spouse.GetHerHim]。如果你不停止你那可笑的解救[prisoner_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]的尝试，你可能永远也无法见到[prisoner_spouse.GetHerHim]。\n\n[prisoner_host.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Despite my letter warning [outside_spouse.GetTitledFirstName] to give up [outside_spouse.GetHerHis] attempts to rescue [outside_spouse.GetHerHis] spouse, a letter arrived this morning telling me to release the [prisoner_spouse.GetManWoman] or else...
translation: 尽管我去信警告[outside_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]放弃[outside_spouse.GetHerHis]尝试解救[outside_spouse.GetHerHis]配偶，一封信于今天早晨抵达告诉我释放[prisoner_spouse.GetManWoman]，否则……

original: I have tired of this. Here, have your [prisoner_spouse.GetManWoman] back
translation: 我已经厌倦此事了。来，把你的[prisoner_spouse.GetManWoman]带回去吧。

original: Guards! Make sure the prisoner won't escape
translation: 卫兵！确保囚犯不会逃走

original: My husband [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] has hired an incredibly annoying man to serve us. His rudeness knows no limits, and I have no idea how to handle him. He does not know his place.
translation: 我丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]聘请了一个令人难以置信的烦人的家伙来为我们服务。他的粗鲁永无止境，我不知道如何与他相处。他的举止很不得体。

original: I'll do my best to ignore him and trust my husbands decision
translation: 我会尽可能不理他，我相信我丈夫的决定

original: If possible I'll have him fired
translation: 如果可能的话，我会让他被解雇

original: I ask my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] to fire the annoying man
translation: 我要求我的[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]炒了这个烦人的家伙

original: I have the man punished for his insolence
translation: 我让这个人因为他的傲慢而受罚

original: [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] becomes aware of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s distaste for the courtier

My wife [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] has asked me to get rid of one of my courtiers whom she finds mighty annoying. On one hand, [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] might not be happy if I refuse her request, but if I fire 'the annoying man' maybe people will feel my wife has too much influence over my actions.
translation: 我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]要求我开除我的一个廷臣，她觉得这家伙无比烦人。一方面，如果我拒绝了她的请求，[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]可能会不高兴，但如果我炒了这个「恼人」的家伙，人们也许会觉得我的妻子对我的行为影响太大了。

original: My [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s happiness is more important to me
translation: 我的[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]的幸福对我更重要

original: She should stay out of this!

Apparently, one of the courtiers has been annoying my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], and instead of asking me for help she took the matter in her own hands and made sure the courtier would never annoy her again or he'd know the consequences.
translation: 显然，一个廷臣已经惹恼了我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]，她决定自己动手处理此事，确保廷臣永远不会惹恼她，否则他将知道后果。

original: What on earth was she thinking?!
While walking alongside the river together with several people from the court, one of the courtiers keeps annoying me, so I decide to...
translation: 我与几个人宫廷里的人一道沿河漫步，其中一个朝臣一直让我很恼火，所以我决定……

original: The young man I pushed into the river ended up drowning. Although it was an accident rumors of my deed spread quickly.
translation: 我推入河中的年轻人最终淹死了。虽然这是个意外，我是故意的谣言迅速蔓延。

original: I'll send gifts to his family
translation: 我会送礼物给他的家人

original: I shall tell the public what happened
translation: 我要告诉公众发生了什么事

original: I never meant for this to happen!
Anyone speaking of the event will be punished
translation: 任何谈论这个事件的人将被处罚

original: Wet, but otherwise unharmed, the courtier blasted me with foul words and angry but empty threats. Seeing him standing before me dripping mud and with algae entwined into his hair, I couldn't stop the laughter pouring out of me.
translation: 他全身湿透，但是没有受伤。那个人用脏话和愤怒责骂我，但对我来说是空洞的威胁。看到他站在我面前满身泥沙，头发缠绕着藻类，我忍不住笑出了声。

original: My wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has complained about me being absent so often, and so when I found that I had some extra gold to spend, I decided to buy her something nice. Maybe some sort of jewellery?
translation: 我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]一直抱怨我缺席如此频繁，所以当我发现我有一些额外的黄金，我决定给她买些不错的东西。也许是某些珠宝首饰？

original: This bracelet would really bring out the... color in her eyes
translation: 这手镯真配……她眼睛的颜色
来一个我私人珍藏的石雕像怎么样？

original: Ruby earrings is exactly what she wants!
translation: 红宝石耳环正是她想要的东西！

original: I think I'll just keep the gold...
translation: 我觉得我还是省点钱吧……

original: The skewbald one looks a bit old, but sweet!
translation: 花斑的看起来有点老，但不错！

original: The white mare is a bit frisky, but she'll be fine.
translation: 白色母马有些活蹦乱跳，但她不错。

original: The black one is magnificent, the only suitable match for my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife]...!
translation: 黑色太棒了，是适合我[Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife]的唯一指定马！

original: I'm sorry, honey, but all these will be breeders.
translation: 对不起亲爱的，但这些都是种马。

original: A falcon would serve you well!
translation: 一只猎鹰将竭诚为您服务！

original: Too dangerous, my love. I don't want you to overexert yourself.
translation: 太危险了亲爱的。我不希望你伤到自己。

original: The stubborn baron of [Root.Location.GetName] is really getting on my nerves! My wife, [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], sensed my irritation and offered to give me advice on the matter. Her diplomatic skill has saved me many times before...
translation: 顽固的[Root.Location.GetName]男爵真是让我心烦！我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]，感觉到我的不满，并给了我一些意见。她的外交技巧以前帮了我很多次……

original: ... I hope she can save me now!
I can work this out myself, thank you very much!
translation: 我能自己解决，非常感谢你！

original: Two competent contenders are fighting for a position in [Root.Location.GetName] training the levies there. My gut tells me to choose the younger man who has risen through the ranks fast, whilst my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is urging me to choose the older man who has never risen above the rank of sergeant.
translation: 两个主管竞争者正争取在[Root.Location.GetName]训练军队的职位。我的直觉告诉我，选择那个提升迅速的年轻人，而我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]催促我选择一个从来没有当过治安官的老人。

original: I trust my wife more than my gut
translation: 我相信我的妻子胜过我的直觉

original: This is no business for a woman!

Gold pours from my hands but never finds its way back! The numbers and sums make no sense, twirling numbers mocking me appear every time I close my eyes. My wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has offered to help me, but I have refused every time she brings it up.
translation: 黄金已经盆满钵满了，但是我不知道到底有多少！数量和金额让我头大不已，每次我闭上双眼，账目上的数字都在嘲笑我。我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]已表示愿意帮助我，但我每次都拒绝了。

original: I give up! Honey, please help me!

I have my eyes set on a title, but my Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetFullName] has advised me to forget about the title, saying I would invoke too much wrath if I try to claim it. My wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], however, is doing everything but telling me outright that I should pursue the title.
translation: 我的眼睛盯着一个头衔，但我的间谍总管[Root.job_spymaster.GetFullName]建议我忘了这个头衔，说如果我尝获得称它，我会招来太多非议。然而，我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]告诉我，我应该将它追求到底。

original: I would invoke people's wrath if I follow my wife's advice!
translation: 如果我同意妻子的意见，我将招致人民的愤怒！

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] suggests I should offer to rebuild the church
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]建议我应该提议重建修道院

original: [Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName] suggests I try to scare them into submission

[Root.Spouse.job_chancellor.GetFullName] is doing a somewhat good job as a [Root.GetMyChancellorName] but there is a contender for the title, one of my special male friends. I am slowly but stubbornly trying to make [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] realize the potential of my friend, and now I am prepared to use the final and best argument to make him do as I want.
translation: [Root.Spouse.job_chancellor.GetFullName]作为[Root.GetMyChancellorName]干的不错，但有一个头衔的竞争者，他是我特别的男性朋友之一。我缓慢而坚定地试图使[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]意识到我的朋友的潜力，现在我准备用最后和最好的办法让他按我想的做。

original: Do as I want or else...

My sweet [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is terrifying when she wants something, there is nothing she wouldn't do to make me bend to her will. Now she wants me to make one of her friends [Root.GetMyChancellorName], but [Root.GetMyChancellorName] [Root.job_chancellor.GetFullName] is a very competent man...
translation: 我亲爱的[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]是可怕的，当她想要什么东西时，没有什么能让她屈服。现在，她要我把他的一个朋友任命为[Root.GetMyChancellorName]，但现任的[Root.GetMyChancellorName][Root.job_chancellor.GetFullName]是一个非常能干的人……

original: I will let her have her way just this once
Her 'friend' is not good enough to become [Root.GetMyChancellorName]
translation: 她的「朋友」还不够格成为[Root.GetMyChancellorName]

original: When I presented my ultimatum to my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], trying to make him choose my friend to be the new [Root.GetMyChancellorName], he reacted as I had anticipated. [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] tried to argue with me, plead with me and even tried to scare me into submission, but I saw in his eyes that he had already made his decision.
translation: 我给我丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]下最后通牒，要求他任命我的朋友为新的[Root.GetMyChancellorName]，正如我所料，[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]试图通过与我吵架、恳求甚至威胁来使我做出让步，不过我通过他的眼神看出，他已经做出了决定。

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] refused to make my friend Chancellor!
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]拒绝任命我的朋友为外交总管！

original: I have a very special male friend who would be an excellent Marshal! Too bad my husband thinks highly of Marshal [Root.Spouse.job_marshal.GetFullName], making it hard for me to convince him of my friend's superiority.
translation: 我有一个很适合成为军事总管的男性朋友！不幸的是我丈夫很看中现任军事总管[Root.Spouse.job_marshal.GetFullName]，这使得我很难说服他发现我朋友的优点。

original: I will keep arguing until [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] agrees with me!
translation: 我会一直与他争论，直到[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]同意我的想法为止！

original: No matter how many times I try to point out the virtues of Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetFullName], my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] won't listen. She cannot take no for an answer, not when she has decided that her friend should be Marshal.
translation: 不论多少次我指出军事总管[Root.job_marshal.GetFullName]的优点，我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]都不听。她从不接受拒绝作为答案，但在关于任命她的朋友为军事总管这件事上应该改一改这个规矩了。

original: Enough! Fine, your 'special' friend will be Marshal!
translation: 行了！好吧！你那个「特别」的朋友可以当军事总管！

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is more than happy with your decision
No matter what you say I will not make your friend Marshal!
translation: 不管你怎么说，我都不会任命你的朋友为军事总管！

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is not happy, not happy at all

My husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and I argued about who should be Marshal, my special friend or the current one. As I made my arguments, threatened to shun [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] from my bed and stressed my friend superiority over [Root.Spouse.job_marshal.GetFullName], my husband finally took a decision.
translation: 我丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]和我争论我的朋友和现任军事总管谁更适合军事总管这一职位。为了与他争论，我以不和[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]行房来威胁他，同时再次强调我的朋友比[Root.Spouse.job_marshal.GetFullName]强得多，我丈夫终于做出了决定。
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]同意任命我的朋友为军事总管！

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] told me he would never make my friend Marshal!
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]告诉我他永远不会任命我的朋友为军事总管！

original: I have tried to make my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] discharge his Steward [Root.Spouse.job_treasurer.GetFullName] in favour of my close friend whom I cannot deny anything. The stubbornness of my husband is convincing me I need to do something drastic in order for him to listen to me.
translation: 我让我丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]解雇他的财政总管[Root.Spouse.job_treasurer.GetFullName]来帮助我的莫逆之交。但是他顽固地拒绝我的建议，这使得我考虑要做些更激烈的反应来逼他接受我的要求。
要么现在就答应我，要么就永远别提了！

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is forced to make a decision

[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is adamant, she tries to make me appoint one of her male friends, who might mean more to her than I earlier suspected, Steward. No matter how well our current Steward [Root.job_treasurer.GetFullName] does his job I need to decide whether I should make [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] happy by or if the current Steward will get to keep his job.
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]太固执了，他试图让我任命她的一个也许对于她来说比我更重要的男性朋友作为财政总管，不论我的现任财政总管[Root.job_treasurer.GetFullName]做得有多好。我必须在[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]的快乐和我现在的财政总管之间做出一个选择了。
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]为你做出的决定而感到十分高兴

original: I will keep [Root.job_treasurer.GetFullName] as my Steward!
translation: 我要让[Root.job_treasurer.GetFullName]继续担任我的财政总管！

original: I am getting tired of fighting for my friend, though I still feel he would make a better Steward than [Root.job_treasurer.GetFullName]. One last effort and whatever my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] decides, I have to accept that.
translation: 我已经为了我的朋友做的够多的了，即使我依然觉得他比[Root.job_treasurer.GetFullName]更适合担任财政总管。不论我丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]做出怎样的决定，我都必须接受。

original: My friend has been appointed Steward!
translation: 我的朋友被任命为财政总管了！

original: My husband decided to keep the current Steward...
translation: 我丈夫决定留任现任的财政总管……

original: I couldn't care less if our current Spymaster [Root.Spouse.job_spymaster.GetFullName] is competent as a Spymaster or not, my very good friend would truly overtrumph [Root.Spouse.job_spymaster.GetHerHim] as Spymaster! I only have to convince my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] to discharge [Root.Spouse.job_spymaster.GetFullName] and then appoint my friend.
translation: 我不管现任间谍总管[Root.Spouse.job_spymaster.GetFullName]是否胜任他的职位，我的好友绝对比[Root.Spouse.job_spymaster.GetHerHim]更胜任间谍总管这个职位！我必须劝说我丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]解雇[Root.Spouse.job_spymaster.GetFullName]并让我的朋友接任。

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is pestered into making a decision
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]在为做出一个决定而感到苦恼。

original: I cannot get any rest from [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] pestering me about making her good friend Spymaster. She does not care that our Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetFullName] is competent, skilled and a great Spymaster.
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]一直缠着我任命她的朋友当间谍总管。她根本不管[Root.job_spymaster.GetFullName]其实是个称职能干的优秀间谍总管。

original: Stop pestering me and I'll make your friend Spymaster
translation: 够了够了！我让你的朋友当间谍总管还不行么

original: Nothing you say or do will make me change my mind!
Your decision to keep your spymaster displeases [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]
translation: 你让现任间谍总管留任使得[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]很不高兴

original: My husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] asked me to give him a couple of days to think about this, he promised me a decision if only I stopped pestering him. I could hardly restrain myself and waited impatiently until my husband declared that he had made a decision.
translation: 我丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]让我给他一点时间来考虑这件事，他保证给我一个答复，只要我不烦他。经过一番煎熬似的的等待，他终于给了我答复。

original: He will make my friend Spymaster!
translation: 他将任命我的朋友为间谍总管！

original: He decided to keep the old Spymaster
translation: 他决定留任现任的间谍总管

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] must listen to me, if only this once!
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]必须听我的，即使仅仅就这一次！

original: The future of [Root.GetFirstName]'s friend lies on [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] accepts your decision but does not approve of it

My husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and I long for children, but despite our best efforts and the time we spend together in the bedchamber I have failed to conceive. The suspicion of being barren makes me seek consolation in another man's arms.
translation: 我丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]和我一直想要孩子，但不论我们多么努力播种，我却依然无法怀孕。我怀疑我丈夫不育，这让我开始投向别的男人的怀抱。

original: The consolation came with a price - I'm pregnant!
translation: 偷欢是有代价的，我怀孕了！

original: The pregnancy is starting to show and my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s happiness shows no bounds. I should be happy as well, but in my heart I know my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] isn't the father of my child.
translation: 我的肚子渐渐大了起来而我丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]也为此感到很高兴。我虽然觉得很幸福但我知道那孩子不是我丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]的种。

original: My husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] will never know the truth!
translation: 我丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]将永远不会知道真相！
我会拒绝承认所有的事情！

original: I should tell my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] the truth
translation: 我应该把真相告诉我丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]

original: If my husband suspects anything, I will blame the courtier!
translation: 如果我丈夫怀疑我，我将会把责任推给一个廷臣！

original: My happiness when my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] told me I was about to be a father made me almost blind to her feelings, she smiled and seemed happy but something was amiss...
translation: 当我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]告诉我我就要当爸爸的时候，欢乐几乎冲昏了我的头脑。她看起来很高兴，但是似乎有点什么东西不对劲……

original: The bigger her belly gets, the thinner and more heavy-hearted my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] seems. Her appearance made me worry and I finally asked her what was wrong. It was as if [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] had just waited to tell me about her indiscretion with the courtier and her belief that it is the courtier who is the father of the child she carries.
translation: 我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]的肚子越来越大，但她看起来心事重重，而且日渐消瘦。这让我很担心她的身体。我问她是什么使她如此这般。[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]终于向我坦白了她和一名廷臣之间的奸情，同时告诉我她觉得这孩子是那个人的。

original: This child is ours, no matter who fathered it
translation: 不管这孩子的父亲到底是谁，他都是我们的孩子！

original: The child is ours, but the courtier must be punished
translation: 孩子是我们的，但是那个廷臣必须受到惩罚

original: [Root.GetFirstName] decides what to do with the courtier
translation: [Root.GetFirstName]决定了该如何对付那个廷臣

original: How could you do this to me?
[Root.GetFirstName] decides what to do with the courtier and [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetFirstName]决定了该如何惩处那个廷臣和[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]

original: The look on my pregnant wife's face whenever she sees one of the male courtiers has made me suspicious. It is a weird mixture of guilt, gratefulness and a warning of some sorts. I confronted my wife and, after awhile, she confessed to having had an affair with the courtier but blamed him for seducing her and impregnating her.
translation: 我那怀孕妻子看向每个男性廷臣时脸上的表情都让我怀疑。这个诡异的表情混合了罪恶、感激和某种警告。我与妻子对质，不一会儿，她承认曾与廷臣外遇而且指责他勾引她，让她怀孕。

original: I need to set an example with the courtier who impregnated my wife. I could throw him into prison, execute him or banish him, making sure no one will ever dare touch my wife again!
translation: 我要好好教训那个家伙，我要把他扔进监牢，砍掉他的脑袋或是将他轰出去，从而保证不会有人再打我媳妇的主意！

original: The taste of vengeance is foul, I will do nothing
translation: 复仇的恶臭使人厌恶，我不会做任何事情。

original: The child my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] carry is not mine. The pain of her betrayal is still fresh in my mind, I will punish her in the same way I will punish the courtier who impregnated her and made her an adulteress.
translation: 我妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]怀着的孩子不是我的。被背叛的痛苦不断地在脑海里折磨着我，我要像惩罚那个奸夫一样惩罚这个淫妇！

original: Imprison the adulterer and the adulteress!
Execute the adulterer and the adulteress!
Banish the adulterer and the adulteress!
translation: 把奸夫淫妇都给我驱逐！

original: I have changed my mind, I will only punish the courtier
translation: 我改主意了，我只惩罚那个廷臣。

original: My lovely young wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has expressed her boredom several times, in several ingenious ways. The court is boring, hunting is boring, embroidery is boring, her ladies-in-waiting are boring and she wants me to 'make the boredom go away'.
translation: 我可爱而又年轻的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]好几次用委婉的方式向我抱怨生活的无聊。宫廷里很无聊，打猎也很无聊，绣花也很无聊，她的女官们也很无聊。她让我帮她「把这些无聊的东西都统统赶走」。

original: Honey, I have obligations I must take care of
translation: 亲爱的，我还有我的责任。

original: My boring old husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] told me his obligations is more important than my well-being! He might be right though, I should probably try to find a friend among the courtiers.
translation: 我那年老的丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]告诉我他的责任比我的欢乐还重要！他也许是对的，也许我应该和其他廷臣们交朋友。

original: [From.GetBestName] and I agreed to do something together the next morning, so I am currently planning what we should do.
translation: [From.GetBestName]和我决定明天早晨起来做些事情，让我来想想我们应该做点什么。

original: A trip to the lake is always nice
A quiet dinner together would be perfect!
translation: 享用一顿安静的晚餐那将是完美的！

original: I will never be bored again with [From.GetFirstName] by my side!
translation: 当[From.GetFirstName]在我身边的时候，我再也不会感到无聊了！

original: Despite the threatening clouds in the sky we started walking to the lake.
translation: 即使天空乌云密布，我们依然在湖边散步。

original: But the skies opened up and drenched us!
translation: 但是很快下起了倾盆大雨，把我们都弄湿了！

original: A failed trip to the lake
The clouds departed and the sun shone down on us
A perfect trip to the lake
translation: 这次湖边散步太完美了

original: I did not like the company
The cook had packed a perfect picnic, with some roast lamb, bread, cheese and wine.
translation: 我们的厨子为野餐准备了完美的菜肴，有烤羊腿、面包、乳酪和酒。
不速之客把野餐给毁了！

original: The food was nice but the company better!
translation: 吃得好，更重要的是朋友好！

original: The dogs were excited, the horses willing and the day had barely begun. My friend and I set out to hunt some serious game.
translation: 狗儿跑的欢，马儿跑的疾，一天就要开始了。我和我的伙伴们要去打猎了。

original: There were plenty of game in the forest, and now a lot less
translation: 原来森林里有很多猎物，但现在少多了。

original: The hunter became the hunted, and did not enjoy it
translation: 猎人反而成了猎物，他们都觉得很不高兴。

original: We became the game, a family of bears hunted us!
translation: 我们被一窝熊给围猎了！

original: I was just making the last arrangements to the dinner table when my guest arrived. We would not go starving from this table!
translation: 当我的客人来的时候，我刚刚把桌子布置好。我们将在这里大饱口福！

original: Dinner was pleasant and with great company!
The food, the drink, the company... all was perfect tonight
translation: 朋友和美食让今晚的晚宴十分完美

original: Dinner was quiet, we had nothing to say to each other
translation: 晚餐很安静，都没什么可聊的。

original: The conversation at dinner lacked substance
[From.GetBestName] has avoided me for some time now, probably because we do not have anything in common.
translation: [From.GetBestName]拒绝了我好几次，也许是因为我们缺乏共同点吧。

original: I think I'll find someone else to befriend
translation: 我觉得我应该找别人交朋友

original: We fit together, [From.GetBestName] and me. No matter what we do together, we always have a good time and we can talk for hours without getting bored with each other.
translation: [From.GetBestName]和我很投缘。不论我们做什么我们都能享受到美好的时光而且聊得很尽兴。

original: I think I have found a new friend
translation: 我觉得我交到了一个新朋友

original: The attraction between me and my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has slowly started to fade. I realized this had been happening for some time when we week after week used the bedchamber to sleep in instead of having all the fun we used to have there.
translation: 我丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]和我之间的感情日渐褪色。我意识到这几周我们的床只是用来睡觉的地方而不是我们曾经享乐的地方了。

original: I want to take [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] on a 'wild ride'
translation: 我想让[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]和我一起「打野战」

original: The wild ride takes [This.GetFirstName] with surprise
Make sure [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] knows who is the boss in the bedchamber
translation: 要让[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]认识到到底谁才是床上的主角

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is sure to beg for mercy when [Root.GetFirstName] is done with him
I will be gentle to him
Gentle lovemaking will make [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] relive your honeymoon
translation: 轻柔的做爱会使得[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]让你感到重回了蜜月一样

original: We will make sweet, sweet love...

The passion between [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and myself was still there, only slumbering beneath our skins, and easily reawakened by a lover's touch. It was hot, fierce, wonderful lovemaking such as we used to have.
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]和我之间的激情依然存在，只是在我们的肌肤下沉睡，而且容易被爱人的触摸唤醒。这热情的、激烈的、美妙的性爱就如我们曾经那样。

original: The [Root.GetTitle]'s heart could not take the excitement
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] showed who is the boss in the bedchamber!
Sweetly, gently we molded our bodies together and re-created the familiar feel of us embracing, touching, loving...
translation: 我们的身体甜蜜而又温柔地交合在一起并让我们重温了那曾经的紧张、轻触以及爱……

original: Love, how I have missed thee!
Gently, we woke the passion between us once again
translation: 我们用一种柔和的方式重燃了我们之间的激情

original: Sweet love unfroze this old heart
translation: 甜美的爱唤醒了这老去的心

original: This is a night I will remember, forever
The wild ride which showed [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] who was the boss in the bedchamber killed him. He died with a smile on his lips, so maybe this was the perfect way of leaving this world.
translation: 那场告诉[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]谁才是床上老大的野战害死了他。他嘴上带着笑意离开了这个人世，这也许是他告别人间的最佳方式吧。

original: I hope [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is in Heaven now...
translation: 我希望[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]现在已经在天堂了……

original: I wanted to show [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] the passion between us had never died out, but even the sweetest, gentlest lovemaking was too passionate for his heart.
translation: 我只是想向[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]展现我们的激情还没有死去，但即使是最甜蜜的温柔的做爱对于他的心脏来说也是过于激烈了。

original: May he be happy in Heaven
I suspect that my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is unable to sire children. If my husband is infertile, then maybe I need to find someone who is!
translation: 我怀疑我丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]不能生育。如果我丈夫不能生育的话，也许我应该找那个能让我怀孕的人！

original: I do have someone in mind...
I will not have an affair!
A Loving Marriage ends with my death.
translation: 一个充满爱的婚姻以我的死为结束.

original: Wenching might make me forget her!
translation: 出去嫖也许会让我忘记她！

original: Who will my father trust in now?
translation: 我父亲现在还会相信谁？

original: [Root.Father.GetTitledFirstName] will have to deal with it.
Maybe my wife can give me another son?
translation: 也许我的妻子能再给我生一个合适的？

original: I have other sons, maybe one of them can be worthy
translation: 我还有其他儿子，也许他们其中的一个还是有价值的

original: My wife is pregnant, but she better give birth to a decent son this time. Else she may 'accidentally' fall down from a tower.
translation: 我的妻子怀孕了，但她最好在这时候生下一个合法儿子。否则她可能「意外地」从塔上摔下来。

original: I know it was nothing wrong with ME
translation: 我知道我什么都没做错

original: I hope the circumstances of my untimely death makes someone suspicious. I did NOT die a natural death...
translation: 我希望我的非正常死亡能引起谁的主意。我不是自然死亡的……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not die a natural death, of that I am certain! I suspect one of the courtiers to be behind [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s unfortunate demise.
translation: 我敢肯定[From.GetTitledFirstName]并不是自然死亡的！我怀疑是哪个廷臣造成了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的不幸去世。

original: There's no doubt in my mind, the murderer will be imprisoned!
translation: 我的心中毫无怀疑，杀人犯必须被关起来！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is certain someone murdered one of [From.GetHerHis] dear friends, and wants me to imprison the courtier who [From.GetSheHe] thinks is the murderer.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]敢肯定有人杀了[From.GetHerHis]一个朋友，并且希望我将那个被[From.GetSheHe]怀疑为凶手的廷臣投入监狱。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName], your friend's murderer will be imprisoned!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]，杀害你朋友的凶手将被投入监狱！

original: I submit to your wise counsel and will convert to the [This.Religion.GetName] faith forthwith.
translation: 我已经接受了你明智的忠告并将会立即转为[This.Religion.GetName]信仰。

original: I refuse to convert to your false religion, the [From.Religion.GetName] faith is the true faith.
translation: 我拒绝转信你那错误的信仰。[From.Religion.GetName]才是正信！

original: I humbly accept your decision to revoke the [Root.GetFullName], though it grieves me deeply.
translation: 我恭敬地接受您剥夺[Root.GetFullName]的决定，虽然这让我感到无比的痛心。

original: I will not allow you to steal my titles without a fight! You are no longer my liege lord.
translation: 我不会容忍你来偷走我的头衔，除非是用你的宝剑！从现在起你再也不是我的领主了！

original: I accept your offer of peace.
I reject your offer of peace.
Please accept this humble gift of §Y[GetDiploGiftSize]§W¤.
translation: 请接受这份代表我谦卑的礼物，价值 §Y[GetDiploGiftSize]§W¤。

original: I accept to swear fealty to you and to serve as your vassal lord.
translation: 我宣誓效忠于您并以一名封臣的身份服侍您。

original: I reject your offer of vassalization. I do not need your 'protection'.
translation: 我拒绝接受你的附庸要求，我并不需要你的「保护」。

original: I have decided to accept your suggestion of a betrothal between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 我接受你关于[Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[New.GetTitledFirstName]之间的婚约建议。

original: I reject your insulting suggestion. [New.GetTitledFirstName] will never marry [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 我拒绝你无理的要求。[New.GetTitledFirstName]不会和[Root.GetTitledFirstName]结婚。

original: I have decided to accept your suggestion that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName] get married. All children of the union will be of her Dynasty.
translation: 我决定接受你关于让[Root.GetTitledFirstName]同[New.GetTitledFirstName]结婚的建议。他们所生的所有孩子都将冠母姓。

original: Regrettably, I feel it would not be in my best interests for [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to marry [New.GetTitledFirstName] under those terms.
translation: 很遗憾，在这种条件下我无意答应让[Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[New.GetTitledFirstName]联姻。

original: I accept your suggestion that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName] get married.
translation: 我接受你的建议，允许[Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[New.GetTitledFirstName]结婚。

original: Regrettably, I feel it would not be in my best interests for [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to marry [New.GetTitledFirstName].
I accept paying your ransom for the safe return of [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 为了 [Root.GetTitledFirstName]的安全，我同意向你支付赎金。

original: I refuse to pay your extortionate ransom demand for [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 我拒绝支付[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的赎金，你那简直是敲诈！

original: Your demand is just. My scheming was obviously misdirected. I hope you will find it in you to forgive me.
translation: 你的要求很正当。我的阴谋很明显是错误的。我希望你能原谅我。

original: I will eventually [From.GetPlot]! You cannot stop me.
I accept your demand. I will no longer back [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s dubious plot to [Root.GetPlot].
translation: 我接受你的请求。我将不再支持[Root.GetTitledFirstName]那令人生疑的[Root.GetPlot]的计划。

original: I will not withdraw my support for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s plan to [Root.GetPlot].
An intriguing scheme! I believe I will indeed back your plot to [This.GetPlot].
translation: 一项密谋！我会实质支持你[This.GetPlot]的计划。

original: I refuse to back your foolish plot to [This.GetPlot].
translation: 我拒绝支持你[This.GetPlot]的愚蠢计划。

original: I have decided to grant you the [Root.GetFullName] in recognition of your service and your nobility of spirit.
translation: 我决定赐予你[Root.GetFullName]以嘉奖你立下的功劳以及崇高的精神。

original: I would be honored to serve on your Council!
translation: 我很荣幸能在你的宫廷中供职！

original: Regrettably, I must decline your gracious offer to serve on your Council.
translation: 很遗憾，我不得不拒绝你对我的邀请，我不能在你的宫廷中供职。

original: Your request has merit. In the name of [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName], I grant you the right to invade the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]!
translation: 我接受你的请求。以 [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的名义，我批准你入侵 [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]！

original: I fear I must refuse your request to invade [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s lands.
translation: 恐怕我必须拒绝批准你入侵 [Root.GetTitledFirstName]领地。

original: After much prayer and meditation, I have decided to grant your request to divorce your spouse on the grounds of consanguinity.
translation: 经过长期的祈祷与冥想，我决定同意以近亲结婚的原因允许你同你的配偶离婚。

original: Matrimony is a holy bond. Under the laws of the Church, I cannot grant you divorce.
translation: 婚姻是神圣的纽带，因为教规，我无法允许你们离婚。

original: The vile excesses of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] can no longer be tolerated! We agree that [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] should be denied communion and be excommunicated!
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]的卑劣行径不能被继续容忍了。本座决定[Root.GetSubjectPronoun]将被禁止领受圣体圣事并被绝罚！

original: We refuse to excommunicate the gentle and pious [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 我们不同意绝罚高贵而又虔诚的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: Of course I will honor my obligation and answer your call to war!
translation: 我们当然会应您的要求加入战争！

original: We can unfortunately not join your wars at this time.
translation: 很遗憾我们现在不能加入你的战争。

original: This is a formal declaration of WAR. Our armies shall meet on the field of battle!
translation: 这是正式的宣战。让我们的军队在战场上见！

original: You have not fulfilled your obligations as a liege lord, thus leaving me little choice but to declare WAR.
translation: 你没有履行一名封臣应尽的义务，我不得不因此而向你宣战。

original: Alas! [Root.GetBestName] has died bravely on the field of battle.
translation: 天啊！[Root.GetBestName]在战场上英勇战死了！

original: [Root.GetBestName] was wounded in the thick of battle.
[Root.GetBestName] was maimed in battle by a valiant foeman.
translation: [Root.GetBestName] 在战斗中为敌方勇士所伤致残。

original: [Root.GetBestName] received a crushing blow to the head in battle and will not stir from [Root.GetPossPronoun] repose.
translation: [Root.GetBestName] 的头部在战斗中受到沉重打击，并从此再也不用为 [Root.GetPossPronoun]所扰了。

original: Combat is the best teacher! [Root.GetBestName] has become a more proficient commander.
translation: 格斗是最好的老师！[Root.GetBestName] 已经成为了一名优秀的将领。

original: A dear friend of mine has been imprisoned by [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]! If I appeal to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], maybe I can get [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] to release my friend from the prison.
translation: 我的一个好友被[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]监禁了！如果我向[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]请求，也许能让[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]释放我的朋友。

original: Maybe [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] has a good reason for the imprisonment of my friend?
translation: 也许[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]有关押我朋友的缘由？

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] had the audacity to ask me to release one of my prisoners today! The only reason for me to consider complying [From.GetHerHis] request is the support [From.GetSheHe] has from my other vassals.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]今天十分大胆地要求我释放一名俘虏！让我考虑接受[From.GetHerHis]要求的唯一理由是我的封臣们支持[From.GetSheHe]。

original: Your audacity is your downfall, I will not release your friend!
translation: 你胆大包天，我不会放了你的朋友！

original: Our enemy has died, the war has ended.
translation: 我们的敌人死了，战争结束了。

original: I accept your gracious invitation and will join your court forthwith!
translation: 我接受您那光荣的邀请，并立即前往您的宫廷任职！

original: I cannot in good conscience abandon my current liege to join your court.
translation: 我不能背弃我现在的领主去您那任职。

original: I accept you as my vassal. Henceforth, you will enjoy my protection as your liege lord.
translation: 我接受你的臣服，从今天起，你将作为我的封臣而受到保护。

original: Your offer is tempting, but I have to decline your offer to become my vassal.
translation: 你的请求很诱人，但我还是不能接受你的臣服。

original: I will gladly lift the excommunication of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and allow [Root.GetObjectPronoun] back into the Church!
translation: 我很乐意免除对[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的绝罚并允许[Root.GetObjectPronoun]重归教会的怀抱中！

original: I am afraid that the depravity of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] precludes a return to the embrace of Holy Mother Church.
translation: 恐怕[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的劣行依然是他回归圣母怀抱中的障碍。

original: But of course I accept such a generous ransom. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has been released!
translation: 我当然会接受这么一大笔赎金。[Root.GetTitledFirstName]自由了！

original: I am afraid I cannot accept your offer. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] had better remain in my custody.
translation: 我恐怕无法接受你的请求。[Root.GetTitledFirstName]被我关着更好。

original: I am out in the woods, and I see a mighty stag while my party is hunting.
translation: 我和我的同伴们在森林里狩猎时看见了一头强壮的牡鹿。

original: I know people are out to kill me, and they are after me while I hunt.
translation: 我知道人们想杀我，当我打猎的时候他们总是站在我的后边。

original: Do nothing, I can't let them know that I know
translation: 什么也不做，不能让他们知道我看穿了他们。

original: I got him while he hunts.
translation: 我将在他打猎时做掉他。

original: I let the arrow fly and no one knows any better
translation: 让弓箭飞，神不知鬼不觉地……

original: I managed to injure him on the latest hunt.
translation: 我成功在最近的打猎时伤到了他。

original: The arrow struck but not quite where I wanted
translation: 弓箭射中了他，但并没有射中要害。

original: I was killed by my Liege?
I thought I was finally able to kill him.
translation: 我以为我最终还是能杀死他。

original: What?? My Liege has killed me
translation: 什么？？我被我的领主杀了

original: He thought I wanted to kill him
A white hart has been seen in the north of [Root.Location.GetName]. I am told it is a hart of ten and the biggest deer ever seen.
translation: 一只白色的牡鹿出现在了[Root.Location.GetName]的北部。我被告知这是有史以来最大的一只十岁的牡鹿。

original: I find no joy in killing such a proud animal
translation: 我无心伤害一只如此高贵的动物

original: I will send out our best hunter.
translation: 我会派出我最好的猎手。

original: The dogs have caught scent of a boar in the forest. This is the chance of getting a mighty boar slain.
translation: 猎犬在森林中嗅到了野猪的气息，这是展开一场激动人心的围猎的好时机。

original: I will face it alone with my spear.
translation: 我将带着我的长矛独自面对它。

original: Our hunting party has cornered a large bear. A small argument amongst the hunters regarding who should get to kill the bear has nearly turned into a brawl.
translation: 我们的围猎团队在森林里碰见了一头熊。对于到底让谁去猎杀那头熊一事，大家为此争吵不休。

original: Anyone but me, don't give it to me
translation: 你们谁想去谁去，不要找我来。

original: The hounds were more alert this morning than I've ever seen before. Something stupendous must be awaiting us.
translation: 今天早晨猎犬表现的异常警觉，肯定有什么不寻常的东西在等待着我们。

original: What are we waiting for? Let's go!
translation: 我们还愣着干什么？现在就出发！

original: I think my horse has a limp
I don't care what it is, we'll hunt it.
translation: 我不管那是什么东西，我们会捕获它！

original: The hounds brings down the child of a peasant..
translation: 我的猎犬袭击了一个农家小孩……

original: The hounds have torn a small child of a peasant to pieces. This may tarnish our reputation slightly.
translation: 我的猎犬将那个小孩撕成了碎片，这将会给我的荣誉染上小小的污点。

original: While chasing an agile deer my horse stumbled and broke his leg. Luckily, I was thrown off, but now my horse is in pain...
translation: 在追赶一头小鹿的时候，我的马被绊倒了还摔断了腿。我只是被甩了出去而已，但我的马却十分痛苦……

original: I will end his suffering myself
translation: 让我来亲自结束它的痛苦

original: The sighthounds thirsted for blood this gentle afternoon and they brought us many hares.
translation: 在这个宁静的下午，我的那群渴血的猎犬抓来了几只野兔。

original: Another one? Isn't it enough now?
My lack of hunting skill is becoming quite obvious. My court is talking about my failure in not so quite quiet voices.
translation: 我拙于狩猎一事开始传开了，我的廷臣们开始悄悄地谈论这件事了。

original: Claim someone else's success as mine.
I have given the order for a Grand Hunt to be organized in [Root.Location.GetName].
translation: 我下令在[Root.Location.GetName]组织一场大围猎。

original: I will find the White Stag.
translation: 我会找到那头白色的牡鹿。

original: War disrupts our Grand Hunt. We are forced to cancel our activities.
translation: 战争迫使我们取消了这次围猎。
年年都会有这样的机会……

original: The Grand Hunt is over for now. This was a truly noble endeavour and a true challenge for our martial abilities.
translation: 大狩猎就此结束，这真是一项高雅的运动，同时还能锻炼我们的军事才能。

original: I am proud of my hunting abilities.
translation: 我为我精湛的猎技而感到骄傲。

original: I am such a good hunter that I do not always need my retinue when I hunt. There is a large pack of wolves ahead, and they look hungry.
translation: 我是一个能干的猎手因此我不常带着随从出猎，今天我发现前面有一群狼，他们看起来很饿。

original: I need more warm pelts for the winter.
translation: 今年过冬用的毛皮有着落了。

original: I've taken down a large deer on my own. My skill is legendary in [Root.Location.GetName], but my liege is not always as skillful as I am.
translation: 我独自猎取了一头巨大的鹿。我打猎能手的名声也开始在[Root.Location.GetName]传开，但是我的领主却不像我一般精于射猎。
这正是自吹自擂的好时机！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is boasting about how much better a hunter [From.GetSheHe] is, compared to you, just because [From.GetSheHe] killed a large deer on [From.GetHerHis] own.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]正在吹嘘[From.GetSheHe]的精湛猎技，并且拿你作对比，仅仅是因为[From.GetSheHe]在[From.GetHerHis]领地里独自猎取了一头巨大的鹿。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] can not hunt from the dungeon.
translation: 把[From.GetSheHeCap]扔进地牢里，看他还能不能打猎。

original: Today, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] asked me for a fief of [From.GetPossPronoun] own to govern...
translation: 今天，我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]向我请求一块封地予[From.GetPossPronoun]统治……
我告诉[From.GetObjectPronoun][From.GetSubjectPronoun]还没有准备好接受此职
我们还是来谈谈有关教会的工作吧……

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is reminding me of my promise to grant [From.GetObjectPronoun] a fiefdom again...
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]又开始提醒我关于许诺赐予[From.GetObjectPronoun]封地一事了……

original: My beloved [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is concerned that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is still not married.
translation: 我亲爱的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]还在为[From.GetSubjectPronoun]没有完婚一事而操心。

original: And here I was hoping [From.GetSubjectPronoun]'d take the vows...
translation: 在此我希望[From.GetSubjectPronoun]能立下誓言……

original: My [GetFromRelation] has promised to arrange a marriage for me!
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]答应帮我找一门婚事！

original: [From.GetFirstName], my dear [GetFromRelation], clearly upset, is reminding me of my promise to get [From.GetObjectPronoun] married.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]，我亲爱的[GetFromRelation]，十分忧心地提醒我说我曾经答应过为[From.GetObjectPronoun]找一门亲事。

original: I have just the person in mind!
That's it, you're off to the monastery!
translation: 对就是要这样才能让你进修道院！

original: I still have not found anyone suitable...
translation: 我觉得我还没找到合适的人选……

original: My hopeless [GetFromRelation] has betrayed me and secretly gotten married to a lady-in-waiting.
translation: 我那缺德的[GetFromRelation]背叛了我并与我的一个女官秘密地结婚了。

original: Ah well, I wish them luck!
The insolence! I will not forget this...
translation: 耻辱！我不会忘记这一切的……

original: Long life to them... in the oubliette!
translation: 让他们长相厮守吧……在密牢里！

original: My coffers are empty and I've already borrowed money from my friends. Perhaps it is time to approach the moneylenders...
translation: 我的金库已经空了，但是我已经从周围的朋友们那里把钱借了个遍。也许我应该去找找放高利贷的了……

original: They will make me such a deal!
Take a five-year loan at 25% interest
translation: 借四分之一利率的五年期贷款

original: Take a five-year loan at 50% interest
translation: 借二分之一利率的五年期贷款

original: I am informed by the moneylenders that the loan is due...

translation: 250 金币？再宽限一段时间吧

original: The moneylenders are here, reminding me of that loan I took...
I don't have the 300. Come back later
translation: 我现在没有 300 枚金币，再宽限一段时间吧

original: Cut off their hands and have them castrated!
translation: 剁了他的手，再把他给阉了！

original: My coffers are empty, but the coffers of my vassals are full. They have an obligation to their liege.
translation: 我的金库空了，但是我的封臣的却很满，我觉得他们有义务来帮助他们的领主。

original: Will get back with a reply to your request soon.
translation: 他们会很快回应你的要求。

original: Will get back with a reply to your humble request soon.
translation: 他们会很快回应你不高的要求。

original: Will get back with a reply to your tough request soon.
translation: 他们会很快回应你严苛的要求。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is requesting help with [From.GetHerHis] mismanagement of the economy. We are asked to provide a certain amount of gold.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]向我们寻求援助，这都是由于[From.GetHerHis]在经济上的乱政导致的。我们接到了上贡一笔资金的要求。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has refused to pay us the gold we need. Perhaps we should have [From.GetHerHim] arrested?
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝上贡。也许我们该把[From.GetHerHim]抓起来？

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has paid us the money we asked [From.GetHerHim] for. This is definitely what we needed.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]上交了我们要求[From.GetHerHim]付出的贡金。这正是我们想要的。

original: My coffers are empty, but the Church is rich! Maybe I should seize church properties to repay my debts.
translation: 我的金库空了，但是教会却那么有钱。也许我应该侵占一些教产来偿还我的债务。

original: Time are harsh, force the church to share the costs!
translation: 日子不好过，逼教会交出点钱吧！

original: Compromise with them to find money!
translation: 跟他们谈谈让他们资助一点钱吧！

original: will not sit silent when Church law is violated.
translation: 当教规被打破时候，教会不会袖手旁观。

original: There is a place in hell for sinners such as [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Never in the history of Christendom has such a vile ruler existed, one who robs the Holy Church itself of its belongings!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]这个罪人应当下地狱！基督教世界和历史将不会容忍这种罪行，这个强夺教产的卑鄙无耻之徒必将受到破门严惩！

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is cursed in the eyes of God!
Jesus said to forgive the sinner!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] will get excommunicated from the holy church, when the Holy Father hears of what [From.GetSheHe] has done.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]将遭到绝罚，因为圣父教宗听闻了[From.GetSheHe]的罪行。

original: An emissary from the Holy Father has come to our court, to announce that we are anathema to everything that is holy. We have been excommunicated!
translation: 圣父教宗的使者来到我们的宫廷，宣布我们被任何神圣的事物拒斥。我们被绝罚了！

original: We have been judged in the eyes of God...
translation: 我已遭到了上帝的审判……

original: To [Root.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. The [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] is faithful as long as it gets paid. But we are, after all, mercenaries. We owe [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA] no oath of fealty, and so we have decided to reclaim a little of what is owed us. Forcefully.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。[From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的雇佣军在拿钱的情况下是忠诚的。但仅仅是在拿钱的情况下，[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA]并不是你的下属。所以我们决定从你的国库里把你欠我们的钱拿回来，当然，要用一点暴力。

original: To [Root.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. The irregularity of pay recently has made the men restless. Regrettably, I share their sentiments. The [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] must cease its service to you immediately, due to [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA]'s inability to fulfill the contractual obligations.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。您一直不能按时发饷，这让我的手下无心作战，遗憾的是，我跟他们想的一样。[From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]必须马上停止为您效力，因为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA]无力履行雇佣合同。

original: To [Root.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Due to [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA]'s lack of regular payment, the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] has decided to seek more gainful employment elsewhere, perhaps among the other participants in this war...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。由于[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA]不能按时发饷，[From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]决定另寻值得效力的雇主，也许下一个雇主将是敌方……

original: That blackguard will get his just deserts!
translation: 那个混蛋必将死无葬身之地！

original: To the great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetTitledFirstName] of the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. The inability of our previous employer to provide our contractual pay has caused us to look for employment elsewhere. We would serve [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA] if you would have us.
translation: [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的[From.GetTitledFirstName]致伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。由于我们的前任雇主不能按时发饷，于是我们决定另寻明主。如果[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA]您愿意收留我等，则在下愿效犬马之劳。

original: I woke up last night in a cold sweat, heart pounding with fear at the realization I must someday die...
translation: 我昨夜一身冷汗自梦中惊醒。无尽的恐惧与急促的心跳警示着我可能在某一天离开这个人世……
问问我的监护人有关[Root.Guardian.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的事情。

original: [From.GetFirstName], my young [GetFromRelation], wants to know what it is all about. Why are we here on this Earth?
translation: [From.GetFirstName]，我年轻的[GetFromRelation]，非常喜欢问问题，他向我询问为什么人生活在这个世界里？

original: Let [From.GetObjectPronoun] sort it out on [From.GetPossPronoun] own...
translation: 让[From.GetObjectPronoun]去寻找这个问题的答案，当然是要靠[From.GetPossPronoun]自己……

original: My [GetFromRelation] has answered all my existential questions.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]回答了我所有的关于自身存在的问题。

original: The [From.Religion.GetName] Faith gives me peace of mind
I find myself speaking and acting more and more like my guardian.
translation: 我发现我的言行举止越来越像我的监护人。

original: I suppose I am getting cultured.
I have taught my young [GetFromRelation] well. [From.GetFirstName] is starting to act properly [Root.Culture.GetName]!
translation: 我尽心尽力地教导我的[GetFromRelation]。[From.GetFirstName]正在成为一个真正的[Root.Culture.GetName]！

original: This ugly weed must be rooted out!
The charismatic preacher has convinced me. The [Root.Location.Religion.GetName] creed is the true faith!
translation: 那个伟大的传教士坚定了我的信仰。[Root.Location.Religion.GetName]信仰是唯一的正信！

original: My faith is strong and I am itching to spread the good word to my friends...
translation: 我那强烈的信仰开始让我试图向我的朋友传播福音……

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], is attempting to convert me to [From.GetPossPronoun] heresy.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] would have me reconsider and embrace the [From.Religion.GetName] faith.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]让我考虑重新皈依[From.Religion.GetName]信仰。

original: Betrayal! The guards are coming for me.
[From.GetFirstName], my [GetFromRelation], remains true to [From.GetPossPronoun] errant beliefs.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]，我的[GetFromRelation]，依然在[From.GetPossPronoun]错误信仰中迷失自我。

original: [From.GetFirstName] has seen sense and abandoned [From.GetPossPronoun] dangerous heresy.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]已经意识到了异端的危险之处并抛弃了[From.GetPossPronoun]异教。
不，大家的尊重是最好的财富！

original: I have a bad feeling about this...

translation: 上主，光荣不要归于我们
可以杀更多的异教徒了
帮助 守卫 救治

original: The infidels come in many flavors
The coffers of Holy Mother Church are full and the faithful are struggling against infidels and heathens. Perhaps we should provide some assistance.
translation: 圣母教会的金库是充盈的。而我们虔诚的教徒正在同异端和异教徒们作战。也许我们应该给他们提供一些帮助。

original: Send a Papal emissary with funds
translation: 让教廷使者给他们送去资金支持。

original: Our coffers are not that full
translation: 我们的金库还不是那么满。

original: Your righteous struggle against the heathens has not gone unnoticed. I have dispatched a Papal emissary with sufficient funds to assist you.
translation: 你那针对异教徒和异端的正义战争并没有被遗忘。我已经派了教廷使者带着资金去支援你了。

original: One of the God's favored children seems to have been accused of kinslaying. This is clearly unfortunate.  The Church will allow him to do penance for absolution.
translation: 一个为上帝所眷爱的教徒被人指责为弑亲禽兽，这真是太不幸了。教会同意他通过忏悔来洗刷自己身上的罪孽。

original: The Church will allow him to do penance for absolution.
translation: 教会同意他做补赎以赦罪。
这不是我们应该考虑的。

original: will get a visit from one of our emissaries.
translation: 将会被我们的使者拜访。

original: An emissary from [From.GetTitledFirstName] has reached us with a proposal. [From.GetTitle] will grant us absolution for our sins of kinslaying.
translation: 来自[From.GetTitledFirstName]的使者向我们提出了一份提议。[From.GetTitle]将会免去我们的弑亲之罪。

original: I'm on my knees saying Ave Maria's.
translation: 我匍匐在地上高呼万福玛利亚。

original: [From.GetTitle] will be pleased with my devotion.
translation: [From.GetTitle]将会为我的虔诚而感到高兴。

original: [From.GetTitle] will be upset with my lack of devotion.
translation: [From.GetTitle]将会因为我缺乏虔诚而感到不快。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has repented [From.GetHerHis] grave sin of kinslaying. Absolution has been granted and the all the angels of Heaven are crying with joy.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]已经忏悔了[From.GetHerHis]弑亲重罪。他的罪已被赦免，天堂里的天使们将为此喜极而泣。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] refuses to repent [From.GetHerHis] grave sin of kinslaying. [From.GetSheHeCap] will spend a long time in Purgatory...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝对[From.GetHerHis]弑亲重罪进行忏悔。[From.GetSheHeCap]将在炼狱中备受煎熬……

original: May God have mercy on [From.GetHerHis] soul...
I am forced to languish in this dungeon, where the evil fiends of [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] is torturing my soul.
translation: 我在地牢里备受煎熬，那如魔鬼般邪恶的[Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName]在折磨我的灵魂。

original: Write a letter to the Pope
The Holy Father will read my desperate plea...
translation: 圣父教宗会理解我绝望的请求……

original: We have received a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName] asking us to intervene on his behalf and ask [From.Host.GetTitledFirstName] to release him from his prison.
translation: 我们接到了一封来自[From.GetTitledFirstName]的信，他请求我们帮助他并命令[From.Host.GetTitledFirstName]将他释放。

original: The Throne of St. Peter must be obeyed!
His captor will listen to our demand.
translation: 关押他的人听从了我们的建议。

original: We have caught [From.GetTitledFirstName] attempting to smuggle out a letter to the Pope, where he wishes the Holy Father to intervene on his behalf.
translation: 我们发现[From.GetTitledFirstName]试图偷偷给教宗送信以获得圣父教宗的支持。

original: The prayers of [From.GetTitledFirstName] have not gone unnoticed. Is there such a thing as a limit to my power?
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]的祈祷没有被忽视。是不是存在限制我权力的东西？

original: I can't keep a man of God imprisoned.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has come to our intervention and written a stern letter to [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] demanding our release.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]开始介入此事并写了一封措辞严厉的信给[Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName]要求释放俘虏。

original: I am sure [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] will release us now.
translation: 我敢肯定[Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName]这回会释放我们了。

original: A secret messenger from [From.GetTitledFirstName] has arrived, telling me that the Holy Father can do nothing to help me..
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]的密使来了，他告诉我们圣父教宗对此无能为力……

original: My God, My God, why have you forsaken me?
translation: 我的上帝，我的上帝，您为什么要抛弃我？

original: A letter has arrived from the Holy Father. He demands that we release [From.GetTitledFirstName] from our prison and submit to the will of God.
translation: 我收到了一封来自圣父教宗的信件。他要求我们应神的旨意释放我们的俘虏[From.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: I bend my knee for the Throne of St. Peter
A young artist is working on what is clearly a divinely inspired icon, depicting Mary, Mother of God. He needs sponsorship to finish it, so we can place it in our own chapel!
translation: 一位天才的年轻画家正在创作一幅有关圣母玛利亚的精美画作。如果我们能资助他，这幅惊世之作将会放置在我们的礼拜堂里！

original: I pray to Our Lady for guidance
A young artist is working on what is clearly a divinely inspired icon, depicting Christ Pantocrator. He needs sponsorship to finish it, so we can place it in our own chapel!
translation: 一位天才的年轻画家正在创作一幅有关我主耶稣基督的精美画作。如果我们能资助他，这幅惊世之作将会放置在我们的礼拜堂里！
全能的耶稣指引我们的灵魂！

original: A young artist is working on what is clearly a divinely inspired icon, depicting St. Peter. He needs sponsorship to finish it, so we can place it in our own chapel!
translation: 一位天才的年轻画家正在创作一幅有关圣伯多禄的精美画作。如果我们能资助他，这幅惊世之作将会放置在我们的礼拜堂里！

original: He is one apostle to admire!
A young artist is working on what is clearly a divinely inspired icon, depicting John the Baptist. He needs sponsorship to finish it, so we can place it in our own chapel!
translation: 一位天才的年轻画家正在创作一幅有关洗者若翰的精美画作。如果我们能资助他，这幅惊世之作将会放置在我们的礼拜堂里！

original: If John guided Jesus, he can guide me.
translation: 既然若翰能引领耶稣，他也能引领我。

original: A young artist is working on what is clearly a divinely inspired icon, depicting St. George. He needs sponsorship to finish it, so we can place it in our own chapel!
translation: 一位天才的年轻画家正在创作一幅有关圣乔治的精美画作。如果我们能资助他，这幅惊世之作将会放置在我们的礼拜堂里！

original: Veneration of a dragonslayer is never bad.
translation: 对屠龙者表示尊敬不是件坏事。

original: I devote myself to the service of the Church, and eradicating her enemies. I have not yet fallen to any of the mortal sins, nor do I shy away from danger.
translation: 我全力投入到服务教会的工作中去并同她的敌人战斗。现在我身上已没有任何人世间的罪，而任何恐惧也不能阻挡我。

original: I am a fallen man. What was once a noble knight, is now just a mere sinner. I am not a true knight.
translation: 我是个堕落的人。我虽然曾经高贵，但如今仅仅是个罪人而已。我不配做一名骑士。

original: May God have mercy on my soul.
My friends have managed to smuggle in a rope in a flagon of wine. Wine for the guards and rope for the window! Soon, the bird shall fly its cage!
translation: 我的朋友准备偷运一壶酒和一卷绳索。酒是给侍卫的，绳子是用在窗子上的。很快我将重获自由了！

original: I did it! Now to find my way home without being captured...
translation: 我逃出来啦！现在就让我走上回家的路，不要再被抓到了……

original: [From.GetBestName] has managed to effect [From.GetPossPronoun] escape from my dungeon!
Despite their drunken state, the guards managed to catch me, tie me up and bring me to [From.GetTitledFirstName] when I tried to escape.
translation: 卫兵很快就从酒醉中醒了过来，他们抓住了正在准备逃跑的我并把我捆起来带到了[From.GetTitledFirstName]那里。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] sent me back to the dungeon
I deserve better than to rot in this dank dungeon. I should ask [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] for accommodations suitable to my rank.
translation: 我不能死在这个阴暗潮湿的地牢里。我应该要求[Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName]改善我的待遇。

original: My prisoner, [From.GetBestName], is complaining about [From.GetHerHis] dark cell in the dungeon, asking for more suitable accommodations...
translation: 我的囚徒，[From.GetBestName]，向我抱怨在[From.GetHerHis]牢房里的恶劣条件并要求我改善他的待遇……

original: Very well, I shall be merciful
translation: 很好，我将仁慈地改善你的待遇
更合适的待遇？别去牢房了，去密牢怎么样？！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] graciously acceded to my request! I am being moved to a decent tower suite.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]亲切地接受了我的要求！我被移往塔楼中的一个套间软禁。

original: Cruel [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] decided I should be forgotten in the Oubliette! This is the end of me...
translation: 残忍的[Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName]决定把我扔进暗无天日的密牢里！我完了……

original: I can't stop thinking of all those prisoners in my dungeon. They are at my complete mercy... what a thrill it would be to hurt them... to hear the sweet screams, to see the panic in their eyes...
translation: 我开始考虑怎么处置我地牢里的那些囚犯们了。他们在祈求我的怜悯，并为可能的刑讯而感到恐惧……看到他们惊恐的眼神，听着他们惨烈的哀嚎，这一切都让我感到……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName], eyes alight with an ugly glow, has come into my cell with a bag full of tongs and knives!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]的眼神里闪烁着恶意的寒光，他带着一大包钳子和刀子进入了我的牢房！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetPossPronoun] freakish chief jailor have come to put me on the rack!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]和[From.GetPossPronoun]那腌臜的牢头把我给捆在了刑柱上！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is a depraved lunatic! [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] sawed my hand off with small knife. It took hours...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]是个变态的疯子！[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]花了好几个小时用一把小刀将我的双手锯下……

original: I can feel my life fading... but at least, so is the pain of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s torture implements.
translation: 我觉得我快死了……但我至少能从[From.GetTitledFirstName]的折磨中解脱了。

original: I was, perhaps a bit too... enthusiastic torturing [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] did not survive the session.
translation: 也许我虐待[From.GetTitledFirstName]得有点太过了。[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]死了。

original: Ah well, who will ever know?
Sounds like a job for real men
translation: 听起来像给男子汉的工作

original: For as long as have ruled here we Normans have entrusted the raising of our children to Saxon nursemaids. Our first words would not be Norman French but Saxon. As we grew up we learned to speak a tongue that was neither one nor the other. Now is this time to make this tongue our own so we may all communicate.
translation: 长久以来，我们诺曼人的孩子都是由撒克逊保姆们带大的。我们说出的第一句话不是诺曼底法语而是撒克逊语，随着我们长大，我们学会了说一种和两者都不同的语言。现在是时候把这种语言作为通用语了。

original: Yes let us be one with our serfs
translation: 让我们跟我们的仆人们融合在一起吧。

original: Around our lands more people are using this English language and I find this is a perfect means for a Norman overlord to get his Saxon serfs to work properly. We continue to use our own influence to promote this means of communication in the interests of more efficient realm.
translation: 在我们的领地上有越来越多的人开始使用这个英语了，我发现这是能让撒克逊仆从为诺曼领主正常工作的完美手段。我们继续用自己的影响力来推广，使其更有效率。

original: Although every civilised man in Christendom knows that French is the true language of communication, this new English language does have a certain functionality. I have therefore prevailed upon a member of my court to adopt this for everyday administrative use.
translation: 在基督教文明世界里，几乎每一个人都认为法语才是最好的交流语言，而且新产生的英语还并没有完善，因此我鼓励我的廷臣们在宫廷中更多地使用法语词汇。
这是一个很重要的进步

original: I was considering important business when I had an amazing insight. To strengthen my realm I must bring my vassals round to my way of thinking. This involves communication. If I can get them to communicate like me then I will have a much smoother running realm.
translation: 精明的我发现了一件很重要的事情。为了更好地管理我的领地，我必须让我的封臣们想我所想，念我所念，如果我们使用的语言相同那将会大大有益于此。
有些时候我都会被我超人的洞察力所震惊

original: My liege, vague rumors of an all-conquering menace have reached us from the far East. It seems that a Great Khan has united all the tribes of the vast steppes, leading millions of fierce horse warriors against the great cities of Cathay. In time, this new Khagan could pose a threat to the civilized world...
translation: 我的领主，一个恐怖的消息正在从遥远的东方传来。据说一位伟大可汗统一了整个大草原并带领着数以百万计的铁骑攻打着契丹国。也许这位可汗之后将会威胁到整个文明世界……

original: My liege, the great Khagan has dispatched a numberless horde of barbarian horsemen against the lands of Central Asia and Eastern Persia. Appearing in Balkh, the heathen armies seem intent on conquering the Muslim world!
translation: 我的领主，那位伟大的可汗已经派遣出了数以百万计的由野蛮人组成的骑兵横扫了中亚和波斯东部。他们的前锋已经征服了缚喝，这群异教徒很显然是打算吞并整个穆斯林世界！
也许蒙古的长生天更强大一些

original: My liege, another horde has been sent west by the terrible Khagan of the Mongols. This one - the 'Golden Horde' - has allegedly been ordered to conquer Europe all the way to the Atlantic Ocean!
translation: 我的领主，另一支恐怖的游牧民族正在一个残暴的可汗的带领之下向西进发。这个所谓的「金帐汗国」宣称要征服到大西洋为止所有欧洲的土地！

original: Time for the Infidel to suffer!
translation: 是让那些异教徒尝尝苦头的时候了！
也许蒙古的长生天更强大一些

original: I have decided to institute the [From.GetProposedLaw] Law. All that is needed is the support of yourself and my other loyal vassals.\n\nYour [From.Holder.GetTitle]
translation: 我决定开始研究制定[From.GetProposedLaw]的法律。当然这需要举国上下，包括阁下你的一致支持。\n\n你的[From.Holder.GetTitle]

original: I have decided to institute the [From.GetProposedLaw] Law in the [From.GetFullName]. Your status as my de jure vassal entitles you to vote on the matter.\n\n[From.Holder.GetTitledName]
translation: 我决定在[From.GetFullName]实行[From.GetProposedLaw]法。作为我的封臣你有资格对此事进行表决。\n\n[From.Holder.GetTitledName]

original: I have decided to institute the [From.GetProposedLaw] Law in the [From.GetFullName]. Since this is a Crown Law and you are a formal elector of [From.GetName], you may vote, even though you are not my vassal... yet.\n\n[From.Holder.GetTitledName]
translation: 我决定在[From.GetFullName]实行[From.GetProposedLaw]法。因为这是一个王权法，而你是一名正式的[From.GetName]选侯，虽然你还不是我的封臣，你仍可对此进行表决。\n\n[From.Holder.GetTitledName]

original: A revolt has broken out in [Root.GetName]! Angered by my 'oppressive' rule, the peasants have taken to arms.
translation: [Root.GetName]爆发了叛乱！农民们揭竿而起，反抗我的「暴政」。

original: A revolt has broken out in [From.GetName]! Angered by the oppressive rule of [From.County.Holder.GetTitledName], the peasants have taken to arms. Their indiscriminate destruction will unfortunately hit my holdings as well...
translation: [From.GetName]爆发了叛乱！农民们揭竿而起反对[From.County.Holder.GetTitledName]的暴政。他们洗劫一切、破坏一切，当然也包括我的地产……

original: If the count doesn't act, I better...
translation: 如果伯爵阁下不出手镇压，那么我就……

original: Peasant rebels have taken control of one of our holdings in [From.GetName] and looted it!
translation: 乡巴佬暴徒们控制并洗劫了我们在[From.GetName]的地产！

original: The peasant rebels in [From.GetName] have been dispersed and our holding taken back!
translation: 在[From.GetName]的农民暴动已被镇压，我们的地产终于物归原主了！

original: An old wound is aggravating and painful
We have gained a better understanding of military matters during this battle.
translation: 在战斗中，我们的军事技巧日益精进。

original: This battle has shown my true mettle. I am Brave!
translation: 这场战斗充分地展现了我的气概。我超勇的！

original: Swords are sharp and dangerous. I can lead better from inside my own castle.
translation: 宝剑虽说锋利但也危险，我还是在我的城堡里指挥战斗更好一点。

original: My careful maneuvers in this battle have shown our patient nature to everyone.
translation: 我在这场战役中的机动作战充分地向世人展示了我的冷静。

original: A noble has distinguished himself in this battle. Perhaps I can make use of him...
translation: 一名贵族在这场战斗中表现出色，也许我可以利用他……

original: My position as regent to [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] means that I have access to the treasury. I think I deserve a raise...
translation: 作为[This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的摄政，我有权使用国库，我觉得我应该给我加薪了……
我的领主怀疑我贪污腐败。
财政总管怀疑我贪污腐败

original: My liege has proof of my corruption
translation: 我的领主发现了我的贪污行径

original: The Steward has proof of my corruption
translation: 财政总管发现了我的贪污行径

original: Money has been disappearing from the treasury. I suspect my regent, [From.GetTitledFirstName]...
translation: 国库里的财产不翼而飞，我怀疑我的摄政[From.GetTitledFirstName]贪污了这笔钱……

original: Money has been disappearing from the coffers of my liege, [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. I suspect the regent, [From.GetTitledFirstName]...
translation: 我领主[This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的国库中丢失了一大笔钱。我怀疑摄政[From.GetTitledFirstName]贪污了这笔钱……

original: I have indisputable proof that my regent, [From.GetTitledFirstName] is embezzling money from the treasury!
translation: 我发现了我的摄政[From.GetTitledFirstName]贪污公款的确切证据！

original: My investigations have unearthed proof that the regent of [This.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been embezzling money!
translation: 经过缜密的调查我发现[This.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的摄政，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，贪污了公款！
