original: This voice calling to me, telling me I was a bad person, telling me how evil I was. I realized that this was no ordinary voice, this was Jesus Christ himself our Lord and saviour himself. I knew that I would have to live a better life.
translation: 冥冥中我听到一个声音，他在指责我是一个坏人，并一遍又一遍地指出我的罪恶之处。我知道这不是普通的声音，这是我主耶稣基督的谴责，我应该从此改变我的生活了。

original: Jesus Christ our Lord has commanded me to give more to the poor. I cannot ignore his calling.
translation: 耶稣基督命令我应多给穷人以施舍，我必须这么做。

original: My sin is too great so I must show repentance. I care not what others think Heaven is only for the truly repentant. I will don the cilice to show the depth of my repentance.
translation: 我罪孽深重，必须为此忏悔。不管别人怎么认为，我觉得天堂大门会为真心忏悔之人敞开。我会身着麻布衣来表现我深刻的悔意。

original: I saw a hairy star in the sky, I swear it to be true. 'Twas the color of blood I tell thee. It was if the Lord God himself was bleeding.
translation: 我发誓我在天空中看到了灾星！那星的颜色乃是血红，那星乃是我主流血的证明。

original: I seem to be slow to talk
So where does children come from?
Maybe my father will tell me?
translation: 也许我的父亲会告诉我？

original: The darkness must definitely contain goblins and demon!
translation: 黑暗中一定隐藏着地精和魔鬼！

original: Other children just get into fights with me.
I just do not have enough things to play with.
Maybe father will give me more toys.
translation: 也许我爸会给我更多的玩具。

original: Other children talk about their mothers, but I never see my mother.
translation: 别的孩子们都在聊他们的妈妈，但我从来没见过我的妈妈。

original: I am rather lonely, the other children does not seem to want to be with me.
translation: 别的孩子都不跟我玩，我觉得很孤单。

original: It is probably no big deal.
Why must I go to school today instead of playing 'Who's afraid of the Black Knight' with my friends?
translation: 为什么我今天要去上学我想跟我的小伙伴们玩。

original: My will should count for more...
translation: 没什么人看重我的想法……

original: I really wonder what heathens are. Maybe [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] knows?
translation: 什么是异教徒？也许[Root.Guardian.GetFullName]知道？

original: Climbing high walls, and practising sword fighting with my friends are great fun.
translation: 爬上高墙用剑跟我的小伙伴打斗真有意思。

original: Why do people die? Maybe [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] knows?
translation: 为什么人会死？也许[Root.Guardian.GetFullName]知道？

original: Will I rule one day? Maybe [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] knows?
translation: 我将来会成为统治者么？也许[Root.Guardian.GetFullName]知道？

original: Life is good, and great parties makes them even better.
translation: 生命是美好的，聚会让她更加美好。

original: Maybe I should invite [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] to one of them?
translation: 也许我应该邀请[Root.Guardian.GetFullName]也来参加聚会？

original: I do not understand why we are fighting fellow [catholic.GetName]s?
translation: 为什么本应相亲相爱的[catholic.GetName]教友们还会相互攻击？

original: I wonder why the Church is so rich, and the peasants so poor?
translation: 为什么教会那么富有，农民却那么穷？

original: I wonder why [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] let that peasant get away?
Peasants are only good for following my commands!
translation: 一个听话的农民才是好农民！

original: Deep thoughts interest me, but I would love to hear the answers to some questions.
translation: 思考一个问题很有意思，不过我也喜欢直接得到答案。

original: Since we all are going to die, why not enjoy life?
translation: 既然人都会死，那么为什么我们不享受人生呢？

original: I snuck out again, found my slim sword Pin and began practising. I'd rather practise sword fighting with Pin than doing embroidery, but I have to watch out so none finds out and takes my sword from me...
translation: 我悄悄的跑了出来，找到了那个小小的剑型胸针来练习击剑。比起绣花来说，用胸针来练剑有意思多了，不过我必须小心不被发现，不然胸针被他们拿走就糟了……

original: I was not careful enough, [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] saw me!
I am afraid of so many things, and every time I show my weaknesses others ridicule me for cowardness.
translation: 我很胆小，每次被吓到的时候别人都会嘲笑我。

original: I sneaked through the dungeons, hearing the prisoners pleading for their life and the coarse laughter from the guards. A knife lay forgotten on the floor and I brought it with me, only to realize in the daylight why it had felt so sticky...
translation: 我偷偷地溜进了牢房，听见了囚徒的祈求与守卫的狂笑。我捡起了地上的一把刀，觉得很奇怪，为什么在大白天里这把刀还是那么又湿又粘……

original: I curled up in my favorite chair with the biggest book I could find. When I heard [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] coming up the stairs I sprung from the chair but the book dragged me down and so [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] caught me.
translation: 我拿着一本我能找到的最大的书蜷缩在我最喜欢的椅子里读。当我听到[Root.Guardian.GetFullName]上楼的脚步声时，我赶忙从椅子上跳了下来，但是我却被那本书给挂倒了，于是我被[Root.Guardian.GetFullName]抓到了。

original: Let me go! I wanna read!
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName] caught [Root.GetFirstName] reading instead of doing [Root.GetHerHis] chores
translation: [Root.Guardian.GetFullName]抓到[Root.GetFirstName]正在读书而不是[Root.GetHerHis]应干的家务

original: I know I am ugly, I can never be as beautiful as some of the people in the court of [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 我觉得我很丑，而且永远不会变的和[Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]宫廷中的一些人一样美！

original: I always get compliments for my fair skin, my silken hair and my big eyes. They tell me I am beautiful and I should be proud of my looks.
translation: 我光滑的肌肤柔顺的秀发和明亮的眼睛经常被别人恭维。他们都跟我说我很美，我觉得很自豪。

original: I am the fairest of them all!

It was market day and I had persuaded [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] to let me have some money for sweetmeats. I found what I wanted but haggled all I could until the merchant gave up, laughed and handed me the sweetmeats for a lot less than what he wanted for them.
translation: 今天是赶集的日子，我请求[Root.Guardian.GetFullName]给我点零花钱去买糖吃。我找到了我喜欢的糖，但钱不够，于是我跟商人讨教还价，缠着他。他终于笑着用很便宜的价钱给了我一些糖。

original: [Root.Guardian.GetFullName], may I talk to the visitors?

Every chance I get I practice swordfighting, often with the older men who finds it amusing to see me charging at them with all my might. They are too seasoned for me to defeat them, but practise makes perfect and one day I will be the best.
translation: 每次练剑的时候，我都会叫上一些比我大的人练习。他们很喜欢看我用尽全力冲向他们的样子。但他们都是用剑的高手，所以我无法打败他们，但终有一天我会胜利的。

original: I got my first kiss today! It was not quite what I had expected but rather nice anyway. Too bad [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] blundered in on us, spoiling the moment.
translation: 我得到了你的初吻！虽然跟我想的不太一样，但是依然很美好。但是我们被[Root.Guardian.GetFullName]被撞见了，美好的氛围全没了。
[Root.Guardian.GetFullName]意识到[Root.GetFirstName]正在变成一个真正的[Root.GetManWoman]

original: The kitchen is warm and filled with delicious smells and even more delicious foodstuff. If I could, I would spend all my days here.
translation: 厨房里不仅暖和而且为香味所萦绕，更有很多好吃的。我真想整天都呆在这里。

original: The biggest tower in [Root.Location.GetName] is staggering high, but I had decided to climb all the way up, on the outside. I saw [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] in the room at the top and shouted a greeting.
translation: [Root.Location.GetName]的最高的塔楼真的是非常高，不过我决定从外面爬上去。我看到[Root.Guardian.GetFullName]在最顶层的房间喊我让我赶紧进来。

original: I don't feel too good, I am feverish and my head hurts! Can't [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] do something to rid me of this illness?
translation: 我觉得很不舒服，发烧而且头疼！[Root.Guardian.GetFullName]能做点什么来缓解我的痛苦么？

original: I have feelings for a [Root.GetManWoman] at court, I feel happy and almost in love everytime I see [Root.GetHerHim]. I try to accept this but will others accept me?
translation: 我对宫廷中的一个[Root.GetManWoman]特别有感觉，每次看到[Root.GetHerHim]，我都会觉得脸红心跳。我试着接受这个现实，但是别人会接受我么？

original: Do you accept me for who I am, [Root.Guardian.GetFullName]?
I have never had any problems making friends, to get someone to like me I can twist and turn the truth until it fits.
translation: 我特别擅长交友，为了交上朋友，我经常会改变我的性格成为他们喜欢的那种人，然后再变成我的真实的性格。

original: It's a great skill, isn't it, [Root.Guardian.GetFullName]?
translation: 这是个好技巧，你说是不是，[Root.Guardian.GetFullName]？

original: [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] has something to say about [Root.GetFirstName]'s way of getting friends
[From.GetFirstName] is slow to learn to talk.
Daddy will tell you when you get older
translation: 等你长大了，爸爸再告诉你

original: You know there are bees and flowers...
Be silent or I'll slap you!
Try to address the causes of the fear
[From.GetFirstName] is often involved in fights with other toddlers

translation: 试着把[From.GetHerHis]注意力转移到别的地方

original: [From.GetFirstName] is not satisfied, and keeps asking for more toys to play with.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]总是找你要更多的玩具，从不满足。

original: Off to the nannies with you, leech!
translation: 找你的保姆去，小吸血鬼！

original: Mom has gone on a long journey
Don't ask me things like that!
Friends are an overvalued commodity anyway
Give [From.GetHerHim] toys to attract friends with
[From.GetFirstName] wants to play with friends instead of studying.
You can play only after school.
You can play with a birch if you like, go to school!
Heathens are people just like us
translation: 异教徒跟我们一样都是人。

original: They are men like us, but unbeliever enemies
translation: 他们虽然是人，但更是真理的敌人。

original: [From.GetFirstName] is often playing very daring games with other children
translation: [From.GetFirstName]经常跟其他孩子们一起玩危险的游戏

original: Let [From.GetHerHim] play, what harm could there be?
Try to limit [From.GetHerHis] games a bit
Of course my child, go to play now
translation: 当然有了孩子，现在去玩吧。

original: Certainly [From.GetFirstName], let me tell you about matters of Faith...
translation: 当然了[From.GetFirstName]，让我给你来讲神的故事……

original: My child, let me explain how things really are...
translation: 孩子，让我来告诉你真相吧……
因为人们太无法无天了

original: It's all part of God's plan
If you deserve it, you shall.
translation: 你得有足够的能力才行。

original: [From.GetFirstName] has developed a habit for wild parties.
There is nothing I can do
[From.GetFirstName] asks 'If we're [catholic.GetName] and our enemies are [catholic.GetName], why are we fighting?'
translation: [From.GetFirstName]问：「我和我们的敌人既然都是[catholic.GetName]的教友，为什么我们还要相互争斗？」

original: Fighting heathens is just silly church thing
translation: 征讨异教徒那是教会才干的傻事

original: Sometimes, even your brother can be an enemy
translation: 有时，即使是你的亲哥哥也会变成你的敌人

original: [From.GetFirstName] asks 'Why is the church so rich when the peasants are starving and poor?'
translation: [From.GetFirstName]问「为什么教会那么有钱而农夫却又受穷又挨饿？」

original: Because for the poor is the kingdom of heaven
translation: 因为穷人才更容易进入天国

original: How about sharing of your own then?
translation: 为什么不把你的钱分给他们一点呢？

original: [From.GetFirstName] asks 'Why did you let off that peasant accused from poaching?'
translation: [From.GetFirstName]问「为什么你要放走那个偷猎的农夫？」

original: Because he needed the deer more than me
translation: 因为他比我更需要鹿肉

original: A good deed in a day keeps man happy
[From.GetFirstName] says 'These peasants we have are all mine to command like little slaves, right?'
translation: [From.GetFirstName]说「我是否能像使唤奴隶一样使唤领地上的农民？」

original: [From.GetFirstName] asks 'If a tree falls in the woods and there's nobody there to hear it, does it make a noise?'
translation: [From.GetFirstName]问「如果大树倒在没有人的森林里，那它是否会发出声音？」

original: Good question, you should ponder it on your own
translation: 好问题，靠自己去想答案吧

original: You should concentrate on something useful instead
translation: 你应该思考一些更有意义的事情

original: [From.GetFirstName] asks 'Since we all die anyway, why to be so hassled about life?'
translation: [From.GetFirstName]问「既然我们都要死，为什么生活却还是那么纷乱无常？」

original: [From.GetFullName] was supposed to work on her embroidery but she clearly fancied another kind of Pin. Her swordsmanship was not too bad, for a girl.
translation: 人们都以为[From.GetFullName]去学刺绣了，其实她是去玩她的胸针了。对于女孩来说，她的剑术其实还算不错的。

original: There's no harm letting her learn how to use a sword
This is not seemly for a woman

The ones who ridicule [From.GetFirstName] for [From.GetHerHis] weaknesses are getting more and more scornful. Their escalating ridicule has made [From.GetFirstName] unable to ignore it anymore, [From.GetSheHe] begged me to help [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 小孩们因为[From.GetHerHis]弱点，对 [From.GetFirstName]的嘲笑变得越来越过分了。他们的嘲笑使得 [From.GetFirstName]再也无法忍受，[From.GetSheHe]请求我帮帮[From.GetHerHim]。

original: I shall show [From.GetFirstName] how to fight myself
translation: 我会让[From.GetFirstName]看我是怎么打人的

original: I will speak up for the child and stop the ridicule
translation: 我会警告那群小孩停止他们的行为

original: [From.GetFirstName], don't you worry about it. It'll be better soon
translation: [From.GetFirstName]，别担心了，一切都会好起来的

original: My heart missed a beat when I saw [From.GetFirstName] emerge from the dungeons, covered in grime and with a bloody knife in [From.GetHerHis] hand.
translation: 当我看见[From.GetFirstName]出现在地牢里的时候，我的心里一颤，这孩子衣服上沾满了污泥，[From.GetHerHis]手里还拿着一把带血的刀。
我要教给[From.GetFirstName]一些有用的技巧

original: It is time to teach [From.GetFirstName] the right way
translation: 现在是教给[From.GetFirstName]正道的时候了

original: I knew exactly where I would find [From.GetFirstName] when [From.GetSheHe] did not show up for practice, in the library in [From.GetHerHis] favorite chair and with the biggest book [From.GetSheHe] could find.
translation: 我知道我该到哪里去找到[From.GetFirstName]，[From.GetSheHe]又没有去练习，肯定是在图书馆里坐在[From.GetHerHis]最喜欢的椅子上，拿着[From.GetSheHe]能找到的最大的一本书。

original: You should take pride in your learning
translation: 你应该为自己的好学而感到骄傲

original: Aren't you a real bookworm? Soon you'll eat the books as well!
translation: 你是个书虫么？你都快把书给吃了！

original: You know, other people can be as interesting as books
translation: 你知道，人其实比书更有趣

original: If you would compare the fairest courtier and [From.GetFirstName], then the courtier would a beautiful swan and [From.GetFirstName] a ugly toad.
translation: 如果你拿你宫廷里最美的人和[From.GetFirstName]相比，你的廷臣就是个美丽的天鹅而[From.GetFirstName]简直就是个癞蛤蟆。

original: [From.GetFirstName], you can never be as good looking
[From.GetFirstName]'s hair, fair skin and beautiful big eyes will make life easier for [From.GetHerHim] than if [From.GetSheHe] had been ugly.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]柔顺的头发，细嫩的肌肤和美丽的大眼睛让[From.GetHerHim]的生活轻松如意，如果[From.GetSheHe]长相丑陋的话绝对不会有这种好事。

original: I should encourage [From.GetFirstName] to flaunt [From.GetHerHis] beauty
You should try to not overwhelm people

[From.GetFirstName] is always counting money and makes sure [From.GetSheHe] get the most out of it. [From.GetSheHeCap] haggled with a merchant over some sweetmeats until the merchant laughed with frustration and handed over the sweetmeats for a lot less than he had asked for.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]锱铢必较，一定要确保[From.GetSheHe]占到最多的便宜。[From.GetSheHeCap]和一个商人为了几个糖果讨价还价，直到商人无奈一笑大幅降价才肯罢休。

original: I'll teach [From.GetFirstName] about the joys of money
I'll tell [From.GetFirstName] about the joys of giving money

[From.GetFirstName] was curious about the visitors but was polite enough to wait until the chamberlain had escorted them to their rooms before [From.GetSheHe] started asking thousands of questions about them, where they came from, why they looked so different and who they were.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]对于我的客人们感到很好奇。但是这孩子总是很有礼貌地等着，直到使者侍者们带着客人们都回房间了，依然没有把[From.GetSheHe]那一大堆有关客人们家乡、语言和身份的问题问出来。

original: Wait until the banquet, then I will introduce you to them
translation: 等到宴会开始的时候，我会把你介绍给客人们

original: Stop asking questions! Children should be seen and not heard
translation: 不要问问题！小孩在宴会上应该多听多看少说

original: If [From.GetFirstName] is nowhere to be seen, you can always find [From.GetHerHim] in the courtyard, playing with [From.GetHerHis] swords and practising [From.GetHerHis] swordfighting with older men.
translation: 如果你找不到[From.GetFirstName]了，去庭院里一定能找到[From.GetHerHim]在用着[From.GetHerHis]剑和大一点的人们练着[From.GetHerHis]剑术。

original: This will turn [From.GetFirstName] into a great knight!
translation: 这会让[From.GetFirstName]成为一名伟大的骑士！

original: I opened the stable door a bit quick and accidently stumbled in on [From.GetFirstName] getting [From.GetHerHis] first kiss! I suddenly realized [From.GetFirstName] is becoming a [From.GetManWoman].
translation: 我开门的速度有点快，结果撞见[From.GetFirstName]正在接受[From.GetHerHis]初吻！我突然发现[From.GetFirstName]已经变成了一个[From.GetManWoman]了。

original: Before anything happens, I should teach [From.GetHerHim] about courtly love
translation: 在那种事发生之前，我得教会[From.GetHerHim]什么才叫得体而又礼貌的爱情。
指责 [From.GetFirstName] 做出这种可耻的事情.

original: The kitchen is truly a wonderful place, filled with delicious things and smells, but it worries me that [From.GetFirstName] spends all [From.GetHerHis] time here, when [From.GetSheHe] should be practicing swordfighting and learning how to rule.
translation: 厨房真是个好地方，这里充满着美味，不过这让我担心[From.GetFirstName]会在这花费太多[From.GetHerHis]时间，尤其是当[From.GetSheHe]应该去学习怎样成为一个合格的骑士和统治者的时候。

original: Force [From.GetFirstName] to learn how to fight

I was... inspecting the damage to the highest tower in [From.Location.GetName] when the head of [From.GetFirstName] appeared outside the window, fifty metres above ground. What should I do with this curious child?
translation: 当我去勘察[From.Location.GetName]最高的塔楼的受灾状况时，突然看到[From.GetFirstName]的头露出了窗外，这孩子距离地面足足有五十米！我对这个淘气的孩子该怎么办？
不过是淘气而已，又不要命

original: Strictly forbid [From.GetHerHim] to climb the tower
[From.GetFirstName]'s fever has risen and [From.GetSheHe] complains about a headache. I worry about [From.GetHerHim] but there's not much I can do.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]的体温越来越高而且[From.GetSheHe]还向我抱怨头疼。我很担心[From.GetHerHim]但是我什么都做不了。

original: This is a sign of sin, make the child fast to atone for its sins!
translation: 孩子这是你在赎清你身上罪孽的表现！

original: A doctor might be able to cure [From.GetFirstName]
Only God decides over life and death
translation: 只有上帝才能决定生死

original: Every time [From.GetFirstName] looks at that [From.GetManWoman], I get a sinking feeling in my stomach. [From.GetSheHeCap] might be attracted to persons of the same sex as [From.GetSheHe]!
translation: 每次[From.GetFirstName]看到那个[From.GetManWoman]的时候，我都会按捺住我的心情。[From.GetSheHeCap]也许被和[From.GetSheHe]同一性别的人所吸引！

original: Make [From.GetFirstName] fast to atone for its sins
Try to beat it out of [From.GetHerHim]
The twists and turns of [From.GetFirstName]'s tongue and the white lies [From.GetSheHe] uses to make friends is making my head spin. How can such a young [From.GetLadLass] be able to lie so well?
translation: [From.GetFirstName]用花言巧语和各种善意谎言来交朋友，[From.GetSheHe]的行为让我感到迷惑。这个年轻的[From.GetLadLass]怎么那么能说谎呢？

original: No matter, the goal justifies the means
translation: 没关系，达到目的就可以了

original: [From.GetFirstName], your tongue will cause you problems!
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has become Trusting. This may not be the most beneficial for [FromFrom.GetHerHim] in the long run.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]变得容易轻信他人。这对[FromFrom.GetHerHim]将来的人生也许不太好。

original: It is clear that all other people are friendly and want my best. I've gained the §YTrusting§! trait.
translation: 大家都很友善而且都希望我能做得更好。我获得了§Y轻信他人§!特质。

original: It seems that [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has become Slothful.
Everything seems so hard to do, not really worth the effort. I've gained the §YSlothful§! trait.
translation: 所有的事情都那么难，而且都不值得我去尽全力去做。我获得了§Y懒惰§!特质。

original: Sadly, [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has become Greedy. I guess I have to keep checking my purse everyday now.
translation: 真可悲，[FromFrom.GetFirstName]变得很贪婪。我觉得从今以后我要经常检查我的钱包了。

original: I want it all, and I want it now! I've gained the §YGreedy§! trait.
translation: 我什么都想要，我现在就想要！我获得了§Y贪婪§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has started to stutter. This may turn out slightly embarrassing for [FromFrom.GetHerHim] in the future.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]说话开始变得结结巴巴。这也许会对[FromFrom.GetHerHim]的人生产生些小麻烦。

original: I can't speak properly, I've gained the §YStutter§! trait.
translation: 我无法流利地说话，我获得了§Y口吃§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] is exhibiting a severe anger constantly. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Wroth trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]变得十分易怒。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了易怒特质。

original: Everything frustrates me! I've gained the §YWroth§! trait.
translation: 什么都能激怒我！我获得了§Y易怒§!特质。

original: I do not seem to be able to trust [FromFrom.GetFirstName] anymore. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Deceitful trait.
translation: 我觉得我不能再继续相信[FromFrom.GetFirstName]。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了狡诈特质。

original: People are such gullible fools! I've gained the §YDeceitful§! trait.
translation: 人们都是些容易上当的傻瓜！我获得了§Y狡诈§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to work so hard when [FromFrom.GetSheHe] needs something done. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Diligent trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]在[FromFrom.GetSheHe]完成任务的时候都会十分努力。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了勤奋特质。

original: Hard work is always needed to achieve something in life. I've gained the §YDiligent§! trait.
translation: 要想获得成功，必须努力工作。我获得了§Y勤奋§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems almost afraid of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] shadow. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Craven trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]看起来很害怕[FromFrom.GetHerHis]影子。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了怯懦特质。

original: The world is such a scary place. I've gained the §YCraven§! trait.
translation: 这个世界太恐怖了。我获得了§Y怯懦§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to not believe anything anyone says. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Cynical trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]不相信任何人的说辞。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了愤世嫉俗特质。

original: The world is such a big lie. I've gained the §YCynical§! trait.
translation: 这个世界中充满了谎言。我获得了§Y愤世嫉俗§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to enjoy watching others in pain. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Cruel trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]看起来很喜欢他人痛苦的样子。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了残暴特质。

original: I like seeing other people cry. I've gained the §YCruel§! trait.
translation: 我喜欢看别人受苦，听他们的哭声。我获得了§Y残暴§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems so modest and polite. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Humble trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]是那么的谦虚有礼。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了谦卑特质。

original: Everyone deserves respect, and I will give it to them. I've gained the §YHumble§! trait.
translation: 所有的人都值得我尊重。我获得了§Y谦卑§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] is definitely sure of [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself]. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Proud trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]变得对[FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself]过于自信。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了骄傲特质。

original: I know that I am great and deserve respect. I've gained the §YProud§! trait.
translation: 我应得到所有人的尊重。我获得了§Y骄傲§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] speaks the truth whenever possible, and never seems to lie. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Honest trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]总是会将真相告诉别人，并且从来不说假话。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了诚实特质。

original: Telling lies just seems so wrong. I have gained the §YHonest§! trait.
translation: 说假话是不对的！我获得了§Y诚实§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to be quiet and not asserting [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself]. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Shy trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]总是很安静并且从来不发言维护[FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself]。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了害羞特质。

original: I'm always awkward talking to the people.. I have gained the §YShy§! trait.
translation: 我总是不能鼓起勇气和别人交流。我获得了§Y害羞§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to be taking [FromFrom.GetHerHis] time when taking decisions. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Patient trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]在做决定的时候总是会花费[FromFrom.GetHerHis]大量时间做判断。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了耐心特质。

original: Rushing into action seems foolish. I have gained the §YPatient§! trait.
translation: 急于下手去做乃是愚行。我获得了§Y耐心§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to be getting along with everyone. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Gregarious trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]看起来很喜欢和别人呆在一起。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了合群特质。

original: Talking to people, and getting to know them is something I really like. I have gained the §YGregarious§! trait.
translation: 我很喜欢和别人聊天并了解他们。我获得了§Y合群§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] doesn't really understand the concept of rules and laws. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Arbitrary trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]看起来不是很理解法律和规矩的意义。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了专断特质。

original: Do I have to abide by laws and rules? My whim sounds more interesting. I have gained the §YArbitrary§! trait.
translation: 法律和规矩算什么，我的想法才是真有意思的呢。我获得了§Y专断§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to take a great interest in fair rules and true justice. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Just trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]变得对公平规则以及正义的法律很感兴趣。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了正直特质。

original: Treating people fairly and providing justice is my duty. I have gained the §YJust§! trait.
translation: 予世间以公平与正义乃是吾人之义务。我获得了§Y正直§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to treat everyone nicely. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Kind trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]总是能善待他人。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了仁慈特质。

original: Treating people nicely feels good. I have gained the §YKind§! trait.
translation: 善待他人使我感到十分快乐。我获得了§Y仁慈§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has become a true believer and want to follow the faith. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Zealous trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]开始变成一位真正的信徒并愿全心全意追随信仰。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了狂热特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to have no fears at all. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Brave trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]从不畏惧任何事情。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了勇敢特质。

original: There is nothing to fear, but fear itself. I've gained the §YBrave§! trait.
translation: 除了恐惧本身，没什么值得恐惧的。我获得了§Y勇敢§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] always seems to covet what others have. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Envious trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]总是想得到别人的东西。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了嫉妒特质。

original: Others have things that I should have been given. I've gained the §YEnvious§! trait.
translation: 别人有的东西我也应该有！我获得了§Y嫉妒§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to constantly spend time with the opposite sex. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Lustful trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]总是花大量的时间在异性身上。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了色欲特质。

original: Life spent in the arms of another, is a life spent well. I've gained the §YLustful§! trait.
translation: 美好的生活总是存在于恋人的怀中。我获得了§Y色欲§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] always gives freely to everyone that has a need or want.. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Charitable trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]总是免费地给别人东西。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了慷慨特质。

original: I have lots of things, and giving my surplus to others is a good deed. I've gained the §YCharitable§! trait.
translation: 把多余的东西和别人分享是个好主意。我获得了§Y慷慨§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] does not seem to like physical contact with other people. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Chaste trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]似乎不喜欢跟别人有肉体上的交流。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了忠贞特质。

original: I don't feel comfortable touching other human beings. I've gained the §YChaste§! trait.
translation: 我不想接触其他人的肉体。我获得了§Y忠贞§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] does not seem to trust ANYONE! [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Paranoid trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]似乎不信任任何人！[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了多疑特质。

original: They are out to get me! I've gained the §YParanoid§! trait.
translation: 他们都想害我！我获得了§Y多疑§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to always be moderate, and never does anything to excess. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Temperate trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]做事总是恰到好处，从不过分。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了温和特质。

original: Moderation is the key! I've gained the §YTemperate§! trait.
translation: 适度乃是人生的金钥匙！我获得了§Y温和§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to never be satisfied, and just gorges [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself] on food and drink. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Gluttonous trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]看起来从不满足，并把[FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself]用食物和饮料塞饱。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了暴食特质。

original: There is nothing better than just eating and drinking! I've gained the §YGluttonous§! trait.
translation: 吃喝乃是人生之乐！我获得了§Y暴食§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] sets great goals for [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself], and works hard at reaching them. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Ambitious trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]为[FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself]设立了一个远大理想，并且为此努力奋斗。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了野心勃勃特质。

original: I deserve good things, and I will work to get them! I've gained the §YAmbitious§! trait.
translation: 为了得到我应得的目标，我会为之努力！我获得了§Y野心勃勃§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems satisfied with what [FromFrom.GetSheHe] has. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Content trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]看起来很满足于[FromFrom.GetSheHe]已经拥有的事物。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了安于现状特质。

original: I am perfectly happy with the way things are. I've gained the §YContent§! trait.
translation: 我为我已有的一切而感到高兴。我获得了§Y安于现状§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has been severely injured. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Wounded trait.
I have been injured badly. I've gained the §YWounded§! trait.
translation: 我这次受伤太严重了，我获得了§Y受伤§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has been crippled for life. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Maimed trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]只能以瘸子的身份终老了。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了残废特质。

original: I have been crippled for life. I've gained the §YMaimed§! trait.
translation: 我的腿彻底断了。我获得了§Y残废§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] worries too much over things [FromFrom.GetSheHe] cannot influence. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Stressed trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]总是为[FromFrom.GetSheHe]没法办的事情而忧心忡忡。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了紧张不安特质。

original: There are too many things to do, too many things that worries me. I have gained the §YStressed§! trait.
translation: 怎么有那么多事情要做，有那么多事情要烦？我获得了§Y紧张不安§!特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has been cured from [FromFrom.GetHerHis] illness! [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has lost the Ill trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]，[FromFrom.GetHerHis]病治好了！[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]失去了身患疾病特质。

original: I have been cured from my illness! I have lost the §YIll§! trait.
translation: 我的病治好了！我失去了§Y身患疾病§!特质。

original: My body is sapless and feeble. I have gained the §YInfirm§! trait.
translation: 我浑身虚弱无力。我获得了§Y体弱多病§!特质。

original: The temptations and desires of the body no longer holds me down. I have gained the Celibate trait.
translation: 欲望不再侵扰我的心灵，我获得了独身主义特质

original: For too long I have pandered to my lustful yearning, Jesus tells me it is a mortal sin, I must stop it now.
translation: 我沉湎于我的欲望太久了，我主耶稣教导我们这是罪！我不会再这样下去了。

original: The life of virtuous is not easy, but Jesus commands me to resist the carnal urges.
translation: 践行美德着实不易，但我主耶稣教导我们要全力抵御世俗的诱惑。

original: I hear him admonish me, I should not be eating for the sole motive of sensual gratification. I must stop.
translation: 我听见他的旨意了，我不应该这样暴食饕餮下去了。

original: The road to heaven is hard and demanding. Jesus tells me I must be self controlled and disciplined.
translation: 通往天堂的路是那么的艰苦，但我主耶稣教导我一定要抵御住诱惑。

original: I try to justify it to him, but I know I lie not just to him, but to myself. I condemned things eternal for the sake of temporal things.
translation: 我试着证明我的想法给他看，但是我知道这是自欺欺人。我总是为这些蜗角琐事而争。

original: I feel the love of God infuse my soul. Jesus tells me it is only way to truly glorify God.
translation: 我感到我的灵魂中充满了主的爱。救主耶稣教导我这才是通向天国的正道。

original: There was a Lion without, I though I would be slain in the Streets, but then the Lion said unto me let go your slothful ways and I realized who the Lion was.
translation: 那里有一只狮子，我想当街将其杀死，突然那只狮子开口对我说「让你的懒惰离你而去！」 我突然意识到那只狮子是谁了。

original: I will do as I was commanded
I hear him whispering to me, that it is for me to glory God, not to leave it unto others. I shall do thus and be more diligent in my tasks.
translation: 我听见他在我耳边轻语，告诉我这是尊奉光荣的主的秘密。我应该变得更加勤勉。

original: I finally stand before the destination of the crusade. With sword in hand I am ready to storm the walls of [Root.Location.GetName]!
translation: 我终于站在了我们远征的目的地前，手持长剑的我已经准备好攻入[Root.Location.GetName]城内了！

original: May the enemies of God tremble!
Fighting the infidels has brought out the warrior in me!
translation: 与异教徒的战斗使我勇猛异常！

original: How can God let the infidels defeat us...?
translation: 神怎会让他的子民战败……？
我觉得我的宗教狂热日益褪色……

original: The target of our crusade, the [From.County.GetFullName], has finally fallen to our mighty arms and the wrath of God!
translation: 我们远征的目标，[From.County.GetFullName]终于在我们的刀剑与上帝的愤怒之下陷落了！

original:
Good news! My brave knights have captured the target of the crusade, [From.Location.GetName]!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
好消息！我们勇敢的骑士们终于占领了远征的目的地，[From.Location.GetName]！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Pillaging through the ruins of a temple in Jerusalem I stumbled across the pieces of a very old lance...
translation: 在洗劫耶路撒冷一座神殿的废墟的时候，我被一个非常古旧的枪头绊倒了……

original: I must have found the Holy Lance!
translation: 我肯定是找到了传说中的圣枪！

original: Prying open a tomb in Caesarea that had been sealed for centuries, I found a very old wooden chalice...
translation: 在探索一座凯撒利亚的几百年前的古墓时候，我找到了一个古老的木杯……

original: Could it be... the Holy Grail!
Jerusalem is finally ours after a horrific siege. Entering the city we rode in the blood of the infidels up to the knees of our horses.
translation: 在残酷的围攻战后，耶路撒冷终于落入我等手中。城中血流遍地，深及马膝。

original: I have lost the siege of [From.GetName] and let the infidels take back the very target of our crusade.
translation: 我们输掉了[From.GetName]围攻战，我们的远征目标城市又被异教徒夺去了。

original: How will I live with the shame...

I regret to inform you that we have lost the target of the crusade, [From.Location.GetName]...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我很遗憾地告知您，我们丢掉了这次远征的目标城市，[From.Location.GetName]……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]
投降的日子越来越近了。

original: They will be back in greater numbers.
The fortress of the infidel has not fallen. It's up to me to lead the charge for God, Jesus and the Holy Ghost!
translation: 异教徒的堡垒依然没有陷落。我现在要以圣父、圣子、圣神的名义带领士兵们发起一次冲锋！

original: The enemy is near and I know what is ahead. Today would be a good day to die!
translation: 敌人越来越近，我已知晓了的命运，舍生取义就在今朝！

original: Lead the assault from the first line
Order the assault to commence, while staying behind
It rankles me that my liege, [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], has vassals who should rightfully be mine.
translation: 我的领主[This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]，手下有一名封臣，但他本应是臣服于我的，这让我怨恨不已。

original: My vassal, [From.GetTitledName], has requested that a lower rank vassal should serve [From.GetObjectPronoun] rather than me directly...
translation: 我的封臣，[From.GetTitledName]，向我申述一名我的一名低级封臣本应是[From.GetObjectPronoun]的属下……

original: I like my other vassal better
translation: 我觉得我更喜欢另外一名封臣。

original: My Liege, [From.GetTitledName], has decreed that henceforth I am a vassal of [FromFrom.GetTitledName]'s.
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledName]，宣布从今以后我将成为[FromFrom.GetTitledName]的封臣。

original: My Liege, [From.GetTitledName], has denied my request to make my rightful vassal mine.
translation: 我的领主，[From.GetTitledName]，拒绝了我关于收回我的封臣的请求。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has not answered my request to transfer a vassal. This bodes ill.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]并没有回应我关于归还我封臣的请求，这不是个好兆头。

original:
My dear friend and vassal!

You are a bedrock of loyalty, the cornerstone of the realm! Truly, there is support for your claim in [From.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I know that [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will reward you in time!

[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我亲爱的朋友和爱卿！

你是忠诚的基石，王国的柱石！真的，这里支持你对[From.Religion.GetScriptureName]的主张。我知道[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]将及时回报你。

[From.GetTitledName]
我的领主真是万世明君！

original: My Liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName], has justly agreed to my request. [From.GetTitledName] is now my vassal!
translation: 我的领主，[Root.Liege.GetTitledName]，同意了我的要求。[From.GetTitledName]现在是我的封臣了！

original: It seems [FromFrom.GetTitledName] wanted to become my new liege, but [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has chosen to give me a claim on [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] instead!
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledName]好像想成为我的新领主，但[Root.Liege.GetTitledName]决定给予我[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]的宣称权！

original: The late nights, the way [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has stopped touching me or even looking at me, the rumors about [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and a courtier being lovers... There is no doubt in my mind, [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has an affair with that courtier!
translation: 天色已晚，[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]已经很长时间没碰过我了，甚至看都不看我一眼，有传言指[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]已经移情别恋于一名廷臣……我的心中不再疑惑，[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]肯定在和那个廷臣私通！

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is confronted by [Root.GetFirstName] about the affair
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]被[Root.GetFirstName]要求为私通之事当面对质
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]被[Root.GetFirstName]要求为私通之事当面对质

original: Discretion is key to a successful love affair, but we had apparently not been as discreet as we should've been. [From.GetFirstName] somehow found out about me and my lover and confronted me about it, demanding I would break it up.
translation: 谨慎乃是偷情之要义，但很显然我们的私情败露了。[From.GetFirstName]不知怎地发现了我和那个人的私情并要为此当面对质，要求我们到此为止。

original: You don't understand our relationship, we are in love...
translation: 你根本不懂我们之间的爱情！

original: I will break it up, but always remember: you forced me to do it
translation: 我会分手的，但你给我记住：是你逼我的

original: I was confronted about my love affair with [From.GetFirstName]'s [From.Spouse.GetManWoman] [From.Spouse.GetFirstName] by [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetHerselfHimself].
translation: 我因与[From.GetFirstName]的[From.Spouse.GetManWoman][From.Spouse.GetFirstName]私通一事而被[From.GetFirstName][From.GetHerselfHimself]当面对质。

original: Fine, I'll stop my love affair with [From.Spouse.GetFirstName]!
translation: 好的，我会让我和[From.Spouse.GetFirstName]之间的私情告一段落！

original: I will claw your eyes out!
translation: 我要把你的眼珠抠出来！

original: Your interference will cost you dearly!
translation: 我会让你为干涉我们付出惨重代价！

original: [From.GetFirstName] attacked me when I confronted [From.GetHerHim] about [From.GetHerHis] love affair with my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]!
translation: 当我与[From.GetFirstName]对质的时候，[From.GetHerHim]攻击了我，冲突的起因是我的[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]和[From.GetHerHis]情事！

original: Several days after my confrontation with [From.GetFirstName] I was attacked by someone who managed to injure me and disappear before I even started to feel the pain. I collapsed to the floor and that was where [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] found me, with blood gushing from the wound.
translation: 在我与[From.GetFirstName]发生冲突几天之后，我被人袭击，在我感到疼痛之前袭击者就跑掉了。我倒在地板上，[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]在那里发现我的时候，我的鲜血一直在从伤口处往外涌。

original: The wound forced me to bed for several days
translation: 伤势迫使我在床上躺了好几天

original: My lover is ill and I feel that there is something I should do to ease my lover's pain.
translation: 我的情人生病了，我想我应该做些什么来缓解我的情人的痛苦。

original: I will stay at my lover's bed and take good care of him myself
translation: 我会亲自呆在我的情人的床边细心照顾他

original: I will pay the best physician to cure my lover
translation: 我会付钱给最好的医生让他给我的情人治疗

original: I will stay at my lover's bed and take good care of her myself
translation: 我会亲自呆在我的情人的床边细心照顾她

original: The cruel wound on my lover's beautiful body had already started to fester.
translation: 在我的情人的美丽身躯上的残忍伤口已经开始感染了。

original: I will take care of you until the wound has healed
translation: 我会一直照顾你直到你的伤口痊愈

original: I will pay the best physician to cure you, my lover
translation: 我会付钱给最好的医生让他给我的情人治疗

original: This is not worth my time
There are members of our dynasty that hold land, but have no children that can continue their legacy. I'm more than fit enough to get part of that inheritance.
translation: 我们家族中有的人拥有土地但是没有儿女继承。我拥有充足的理由索取一部分继承权。

original: I deserve a claim on a title!
translation: 我应当拥有一个头衔的宣称权！

original: Will look at your demands for a claim.
translation: 将会考虑你对头衔的宣称权。

original: Will evaluate your need for a title.
translation: 会评估你对头衔的索取。

original: [From.GetBestName] is asking for a claim on one of our titles, as [From.GetSheHe] believes that [From.GetSheHe] is entitled to part of our inheritance early.
translation: [From.GetBestName]要求拥有我们一项头衔的宣称权，因为[From.GetSheHe]认为[From.GetSheHe]早先被赋予了继承我们一部分遗产的资格。
承认[From.GetHerHim]拥有合法的宣称权。

original: [From.GetBestName] believes that [From.GetSheHe] should be granted a title from us, due to [From.GetHerHis] competence, and the worry that we are childless.
translation: [From.GetBestName]认为凭借着[From.GetHerHis]资格以及对我们没有儿女的担心，[From.GetSheHe]应该被承认有继承我们的一项头衔的资格。

original: I have a claim on a title, and it should rightfully be mine.
translation: 我拥有一项头衔的宣称权，它理所当然地属于我。

original: Ask our liege to fight for our land!
translation: 请求我们的领主为了我的土地开战！

original: There are rulers in the world who are sadly neglecting the laws that Jesus himself gave to the Holy Church.
translation: 有的统治者无视耶稣基督赐予圣教会的法规。

original: Invite them to follow the true doctrines
translation: 要求他们遵从真正的教义

original: The Pope is upset with our law of Free Investiture. The Holy Father is asking us to change it to comply with Church Doctrine.
translation: 教宗对我们的自主神职叙任权感到不满，圣父教宗要求我们将它改为教宗叙任权以符合教会信条。

original: We always follow the divine will.
Some gold to the church will silence them.
translation: 送给教会一些金子就能让他们闭嘴。
以神学理论为基础拒绝

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has accepted God's will, and is now allowing Papal appointments of Bishops.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]接受了上帝的旨意，允许教宗任免主教。

original: The Devil is acting through [From.GetTitledFirstName]. That can be the only reason for [From.GetHerHis] stubborn refusal of God's will.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]被魔鬼附体了。这是因为[From.GetHerHis]顽固的拒绝了上帝意志。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent donations to the Church. This will be needed for the holy work.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]向教会送来了捐款，这将对神圣的事业大有裨益。

original: We can wait for [From.GetHerHim] to change the laws.
translation: 我们可以给[From.GetHerHim]一段时间更改法律.

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has argued convincingly, on theological grounds, why [From.GetHerHis] realm should be exempt from Papal Law.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]以神学理论为基础提出了令人信服的主张，为什么[From.GetHerHis]领土上不适用教宗的法律。

original: The Kings and Emperors refuse to follow the Law of God. It is up to the servants of Christ to rectify this.
translation: 这些国王和皇帝拒绝遵从主的法则。基督的仆从们有责任纠正这点。

original: Demand allegiance to the Throne of St. Peter
translation: 要求向圣伯多禄的宗座效忠

original: will listen to the demands of The Holy Father
translation: 将会听从圣父教宗的命令

original: Our mortal liege will hear of this.
translation: 我们的世俗领主会听说这件事.

original: An emissary is visiting us from the Papacy, giving us gifts and demanding our allegiance to the Throne of St. Peter
translation: 教宗派来一名密使造访我们，送给我们礼物并要求我们效忠圣彼得之座
我的领主就是我的主宰

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been approached by the Pope, and is clearly disregarding our lawful rights.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]收到了教宗的旨意，但显然无视我们的合法权利。

original: Will no one rid me of this turbulent priest?
translation: 就没人能帮我赶走这个烦人的神父吗？

original: The Kings and Emperors refuse to follow the Law of God. However, any nobleman anointed by God's servants can become a rightful King.
translation: 这些国王和皇帝拒绝遵从上帝的法规。但是任何由神的仆人受膏的贵族都可以成为合法的国王。

original: Grant the vassal a legal claim to the title.
translation: 给予封臣这顶头衔的合法的宣称权。

original: The Holy Father is asking us to replace our liege, and is giving us the divine right to do so.
translation: 圣父教宗要求我们更换我们的领主，并且赐予我们这样做的神圣权利。

original: I am loyal to my liege!
Our Liege will hear of this.
translation: 我们的领主会听说这件事的。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is a rebel and a traitor. The false sweet words of the false pope has swayed [From.GetHerHim].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]是一个叛徒.[From.GetHerHim]被教宗满嘴的谎言和甜言蜜语操纵了.

original: And we can't do anything about it...
translation: 而且我们对这种情况毫无办法……

original: They have not stolen any of my property yet
translation: 但是他们还没有偷窃我的任何财产

original: Thanks to my wise Stewardship of §Y[Root.GetName]§!, the local Thieves' Guild has been eradicated.
translation: 我在§Y[Root.GetName]§!实行的精明治理使得本地的窃贼行会被连根拔起。

original: It is good to be the [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]!
I don't see how this matters to me?
translation: 我看不到这对我有什么坏处。

original: Thanks to my great diplomatic skill, the Smugglers' Ring in §Y[Root.GetName]§! has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike outside the city gates.
translation: 由于我杰出的外交手段，§Y[Root.GetName]§!的走私集团已经被摧毁了。最后一名走私者的首级悬挂在城门外的矛尖上，已经开始腐烂了。

original: I am safe inside my walls..
translation: 我躲在城墙里面很安全……

original: With my great Martial ability, I have rounded up and executed the robber bands that were plaguing §Y[Root.GetName]§!!
translation: 由于我出色的军事能力，我已经逮捕并处决了这伙祸害 §Y[Root.GetName]§!的强盗！

original: A group of Hedge Knights have come to visit [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] has met with them, and ask for my reply.
translation: 一伙雇佣骑士前来拜访[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]。[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]已经同他们会面，并问我如何答复。

original: Welcome them with a lavish feast!
translation: 用丰盛的宴会欢迎他们！

original: Pay for some medication, and send them on their way.
translation: 给些钱作为补偿，然后送走他们

original: Allow them to stay at the castle while he recovers.
translation: 允许他们留在城堡里直到康复。

original: A young hedge knight has distinguished himself quite nicely in the time he has been at our castle.
translation: 一名年轻的骑士在他停留在我们的城堡期间，表现出了十分出众的能力。

original: A member of our court has taken great offense at the behavior of the rough uncut hedge knights visiting our castle. He almost demands that we should execute the vagrants.
translation: 我们廷臣中的一员对这些来访的雇佣骑士粗鲁无礼的行为感觉受到极大的冒犯，他几乎要求我们处决这些流浪者。

original: Throw the hedge knights out of the castle!
translation: 把这些雇佣骑士赶出城堡！

original: A young woman has been seduced by one of the hedge knights. This seems to have some unforeseen consequences.
translation: 一位年轻的女人和一个雇佣骑士勾搭上了，谁都不知道后果会如何。

original: Let them both stay at court.
translation: 让他们两人呆在营地里.

original: The dungeon is a nice place for that 'knight'.
translation: 地牢对这个骑士来说是个好地方.

original: The hedge knights are ready to depart our castle and ride forth to another lord's domain.
translation: 这些雇佣骑士已经准备好离开我们的城堡并向另一位领主的领地进发.

original: [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] has arrested an armed man with ragged armor and a spotty horse. [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHeCap] says that the man claims to be a hedge knight, but clearly does not believe that statement.
translation: [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]逮捕了一位穿着破烂盔甲骑着劣马的武装分子。[Root.job_marshal.GetSheHeCap]说这个男人自称是一位雇佣骑士，但是这显然不可信。
下命令释放这个雇佣骑士.

original: A famous writer proposes to compose your family chronicles.
translation: 一位著名的作家计划为您的家族写一本编年史。

original: That is her interest, not mine.
translation: 那是她的兴趣，不是我的。

original: These are books created by Satan!
translation: 这些都是撒旦创造的邪说秽书！

original: The church wants to organize a Miracle play for a local saint in our demesne. They seem to feel that it should fall on our shoulders to pay for it.
translation: 教会想要为我们领地的一位当地的圣人组织一场圣迹剧表演。他们看起来想让我们为此付钱。

original: It is for the glory of God!
If the Church wants it, the Church pays for it..
translation: 如果教会想要，就自己付钱……

original: Peasants from the local countryside have sent a representative to petition for our support for one of their traditional carnivals.
translation: 当地乡村的农民派来一位代表为他们传统的狂欢节寻求我们的帮助。

original: A young talented artist from [Root.Location.GetName] proposes to paint an iconic portrait of [Root.Father.GetBestName].
translation: 来自[Root.Location.GetName]的一名年轻天才艺术家提出为[Root.Father.GetBestName]画一幅肖像。

original: This will be grand in the main hall.
translation: 这会让我们的主厅变得富丽堂皇。

original: This is a waste of money.
Luxury clothes are trendy at the moment. What about keeping your courtiers busy by changing the fashion at court?
translation: 奢侈的服饰是现在所流行的。通过不断更换宫廷里的时装来让你的廷臣们保持忙碌怎么样？

original: Introduce a new fashion at the court
translation: 在宫廷中引进一种新的时尚

original: There are better ways of spending the taxes
translation: 税收应该用在更好的地方

original: My trusted and devoted chamberlain just brought to my attention that one of the serving maids have given birth to a child. According to him, my son is the father.
translation: 我所信任的忠实管家刚刚告知我的一位侍女生下了一个孩子。根据他的说法，这是我儿子的种。

original: Force him to adopt the child to prevent scandal
translation: 强迫他收养这个孩子以避免丑闻

original: Give him a beating for messing with inferiors
translation: 因为他和下人乱搞而揍他一顿

original: Send him to confess his sins!
My beloved wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is constantly bored and keeps talking about the new fashion she has heard about. Now she wants me to introduce it at court...
translation: 我亲爱的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]经常感到无聊，并且总是谈论她听说的新时尚。现在她想让我在宫廷里引进这种时尚……

original: My money is your money, darling
translation: 我的钱就是你的钱，吾爱

original: Vanity is a sin, let's go to the church instead
translation: 虚荣是一种罪，我们还是去教堂吧

original: This is my money you're talking about
translation: 你现在在谈的是我的钱

original: I will consider introducing new fashion at the court.
translation: 我会考虑在宫廷里引进一种新的时尚。

original: A famous herald, well versed in the diplomatic protocol, has arrived at our court. He is proposing his services to us, and our chamberlain is saying that we can make good use of this man.
translation: 一位著名的纹章官来到我们的宫廷，他十分精通外交礼仪。他想为我们服务，而且我们的外交总管说我们可以好好利用这个人。

original: I can always use more men.
Another mouth to feed is not what I need.
A destitute noble from a former enemy court asks for permanent hospitality.
translation: 一位来自前敌人的宫廷的贫穷贵族要求永久居留权。

original: Tell him he can only stay for the night.
translation: 告诉他只能停留一个晚上。

original: I have been reading 'Ars Moriendi', and it claims that death is not something a true Christian should be afraid of.
translation: 我在读《死亡的艺术》这本书，它主张一个真正的基督徒不应该害怕死亡。

original: Forgive me father, for I have sinned.
translation: 上帝，请宽恕我，因为我已染上罪。

original: I am just a poor sinner...
translation: 我只是一名可怜的罪人……

original: To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The county of Archa seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.
translation: 为了保护圣地抵御异教徒，我们需要在那里建设一些城堡。阿尔卡似乎是一个很好的选择。我该寻求那里的伯爵批准。

original: I will write a letter at once.

To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights of St. John ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Archa.
translation: 致伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，\n您的睿智和仁慈已经成了传奇。圣若翰骑士团请求您在我们与对抗异教徒的圣战中伸出援手。为了战事的顺利进展，我们谦卑的向您寻求在阿尔卡建造一座新城堡的许可。

original: No religious orders in my territory!
translation: 我的领土内不允许任何宗教骑士团！

original: The Knights of St. John have erected the castle of Krak des Chevaliers in [Root.GetName].
translation: 圣若翰骑士团已经在[Root.GetName]建立起了骑士堡。

original: Let it be known to the world!

The Knights of St. John have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as Krak des Chevaliers.
translation: 圣若翰骑士团在[From.County.GetFullName]建立起了一座新的建筑，在那里建造的许可是由贵族[FromFrom.GetTitledName]提供的。从今以后，这座坚不可摧的城堡将被世人称作「骑士堡」。

original: I really am a good Christian

To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The county of Tortosa seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.
translation: 为了保护圣地抵御异教徒，我们需要在那里建设一些城堡。托尔托萨似乎是一个很好的选择。我该寻求那里的伯爵批准。

original: To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights of St. John ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Tortosa.
translation: 致伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，\n您的睿智和仁慈已经成了传奇。圣若翰骑士团请求您在我们与对抗异教徒的圣战中伸出援手。为了战事的顺利进展，我们谦卑的向您寻求在托尔托萨建造一座新城堡的许可。

original: The Knights of St. John have erected the castle of Margat in [Root.GetName].
translation: 圣若翰骑士团已经在[Root.GetName]建立起了马加特堡。

original: The Knights of St. John have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as Margat.
translation: 圣若翰骑士团在[From.County.GetFullName]建立起了一座新的建筑.在那里建造的许可是由贵族[FromFrom.GetTitledName]提供的。从今以后，他们坚不可摧的城堡将被称作「马加特」。

original: To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The county of Safed seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.
translation: 为了保护圣地抵御异教徒，我们需要在那里建设一些城堡。采法特似乎是一个很好的选择。我该寻求那里的伯爵批准。

original: To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights of St. John ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Safed.
translation: 致伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，\n您的睿智和仁慈已经成了传奇。圣若翰骑士团请求您在我们与对抗异教徒的圣战中伸出援手。为了战事的顺利进展，我们谦卑的向您寻求在采法特建造一座新城堡的许可。

original: The Knights of St. John have erected the castle of Belvoir in [Root.GetName].
translation: 圣若翰骑士团已经在[Root.GetName]建立起了贝尔沃堡。

original: The Knights of St. John have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as Belvoir.
translation: 圣若翰骑士团在[From.County.GetFullName]建立起了一座新的建筑.在那里建造的许可是由贵族[FromFrom.GetTitledName]提供的。从今以后，他们坚不可摧的城堡将被称作「贝尔沃堡」。

original: To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The county of Hebron seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.
translation: 为了保护圣地抵御异教徒，我们需要在那里建设一些城堡。希伯伦似乎是一个很好的选择。我该寻求那里的伯爵批准。

original: To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights of St. John ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Hebron.
translation: 致伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，\n您的睿智和仁慈已经成了传奇。圣若翰骑士团请求您在对抗异教徒的圣战中伸出援手。为了有助于我们的战斗，我们谦卑地寻求在希伯伦建造一座新城堡的许可。

original: The Knights of St. John have erected the castle of Beth Gibelin in [Root.GetName].
translation: 圣若翰骑士团已经在[Root.GetName]建立起了贝特吉伯兰城堡。

original: The Knights of St. John have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as Beth Gibelin.
translation: 圣若翰骑士团在[From.County.GetFullName]建立起了一座新的建筑。从贵族[FromFrom.GetTitledName]获得建造许可。从今以后，他们强大的城堡将被称作贝特吉伯兰城堡。

original: To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The county of Jaffa seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.
translation: 为了保护圣地抵御异教徒，我们需要在那里建设一些城堡。雅法似乎是一个很好的选择。我该寻求那里的伯爵批准。

original: To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights Templar ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Jaffa.
translation: 致伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，\n您的睿智和仁慈已经成了传奇。圣殿骑士团请求您在对抗异教徒的圣战中伸出援手。为了有助于我们的战斗，我们谦卑地寻求在雅法建造一座新城堡的许可。

original: The Knights Templar have erected the castle of Beit Dejan in [Root.GetName].
translation: 圣殿骑士团已经在[Root.GetName]建立起了贝特达甘城堡。

original: The Knights Templar have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as Beit Dejan.
translation: 圣殿骑士团在[From.County.GetFullName]建立起了一座新的建筑。从贵族[FromFrom.GetTitledName]获得建造许可。从今以后，他们强大的城堡将被称作贝特达甘城堡。

original: To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The county of Tyrus seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.
translation: 为了保护圣地抵御异教徒，我们需要在那里建设一些城堡。推罗似乎是一个很好的选择。我该寻求那里的伯爵批准。

original: To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights Templar ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Tyrus.
translation: 致伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，\n您的睿智和仁慈已经成了传奇。圣殿骑士团请求您在对抗异教徒的圣战中伸出援手。为了有助于我们的战斗，我们谦卑的寻求在推罗建造一座新城堡的许可。

original: The Knights Templar have erected the castle of Belfort in [Root.GetName].
translation: 圣殿骑士团已经在[Root.GetName]建立起了贝尔福城堡。

original: The Knights Templar have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as Belfort.
translation: 圣殿骑士团在[From.County.GetFullName]建立起了一座新的建筑。从贵族[FromFrom.GetTitledName]获得建造许可。从今以后，他们强大的城堡将被称作贝尔福城堡。

original: To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The county of Acre seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.
translation: 为了保护圣地抵御异教徒，我们需要在那里建设一些城堡。阿克似乎是一个很好的选择。我该寻求那里的伯爵批准。

original: To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights Templar ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Acre.
translation: 致伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，\n您的睿智和仁慈已经成了传奇。圣殿骑士团请求您在对抗异教徒的圣战中伸出援手。为了有助于我们的战斗，我们谦卑地寻求在阿克建造一座新城堡的许可。

original: The Knights Templar have erected the castle of Athlith in [Root.GetName].
translation: 圣殿骑士团已经在[Root.GetName]建立起了阿特利特城堡。

original: The Knights Templar have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as Athlith.
translation: 圣殿骑士团在[From.County.GetFullName]建立起了一座新的建筑。从贵族[FromFrom.GetTitledName]那里获得了建造许可。从今以后，他们强大的城堡将被称作阿特利特城堡。

original: To help defend the Holy Land from the infidels, our order should establish castles there. The county of Tiberias seems like a good candidate for this. I should ask the ruling Count there for permission.
translation: 为了保护圣地抵御异教徒，我们需要在那里建设一些城堡。太巴列似乎是一个很好的选择。我该寻求那里的伯爵批准。

original: To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Knights Templar ask for your help in the Holy War against the infidels. To assist us in our struggle we humbly ask permission to establish a new castle in the County of Tiberias.
translation: 致伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，\n您的睿智和仁慈已经成了传奇。圣殿骑士团请求您在对抗异教徒的圣战中伸出援手。为了有助于我们的战斗，我们谦卑的寻求在太巴列建造一座新城堡的许可。

original: The Knights Templar have erected the castle of La Feve in [Root.GetName].
translation: 圣殿骑士团已经在[Root.GetName]建立起了拉费夫城堡。

original: The Knights Templar have established a new holding in the [From.County.GetFullName]. Permission to settle there was granted to them by the noble [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Their mighty castle will henceforth be known as La Feve.
translation: 圣殿骑士团在[From.County.GetFullName]建立起了一座新的建筑。从贵族[FromFrom.GetTitledName]获得建造许可。从今以后，他们强大的城堡将被称作拉费夫城堡。

original: Several Kingdoms in Europe are fighting to keep the pagans back and try to spread Christianity eastwards. The Teutonic Order should assist them by offering to settle on their borders.
translation: 几个欧洲王国为了击退原始宗教信徒而与之开战，并且试图让基督教势力向东扩展。条顿骑士团应当为他们提供守卫边界的帮助。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has graciously seceded the [Root.County.GetFullName] to us. The Teutonic Order will now be able to effectively fight the heathens in this region.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]已经和善的为我们让出了[Root.County.GetFullName]。现在，条顿骑士团就可以高效地同这一地区的野蛮人战斗了。

original: In an effort to defend [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName] against pagan attacks, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has granted the Teutonic Order the [From.County.GetFullName]. This county has never been fully settled and many of the population are still heathens. This noble gesture could help protect the endangered frontier of [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName] as well as further the Holy War against pagans.
translation: 为了帮助[FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName]抵御异教徒的进攻，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]赐予条顿骑士团[From.County.GetFullName]。目前尚未有人完全在这个省份定居，且这里还有许多异教徒。这个高贵之举能够帮助保卫[FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName]处于危险中的前线以及推进针对异教徒的圣战。

original:
Holy Order or not, I will not let any foreign power establish a hold in my realm.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
不管是否是骑士团，我不会让任何外国势力在我的领土上建起一座建筑。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: The pressure of commanding a whole unit is killing me. The ones I have to command are lazy good-for-nothing soldiers but I had endured their incompetence until one of them managed to lose my horse's bridle and saddle. That was the last drop, then I...
translation: 指挥一整支分队的压力让我崩溃。我不得不指挥的这些人是一群懒惰的饭桶士兵，但是我一直忍受着他们的无能，直到他们中的一个弄丢了我的马笼头和马鞍。这是压死骆驼的最后一根稻草，然后我……

original: I have always been bad at diplomacy and I fear I will insult the ambassador when he arrives to talk about a possible alliance between me and his liege.
translation: 我一直不擅长外交，我害怕我会冒犯即将到来的大使，他是为了我和他的领主之间一次可能的联盟而前来谈判的。

original: I should let my [Root.GetMyChancellorName] [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] take care of it
translation: 我应当让我的[Root.GetChancellorName][Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]处理这件事情

original: No! I am the [Root.GetTitle], I should be able to handle this!
translation: 不！我才是[Root.GetTitle]，我能够处理好这件事情！

original: When [From.GetTitledFirstName] took me aside a couple of days before the ambassador was supposed to arrive and asked me to handle the negotiations, I was not exactly surprised. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has many virtues, but diplomacy is not one of them.
translation: 在大使即将到来的几天之前，当[From.GetTitledFirstName]把我叫到旁边并要求我处理这场谈判的时候，我并不感到十分吃惊。[From.GetTitledFirstName]有许多优点，但是外交不在其中。

original: I am glad [From.GetTitledFirstName] feels [From.GetSheHe] can entrust me with this!
translation: 我很高兴[From.GetTitledFirstName]觉得[From.GetSheHe]可以在这件事情上面信任我！

original: As I have difficulty distinguishing the handle from the blade of a sword, I would rather delegate the troublesome task of handling the troops to my Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 因为我连分清剑柄和剑锋都有困难，我情愿把掌控军队这项恼人的任务分派给我的军事总管[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: I should definitely delegate that task to [Root.job_marshal.GetHerHim]
translation: 我绝对应该把这项任务分派给[Root.job_marshal.GetHerHim]

original: I should work harder on this
translation: 我应该在这件事情上面更加努力

original: It feels good that [From.GetTitledFirstName] trusts me enough to delegate the handling of [From.GetHerHis] troops to me.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]相信我并且把掌控[From.GetHerHis]军队的任务分派给我，这让我感到高兴。

original: I have never been one to lurk in the shadows to plot and scheme, to plan assassinations or plant devious rumors about my rivals. I would gladly hand over those tasks to my Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 我不是一个擅长潜伏在阴影中发动阴谋和策划，暗杀和流言的人。我十分乐意把这些任务交给我的间谍总管[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] will make sure all plots will run smooth
translation: [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]会确保每一项密谋顺利进行

original: I shouldn't rely too much on [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]

I have always felt a calling for plots and schemes, assassinations and devious rumors, all those shady activities that almost all participate in but never mentions. When I was entrusted with all this by [From.GetTitledFirstName] it was the happiest moment in my life.
translation: 我总是感到阴谋和策划，暗杀和流言在召唤着我，几乎所有人都参与过这些阴影中的把戏，但是从没被提起。我被[From.GetTitledFirstName]所信任去做所有的这类事情，这是我生命中最高兴的时刻。

original: I will plot, I will scheme, and no one will know what hit them
translation: 我将会发动阴谋诡计，没有人会知道是谁在和他们捣鬼

original: Numbers eludes me, math frustrate me and taxes... don't even talk about taxes. Every time I try to understand and organize the expenses and revenues I get frustrated and feel inadequate.
translation: 数字使我迷惑，数学让我沮丧，税收……更不要提起税收了。每当我尝试理解并且管理收入和支出的时候，我感到十分沮丧和无能。

original: I will fight the numbers and defeat them!
translation: 我会同数字战斗并且击败他们！

original: I hadn't realized how much [From.GetTitledFirstName] had struggled with understanding and organizing the expenses and revenues so when [From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me to take over this task I was more than happy to relieve [From.GetHerHim] of [From.GetHerHis] burden.
translation: 我竟然从来没有意识到[From.GetTitledFirstName]在理解并管理收入和支出的时候有多煎熬，所以当[From.GetTitledFirstName]让我接过这项任务的时候，我十分愿意帮助[From.GetHerHim]解除[From.GetHerHis]负担。

original: I will gladly help [From.GetTitledFirstName] with this

The [Root.Religion.GetName] priests can be a bit irritable and after my latest blunder I feel the need to be extra careful around them. Too bad I cannot really rely on myself when I am stressed to be anything else but blunt.
translation: [Root.Religion.GetName]的教士们脾气有些不大好，在我最近一次说错话之后我感到对他们说话要格外谨慎。十分糟糕的是，在我紧张的时候，我会管不住自己而变得口无遮拦。

original: [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] should be able to handle this better than I would
translation: [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]应该能够把这件事情处理得比我更好

original: I will take care of them myself

The more stressed [From.GetTitledFirstName] gets, the more blunt and outspoken [From.GetSheHe] becomes. There have been rumors about what happened the last time the [From.Religion.GetName] priests visited us, and none of us who experienced the awkwardness and rage of [From.GetTitledFirstName] are keen to watch that happen again.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]越是紧张不安，[From.GetSheHe]就变得越发口无遮拦。自打上一次[From.Religion.GetName]教士们造访了我们就一直有些流言蜚语，曾经感受过[From.GetTitledFirstName]的尴尬与怒火的我们都不想看到这种事情再次发生。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me to take care of them

The stress and the frustration inside of me reached boiling point today when something important went fatally wrong. I lashed out in anger to hide my frustration and the anger went straight for the closest person,
translation: 今天当一件重要的事情出了大岔子的时候，我心中的压力和沮丧达到了鼎沸。我大肆发泄怒火来遮掩我的沮丧，而这些愤怒直接倾泻在了我最亲近的人身上
[Root.GetFirstName]将[Root.GetHerHis]怒火发泄在一位内阁成员身上
[Root.GetFirstName]将[Root.GetHerHis]怒火发泄在一位廷臣身上

original: The anger in [From.GetFirstName]'s eyes frightened me and as [From.GetSheHe] poured [From.GetHerHis] anger and frustration on me, instead of addressing what really troubled [From.GetHerHim], I stood quietly and let [From.GetFirstName] get it out of [From.GetHerHis] system.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]眼中的怒火吓坏了我，当[From.GetSheHe]把[From.GetHerHis]怒火和沮丧倾泻在我的身上的时候，我没有说出是什么真正在困扰着[From.GetHerHim]，而是安静的站着让[From.GetFirstName]把这些情绪从[From.GetHerHis]身体里发泄出来。

original: [From.GetFirstName]'s outburst of anger was uncalled for!
My fosterling is a weakling without any backbone! I would truly feel ashamed of myself if I couldn't do something to make the child less of a coward.
translation: 我的养子是一个无能的软骨头！如果我不能做些什么来让这个孩子少一些懦弱的话，我会为我自己感到非常羞愧。

original: I'll try to beat some sense in the child
I'll put the child out with the wolves
translation: 我会把这个孩子放到外面和狼一起

original: I was bored until I remembered the prisoner in my dungeons. I had so many deliciously cruel ideas as what to do to the prisoner, but I finally narrowed the ideas down to two: slowly reduce the food rationings or release rats in the prisoner's cell.
translation: 我感到无趣，突然我想起了关在我的地牢里的囚犯。我有许多精彩而又残忍的主意可以在这个囚犯身上一一试验，但是最后我把主意减少到两个：缓慢地减少食物的配给或者把老鼠放进他的牢房.

original: Release some rats in the prisoner's cell!
translation: 往这名囚犯的牢房里放一些老鼠！

original: We were high above the courtyard with courtiers scurrying around looking like ants. I ordered my bow and bow to be brought to me and started shooting at them, laughing at the panic and the looks they threw up at me.
translation: 我们站在庭院的高处，廷臣们在下面围着像蚂蚁一样四处乱跑。我让人拿来我的弓并开始向他们射箭，同时嘲笑他们的惊慌失措以及他们向我投来的目光。

original: The next shot will be aimed low
I will aim high this time

I do not tolerate any cravenness in my court, I despise the scared eyes of one of the courtiers and the way the courtier shy away from me and everything scary. There must be a way to cure the courtier of this cowardness, but how?
translation: 在我的宫廷里我无法容忍任何的懦弱，我鄙视一位廷臣害怕的眼神，还有他避开我以及所有吓人事物的方式。一定有一种方法可以治愈他的懦弱，但是怎么去做呢？

original: Maybe if I pretend to push them off the walls?
translation: 或许我可以装作要把他从墙头推下去？

original: I will scare the courtier in the middle of the night!
translation: 我会在午夜去吓唬这位廷臣！

original: Nothing feels good, nothing feels fun nor interesting. I am in the deepest, blackest pit of sorrow and worthlessness, feeling as I will never be able to escape from it and wondering why God makes us feel like this...
translation: 任何事情都不能让我感到高兴，愉快或者有趣。我处在最深、最暗的深渊中，满怀悲伤，感觉自己毫无价值，好像永远不能从中逃脱，我想知道为什么上帝会让我们感受这痛苦……

original: I doubt myself and my faith
translation: 我怀疑自我和我的信仰

original: The sickness is slowly eating away at me, making me look like a shadow of my former self. No matter what I do, no matter how many physicians I pay to cure me, nothing seems to help.
translation: 病痛正在缓慢地吞噬着我，让我看上去就像是以前自己的影子一样。不管我做什么事情，不管我花钱请来多少医生来治疗我，都不能对我有一丝帮助。

original: I should spend a fortnight fasting for my sins
translation: 我应该为我犯下的罪而斋戒两个星期

original: I will continue praying for a cure, or a miracle
translation: 我会继续祈祷能够痊愈，或者发生奇迹

original: My God, why have you forsaken me? I have been cursed with a fever, a headache from Hell and now I am coughing blood. I think [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] must have decided to punish me for my sins!
translation: 我的主，为什么你要舍弃我？我已经被高烧和地狱般的头痛诅咒，现在我又开始咳血。我想一定是[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]决定要惩罚我所犯下的罪！

original: I should give to the poor for my sins
translation: 我应当救助那些穷苦的人来减轻我的罪孽

original: Jesus healed people like me, if I just was more devout and truly repented my sins He might heal me too.
translation: 耶稣治愈了像我一样患重病的人，如果我能够更虔诚一些，并且真心为我犯下的罪孽忏悔，主也会治好我的.

original: Forgive me Father, for I have sinned...
The guilt is burning through me, every second is pure agony mixed with shame. I have never felt so guilty, so sinful...
translation: 罪孽烧穿了我的胸口，每一分每一秒都只有痛苦和羞愧交织在心头。我从来没有感到如此的内疚，如此的罪孽深重……

original: I ease my guilt with prayer and fasting
translation: 通过祈祷和禁食来减轻我的罪行

original: Pay church to ease some of my guilt
translation: 给教会捐款来减轻我的罪行

original: I have written a religious tract which I named Tractatus de Purgatorio Sancti [Root.GetFirstName], about a knight and how he journeyed through Purgatory and the Earthly Paradise. It is a masterpiece and I must share the tract with the world!
translation: 我写好了一本宗教小册子，我为它起名为圣[Root.GetFirstName]炼狱论，它写的是一名骑士以及他在炼狱和地上天国之中旅行的故事。这是一部杰作，我应当同全世界一起分享这本小册子！

original: The [Root.Religion.GetName] Church will help spread it!
I will give it to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] so [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] can help spread it
translation: 我会把它交给[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]，这样[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]就可以帮助传播它

original: I will give it to [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] so [Root.Host.GetSheHe] can help spread it
translation: 我会把它交给[Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName]，这样[Root.Host.GetSheHe]就可以帮助传播它

original: I am not lustful, gluttonous, slothful, greedy, envious, proud or wroth. I am and will always be free from sin.
translation: 我既不好色，也不贪食不懒惰，也不贪婪，也不妒忌，也不傲慢，也不愤怒。我现在没有并且永远不会沾染这些罪孽。

original: I proclaim my lack of sin publicly
translation: 我公开宣布我未被罪孽玷污

original: I thank the Lord in private

I secretly admire a person who has been celibate for many years now. I am a faithful [Root.Religion.GetName] and I have contemplated becoming celibate, but there has always been something that has hindered me from following that path.
translation: 我秘密的崇拜着一位已经禁欲多年的人。我是一名虔诚的[Root.Religion.GetName]我一直想要成为一名禁欲者，但是总有事情妨碍我走上这条路。

original: I should ask the courtier for advice...
translation: 我应该向廷臣寻求建议……

original: I should ask the vassal for advice...
translation: 我应当向封臣寻求建议……

original: My servants have provided such a fine meal today. There is an enormous amount of fine wine, and the cooking is absolutely great. I will enjoy this feast!
translation: 今天，我的仆人们为我提供了一顿十分丰盛的大餐。有许多美酒，饭菜也做的非常棒。我会好好享受这顿宴席！

original: Commanding troops is a demanding task, especially for someone as stressed as I am. There are ways though to relieve this stress, but how will I find solace?
translation: 指挥军队是一项艰巨的任务，尤其对于像我这样容易紧张的人更是这样.有一些释放压力的方法，我会怎样寻求慰籍呢

original: Find solace in a bottle of wine
Find solace in the camp followers
translation: 从随营「女眷」身上寻求慰籍

original: I attended a great party down at the village last night. I do not remember all the details, but I surely must have had a great time at it.
translation: 我昨晚去村子里参加了一场精彩的聚会.我记不清每一个细节，但是我肯定玩得十分愉快.

original: I know I drank some wine..
I woke up with a terrible hangover this morning. Now the priest is talking with his boring voice again, and I keep falling asleep here in Church.
translation: 今天早上我带着浓重的醉意醒来，现在神父又在用烦人的声音讲话，我在教堂里继续打瞌睡。

original: This is not proper for a [This.GetTitle]
translation: 这对于一个[This.GetTitle]来说不合适

original: It seems that I have embarrassed myself severely in front of my children. This is entirely due to by habit of drinking until I pass out, but I simply can not stop it.
translation: 看起来我在我的孩子们面前严重失态.这全是因为我喝酒必醉的习惯，但是我却改不了.
他们最终会忘掉这件事的……

original: My beloved spouse [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has noticed my constant drinking and is deeply concerned. [Root.Spouse.GetSheHeCap] is asking me to stop drinking and become responsible again.
translation: 我亲爱的配偶[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]注意到我经常饮酒并对此十分担心。[Root.Spouse.GetSheHeCap]要求我不再饮酒并且重新变回可靠的我。

original: I will stop being a drunkard.
translation: 我决定从今以后滴酒不沾。

original: I am so lucky that I have [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]..
My husband has dragged me down to his levels, and got me addicted to wine. I wish I had never married him.
translation: 我的丈夫让我变得和他一样堕落并染上酒瘾。我没有嫁给他该多好啊.

original: The wine makes me such a good speaker. I can truly motivate people, and they become inspired from hearing me talk.
translation: 酒让我变成了一个优秀的演说家。我可以真正的激发人们的情绪，听了我的讲话的人都受到极大的鼓舞.

original: I have wasted enough days in my life as a drunkard. I need to get my life in to better shape.
translation: 作为一个酒鬼，我已经浪费了很长时间的生命.我需要让我的生活变得更好.

original: Devoting myself to the sword will do it.
translation: 全身心扑在剑术上可以帮我做到这一点.

original: Embroidery will take my mind off it.
translation: 刺绣会让我不再想着喝酒.

original: I seem to drink myself into an early grave. There must be some way to stop drinking.
translation: 我好像要把自己喝得英年早逝了。一定存在一个戒酒的方法。

original: But the wine tastes so good...
I'll ask a priest for some advice.
translation: 我会向一位神父寻求建议。

original: There is nothing but whine, or wine.. I've lost my mine, my mined mind..
translation: 除了酒，还是酒……我已经失去了我的，我自己的思维……

original: The troops I am commanding thinks I am craven, I haven't shown myself to them for several days because of my illness.
translation: 我指挥的军队认为我是一个懦夫，由于疾病，我已经有好几天没在他们面前出现了。

original: I am soon dead, if not of old age then of this illness. I worry about my sins, will God truly forgive me?
translation: 我就快死了，不是死于年老就是死于这场疾病。我担心我犯下的罪，上帝真的会宽恕我么？

original: Please give me more time God, I need to reform myself
translation: 上帝，请给我更多的时间，我要改正我自身的错误

original: God is punishing me rightly for my sins
translation: 上帝在惩罚我，这是我犯下的罪应得的

original: God answered my prayers! I am cured of my illness and can atone for my sins before it is too late.
translation: 上帝回应了我的祈祷！我的病治好了，并且让我可以在无可挽回之前弥补我的罪孽.

original: Yes, you are a sinner that deserves it
translation: 是的，这是你这个罪人应得的

original: Don't worry, I'll take care of you
The cold nights of January are strainful for my health...
translation: 一月寒冷的夜晚对我的健康十分有害……

original: Stay in a warm bed near the fire during the cold nights
translation: 在寒冷的夜晚睡在火炉边温暖的床上

original: My call for a crusade against the infidels has apparently fallen on deaf ears, and a number of prominent Christian rulers have still not put on the cross.
translation: 我抵抗异教徒的号召被置若罔闻，许多显赫的基督教统治者仍然没有穿上十字罩衣。

original:
To the Noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I am concerned that you have not yet heeded my call to arms against the infidels. I hope that this is a mere oversight on your behalf and expect that you will put on the cross in the near future.

[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致高贵的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，
我对你仍未回应我的拿起武器对抗异教徒的召唤这件事情表示关切。我希望这只是你的一时疏忽，并期待着你在不久之后穿上十字罩衣.

[From.GetTitledName]

original: My reminder about their absence from the ongoing crusade has apparently fallen on deaf ears. I am very disappointed.
translation: 我因为他们缺席正在进行的十字军远征而送出的提醒信显然没有得到理睬.我感到非常失望.

original: Let it be know to them
I am bitterly disappointed to see that you still choose to ignore my call for a crusade.
translation: 我对你仍然选择无视我的召唤，拒不参加十字军感到十分失望。

original: I am shocked to see that my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has not yet answered the Pope's call for a crusade.
translation: 我非常吃惊的发现我的领主[Root.Liege.GetTitledName]竟然还没有回应教宗的召唤参加十字军。
立即向[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]送出一封提醒信

original: There is nothing I can do about it

My liege,
I am concerned that you have not yet heeded the Pope's call to arms against the infidels. I pray that you plan to put on the cross in the near future.

Your loyal subject, 
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，
我注意到您还没有回应教宗拿起武器对抗异教徒的召唤。我祈祷您计划在不久之后穿上十字罩衣。

您忠诚的臣民，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: I will not be told what to do by a vassal!
translation: 我不会由我的封臣告诉我该做什么！

original: I promise that I shall be on my way within a month
translation: 我承诺我将会在一个月之内启程

original: It seems my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has decided not to join the crusade despite his promise to do so. I am very disappointed.
translation: 看起来我的领主[Root.Liege.GetTitledName]已经决定不参加十字军，尽管他曾经承诺过会这样做。我非常失望。

original:
My liege,
I am most disappointed to see that you have decided not to participate in the ongoing crusade.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，
我对您做出不参加正在进行的十字军远征的决定感到十分失望。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: The Pope has finally called a crusade against the infidels and many of us are eager to fight. But my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has not put on the cross yet.
translation: 教宗最后一次发出对抗异教徒的召唤，我们中的许多人正热切盼望着参战。但是我的领主[Root.Liege.GetTitledName]仍然没有穿上十字罩衣。
立刻向[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]发出一封提醒信

original:
My liege,
Many of us are eager to join the crusade and fight for the glory of God. So it is with concern I notice that you have yet to answer the Pope's call to arms. I assume that you plan to put on the cross in the near future.

Your loyal subject, 
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，
我们中的许多人正热切盼望着参加十字军为上帝的荣光而战。所以我对您仍未回应教宗拿起武器对抗异教徒的召唤这件事情表示关切。我假定您计划在不久之后穿上十字罩衣。

您忠诚的臣民，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: I will not be told what to do by a vassal!
translation: 我不会由我的封臣告诉我该做什么！

original: I promise that I shall be on my way within a month
translation: 我承诺我将会在一个月之内启程

original: It seems my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has decided not to join the crusade despite his promise to do so. I am very disappointed.
translation: 看起来[Root.Liege.GetTitledName]已经决定不参加十字军，尽管他曾经承诺过会这样做.我非常失望。

original:
My liege,
I am most disappointed to see that you have decided not to participate in the ongoing crusade.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，
我对您做出不参加正在进行的十字军远征的决定感到十分失望。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Pagans have crossed the border and raided the county of [Root.GetName]!
translation: 原始宗教信徒们已经越过边境开始袭击[Root.GetName]省份！
这些该死的原始宗教信徒！

original: Encouraged by their successful border raiding, pagans have pushed further on and ravaged the county of [Root.GetName]!
translation: 受到在边境地区袭击成功的鼓舞，原始宗教信徒们已经继续推进并且开始洗劫[Root.GetName]省份！

original: I have hatched a brilliant scheme to get rid of my hated rival!
translation: 我想出了一个绝妙的计划来除去我痛恨的对手！
把我的「证据」提交给我的领主

original: On second thought, it's a bad idea...
translation: 仔细考虑一下的话，这是个坏主意……

original: My liege! It pains me to say, but there is a traitor in the realm. This rotten egg is plotting your downfall. I enclose the damning evidence with this letter.\n\nYour loyal servant, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我的领主！我十分悲痛地告诉您国内出了一个叛徒。这个坏家伙在密谋推翻您。我在这封信件里面附上了翔实的证据。\n\n您忠诚的仆人，[From.GetTitledFirstName]
军事总管！把叛国者给我抓起来！

original: I think [From.GetTitledFirstName] is the real traitor
Throw [This.GetTitledFirstName] in the dungeon for falsifying evidence
translation: 以伪造证据为由把[This.GetTitledFirstName]关进地牢

original: At the false charges of the accursed [FromFrom.GetTitledName], my liege has seen fit to imprison me!
