translation: 因为我对[FromFrom.GetTitledName]发起的虚假的指控，我的领主借机将我关押起来！

original: Dear [Root.GetFirstName]! I'm afraid your allegations do not hold up. I can take no action against your so called traitor.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 亲爱的[Root.GetFirstName]！很遗憾你的指控站不住脚。我不能对你所谓的叛徒采取任何措施。\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Bah, it was a good scheme!

My loyal vassal! I recently received some disturbing allegations against you from [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. I do not believe them, but you should know that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is no friend of yours.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我忠诚的封臣！我最近接到一些来自[FromFrom.GetTitledName]发起的针对你的扰人指控。我不相信这些指控，但是你应该知道[From.GetSubjectPronoun]不是你的朋友。\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Let [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] know what I think of this
translation: 让[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]知道我对此事怎么看

original: To the dishonorable [Root.GetTitledFirstName]! Know that I am aware of your schemes, and so is [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] be my witness, you will not succeed.
translation: 致卑鄙的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]！你要知道我已经察觉了你的图谋，而且[This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]也察觉了。[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]是我的证人，你绝不会成功。

original: Disaster! [From.GetTitledFirstName] has thrown me in the dungeon for my 'false' allegations.
translation: 灾难！[From.GetTitledFirstName]以我「虚假的」指控为由把我扔进了地牢。

original: I will get out of here...
A loyal friend at the household of [From.GetTitledName] told me that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is about to present [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] with false evidence of my treason!
translation: 我在[From.GetTitledName]家中的一位忠实的朋友告诉我一件事情，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]将要向[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]提交伪造的关于我叛国的证据！

original: A fast courier is dispatched to my liege
translation: 派出一位腿脚麻利的廷臣给我的领主送信

original: My liege! Very soon, the scheming [FromFrom.GetTitledName] will make accusations against me. Do not believe a word of it! [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] hates me and lacks all honor and decency.\n\nYour faithful vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我的领主！很快，[FromFrom.GetTitledName]就会发起针对我的密谋已久的指控。请不要相信他的任何言论！[FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap]痛恨我并且完全不知荣誉和礼仪为何物。\n\n您忠诚的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: My loyal vassal! You were right. [FromFrom.GetTitledName] did accuse you of treason, but I dismissed [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] so called evidence. Rest easy my friend.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我忠诚的封臣！你是对的.[FromFrom.GetTitledName]确实指控你叛国，但是我驳回了[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun]所谓的证据。别担心我的朋友.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: The maintenance cost of the levies I sent my liege are ruinous! Perhaps I should ask for some gold in return for my dutiful service...
translation: 为了维持我上缴给我的领主的税款所带来的后果是破坏性的！或许我应当要求一些金币作为我尽职工作的回报……

original: My liege, I am deeply hesitant to ask, but my coffers are running dry from the upkeep of the levies you have raised from my demesne. Any recompense for the costs of my liege's wars would be a great comfort.\n\nYour loyal [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我的领主，我很犹豫该不该说这件事，但是我的金库就快空了，这都是为了维持您从我的领地征收的税款。鉴于我在我的领主的战争上付出的代价，任何补偿都会是巨大的安慰。\n\n您忠诚的[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: My most valued vassal, your request is reasonable. This gift of 30¤ should help tide you over.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我最重要的封臣，你的请求十分合理。这份 30¤ 的礼物将让你度过难关。\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I am under no obligation to give you recompense, but since you are my friend, here is a gift of 15¤.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]，尽管我没有任何义务给予你补偿，但是因为你是我的朋友，这是一份15¤的礼物。\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: To the honorable [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. As my bannerman, it is your sworn duty to pay for the upkeep of your levies. Do not trouble me with this again.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 致尊敬的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。作为我的旗手，上缴你的税款是你发过誓的要尽的责任。不要在这件事情再给我惹麻烦。\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I shall be reduced to begging!
translation: 我竟要沦落到乞讨的境地！

original: honorable [Root.GetTitledFirstName]! Unfortunately, my own coffers yawn empty, but rest assured I will never forget the services you have rendered in these times of strife.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 尊敬的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]！很不幸，我自己的金库也要空了，但是请放心，我永远不会忘记你在战争中所提供的帮助。\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: It bothers me that my liege, [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], holds a title that should rightfully be mine.
translation: 我的领主[This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]拥有一项本应属于我的头衔，这件事很让我纠结.

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is diplomatically informed of my decision

Dear vassal,

I fear that you have failed to convince me of the justice of your request. Regretfully, I cannot oblige you.

Your liege,
 [From.GetTitledName]
translation:
爱卿，

恐怕你没能在你的要求的正义性上说服我。遗憾的是，我不能强迫你。

你的主上，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: One of the guards is sympathetic enough to smuggle a letter out. Perhaps one of my friends can mediate my release...
translation: 一名同情我的守卫，可以帮我偷带一封信出去。也许我的一位朋友能够成功斡旋，让我获得释放……

original: My letter is smuggled out to [This.GetBestName]
translation: 我的信被偷偷送到了[This.GetBestName]手上

original: My dearest friend! I fear that my plight is terrible, I do not know for how long I can survive in this miserable dungeon. I beg of you, please intercede with [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] on my behalf.\n\nYour [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我亲爱的朋友！我的处境非常糟糕，我不知道我在这个肮脏的地牢里还能够活多久。我求求你，请代我出面向[This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]求情。\n\n你的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: My liege! I wish to intercede on the behalf of one of your prisoners, [FromFrom.GetBestName]. Surely a show of mercy would please all your vassals.\n\nYour faithful [From.GetTitledName]
translation: 我的领主！我想为您的一名囚犯[FromFrom.GetBestName]求情。您的仁慈一定会让您的所有封臣感到高兴。\n\n您忠诚的[From.GetTitledName]
委婉地解释为什么我不能释放他

original: I have been released! Thank [This.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for the intercession of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 我已经被释放了！感谢[This.Religion.GetRandomGodName]，让[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]为我求情！

original: A letter of gratitude is sent to [This.GetBestName]
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName], criminals belong in prison. I'm afraid there is nothing I can do to help your friend.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，罪犯就应该呆在监狱里。我很抱歉我不能帮到你的朋友。\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Soldiers took me from my bed at night! [From.GetTitledFirstName] is accusing me of conspiring against [From.GetSubjectPronoun] with known traitors!
translation: 士兵半夜把我从床上带走！[From.GetTitledFirstName]指控我同已知的叛徒一道密谋反抗[From.GetSubjectPronoun]！

original: So much for a show of compassion
translation: 只因为表现出同情就被定罪实在是太过分了

original: My most valued friend and vassal! Your concern for your friend is touching, but the laws of the realm must be upheld or all would surely descend into anarchy.\n\nYour faithful liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我最重要的朋友和封臣！你对你的朋友的关心让人感动，但是王国的法律必须得到执行，否则整个国家都会变得一片混乱。\n\n你忠实的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: My friend! Our liege, [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], has released me from my lonely cell, all thanks to you! [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] bless you!\n\nYour ever grateful [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName]
translation: 我的朋友！我们的领主[This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]已经把我从孤独的囚笼里放了出来，这一切都要感谢你！愿[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]保佑你！\n\n永远感念你恩德的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetFirstName]

original: All is well that ends well!
I should offer to lift excommunication for anyone who joins the crusade.
translation: 我会为所有加入十字军者免除绝罚。

original: I will send out a proclamation.
translation: 我会此事发表一个正式的公告。

original: I am willing to lift the excommunication of you and accept your repentance, should you put on the cross and join the ongoing crusade.
translation: 如果你穿上十字罩衣参加正在进行的十字军，我很愿意为你免除绝罚并接受你的忏悔。

original: Several excommunicated men have chosen to take up the sword against the infidels and joined the crusade.
translation: 几个被绝罚的人选择拿起剑对抗异教徒并且加入了十字军

original: I have accepted your decision to join the crusade as repentance and will hereby lift the excommunication.
translation: 我已经接到你参加十字军作为忏悔的决定，兹免除绝罚。

original: My liege has persuaded me to embrace this notion of Englishness that is sweeping the realm.
translation: 我的领主劝说我接受这种风靡全国的英格兰学说。

original: Oh I say, game of cricket anyone?
translation: 哦，我说，有人去打板球么？

original: The peasant army ravaging the county of [Root.GetName] is burning down buildings!
translation: 劫掠[Root.GetName]省份的农民军正在焚毁建筑物！

original: Is there anything they won't destroy?
translation: 有什么东西是他们不会毁坏的么？

original: Bad news, but I am glad it didn't happen to my holdings...
translation: 坏消息，但是我很高兴得知被毁坏的不是我的财产…

original: The peasant army ravaging the county of [From.GetName] is burning down my buildings!
translation: 正在肆虐[From.GetName]省份的农民军烧毁了我的建筑！

original: I have been attacked by the peasants rebels in [Root.Location.GetName]!
I am lucky to be alive...
[From.GetTitledName] has been captured and killed by peasant rebels!
How dare they execute a subject of mine!
translation: 他们怎么敢处决我的臣民！

original:
My liege,
I was ambushed by a mob of peasant rebels and barely got away with my life. The attack has left me maimed and I fear for the life of me and those around me in [From.Location.GetName]. These rebels must be stopped.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，
我被一伙农民叛军包围，仅以身免。袭击使我身受重伤，我为我和那些在[From.Location.GetName]为我服务的人的性命感到担忧。这些叛乱者必须被消灭。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
My liege,
Although I escaped with my life, the mob of peasant rebels that attacked me managed to wound me. I fear these attacks will only increase until the revolt in [From.Location.GetName] is put down.
Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，
虽然我只身逃出，但是那伙袭击我的暴徒仍然让我受了重伤。我担心这种袭击越来越多，直到在[From.Location.GetName]发生的叛乱被平定。
此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: This peasant rabble must be stopped!
translation: 这些农民暴徒必须被消灭！

original: The lifestyle of a childless courtier has made me suspect that he fancies other men!
translation: 一位无子女的廷臣的生活方式让我怀疑他喜欢的是男人！

original: Ask him if he really desire men rather than women
translation: 问他是否喜欢男人胜过女人

original: I should tell others about my suspicion!
translation: 我应该把我的猜测告诉别人！

original: I will accept money in exchange for my silence
[From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me today if I really fancied men over women!
translation: 今天，[From.GetTitledFirstName]问我是不是真的喜欢男人胜过女人！

original: What nerve! I love women, not men!
translation: 大胆！我喜欢女人，而不是男人！

original: You are right. I desire men, not women
translation: 你是对的，我喜欢男人，不是女人

original: A note left on my table by an unseen visitor told me that if I did not deliver fifty gold within one hour to [From.GetTitledFirstName], my secret would be a secret no more. A small post scriptum wrote: 'the secret is that you are a sodomite'.
translation: 某不明身份的访客在我的桌上留了一张字条说：如果我不在一个小时之内把五十金币送到[From.GetTitledFirstName]的手上，我的秘密就会被曝光。后面还有个小备注：「那个秘密就是你是个鸡奸癖」。

original: I cannot let anyone believe that!
translation: 我不能让任何人相信这个！

original: A childless courtier with a strange choice of lifestyle has shown men a bit more attention than the women at court. Might it be that he is a sodomite?
translation: 有一个廷臣，一直没有孩子，生活方式奇奇怪怪的，而且平日就爱混在男人堆中，不太爱搭理女士，也许他比较喜欢男人……

original: I will accuse him of sodomy!
translation: 我要指控他是个鸡奸癖！

original: It is my duty to inform everyone about this suspected sodomite!
translation: 我由责任去告诉所有人此人鸡奸的嫌疑！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] started questioning my lifestyle, asked why I didn't have any children and made me feel incredibly awkward. My answers did not seem to satisfy [From.GetHerHim] and finally [From.GetSheHe] blurted out [From.GetHerHis] question: was I or was I not a sodomite?
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]开始质疑我的生活习惯，他问我为什么没有孩子，这让我无比尴尬。我的回答看起来无法令[From.GetHerHim]满意，最后[From.GetSheHe]直截了当地说出[From.GetHerHis]问题：我究竟是不是个鸡奸癖？

original: What!? No! No, I am not a sodomite!
translation: 什么不，不，我才不是鸡奸癖！

original: I need to prove to everyone who thinks I prefer men over women that I am not a sodomite!
translation: 我需要向所有认为我喜欢男人胜于女人的人证明我不是同性恋！

original: An unfriendly [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] denounced me in front of everyone today because of the silly rumors about me being a sodomite!
translation: 今天，一名不怀好意的[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]当着所有人的面指责我，就因为那个关于我是同性恋的愚蠢谣言！
不管他是不是[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitleCap]，没有人指责我！

original: Just keep quiet, people will forget this soon
translation: 保持沉默，人们会很快忘记的

original: I have started to doubt myself, might it be that the rumors are true? Am I a sodomite, attracted to men rather than women?
translation: 我开始怀疑我自己，也许谣言是真的？我难道是个同性恋，男人比女人更吸引我？

original: I don't know what to know anymore!
translation: 我不知道该相信什么了！

original: The affection a courtier shows his sister is unnatural. I have begun to suspect they might be having a incestuous affair!
translation: 有个廷臣对他姐妹表现出的情感不太自然。我已经开始怀疑他们之间可能有乱伦的恋情！

original: I should warn him about his incestuous affair
translation: 我要警告他关于他乱伦的事情

original: I have to tell everyone about their incestuous affair!
translation: 我必须告诉所有人他们的乱伦恋情！

original: I wonder how much my silence is worth to him...
translation: 我在考虑他要出多少才能让我保持沉默……

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is forced to pay for [Root.GetTitledFirstName] silence

When [From.GetTitledFirstName] started implying that I and my sister had an incestuous affair I could do nothing but deny, deny and deny. No matter what 'evidence' [From.GetFirstName] think [From.GetSheHe] has, [From.GetSheHe] cannot prove anything!
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]开始暗示我和我的姐妹之间有乱伦的恋情时，我没有别的办法，只能否认，否认和否认。无论[From.GetFirstName]认为[From.GetSheHe]有什么证据，[From.GetSheHe]什么都证明不了！

original: I love my sister, but not in that way!
translation: 我爱我妹妹，但是不是这种方式！

original: I will prove I am not having an affair with my sister!
translation: 我会证明我并非与我妹妹有染！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me what [From.GetHerHis] silence was worth to me, and when I asked [From.GetHerHim] what in the world [From.GetSheHe] was talking about, [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me [From.GetSheHe] knows about my incestuous affair with my sister. If I did not pay [From.GetHerHim], there would be nothing stopping [From.GetHerHim] from telling everybody about our forbidden love.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]问我[From.GetHerHis]沉默对我来说算什么，而我则反问[From.GetHerHim]，问[From.GetSheHe]究竟在说什么，[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]知道我和我妹妹的奸情。如果我不付钱给[From.GetHerHim]，[From.GetHerHim]将不可避免的把我们的禁忌之恋告诉所有人。

original: Your silence is very valuable to me
translation: 你的沉默对我很有价值

original: I did not know [From.GetTitledFirstName] could be so charming, and I had never really noticed how handsome [From.GetSheHe] is...
translation: 我以前不知道[From.GetTitledFirstName]是如此的迷人，我从未注意到[From.GetSheHe]有多么英俊……

original: Well, I wouldn't kick [From.GetHerHim] out of my bed...
translation: 好吧，我不会把[From.GetHerHim]踢下床了……

original: Charming and handsome won't buy your way to my bed!
translation: 迷人和英俊并不能使你爬上我的床！

original: The rumors about my supposed incestuous love affair with my sister has reached the ears of my confessor.
translation: 我和我妹妹乱伦恋情的传闻已经传到了我的神父耳中。

original: I have sinned, if not in flesh then in mind...
translation: 我有罪，如果不是肉体，那就是灵魂……

original: I have nothing to confess, nothing to be forgiven for...
translation: 我没有什么要忏悔的，没有什么需要原谅的……

original: My sister and I enjoyed a few hours together in the high, abandoned tower of [Root.Location.GetName] when a child's face appeared in one of the windows...
translation: 我和我的妹妹在[Root.Location.GetName]废弃的高塔上享受快乐的时光，突然一个孩子的脸出现在窗口……

original: The things I do for love...
translation: 我做的事情都是为了爱……

original: The child has a too big mouth for its own safety...
translation: 这孩子的多嘴会害了他……

original: I should have killed the child when I had the chance! The child told everyone about me and my sister in the tower, describing in detail what it had seen...
translation: 当我有机会的时候，我本应该杀了那个孩子的！那个孩子告诉了所有人我和妹妹在塔中发生的事情，而且将他所见的描述的相当详细……

original: I fear the Holy Father will not look kindly upon us...
translation: 我担心圣父教宗不会再友善地看我们了……

original: Everyone knows how deep and passionate the love between one of the courtiers and his wife are, but sadly it has not resulted in any children. I have heard the wife asking the other wives about cures and ways to get with child but to no avail.
translation: 所有人都知道我的一个廷臣和他的妻子的感情有多深，但是遗憾的是他们没有孩子。我听说他的妻子一直在向其他女人打听求子秘诀，但是一直无济于事。

original: Might he be impotent? I have to know!
translation: 他也许是阳痿？我必须知道！

original: It surprises me no one else knows this, I should tell them...
translation: 我很惊讶没人知道这件事，我应该告诉别人……

original: This is perhaps a secret he would pay to keep secret...
translation: 这是个秘密，他只有付钱才能让人保密……

original: If the secret will remain secret, then [This.GetTitledFirstName] have to pay...
translation: 如果想保守秘密，[This.GetTitledFirstName]必须付钱……

original: The biggest grief in our lives is the absence of children so when [From.GetTitledFirstName] stuck [From.GetHerHis] long nose in our private life the longing and sorrow returned with full force.
translation: 我们生活中最大的悲哀就是没有孩子，当[From.GetTitledFirstName]伸长了[From.GetHerHis]脖子窥视我们的私生活时，一种更大的悲恸与渴望充斥着我们的生活。

original: We have a little trouble conceiving, that is all!
translation: 我们患了不孕不育，仅此而已！

original: I would never have thought anyone would try to profit off our grief, our sorrow that we have failed to conceive a child. The demand for gold or the secret about our trouble conceiving would be out in the open made me furious.
translation: 我从来没有想过有人试图从我们的悲恸中获利，我们没办法有孩子是让人悲伤的事情。有人威胁我们要么给钱，要么他就会将我们不孕不育的消息透露出去，这让我十分愤怒。

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] would be devastated, I have to pay...
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]的消息将是毁灭性的，我必须付钱……

original: I will never give in to your demands!
It seems as if the rumor about me being impotent has spread throughout the court. People are laughing behind my back, or so my so-called 'friends' tell me.
translation: 似乎关于我阳痿的谣言已经传遍了朝野。人们都在背后嘲笑我，这都是我所谓的那些「朋友们」告诉我的。

original: The lingering looks, the small, almost inappropriate touches, the secret smiles given to someone other than his wife... A courtier is having an affair!
translation: 依依不舍的凝视，轻柔的不恰当的碰触以及并非是给他妻子的神秘笑容……有个廷臣有奸情！

original: It is my duty to confront him!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is confronted about his adultery by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
I need a bit of persuasion if he wants me to stay silent...
translation: 如果想让我沉默，我需要一点点「说服」……

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is forced to pay [Root.GetTitledFirstName] for [Root.GetHerHis] silence
We hadn't been as discreet as we had hoped, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] confronted me about the adultery I had committed with the beautiful lady at the court.
translation: 我们没有我们希望的那样谨慎，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]发现了我与宫廷中的一位漂亮女士通奸的蛛丝马迹。

original: I did not commit adultery with that woman
translation: 我和那位女士没有奸情

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] might decide to tell your wife [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]

When [From.GetTitledFirstName] denied that [From.GetSheHe] had committed adultery I was stunned, I had been so sure of what I had seen that it had never occurred to me that I might be wrong. I apologised and [From.GetTitledFirstName] accepted the apology with a frown.
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]否认[From.GetSheHe]通奸时，我惊呆了，我原本很确定我看到的东西，我从未想到我也许是错的。我道了歉而[From.GetTitledFirstName]皱着眉头接受了。

original: I should tell his wife [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] about his affair
translation: 我应该和他的妻子[From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]谈谈他的出轨

original: When [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me about my husband [From.GetFirstName]'s little affair with some unknown women I was furious! My rage had subsided a bit when I finally found my cheating husband, but as I saw him admiring the bosom of yet another clueless little strumpet the rage grew once again.
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我，我丈夫[From.GetFirstName]和一个不知名的女人有染的消息时，我愤怒了！当我找到我不忠的丈夫时，我的愤怒稍稍平息了，但是看到他望着其他美女的猪哥样，我的怒火再次升腾。

original: I should forgive and forget. I still love him
translation: 我应该原谅与忘切。我仍爱着他

original: The fury in [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s eyes scared me nearly to death and when [From.GetSheHe] started screaming and cursing at me I wished I was dead.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]的愤怒目光将我几乎吓死，但是当[From.GetSheHe]开始向我尖叫与诅咒时，我巴不得已经死了。

original: I will never cheat on you again, I promise!
translation: 我绝对不会再骗你，我保证！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] forgave me for my little indiscretion but I could see how much it had hurt her. I promised and swore that I would never commit adultery again, ever again.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]原谅了我的些许不检点，但是我看得出这对她伤害很大。我承诺与发誓绝对不会再与人通奸，永远不会。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was direct: if I did not pay [From.GetHerHim] to keep quiet, [From.GetTitledFirstName] would make sure everyone in the court would know about my little affair with one of the court ladies.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]直截了当：如果我不付给[From.GetHerHim]一笔钱，[From.GetTitledFirstName]将保证宫廷里的每一个人都会知道我和宫廷女士之间的「小故事」。

original: Take this, I don't want to see you ever again!
translation: 拿着吧，我再也不想看见你！

original: As if someone would believe you!
translation: 搞得好像别人会信似的！

original: I came home one evening and found that my wife [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] had told our children about my affair and now they all refuse to speak to me!
translation: 有天晚上回家，我听到我妻子[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]和我的孩子们谈论我出轨的事，现在他们都不跟我说话了！

original: Why did you have to involve them?!

The voices could be heard through the walls and I recognized them as belonging to my wife and my mistress. My wife [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] tried to make my mistress break up with me, but she refused so I decided to step in...
translation: 吵闹声穿透了墙壁，我意识到那是我的妻子和我的情人在争吵。我妻子[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]试图让我的情人和我分手，但是她拒绝了。此时我决定介入……

original: I reassure my mistress of my deep love for her
translation: 我力挺我的情人，她是我的真爱

original: [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName], you are the one I love!

I knocked on the door and heard him swear when something was knocked to the floor and broke, by the sound of it. When he finally called 'Come in!' I opened the door and saw the messy room, filled with weird looking glasses, stuffed exotic animals and the man I was visiting in the middle of the mess with singed eyebrows.
translation: 我敲了敲门，听到里有有人在赌咒，然后是什么东西被摔碎了在地板上的声音。当他终于说「请进」时，我打开了门，看到了一团糟的房间：满地都是玻璃渣子和死去的动物遗体，我要拜访的那个人站在房子中间，眉毛被烧焦了。

original: Have you tampered with the occult?
I got to get out of here and tell everyone!
translation: 我得马上离开告诉所有人！

original: He might pay for my silence...

My latest experiment went a bit badly and I was trying to clean up the mess when someone knocked on the door. [From.GetTitledFirstName] entered and saw the mess I was standing in, with my singed eyebrows and the remains of my experiment spread all over the room. It didn't take long before [From.GetSheHe] accused me of dealing with the occult!
translation: 我最近的实验出了点问题，而我试图清理烂摊子的时候，有人敲门.[From.GetTitledFirstName]走进了房间并看到了我站在一堆破烂上，眉毛烧焦了，满地都是试验后留下的残渣.用不了多少时间，[From.GetSheHe]就会指控我进行神秘实验了！

original: Are you mad? I would never!
I could hardly believe my ears when [From.GetTitledFirstName] tried to pressure me into giving [From.GetHerHim] money to keep quiet about my dealings with the occult!
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]试图强迫我付给[From.GetHerHim]封口费以隐瞒神秘实验的时候，我不敢相信我的耳朵！

original: This is all I have got...
I don't care if everyone knows about this!
translation: 我不在乎其他人知道这件事！

original: A child has gone missing and it seems as if everyone suspects me to have something to do with that. Apparently being a suspected occultist everyone believes I might use the entrails of children to read the future. Pah!
translation: 有个孩子失踪了，而所有人都似乎怀疑是我干的.作为一个神秘学家，所有人都怀疑我用小孩的内脏来预测未来，呸！

original: I attempt to clear my name
The voice woke me up, whispering about spells to awaken the dead, curses to make your enemy go blind and potions to make anyone fall in love with you...
translation: 呢喃将我唤醒，悄悄诉说着呼唤死亡，诅咒敌人致盲的魔法，以及让所有人爱上你的药水……

original: I hope I can remember all of this!
translation: 我希望我能全部记住了！

original: I ignore the voice and go back to sleep

My confessor talked sternly to me, clearly avoiding to bring up the occultist rumor but as I just nodded and accepted all he told me without admitting to anything, he lost his patience with me. He scolded me and told me to repent, to stop fiddling with the occult or else...
translation: 我的神父严厉地和我谈过，让我尽量避免那些神秘学家的谣言，但是我只是点了点头全当了耳边风，他对我失去了耐心。他一边责骂我，一边再次警告我要么痛改前非，不再摆弄神秘学的东西否则……

original: I repent, I will never fiddle with the occult again!
translation: 我忏悔，我绝对不会再摆弄神秘学！

original: Or what? You haven't got anything but rumors!
translation: 那又怎样！你除了一些谣言什么也不知道！

original: I had only managed to remember one of the many spells and invocations the voice had whispered to me in the dark. It was long and complicated with many different ingredients, not all easy to acquire...
translation: 我只记住了那晚神秘声音告诉我的许多法术和药水组分，那是一份冗长而复杂的清单，里面有许多不同的成分，有一些原料很难获得……

original: The Church is after me, save me!
translation: 教会在在追踪我，救救我！

original: The diplomatic skill of [Root.GetMyChancellorName] [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] is deplorable! No matter what task I give [Root.job_chancellor.GetHerHim] [Root.job_chancellor.GetSheHe] always manage to disappoint.
translation: [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName][Root.GetChancellorName]的外交能力真是糟透了！不管我交给[Root.job_chancellor.GetHerHim]什么任务，[Root.job_chancellor.GetSheHe]都会让我失望。

original: You are not good enough, you have to shape up!
translation: 你还不够好，你必须继续磨砺！

original: [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] is chastised about [Root.job_chancellor.GetHerHis] lack of diplomatic skill
translation: [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]因为[Root.job_chancellor.GetHerHis]缺乏外交能力而被责骂

original: I don't trust [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] to do a good job
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] lack of diplomatic skill has cost me dearly!
translation: [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]外交能力的缺乏让我付出了高昂的代价！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] claims my diplomatic skill is deplorable! No matter how hard I work, [From.GetTitledFirstName] is never satisfied and [From.GetHerHis] demands are preposterous!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]指责我的外交能力糟糕透顶！不管我如何努力工作，[From.GetTitledFirstName]永远不会满意，[From.GetHerHis]要求是荒谬的！

original: I have to trust Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] to train my troops and to be able to suppress revolts but [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe] has not proved to be adept in those manners. [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] have to shape up or I need to find another Marshal.
translation: 我必须信任军事总管[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]以训练我的军队并镇压叛乱，但是[Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe]被证明并不适合这个位置。[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]必须成长起来，否则我得换个军事总管。

original: Shape up or you're out of a job!
translation: 没能力的话就给我滚蛋！

original: [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] is chastised about [Root.job_marshal.GetHerHis] lack of martial skill
translation: [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]因缺乏[Root.job_marshal.GetHerHis]缺乏军事才能而被责骂

original: I don't think [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] is the right [Root.job_marshal.GetManWoman] for this job
translation: 我认为[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]并非这个[Root.job_marshal.GetManWoman]的正确人选

original: I might be persuaded to let you keep your job...
translation: 你可以说服我来保住你的职位……

original: I know I have failed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s expectations for what a Marshal should be able to do, but if only [From.GetSheHe] could give me a chance I would show [From.GetHerHim] that I do not lack in martial skill!
translation: 我知道我作为军事总管，一直辜负了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的期望，但是要是[From.GetSheHe]能给我机会，我将表现给[From.GetHerHim]看看，我并不缺少军事才能！

original: I will make you appreciate me, [From.GetTitledFirstName]!

I sent Steward [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] to oversee construction in a county - and the building fell apart almost instantly. Then I sent him to collect taxes in one of the richest provinces and [Root.job_treasurer.GetSheHe] returned with much less than I had anticipated. [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] clearly lacks the stewardship skill needed to perform even the simplest of tasks!
translation: 我派财政总管[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]去一个省份监督建设——建筑几乎立刻就崩溃了。然后我派他去最富裕的省份之一收税，[Root.job_treasurer.GetSheHe]收到的钱远远低于我的预期。[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]明显缺乏必需的管理技能以至于连最简单的任务都无法完成！

original: [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] is chastised about [Root.job_treasurer.GetHerHis] lack of stewardship
Do you want to keep your job? Then pay up!
translation: 你还想要工作吗那就打起精神来！

original: It was not my fault the builders had used inferior materials for the building, nor that the locals managed to swindle us on most of the taxes. Still, my liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] aren't too happy with me as a Steward and I do not blame him.
translation: 建筑者使用劣质材料，当地人骗走了大部分的税收并不是我的错。尽管如此，作为财政总管，我的主人[From.GetTitledFirstName]对我并不满意，我不怪他。

original: An efficient Spymaster must be able to uncover plots. Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] did not even manage to uncover a plot which was being planned right under [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis] nose!
translation: 一个高效的间谍总管必须能够揭露阴谋，而我的间谍总管[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]甚至无法揭露哪怕就在[Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis]鼻子底下发生的阴谋！

original: You can and must do better!
translation: 你能够也必须做的更好！

original: [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] is chastised about [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis] lack of intrigue
translation: [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]因为[Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis]缺乏密谋能力而被惩罚

original: [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] failed me, now I have to do the job myself
translation: [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]让我失望，我得自己干这份工作

original: You don't deserve the salary I pay you!
translation: 你不值得我付给你的工资！

original: I was so ashamed when the plot unfurled in front of my nose when I hadn't even noticed that something was going on. It was right of [From.GetTitledFirstName] to chastise me, but still, it hurt...
translation: 阴谋就在我鼻子底下发生，而我却丝毫没有察觉。这让我十分羞愧。[From.GetTitledFirstName]惩罚我是对的，但是尽管如此，仍让我有些伤心……
我很抱歉，我会更努力的工作！

original: It seems to me [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] isn't as pious as [Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHe] claims to be. Instead of improving relations with the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church, [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] managed to make an utter fool out of [Root.job_spiritual.GetHerselfHimself] and, indirectly, me!
translation: 在我看来[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]并不是像[Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHe]说的那样尽职。[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]没有帮我和[Root.Religion.GetName]教会搞好关系，反而成功地表现了[Root.job_spiritual.GetHerselfHimself]傻瓜的一面，间接影响到了我！

original: [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] is chastised about [Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] lack of learning and [Player.Religion.GetPietyName]
I cannot trust you with anything, can I?
translation: 我真的没办法相信你了，不是吗？

original: You will pay for this fiasco with your own means!
translation: 你将因为自己的惨败付出代价！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] was a bit too harsh when [Root.GetSheHe] chastised me for ruining the relations with the local clergy! Although, I admit, I should probably have chosen less unconventional ways of assuring their support...
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]因为我把和当地神职人员的关系搞砸而惩戒我时，[Root.GetSheHe]有些过分严苛了！尽管我承认，我本来应该选一个不那么非主流的方式来获得他们的支持……

original: Why can't I be appreciated for the things I do right?
translation: 我做对了事为什么不被欣赏？

original: The lack of piety I have observed in one of the courtiers makes me worried. I wouldn't want to accuse anyone of not being a good Christian, but if my suspicions are correct then something needs to be done!
translation: 我观察到我的一个朝臣缺乏虔诚，这让我十分担心。我不想以因为某人不是一个好基督徒而指控他，但如果我的怀疑是正确的，那么我就要采取措施！

original: Confront the courtier about the lack of piety
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is confronted about [This.GetHerHis] seemingly lack of piety by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
I could keep quiet, for a price...
translation: 只要你出个高价，我可以保持沉默……

original: Religion has never been one of my great strengths, I do believe in a God but I have trouble accepting all the rituals and demands the priests of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith feel necessary. [From.GetTitledFirstName] confronted me about this, I hadn't even realized my lack of piety was so noticeable.
translation: 宗教从来就不是我的强项，我当然相信上帝，但是我无法接受所有[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰所必须的仪式。[From.GetTitledFirstName]质问了我有关这个的事，我从来没有意识到我缺乏虔诚是如此引人注目。

original: I will prove my piety by good deeds
translation: 我将用行善证明我的虔诚

original: I shrug the question off. I feel no need to explain myself
translation: 我对质疑只是耸耸肩。我觉得没有必要解释

original: All those rituals and demands the priests of the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church feel necessary to prove one's piety is pure nonsense. Despite my feelings about those unnecessary, empty gestures I have always been careful to not show my lack of piety, but perhaps not careful enough. If I don't pay [From.GetTitledFirstName] fifty gold [From.GetSheHe] will expose my lack of faith to everyone!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetName]教会牧师觉得有必要用这些仪式和要求证明自己的虔诚，但在我看来纯粹是无稽之谈。尽管我对那些多余而空洞的姿态毫无好感，我一直小心不让我表现得缺乏虔诚，但我也许不够细心。如果我不付给[From.GetTitledFirstName] 50 金币[From.GetSheHe]会向所有人揭发我！

original: Why will you burn in hell?', my child asked me. The rumors of my lack of piety had obviously spread throughout the castle and now even my children have heard about it.
translation: 「为什么你会下火狱？」我的孩子问我。关于我缺乏虔诚的谣言已经遍布整个城堡，即使是我的孩子都听说过了。

original: I won't burn in hell! Where have you heard that?
translation: 我不会下火狱的！你从哪听来的？

original: I truly need to repent or I will burn in Hell
translation: 我确实应该忏悔，否则我会下火狱

original: Now even the Pope has heard about my lack of piety! Officially, the Pope sent the legate to make sure the bonds between the Pope and the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church in [Root.Location.GetName] is still strong despite my lack of piety but unofficially, the legate was there to give me a stern speech about my lack of faith.
translation: 现在连教宗都知道我缺乏虔诚！教宗正式派出了特使以确保教宗领与[Root.Location.GetName]的[Root.Religion.GetName]教会的联系依然紧密而不受我缺乏虔诚影响。特使的出现其实是对我缺乏信任的非官方警告。

original: I will donate to the church just to keep him quiet
translation: 我会为教会捐款让他们闭嘴的

original: The man is a coward, that's for certain! He can't fight, shadows and loud noises frighten him and blood makes him faint.
translation: 这个人是个胆小鬼，那是一定的！他不会战斗，黑夜和喧哗就足以吓住他，血能让他晕过去。

original: You are a disgrace and I despise you!
translation: 你就是个耻辱，我鄙视你！

original: I will tell the whole castle about his cowardice!
translation: 我会告诉全城堡的人他的怯懦！

original: I could squeeze him for some money...
translation: 我能从他身上弄出点钱来……

original: I will try to prove myself
I'm not craven! Just easily startled...
translation: 我不是懦夫！就是容易被惊吓而已……

original: 'Fifty gold', [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me.\n'Fifty gold or I tell everyone what a coward you are...'
translation: 「50 金币」，[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我。\n「给我 50 金币否则我就会告诉所有人你是个懦夫……」

original: The soldiers watched me while I practised with my sword and one of them asked when I had finished why I was taking unnecessary risks when practising with the sword.
translation: 士兵观察着我练剑，其中的一个人在我结束练习后问我为什么练剑的时候要冒不必要的险。

original: Women laugh behind your back', someone told me.\n'Women laugh behind your back because of your reputation of being a coward'.
translation: 「女人在背后嘲笑你」，有人告诉你。\n「女人在背后笑你，因为你懦夫的名声。」

original: I admit, I am a coward...
I have finally proven my bravery!
translation: 我最终证明了我的勇敢！

original: Everyone at court believes I am a sodomite!
translation: 廷臣们都确信我是一个鸡奸者！

original: Everyone at court believes that my sister and I has an incestuous affair!
translation: 廷臣们都确信我和我的姐妹乱伦！

original: My wife and I have been unable to conceive a child, and now everyone believes I am impotent!
translation: 我的妻子和我一直没有孩子，所有人认为我是阳痿！

original: We only need to try more!
Rumours at the court suggests that I have been unfaithful and committed adultery with one of the ladies.
translation: 宫廷里出现了关于我与某位女士通奸的谣言。

original: ...and now my wife believes those rumors!
My harmless experiments and interest in science has led to rumors erupting in court about me being an occultist!
translation: 我不过是对自然科学感兴趣、进行些无害的实验，但是宫廷里出现了污蔑我为巫师的谣言！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s distrust in me as [From.GetHerHis] [Root.GetChancellorName] has made everyone in court dislike me!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]对我——[From.GetHerHis][Root.GetChancellorName]的不信任使宫廷里的每一个人都不喜欢我！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s distrust in me as [From.GetHerHis] Marshal has made everyone in court dislike me!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]对我——[From.GetHerHis]军事总管的不信任使宫廷里的每一个人都不喜欢我！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s distrust in me as [From.GetHerHis] Steward has made everyone in court dislike me!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]对我——[From.GetHerHis]财政总管的不信任使宫廷里的每一个人都不喜欢我！

original: Well then [From.GetSheHe] should get a new Steward!
translation: 好吧，那[From.GetSheHe]就该找个新的财政总管！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s distrust in me as [From.GetHerHis] Spymaster has made everyone in court dislike me!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]对我——[From.GetHerHis]间谍总管的不信任使宫廷里的每一个人都不喜欢我！

original: Somehow the rumors at court is all about me lacking piety!
translation: 不知怎的，宫廷全是关于我缺乏虔诚的谣言！

original: Everybody 'knows' I am a big, fat coward!
translation: 所有人都「知道」我是一个臃肿肥胖的胆小鬼。

original: While I was busy preparing for my feast, a troop of wandering jongleurs arrived at the castle. They looked a bit ragged but their performance entertained the whole castle. Perhaps I should think about offering them my patronage.
translation: 正当我在准备一场盛大的宴会，一群吟游诗人来到了我的城堡。他们衣衫褴褛，但是他们给了我们一场精彩的表演。是否邀请他们参加这场宴会。

original: They will be perfect entertainment for the feast!
translation: 我将邀请他们参加这场盛大的宴会！

original: The wandering minstrel entered the castle singing and did not stop until he found me. With a flourishing bow and one long, sad tone from his lute he finished his song and asked for my patronage.
translation: 一位流浪音乐家来的了我的城堡，他开始演唱直到他看到了我；他请求我能给他点吃的。

original: I was just looking for some entertainment for my feast!
translation: 我正好在寻找参加宴会的演出人员！

original: You are not quite what I am looking for...

Everybody was talking about the musicians and I finally had some time off from the preparations for my feast so I could see with my own eyes and hear with my own ears what people was talking about. The musicians were good, and they were looking for a patron.
translation: 大家都在谈论一群音乐家，在我终于忙完了宴会的准备工作后，我有幸亲眼见识了这群音乐家，他们很优秀并且正在寻求一位雇主。

original: I want to offer you my patronage

The best part about preparing a feast is deciding what foodstuff to serve. I must purchase venison, boar and duck, spices, wine and ale, honey for the desserts, cheeses and perhaps even a swan or a peacock.
translation: 准备宴会最美妙的工作是决定要使用哪些食物。鹿肉、野猪、鸭、香料、葡萄酒、啤酒、蜂蜜和乳酪，也需还需要只天鹅或者孔雀。

original: I will spend lavishly on food
Spend enough on food to satisfy everyone's hunger
I don't want to spend too much on food

Steward [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] has grave news: part of the castle, where the guests would be staying, would have to be repaired or else [Root.job_treasurer.GetSheHe] couldn't guarantee the guests safety. It would be rather costly but [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] assured me the repairs would be worth the cost.
translation: 财政总管[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]带来了一个坏消息：城堡的一些地方需要修理，否则[Root.job_treasurer.GetSheHe]不能保证待在城堡的来宾的安全。这可能会花很多钱，但是[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]保证这是物有所值的。

original: Just repair it, I don't care about the cost!
translation: 修吧，花多少钱我也不在乎！

original: Bands of robbers are roaming in [Root.Location.GetName] and their very presence threatens my soon to be arriving guests!
translation: 一群土匪在[Root.Location.GetName]周围游荡，这威胁到了将要来到的各位客人的安全！

original: I send Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] to deal with them
translation: 我将派军事总管[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]去对付他们！

original: They haven't killed anyone yet, right?
translation: 他们还没杀任何人，不是吗？

original: The fire blasted right past my face and I felt how my hair started to curl away from the fire. The fire-eater had been a bit too careless for my taste, but his troop and he was clearly greatly skilled.
translation: 魔术师的喷火表演太不小心了，火舌贴面而过，我的头发被烤的卷曲；不过他们的技艺的确不错！

original: The guests would be impressed if they entertained at my feast
translation: 宾客们将会对这次宴会留下深刻的印象！

original: Too dangerous! I don't want my guests to catch fire
translation: 真危险！我不想让宾客被烧到。

original: The conjurer produced a rabbit from a hat, then made a handkerchief change color from brown to red and then he simply vanished from the room, only to knock on the door and open it a few seconds later!
translation: 魔术表演真是精彩！首先是帽子里面变出只兔子，接着又表演了将一块手帕从棕色变为红色；最精彩的，魔术师突然在房间里消失，几秒后他从房门出走了进来！

original: No feast is complete without boar meat. Who will get the prestigious task of hunting and slaying the boars needed for the feast?
translation: 没有野猪肉的宴会是不完整的，谁将去接受猎取野猪的光荣任务？

original: I will hunt the boars myself
Most of the preparations for the feast has been made, now I only have to send out the invitations!
translation: 宴会的筹备工作基本完成，现在只需要发出请帖了！

original: Dear [Root.GetBestName], I hereby invite you to the grand feast in [From.Location.GetName]. Your presence at the feast would be greatly appreciated and I look forward to your attendance.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 亲爱的[Root.GetBestName]，我在此邀请您参加在[From.Location.GetName]的宴会。真诚地希望您能参加宴会，我在此期待您的光临。\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I will travel to the feast
I will attend this feast over my dead body!

translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]对[Root.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝参加宴会感到非常失望

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I thank you for your invitation but I will not be able to attend your feast. In fact, I refuse to set my foot in the same castle as you!

Respectfully,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，非常感激您的邀请，但我实在无法参加这次宴会。事实上，我根本不想来到你城堡！

敬礼，

[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Well I don't like you either!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] greeted us warmly to [From.GetHerHis] feast, wine was served and the most delicious aromas came from the kitchen.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]热烈欢迎大家光临[From.GetHerHis]宴会，美酒和美食已经奉上。

original: Much thought and consideration had been put into the courses served at [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s feast. The venison was so tender it almost melted on the tongue, the boar delicious, the cheeses many and palatable, but the dessert outdid all the other dishes: a large cake with cream, honey and berries...
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的宴会准备的非常用心。鹿肉是那么的嫩，入口即化；可口而充足的奶酪；但甜点胜过了其他所有的菜：一个奶油蜂蜜水果大蛋糕……

original: People are starving and you serve this abundance of food?
translation: 朱门酒肉臭，路有冻死骨

original: I will just keep quiet about the food

The courses at the feast were few but palatable. We were served venison, some sort of fowl, a few cheeses, bread and a small dessert. It was not really the abundance of food I had expected [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] to serve at [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] feast.
translation: 宴会准备的中规中矩。我们有鹿肉，一些家禽、蛋糕、面包和小甜点。[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]在[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]宴会上提供的食物并不如我所预想中那么丰富。

original: This is good enough for me

Instead of the venison, the boar and all kinds of cheeses I had thought [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] would serve at [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] feast, we were served courses that could have been served at dinner at a much poorer [Root.Liege.GetManWoman]'s table.
translation: 与我想要东西相反，鹿肉、野猪肉以及各种蛋糕在[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]提供的[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]宴会都没有。我想我们可能是在一个穷困潦倒的[Root.Liege.GetManWoman]的餐桌上。

original: The dishes reflects your temperance, well done!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is glad [Root.GetTitledFirstName] liked the food at the feast
Is this what you serve your guests? Shame on you!
translation: 这就是你的待客之道？真为你感到羞耻！

original: It is not my place to criticise the food
translation: 我没有批评这些食物的资格

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] spoke up and told everyone how great the food at my feast was. I was really glad someone was kind enough to say something nice about the food, given how hard I had worked to ensure that food was the best part of the feast.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]向大家发言，让大家看看宴会上的食物是多么的精致。我尽了最大努力保证食物是宴会里最有亮点的，也真高兴有一些朋友对食物给予了好评。

original: That was well spoken, thank you

Some of my guests did not seem satisfied with the food, but I would never have thought one of them would have complained out loud! [From.GetTitledFirstName] said a lot of nasty stuff about the food and I couldn't help but feel irritated.
translation: 一些客人似乎并不满意这些食物，但我绝没想到[From.GetTitledFirstName]大声地辱骂这些食物，让我没法不发火！

original: If you don't have something nice to say, shut up!
translation: 假如你不会说话，别乱叫！

original: I was seated besides a person I had never really talked with before. We ended up together in the garden with a couple of bottles from [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s well-stocked wine cellar.
translation: 我的座席在一位我从未真正与之交谈过的人的边上。我们最后一起在花园里喝了几瓶酒，它们是来自[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的储酒充盈的窖藏。

original: I think I have made a new friend
translation: 我想我已经交了个新朋友

original: I enjoyed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s company and we talked in the garden for several hours until we both fell asleep, maybe because of all that wine we drank...
translation: 我和[From.GetTitledFirstName]一起在花园里聊了几个小时，直到我们都感觉有点困了，也许我们喝醉了……

original: The feast was great but I couldn't stand [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s irritating voice for more than a couple of hours, so I excused myself, grabbed a couple of wine bottles and headed for a quiet corner. Someone else had had the same thought as me and together we shared the wine and our dislike for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 宴会非常精彩，除了[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]这个家伙不停制造着噪音，我实在忍受不了了。我拿了瓶酒坐在角落里喝了起来，并且发现了一个和我有同样遭遇的人，然后我们互相倾诉了对[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的厌恶。

original: Our mutual dislike made us friends!
Their mutual dislike of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] made [This.GetTitledFirstName] and [Root.GetTitledFirstName] become friends
When we had escaped from [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s feast we shared the wine [From.GetTitledFirstName] brought and talked about our mutual dislike for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 当我们一起离开[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的宴会，我们一边喝[From.GetTitledFirstName]买的酒一边谈论那令人讨厌的[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: The enemy of my enemy is my friend, right?
translation: 敌人的敌人是朋友，不是吗？

original: I challenge you to a duel!
I wouldn't want to spoil the feast

When [From.GetTitledFirstName] challenged me to a duel in front of everyone at the feast I felt almost ashamed for [From.GetHerHim], to challenge someone when both are guests in another man's house is unheard of!
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]在宴会上向我发起决斗，我对[From.GetHerHim]感到非常的恼火，当着宾客的面在他人的屋子里发起挑战真是闻所未闻！

original: I don't want to spoil the feast, let us do this another time
translation: 我不想毁了这场宴会，换个时间吧！

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] was gracious to let us duel in [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] garden and provided us with a sword each. I attacked first.
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]非常亲切地让我们在[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]花园里进行决斗，并且给了我们每人一把剑。我首先发起了攻击。

original: The duel is over and my opponent [From.GetTitledFirstName] lies...
translation: 决斗结束了，我的对手[From.GetTitledFirstName]倒下了……

original: I have nothing I want to say to you...
I had a lovely dinner neighbor and after some wine we were both a bit drunk and, if I read the situation correctly, more than attracted to each other.
translation: 我的旁边坐着个可爱的家伙，我们都有点醉了，越发觉得对方那么地有吸引力。
但是我们都已经结婚了……

original: May I suggest we retreat to a more private place?
translation: 也许我们应该找个隐秘的地方？

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] and [Root.GetTitledFirstName] slipped away unnoticed from the feast together
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]和[Root.GetTitledFirstName]一起从宴会上偷偷溜走了

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I ended up in a room with a big bed in the middle of the room. Despite the wine and the obvious attraction between us, it suddenly felt a bit awkward being alone together.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]和我来到了一间大床房。都说酒后乱性，但是孤男寡女共处一室还是有些尴尬。

original: [From.GetFirstName] kissed me and we fell onto the bed...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]吻了我，然后我们忍不住上了床……

original: I kissed [From.GetFirstName] and we fell onto the bed...
translation: 我吻了[From.GetFirstName]，然后我们忍不住上了床……

original: The awkwardness of the situation made me leave the room
translation: 尴尬的情况让我离开了房间

original: I have often thought about the feast when I and [From.GetTitledFirstName] spent a night together. Unfortunately, the night resulted in an unwanted pregnancy...
translation: 我经常想起与[From.GetTitledFirstName]度过的那个夜晚；不幸的是，这使她怀孕了……
……现在[From.GetFirstName]的丈夫[From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]把我看成了死敌

original: The wine flowed at [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s feast and whenever I emptied my cup a servant refilled it.
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的宴会提供了充足的酒水，每当我喝完一杯，就有仆人给我倒满。

original: No more wine for me, please

The wine was so smooth and good to drink it took a while before I realized I had drunk too much. In fact, I only realized it when [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s Steward [Root.Liege.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] asked me if I needed anything and I threw up on [Root.Liege.job_treasurer.GetHerHis] shoes.
translation: 酒是那么地美味，当[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的财政总管[Root.Liege.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]询问我是否需要些什么，而我吐在了[Root.Liege.job_treasurer.GetHerHis]鞋子上，我才意识的我喝得太多了。

original: Sorry! The wine do not agree with me...
translation: 对不起，我想这酒不适合我……

original: [Root.GetTreasurerName] [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] had noticed [From.GetTitledFirstName] had drunk too much wine and was trying to to dissuade [From.GetHerHim] from drinking any more when [From.GetTitledFirstName] threw up on [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]'s shoes.
translation: [Root.GetTreasurerName][Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]已经注意到[From.GetTitledFirstName]喝了太多的葡萄酒并且试图劝说[From.GetHerHim]不要再喝了，这时[From.GetTitledFirstName]吐到了[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]的鞋子上。

original: I vaguely remembered [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s feast when I woke up next morning, I remembered the wine but I did not remember getting to the bed I was lying in.
translation: 第二天早起时，我依稀想起昨天参加了[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的宴会，并且喝得烂醉如泥，但是我不记得是怎么到这张床的了。

original: I think I fell asleep at the table, the wine made me sleepy
translation: 我想我在桌子上睡着了，美酒引人陶醉

original: The more wine [From.GetTitledFirstName] drank, the more and louder [From.GetSheHe] talked and laughed until [From.GetSheHe] let out a loud snoring and fell face first into [From.GetHerHis] plate. The servants discreetly removed [From.GetTitledFirstName] from the table and took [From.GetHerHim] to a bedchamber.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]喝得越多，[From.GetSheHe]说出的醉话就越多，发出的笑声就越大，直到最后[From.GetSheHe]开始打鼾，还把脸撞进了[From.GetHerHis]盘子。仆人们小心地将[From.GetTitledFirstName]从桌子上扶起来并且把[From.GetHerHim]带到了休息室。

original: When I traveled to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s feast a band of highway robbers attacked me and my retinue. We managed to fend them off and barely escaped with our lives.
translation: 当我去[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的宴会的途中，一伙拦路劫匪攻击了我的队伍。我们击败了他们，侥幸死里逃生。

original: Can't [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] make sure the roads are safe?
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]难道不能让这里的治安安全点吗？

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] complains to [This.GetTitledFirstName] about the band of highway robbers
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was attacked on [From.GetHerHis] way here by the band of highway robbers that roams the county [Root.Location.GetName]!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]在[From.GetHerHis]路途中被横行于[Root.Location.GetName]省份的拦路劫匪攻击！

original: During [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s feast, a servant spilled wine all over my finest garb ruining its white fabric completely. I grabbed my knife and cut his throat, then returned to my seat and kept eating.
translation: 在[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的宴会中，一个仆人将酒撒在了我华贵的外套上，将其白色的织边弄脏了。我拿起餐刀割了他的喉咙，然后返回我的位置接着吃东西。

original: I should have made him pay for the garb before I killed him
translation: 在杀了他之前，我本该先让他赔偿这件外套！

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] reacts to the killing of [This.GetHerHis] servant
[From.GetTitledFirstName] cut the throat of one of my servants when the clumsy man spilled wine over [From.GetHerHis] garb!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]割断了我一个仆人的喉咙，因为这个笨拙的家伙弄脏了[From.GetHerHis]外套！

original: After having been insulted and been the butt of the jokes for far too long, my patience with my court jester was beginning to run out. One last joke and I don't know what I will do...
translation: 我受够了这卑劣的玩笑的侮辱，我对我的宫廷小丑的耐心已经消耗殆尽。要是再开我的玩笑，我不知道我会做什么……

original: That's it! Off to prison with you!
translation: 够了！把他给我丢进监狱！

original: I really shouldn't let [insulting_jester.GetHerHim] get on my nerves like this
translation: 我真的不应该让[insulting_jester.GetHerHim]把我气成这样。

original: reacts to how graciously [Root.GetTitledFirstName] puts up with [Root.GetHerHis] jester's jokes

It did not surprise me when [From.GetTitledFirstName] lost his temper when [From.GetHerHis] jester told a particularly nasty joke about [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetTitledFirstName] bellowed for [From.GetHerHis] guards to drag the jester down to the dungeons.
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]被[From.GetHerHis]小丑的一个关于[From.GetHerHim]的低俗的笑话弄得发脾气时，我并没有感到惊讶。[From.GetTitledFirstName]命令[From.GetHerHis]卫兵把这个小丑拖进了地牢。

original: Though, it was not suitable to throw the jester into the dungeon
translation: 尽管不该把这小丑投入地牢。

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s patience with the jokes [From.GetHerHis] jester told about [From.GetHerHim] was remarkable! A lesser [From.GetManWoman] would surely thrown the jester into [From.GetHerHis] dungeon.
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]对[From.GetHerHis]小丑开[From.GetHerHim]玩笑的容忍力真令人吃惊。稍微容忍力低点的[From.GetManWoman]一定会把这个小丑扔进[From.GetHerHis]地牢。

original: What would a feast be without entertainment? The jongleurs' dexterity and skill impressed and captivated my guests, making me very pleased with them.
translation: 宴会怎能没有吟游诗人助兴？灵巧和技艺迷住了我的客人，让我十分庆幸雇佣了他们。

original: The jongleurs [From.GetTitledFirstName] had hired for the feast impressed and captivated all of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s guests with their dexterity and skill, including me.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]聘请的吟游诗人用他们的灵巧和技艺迷住了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的包括我在内的所有客人。

original: The minstrel sang and the ladies wept, the minstrel sang and the lords laughed. His performance at my feast was above my expectations and I congratulated myself for hiring him.
translation: 吟游诗人开始演唱，时而女士垂泪，时而领主大笑，他的演奏远超我的预计，我暗自庆幸雇佣了它。

original: Sing that ballad once more, please!
I am not ashamed to admit I both laughed and cried when the minstrel sang. The minstrel's performance at [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s feast was extraordinary!
translation: 我不羞于承认当吟游诗人开始弹唱时我时而欢笑，时而痛哭，[From.GetTitledFirstName]宴会上的吟游诗人的弹唱神乎其技！

original: I loved every minute of it!
translation: 我喜欢演出的每一分钟！

original: The musicians played and my guests danced. I made certain I danced with several different persons and I think we all had great fun!
translation: 乐师演奏着而我的客人们在跳舞，我确信我换了几个不同的舞伴。而我们都跳得很愉快！

original: I danced and danced until my face was red and my feet hurt, then I took a short pause and then danced some more. The musicians at [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s feast played so good it was hard to stay still.
translation: 我跳呀跳呀直到我脸色通红双脚发酸，我休息了下然后又跳了一会。[From.GetTitledFirstName]宴会上的音乐家演奏的真棒，使得我随歌起舞。

original: I don't want to stop dancing!

People exclaimed in wonder and fear when the fire-eaters performed. After their performance was over many eyebrows and beards were singed but none of the guests seemed to care when they applauded the fire-eaters.
translation: 人们对喷火者的表演既好奇又恐惧。当表演完毕，许多人失去了眉毛或胡子，但是他们并不在意，而为喷火者鼓掌。

original: I managed to save both my eyebrows this time!
translation: 我这次保住了自己的一对眉毛！

original: The fire-eaters exited the room unharmed, but the rest of us were slightly singed and some eyebrows could be seen missing. None of us cared though, their performance had been spectacular!
translation: 喷火者安然无恙地离开房间，但是我们中的其它人轻微烧伤，有些人失去了眉毛，但是我们不在乎，他们的表演真是壮观！

original: The conjurer's magic tricks enchanted and charmed my guests at the feast, the women squealed with delight when he produced a rabbit from his hat and the men laughed when he made my crown disappear and then found it under the jester's hat!
translation: 魔术师的魔术使得我的客人如痴如醉，当他从帽子里抓出只兔子时妇女们齐声尖叫，当他将我的王冠变没而最终在小丑的帽子下找到它的时候，男士们放声大笑！

original: I laughed so hard when the conjurer first made [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s crown disappear I was afraid I would snort wine through my nose! The feast was great but the conjurer really made the night special.
translation: 当魔术师第一次将[From.GetTitledFirstName]的王冠变没了的时候我笑的那么厉害，使得我害怕我喝的葡萄酒会从鼻子里笑出来！宴会固然很棒，但魔术师使得这一晚令人难忘。

original: Do it again! Do it again!
translation: 再表演一次！再表演一次！

original: I made sure the most beautiful lady would be my dinner partner and during the feast I kept refilling both our wine glasses. My charm and my winning smile made it impossible for her to stay unresponsive, it didn't take long until she looked at me with more than interest in her eyes...
translation: 我确信这位美丽的夫人将会是我晚餐的伙伴，在宴会上我不停地为我们俩续杯，我的魅力和动人的微笑使得她不可能不理解我的暗示，没过多久，她的眼里就不止是好奇了……

original: I like to flirt, but I wouldn't do anything more than that
translation: 我喜欢调情，但是我不会做在此之上的任何事情

original: I'd like to show you the castle, especially my bedchamber...
translation: 我很乐意带你参观我的城堡，尤其是我的卧室……

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] gives [This.GetTitledFirstName] a tour of the castle and [Root.GetHerHis] bedchamber especially...
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]带领[This.GetTitledFirstName]参观了城堡，尤其是[Root.GetHerHis]卧室……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] took me on a quick tour of [From.GetHerHis] castle and we ended up in [From.GetHerHis] bedchamber...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]带着我参观了[From.GetHerHis]城堡，我们最后到了[From.GetHerHis]卧室……

original: [From.GetFirstName] kissed me and I kissed [From.GetHerHim] back and we ended up in the bed...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]吻了我而我回吻了[From.GetHerHim]然后我们同床共枕……

original: A night of passion came with a prize...
translation: 激情一夜最终得到了回报……

original: We should return to the others now...
translation: 我们现在需要回到大家那儿去……

original: The night of passion [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I shared resulted in an unwanted pregnancy, and [From.GetHerHis] husband [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] is not happy about the news...
translation: 我和[From.GetTitledFirstName]的销魂一夜使得她意外怀孕，而[From.GetHerHis]丈夫[From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]不会对这个消息感到高兴……

original: I started talking to one of my guests at the feast and found them most interesting. Hours flew by, wine bottles were emptied, other guests excused themselves and went to bed but we kept talking until the wee hours...
translation: 我开始与一位客人聊天，发现他们谈吐风趣，时间流转，美酒已空，他人已入梦乡而吾等交谈至天明……

original: I haven't ever met a more fascinating person!
translation: 我从没遇到这么棒的人！

original: I had so much fun talking to [From.GetTitledFirstName] I forgot the other guests and the time. When we finally emerged from our latest discussion we realized the other guests had gone to sleep and it was early in the morning.
translation: 我和[From.GetTitledFirstName]聊得很愉快以至于我忽视了其他客人和时间。当我们聊完最后一个话题以后，发现大家都睡着了，天已破晓。

original: We have to do this again, soon!
translation: 我们必须立刻再做一次！

original: Some of the guests were invited with a ulterior motive, I want their titles! I had trouble finding one of them alone long enough to set my plan in motion and I was about to scrap it altogether when I finally saw one of them, alone, in the garden...
translation: 一些客人被我邀请来参加鸿门宴，我想要他们的头衔！但是我发现我找不到他们独处的时机，我差不多绝望到要放弃，直到最后我发现其中一位在花园里独自一人……

original: I have something important I need to discuss with you...
translation: 我有很重要的事情和你讨论……

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] tries to negotiate with [This.GetTitledFirstName] about the title
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]试图和[This.GetTitledFirstName]就头衔问题进行谈判

original: I have enough titles, I don't need one more
translation: 我的头衔足够多，我不需要多一个

original: Yes, I will grant you the title
translation: 是的，我会授予你这个头衔

original: I refuse to give you the title!
After several hours of negotiation [From.GetTitledFirstName] agreed to grant me the title. We returned to the feast together and drank a toast to our agreement.
translation: 几个小时的交涉之后，[From.GetTitledFirstName]同意授予我头衔。我们回到宴会上，为我们的协议干杯。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to give me the title I sought after!
I saw the most beautiful girl at the feast and I decided I would try to charm her. She responded to my advances and started making her own, should I take this further?
translation: 我在宴会上看到了我见过最美丽的女孩，我决定跟她调情。她回应了我的暗示，并也开始向我暗示，我是不是应该更进一步？

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] approves of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s harmless flirting with [This.GetHerHis] daughter
I'll give her a good tumble!

I saw [From.GetTitledFirstName] together with my daughter and kept a close eye on them. It seemed harmless, just a boy and a girl flirting, but I was relieved when [From.GetTitledFirstName] left my daughter to talk with someone else.
translation: 我看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]和我的女儿在一起，眼神很亲密。看上去没什么关系，不过是男孩女孩一起调调情，不过当[From.GetTitledFirstName]离开我女儿和别人聊天时，我还是松了一口气。

original: I watched as my daughter and [From.GetTitledFirstName] started talking, flirting with each other. When they left, hand in hand, I had to stop myself from getting up and stalking after them. The looks they gave each other the next day confirmed what I had feared yesterday: [From.GetFirstName] seduced my little girl!
translation: 我看着我的女儿和[From.GetTitledFirstName]开始聊天，调情。当他们离开的时候，手牵手，我不得不强迫自己不要起来跟踪他们。第二天他们给对方的表情证实了我昨天的恐惧：[From.GetFirstName]诱奸了我的小女儿。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is told about [This.GetHerHis] son seducing [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s daughter
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] asks for [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s support in this matter
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] humbly asks [This.GetTitledFirstName] to make this right
My son seduced [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s daughter at my feast and now [From.GetSheHe] is very angry!
translation: 我的儿子在我的宴会上勾引了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的女儿，现在[From.GetSheHe]十分生气！

original: Well, what can I do? Nothing!
translation: 好吧，我能做什么？我也没办法！

original: I did not realize the young, beautiful lady I seduced at the feast were [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s daughter! [From.GetSheHeCap] spluttered with anger but I could still make out what [From.GetSheHe] called me...
translation: 我没有意识到我在宴会上认识的那位年轻貌美的女士是[From.GetTitledFirstName]的女儿！[From.GetSheHeCap]愤怒得语无伦次，但是我能明白[From.GetSheHe]是在责骂我……

original: There's nothing I can do about it now

[From.GetTitledFirstName] came humbly to me and told me how my son had seduced [From.GetHerHis] young, innocent daughter. [From.GetSheHeCap] did not demand anything of me, just seemed upset and I could not really make out how [From.GetSheHe] wanted me to deal with this situation.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]谦卑地告诉我我的儿子勾引了[From.GetHerHis]年轻无知的女儿。[From.GetSheHeCap]不想向我要求什么，但是他看上去很沮丧，我也不知道[From.GetSheHe]想让我怎么解决这个事。

original: Is there anything I can do?

The young, beautiful lady I seduced at the feast was none other than [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s daughter! Although [From.GetTitledFirstName] had every right to be upset with me, [From.GetSheHe] offered no advice on how I could make this right.
translation: 那个我勾引过的年轻貌美的女士是[From.GetTitledFirstName]的女儿！尽管[From.GetTitledFirstName]完全有权利对我不爽，但[From.GetSheHe]并没能提出什么纠正错误的办法。

original: Let us forget this ever happened, eh?
translation: 让我们都忘了这件事吧，嗯？

original: Not long after the feast, my daughter started to get sick in the mornings and showed all symptoms of being with child. Her little flirt at the feast must have gotten her pregnant!
translation: 宴会结束后不久，我的女儿某天早上开始不舒服，表现得就像怀了孩子。那次和别人的调情让她怀孕了！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s daughter is pregnant and [From.GetSheHe] demands that I marry her!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]的女儿怀孕了而[From.GetSheHe]要求我娶她！

original: My son's flirt with [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s daughter lead to an unexpected pregnancy and now [From.GetTitledFirstName] demands that my son marry her!
translation: 我儿子和[From.GetTitledFirstName]的女儿调情，结果不小心让对方怀孕了，现在[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求我的儿子娶她！

original: My son have to learn from his mistakes, I accept
translation: 我的儿子必须吸取教训，我接受

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is forced to marry the vassal's pregnant daughter
My son will never marry your daughter!
translation: 我的儿子绝对不会娶你的女儿！

original: I had never thought my [GetFromRelation] would force me to marry the girl I seduced at the feast! She is pregnant and her father demands that I marry her.
translation: 我从没想过我的[GetFromRelation]会强迫我娶那个我在宴会上勾引过的女孩！她怀孕了，而且她父亲要求我娶她。

original: Looks like I have no other choice...
translation: 看上去我没有别的选择……

original: I have given the orders for a Great Feast to be hosted in [Root.Location.GetName]. Let the preparations begin...
translation: 我下令在[Root.Location.GetName]举办一场盛大的宴会。让我们开始准备吧……

original: And all my vassals will be there...
translation: 我所有的封臣都会去那里……

original: The last of the guests has returned home and everyone agreed it was this year's greatest feast.
translation: 最后一个客人回家了，所有人都同意这是今年最好的一次宴会。

original: I had great fun and so did everyone else
translation: 我玩的很愉快，所有人都是

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s feast is over and it is time to begin the long way home. After the food, the entertainment and the warmth, the real world suddenly feels cold and hostile.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]的宴会结束了，是时候踏上回家的路了。在品食，享乐和热情之后，真实的世界让人觉得无比寒冷和充满敌意。

original: Will there be a feast next year?
I have to cancel the feast due to the war I am currently fighting against one of my enemies. Perhaps after the war I might throw a victory feast.
translation: 因为战争，我必须取消宴会，因为现在得和敌人战斗。也许战斗结束后，我可以开一次庆功宴。

original: A letter to all invited is sent out to announce the cancellation of the feast
translation: 宣布宴会取消的信件寄给了所有被邀请的人

original: Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName], due to the unfortunate war I have to cancel the feast. I hope you will be able to attend the victory fest I plan to have after the war.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，因为这场不幸的战争，我必须取消宴会。战争结束以后，我希望你能参加我的庆功宴。\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Ask me then and we'll see
Let us hold a tournament the like of which is only rumored. We will never hold another one in our reign.
translation: 让我们举办一场只在传说中存在的比武大会。我们的御期内将不会再有此盛况了。

original: Let all knights of the realm be invited
translation: 让所有境内的骑士都参加

original: A courier has come forth inviting all knights of the realm to attend a grand tournament, the like of which is only seen once per reign.
translation: 一位廷臣已经派去邀请境内所有骑士参加比武大会，像这样的盛事每位君主的统治中只能见到一次。

original: A chance to prove our worth
translation: 一个证明我们价值的机会

original: A foolish risk for fleeting glory.
translation: 一次为了虚荣的愚蠢冒险。

original: Sadly a small war will delay this
translation: 遗憾的是一场小型战争让这些推迟了

original: The tournament is over and now it is time to bask in the glory.
translation: 比武结束，是时候欢庆胜利了。

original: The Tournament ends and although I may not have won any of the melee events my prowess did not go unnoticed.
translation: 比武结束了，虽然我没有赢得任何肉搏比武，我的实力是不容忽视的。

original: The Tournament ends and I have shown time and time again that my glory in arms, even if I did not win I still covered myself in glory.
translation: 比武结束了，我一次又一次地展现了我武艺的风采，即使我没有赢得比武，依然给我带来了荣耀。

original: The Tournament ends and it was a terrible moment, but it was one time only. I still hear their laughter.
translation: 比武真是个可怕的时刻，虽然只上了一次，但是我仍然能听见他们的嘲笑。

original: The Tournament ends and I was vanquished in the early rounds. Personally I blame my squire, but people did not see it that way.
translation: 比武结束了，我在前几轮就被淘汰了。我个人觉得是自己侍从的错，但是别人并不这么想。

original: I know they snigger behind my back.
translation: 我知道他们在背后嘲笑我。

original: The Tournament ends and although I did not win I felt many lessons were learnt.
translation: 比武结束了，尽管我没赢，但是我汲取了很多教训。

original: The Tournament ends and my tactics were poor, people doubt my abilities now.
translation: 比武结束了，我的战绩很糟糕，现在人们在怀疑我的能力。

original: I felt my armor was strong and my training was first rate. Sadly it failed and I felt the icy chill as the steel carved into my flesh. My eyes grew heavy and sight grew dim.
translation: 我觉得我的盔甲很坚固，我的技术是一流的，但是很不幸，我感觉到冰冷的利刃切入了我的肌肉。我的眼皮变得沉重，视线变得模糊。

original: The melee was going well when the mace came crashing down upon me, I managed to block it but my shield shatter under the force of the blow. The next swing came crashing down and the darkness overtook me.
translation: 混战中一切都很顺利，直到狼牙棒猛地砸在了我的身上，我设法挡住了它，但是盾牌在打击下变得粉碎。然后我倒在地上，黑暗把我包围。

original: When I awoke I was maimed.
I sought out a worthy foe man in the melee, but he came upon me and I parried the first thrust. The follow up was too quick for me and a jolt of pain shot through my body.
translation: 混战中我找到了对等的对手，他冲到了我的面前，我挡住了他的第一招但是下一招对我来说太快了，然后痛苦占据了我的身体。
我的脸颊在耻辱下发烧。

original: The melee was fought and I went boldly forth, while other stood back I charged forth headless of my own safety.
translation: 混战开始，我大胆上前，其他人都在退后，只有我不顾安危向前冲锋。

original: They were all in awe with my manliness.
translation: 他们都佩服我的男子气概。

original: People felt my leadership skills were poor, some even called me misguided.  Then the tide of the melee turned  but in the heat of battle my voice rose above the others and my direction  turned the tide.
translation: 人们觉得我的领导才能很差，有些人甚至说我在误导。结果战斗陷入了僵局，但是在战斗最激烈的时候，我的声音盖过了其他人，并带领着人们逆转了战局。

original: I have been long renowned for my roughness, but in the recent melee the enemy took us by surprise and yet I still lead from the front and steered us to victory.
translation: 我很长时间里一直以彪悍为名，但是最近的一次混战中，敌人让我们很吃惊。但是最终我还是带领大家获得了胜利。

original: The melee was challenging and my skills were renowned. Our valiant foe men were had prepared well but if it wasn't a moment of brilliance by myself they would of triumphed
translation: 混战富有挑战性，而我的技艺也是久负盛名。我们的对手准备得很充分，要不是我片刻的灵光一现，他们就获胜了。

original: I am known for my brilliance but the enemy had developed a counter. Word has spread and my brilliance is diminished.
translation: 我因我精湛武艺而闻名，但是对手似乎已经有了一套反制我的招数，关于我的武艺大不如前的谣言传播开来。

original: My skills are well known, but it seems there is a counter. More have heard about it.
translation: 我的技艺是众所周知的，但越来越多的人听到的是相反的传言。

original: In a recent melee the toughness I habitually show has been proven to be misguided.
translation: 我习惯性的显摆强韧在最近的一次近身战中被证明是有误导性的。

original: Victory is mine, I triumphed in several Melee's proving once and for all that I am the champion.
translation: 我赢得了胜利，几次马上比武中的胜利再一次证明了我就是当之无愧的冠军。

original: Although I was not triumphant in the many melee's I was good enough to be declared second.
translation: 经过数次马上比武，虽然我不是最终的胜者，但是我能够骄傲的宣称我位居亚军。

original: A honorable third place was the result of my efforts in the Melee.
translation: 荣耀的季军是对我马上比武中努力的奖励。

original: Good but not quite Good enough
I was taking part in the tournament and enjoying the camaraderie with the other entrants when a queer feeling came over me.
translation: 我参加了比武大会，当享受着同其他参赛者的友谊时，一种奇怪的感觉涌上心头。

original: I dare not speak its name
Tournaments are such fun, and it is not just the taking part it is all the other entertainments available. Then I noticed a strange sore on my body in a place I would much rather not mention.
translation: 比武大会很有意思，不仅仅是参加比赛本身，其他的一些「娱乐」也很有趣。过了一段时间我注意到我身上一块最好不要向别人提起的地方上生起了溃疡。

original: The tournament did not go well, but not badly either. I had prepared for months for this and at the end of the day I was simply not good enough. I had turned to solace in drink. When it was over a few morning later I felt terrible and the hair of the dog seemed like the answer.
translation: 比武大会进行的并不是很好，但也不是太坏。为了取得胜利我准备了数个月，但是在最后关头我发现我还是不够好。我转而借酒浇愁。几个早上以后，我感觉极其糟糕，以毒攻毒，以酒解酒看来是个不错的主意。

original: While I was at the tournament some lower class type with pretensions insulted my honor. I could only do what a man of my class could do and challenged him to a duel. Naturally he was no match for me.
translation: 比武大会中我遇到一些胆敢挑战我荣耀的自负贱民。我只能做了我这个身份的人所能做的事：请他参加一场决斗。最后他自然只有落败的份。

original: I was at the tournament and although I did not have an opportunity to distinguish myself in the melee I was sitting around and listening two knights plot together to advantage themselves in the next bought. I listened carefully to their plan and I instantly saw the flaws.
translation: 我在比武大会中没有机会参加马上比武，所以我无所事事地在听两个骑士在一起策划如何在下一轮下注中获利。我仔细地听着他们的计划，马上就看出了计划中的瑕疵。

original: While at the tournament I was listening to some lesser Lordling describe how he collected tithes from his serfs. As I listened I realized he was giving his serf plenty of ways of avoiding giving their due.
translation: 比武大会举办过程中我一直听着一个小贵族讲诉他是如何从他的农奴那里课什一税。我在听的同时意识到他的课税方法给他的农奴们提供了许多逃税的可乘之机。

original: I kept this knowledge to myself
translation: 我把这些知识留给我自己

original: While at the tournament I joined in a conversation with other Lords on how best to collect tithes. I saw a far easier way and it caused quite an argument with many Lords disagreeing with my stance, but the more I talked the more I convinced myself that I was right.
translation: 比武大会举办过程中我加入了一个同其他贵族讨论如何最有效地课什一税的谈话。我提出了一种相当简洁的方法，但是许多贵族并不赞同我的方法，随着讨论的深入，我越来越觉得我是正确的。

original: But I am right, aren't I?

I was simply passing time at the tournament when I saw two knights argue over honor. I knew straight away that the argument was spurious and the result would be unnecessary bloodshed. So I stepped in and prevented it.
translation: 我一直在比武大会中消磨时间，直到看到有两个骑士就荣誉问题发生了争执。我知道这场争辩马上就会升级，并以一个血腥且不必要的结果收场。所以我上前去制止了他们。

original: I am more diplomatic than I thought.
There are many nobles that are good soldiers, but there are some I get along quite nicely with. This campaign has given me a true friend.
translation: 许多贵族都是优秀的战士，其中一些同我相处得十分融洽。这场战役给我带来了一个真正的朋友。

original: This campaign has been proof that [From.GetTitledName] is a good person to spend time with. I value [From.GetHerHis] opinion highly, and trust [From.GetHerHim] on the battlefield.
translation: 这场战役证明[From.GetTitledName]是一个值得交往的朋友。我十分看重[From.GetHerHis]意见，在战场上[From.GetHerHim]值得信任。

original: As I fought today, I noticed one enemy that had knocked down one of our noblemen and was about to get the killing blow. I threw myself forward and let my shield cover my comrade's body and struck a hard blow against my enemy.
translation: 在今天的战斗中，我注意到一个敌人正准备给我们一名倒地不起的贵族最后一击。我一边冲上前去用我的盾掩护战友，一边给了敌人一记猛击。

original: I thought I was going to die today, but [From.GetTitledName] saved my life. I will forever be grateful of [From.GetHerHis] actions on this day.
translation: 我以为今日我必死无疑，但[From.GetTitledName]救了我一命。我永远不会忘记今天[From.GetHerHis]英勇举动。

original: It is clear that there are unkempt buffoons in the army of our liege. I simply can't stand some of them, and one individual in particular is frustrating me to no end.
translation: 显然本座的领主的军队中存在粗野之人。我完全无法忍受其中一些人，有个人更是让我忍无可忍。
很明显他也是这样看我的

original: This campaign has been proof that [From.GetTitledName] is clearly not of proper blood. I wish I would never have to meet [From.GetHerHim] again.
translation: 这场战役证明[From.GetTitledName]根本就不具有纯正的血统。希望在接下来的时间里我不会再见到[From.GetHerHim]。

original: I had invited a monkey trainer to the Summer fair and the performance went well until one of the monkeys refused to ride on top of a pig. The trainer beat the monkey with a stick which led the other monkeys to attack the trainer, biting him and hitting him with his own stick.
translation: 我邀请了一位耍猴艺人在夏日园游会上进行表演，表演进行得十分顺利，直到一只猴子拒绝骑上一只猪。耍猴人用一根棍子抽打那只猴子，结果引得其他猴子抢了棍子、一起攻击它们的主人。

original: He shouldn't have beaten that poor creature
Here's your money, I don't ever want to see you here again
translation: 拿好你的钱，别让我在这个地方再看见你

original: The Summer Fair's Archery contest went very well. The clout and the space around it was filled with arrows, some of them had hit the bullseye, some of them had missed the clout altogether. The winner was a modest man who disappeared rather quickly after he collected his prize.
translation: 夏日园游会的箭术比赛进行得很顺利。箭靶和周围的空地上扎满了箭，有的箭正中靶心，有的则连靶边都没擦到。赢家是一个拿到奖金就匆匆离去的人。

original: So he was a good archer, a good poacher as well I think...
translation: 他是一名好弓手，但我觉得他同样是熟稔的偷猎者……

original: Marshal, find and arrest that man!
translation: 治安官，找到并拘禁那个人！

original: I wanted to talk to him!
I can't help but feel the prize was inadequate
translation: 我不得不说奖金给得不太合适。

original: The jester who performed during the Summer Fair ran around in his silly hat with bells, and before I knew it he hit me with his bauble! Everyone laughed at this and at his 'jokes', or rather his insults.
translation: 在夏日园游会上表演的小丑戴着他那挂着铃铛的小丑帽跑来跑去，突然他带着那些花哨的小玩意撞在了我的身上！看到他的「玩笑」、或者说冒犯，所有人都大笑起来。

original: Well, obviously he couldn't get a better job
translation: 呃，看来他天生就是一个当小丑的料。

original: If he jokes about me, then he has gone too far!
translation: 如果这是一个玩笑，他就做得太过火了！

original: If I pay him more, perhaps he will not joke about me
translation: 我付给他更多的钱，他就不会再开我的玩笑了

original: Mummers are singing outside the town houses while slowly moving towards my castle. The Summer Fair suddenly felt less pleasant as the mummers,  clad in strange clothes, went from door to door, singing and frightening small children.
translation: 化装艺人的游行队伍一边在城中高声唱歌，一边慢慢向我的城堡行进过来。同穿着奇装异服、挨家挨户造访、边唱歌边吓吓小孩的化装艺人相比，夏日园游会显得逊色不少。

original: If they think they will get in, they are wrong
translation: 如果他们觉得他们能进来，他们就错了

original: Yes, this is exactly what I don't need!
My vassal told me to not let them in, so I won't
translation: 我的封臣告诉我不要让他们进来。

original: I can't wait! I love mummers!
translation: 我已经迫不急待了！我爱化装艺人表演！

original: When the alderman asked for permission for a Summer Fair I could never have guessed I would regret that. After a Piepowder Court held in front of my own bailiff, they sentenced one of my vassals to being drawn in a tumbler across the town square!
translation: 当郡长请求我允许举行一场夏日园游会时，我永远不会想到我会为此多后悔。一个就在我自己的法警面前举办的灰脚法庭，居然宣判我的一个封臣要被装在一个滚筒里面、然后被拖过城镇广场！
我不敢相信他们竟会如此鲁莽！

original: This is what happens when the *beep* get power!
translation: 当「哔」掌权时自然就会发生这种事情！

original: They did exactly what they should have done
translation: 他们只是在尽自己应尽的职责

original: The strolling players had set up their scene and were rehearsing their lines for tonight's performance at the Summer Fair when I approached them.
translation: 一些巡回演出演员在夏日园游会中搭好了戏台，当我走近他们时，他们正在戏台上预排今晚的节目。

original: I'd prefer if you performed 'The Crusader Kings'
translation: 我希望你们能表演「十字军之王」

original: Theatre is a reflection of the world
translation: 戏剧是这个世界的倒影

original: Leave as soon as you are done
[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] wants you to join us for supper
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]希望你们能同我们共进晚餐

original: Even if the church frowns upon jugglers and calls them 'gleemen', I enjoy their humorous and bawdy acts during the Summer Fair.
translation: 虽然教会看不起那些被他们称为「小丑」的杂耍艺人，我倒挺喜欢他们在夏日园游会期间表演的那些幽默的黄段子。

original: One of them can juggle nine apples at the same time!
translation: 他们中的一个人可以同时在空中交替轮换九个苹果！

original: The church does not like fun things
translation: 教会不喜欢有趣的东西

original: If the church doesn't like it, should I really like it?
translation: 如果教会不喜欢杂耍表演，那我应该喜欢它吗？
最后他们倒在一起的场景很有趣

original: Every Summer Fair, mages and diviners flock to read signs, events and omens. Their interpretation of such things are often exaggerated but there are still people who believe in their rituals and interpretations.
translation: 每次夏日园游会都有成群结队的法师和占卜者来为人们卜吉占凶。他们对未来的预测常常是夸夸其谈的，但是仍然有不少人相信他们那些神秘的仪式与对未来的预测。
允许他们留在夏日园游会

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] disapproves of the diviners and mages
Banish them from the Summer Fair
translation: 将他们从夏日园游会中赶出去

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] does not care about the pagan mages and diviners that flock at Summer Fairs to lure honest people from their hard-earned pennies and make them believe their ridiculous interpretations of everyday life!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]不在乎让夏日园游会上那些异教的法师与占卜者骗走那些诚实人的血汗钱的同时，居然还让他们相信那些对他们日常生活的荒谬预测！

original: Why do you allow them to deceive people?
translation: 为什么你允许他们欺骗人民？

original: An errant monk is disturbing the Summer Fair by preaching about sins and the end of the world. His drivel is frightening some, but most of the crowd around him is mocking and laughing at him.
