translation: 一名流浪僧人在夏日园游会中进行着关于原罪与世界末日的布道。虽然他的胡话的确吓到了一些人，但他的大多数听众却在嘲笑他。

original: He's just another part of the entertainment
translation: 他只是一项额外的娱乐项目而已

original: Kick him out, he does not belong at the Summer Fair
translation: 他和夏日园游会格格不入，踢他出去！

original: The errant monk preaching about the end of the world and sins is attracting quite a crowd. Most of them are laughing at and mocking him, but some look terrified and some are listening intently. [From.GetTitledFirstName] does not seem to appreciate the seriousness of this!
translation: 流浪僧人对于原罪与世界末日的布道吸引了不少群众。虽然他的大多数听众在嘲笑他，但是一些人看起来被吓坏了，还有些人听得专心致志。[From.GetTitledFirstName]不会对这件事感到高兴的！

original: Kick him out! He's clearly disturbing the peasants
translation: 很明显他在妖言惑众，踢他出去！

original: Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] caught the peddlers selling stolen goods red-handed!
translation: 军事总管[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]当场抓住了贩卖赃物的小贩！

original: Seize his goods and lock him up!
translation: 没收赃物后将他关进监狱！

original: is annoyed with [Root.GetTitledFirstName] decision about letting the peasants in
translation: 被[Root.GetTitledFirstName]关于农民进城的决议惹恼

original: Restrict the peasants access to the city
During the Summer Fair, the peasants are pouring in through the gates of [Root.Location.GetName] and [From.GetTitledFirstName] does not care at all!
translation: 夏日园游会期间，蜂拥而来的农民穿过[Root.Location.GetName]的城门，而[From.GetTitledFirstName]居然一点都不在乎！

original: My beautiful city! How can you let this happen?
translation: 我美丽的城市！你怎么能让这种事发生了？

original: The peddlers are loading their wares and the merchants are taking down their stalls. The jugglers, strolling players and the other entertainers are preparing to leave. The Summer Fair is over for this year.
translation: 小贩开始将他们的货物装车，商人开始收拾他们的货摊。那些杂耍艺人、巡回演员以及其他的表演者都开始准备离开了。今年的夏日园游会就此结束。

original: It was great fun while it lasted
translation: 真是一次极为有趣的体验

original: This should make the peasants happy...
translation: 这样应该会让那些农民开心……

original: I have sent forth messengers around the realm to spread the word that a grand tournament be held
translation: 我已经向领地全境派出信使，散布我们即将举行一场盛大的比武大赛的消息。
比武大赛即将拉开帷幕

original: I had been hearing a voice for some time now but I couldn't quite place it. Then I felt its presence fill me and it did not feel divine.
translation: 一段时间以来，我的脑中一直回荡着一个声音，但是我却辨别不出是谁的声音。我感到一种并不神圣的东西慢慢浮现，占据了我的内心。

original: I wasn't sure what to do, when [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] himself whispered to me. I should talk to one of the denizens of my dungeon.  As I listened to the prisoner's appeal for mercy Satan whispered to me once more that they weren't very sincere. Perchance a little time on the rack would help him.
translation: 当[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]本尊现身向我低语，我不知道该怎么做。也许我该同那些蜷缩于地牢的人谈一谈。当囚犯向我恳求怜悯时，撒旦再次向我低语说他并不真诚。也许一点折磨可能会对他有帮助。

original: I heard him scream and [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] laughed with delight.
translation: 我听见囚犯的尖叫和[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的笑声交织在一起。

original: He came to me while I slept, it seemed almost as if it was a dream. He had three heads, the body of a man, the legs of a cock and the tail of a serpent. He taught me something about myself that I had always known but denied.
translation: 他在我睡觉时来到我身边，看起来仿佛是一场梦一般。他有三个头，人类的躯干，公鸡的腿与蛇的尾巴。他让我认识到了一些我早已知晓却从不承认的东西。

original: It is wrong, but feels right.
translation: 这是错的，但是感觉起来像是对的！

original: As I sat and looked at the fish course, the fish spoke to me and reminded me that my neighbor's titles were rich and should be mine.
translation: 当我坐下看着那道鱼宴时，那条鱼开口同我交谈了起来，并告知我那些周边领主的纷繁的头衔全都应该冠于我的名字之上。

original: A messenger from my Lord the Leviathan
translation: 一名吾主利维坦的信使

original: Asmodeus asked me why I was denying myself sensual pleasures. I told him it was sin and he reminded me that the Lord God himself had commanded that we should go forth and multiply.
translation: 犹太恶魔阿斯摩太问我为何拒绝滥享鱼水之欢。我告诉他这是原罪，他则告诉我上主天主曾亲自命令人类要繁衍与发展。

original: It was the word of God?
I told Asmodeus that lust is a sin against God, and he whispered quietly that I am made in God's image. If I have these urges then it is only because God does too.
translation: 我告诉阿斯摩太肉欲是一项神所不容的原罪，他向我低语说到人类是按神的模样塑造而成。如果我有这些冲动，唯一原因只能是因为神一样有这些冲动而已。

original: God must want me to do this.

I was patient and listened to the knight as he explained to me why the world was shaped like a banana. I knew it was Satan's voice who said why do you listen to this fool, your eyes prove the world is flat.
translation: 我耐心地听着一个骑士向我讲解为什么这个世界的外形像一个香蕉。撒旦则问我为什么要听那个傻瓜胡言乱语，我之所见已经足以证明这个世界是平的了。

original: The servant dropped the meat and the dogs immediately drove upon it. The waste angered me but I held my temper, then the voice whispered to me as it has so often before: 'Why do you accept this foolishness?'
translation: 一名仆人端着的肉掉在了地下，几只狗马上扑了过去。虽然这个废物仆人惹怒了我，但是我还是尽量按捺下了自己的脾气，这时那个同以前一样轻柔的耳语声再次响起：「为何你要忍受他的愚蠢？」

original: Yes I will not be weak.

At the sermon the father reminded the congregation of my humbleness. Then a voice whispered in my ear, I know it is the morning star, and he told me that the father was making a fool out of me. The so called priest was a wealthy man who ate well while the poor starved.
translation: 在一次布道时，神父向教众赞美我的谦逊。之后路西法的声音在我的耳边响起，他告诉我神父只是愚弄我而已。这个所谓的神父不过是一个在穷人挨饿时，自己却吃的脑满肠肥的有钱人而已。

original: I sat in contemplation of my life and wondered why it was that I wasn't getting my due. Then a voice whispered to me, I know it to be Lucifer, who told me it was my right to have a throne higher than the clouds and over the earth.
translation: 我坐着陷入了对生活的沉思，思考着为什么我没有得到我所应得的东西。然后响起了一个耳语声，我能听出这是路西法的声音，他告诉我一个凌驾于云巅之上、统治世界的王座和我再相符不过。

original: I always tried to avoid eating too much, as I felt it a sin. The Lord of the flies whispered softly in my ear, that I should enjoy all the fruits of God's creation.
translation: 我一直避免过度饮食，因为我觉得这也是原罪之一。但是苍蝇之王在我耳边轻声低语告诉我，我应该尽享神的造物。

original: I looked upon  the table and my mouth salivated at the rich odours. I felt the urge to fill my plate as much as I could and the Beelzebub whispered why not?
translation: 我盯着桌子，因弥漫的香气而垂涎不已。我感受到用食物将我盘子尽可能装满的冲动，蝇王贝耳则步在我旁边低语说：为什么不呢？

original: As I watched the Almoner hand out coins I wondered is it really so good that those who are clearly going to squander the money should receive it. Mammon came to me later and pointed out the logic in my thoughts, we should try to save first those who can be saved.
translation: 看着施赈人员分发硬币，我在想是否应该接济那些铁定会浪费这些钱的人。过了一会，贪婪之神玛门找到了我，并为我解答了疑惑：我们应当首先拯救那些能够被拯救的。

original: It was hard to sleep, while Mammon softly whispered in my ear. He was telling me about all the things that should be mine but  others had The more he whispered the more it made sense.
translation: 在玛门于耳边低语时入睡并不是一件容易的事。他告诉我世上所有的东西都应该是我的，但是其中大多数却被其他人所据为己有。他越重复这些话，它们在我脑海中就越显得有道理。

original: It was the Leviathan who told me that I was merely being weak. I should stop it and show my strength.
translation: 海兽利维坦告诉我，我只是有些软弱而已。我应该停止软弱，向世界展示我的力量。

original: The Leviathan whispered to me and reminded me that there were those who had that did not deserve it and then there were those like me who deserved so much more.
translation: 利维坦告诉我世上有拥有很多不应得东西的人，也有像我一样应当拥有更多的人。

original: I never thought of it that way.
translation: 我从来没有从这种角度想过。

original: Belphegor was wondering why I was always so busy. I am top of the tree, compared to the serfs, so why should I not take the time to enjoy it?
translation: 怠惰恶魔巴耳培敖尔对于我一直这样忙碌感到奇怪。同那些农奴相比，我站在社会金字塔的顶端，那么为什么我不花点时间好好享受下生活呢？

original: You know he has a point
I often wondered why I bother about such trivial things. Belphegor keeps urging me to save my energy for when it really matters.
translation: 我一直不明白为何我要被这些琐事所困扰。巴耳培敖尔一直催促我为大事而节约自己的精力。
他在这一点上也是对的。

original: My liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], taxes the cities harshly. How are we supposed to prosper under such a burden?
translation: 我的领主[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]对城市课以重税。在如此沉重的赋税负担下本座怎能让城市繁荣起来？

original: Ask my liege to seek support for a law change
translation: 在降低税率上寻求我的领主的支持

original: To the most illustrious [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. The good burghers of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] are barely able to pay their taxes. Our coffers are empty. I humbly ask that you lower the taxes for your cities.\n\nYour humble servant, [From.GetBestName]
translation: 杰出的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的好市民已经快纳不起税了。我们的口袋空空如也。在此，我谦卑地请求您降低您对麾下城市的税收。\n\n[From.GetBestName]敬上

original: To my vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. The burghers can whine and squeal all they like. I have realm to run and an army to feed.\n\nYour liege, [From.GetBestName]
translation: 致吾之封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。随便那些市民们如何抱怨和尖叫。吾有国土要治理，吾有军队要供养。\n\n汝主，[From.GetBestName]

original: To my loyal vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. Perhaps you are right - I want my cities to grow and prosper. I will attempt to pass a law for lower city taxes.\n\nYour dutiful liege, [From.GetBestName]
translation: 致吾的尊贵封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。或许你是对的——我要我的城市繁荣壮大。我也将尽力去通过一项法律来降低城市赋税。\n\n汝尽职之主，[From.GetBestName]

original: To my loyal vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. I understand your plight, but I am afraid a law change is not possible at this time. However, I am prepared to offer you this little gift...\n\nYour faithful liege, [From.GetBestName]
translation: 致吾忠诚之封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。我理解你的困境，但在这个时候恐怕不可能更改一项法律。不过，我想送你个小礼物……\n\n汝守信之主，[From.GetBestName]

original: To my most valued vassal, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. Nothing causes me more pain than to hear of the travails of my loyal citizens. I can only ask that you consider the needs of the whole realm. Your taxes are not wasted, but are needed to ensure your safety and long term prosperity.\n\nYour faithful liege, [From.GetBestName]
translation: 致吾尊贵之封臣，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。当我得知我忠诚子民的生活如此艰难辛劳这令我感受到万分痛苦。我只能请你考虑整个国家的所需。而你的赋税没有减少，并且你所需的税金也能保证你的安全和长远的繁荣。\n\n你的守信之主，[From.GetBestName]

original: [Root.GetMyChancellorName] [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] is doing a superb job! I am having trouble with a town and a castle in [Root.Location.GetName] and I shall of course send my [Root.GetMyChancellorName] [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] to try and increase the relation between them and us, but which one should I start with?
translation: [Root.GetChancellorName][Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]工作一流！我与[Root.Location.GetName]的一个城镇和一座城堡有纷争，我当然要送我的[Root.GetMyChancellorName][Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]首先去尝试增进彼此关系，但我该从哪个开始呢？

original: I have noticed Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]'s hard-work and everyone seems to like [Root.job_marshal.GetHerHim]. I am deciding between having my Marshal heighten the morale of the troops or try to recruit more soldiers.
translation: 我已经注意到军事总管[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]的艰苦工作，且人人似乎都喜欢[Root.job_marshal.GetHerHim]。我正决定要派我的军事总管去提高军队士气，还是去设法招募更多士兵。

original: Send Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] to heighten the troops' morale
translation: 派军事总管[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]去提高军队士气

original: My coffers are almost empty and the peasants are restless. I only have one Steward, [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] and even if [Root.job_treasurer.GetSheHe] is doing a wonderful job [Root.job_treasurer.GetSheHe] cannot do more than one thing at once.
translation: 我的金库几乎空了而农夫们焦躁不安。我只有[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]一个财政总管，而虽然[Root.job_treasurer.GetSheHe]工作出色，[Root.job_treasurer.GetSheHe]也不能一次做不止一件事。

original: Send Steward [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] to increase the tax income
Send Steward [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] to calm the peasants
There is a man I need to arrest and another I want to assassinate. My Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] could either help with the arrest or the assassination, but not both.
translation: 有个人我需要逮捕而另一个我想要去暗杀。我的间谍总管[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]可以帮助逮捕或者暗杀，但不能两样都干。

original: I need you to talk to the Church, [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]
Teach me to be a pious [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]

My liege's [Root.GetChancellorName] [Root.Liege.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] has been looking at my wife [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] with lust in his eyes. I need to tell my liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] and ask [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] to do something about this before anything happens!
translation: 我的领主的[Root.GetChancellorName][Root.Liege.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]一直用色咪咪的眼神看我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]。我得告诉我的领主[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]并请[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]在发生一些事之前做点什么！

original: Complain to liege about the [Root.GetChancellorName]'s inappropriate behavior
translation: 向领主抱怨[Root.GetChancellorName]的不当行为

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] accused [Root.GetMyChancellorName] [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] of looking at [From.GetHerHis] wife in an inappropriate way, 'with lust in his eyes' as [From.GetSheHe] said.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]指控[Root.GetChancellorName][Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]用不当的方式看[From.GetHerHis]妻子，如[From.GetSheHe]所说是「色咪咪的眼神」。

original: I don't believe [Root.GetMyChancellorName] [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] has done that!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] took my concern seriously and imprisoned [From.GetHerHis] [Root.GetChancellorName] [From.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]严肃对待我的关切并把[From.GetHerHis][Root.GetChancellorName][From.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]关进监狱！

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] did not like that I complained, though...

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] claimed I had looked at [FromFrom.GetHerHis] wife with lust in my eyes, a most inappropriate behavior! My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] chose to believe [FromFrom.GetHerHim], despite my attempts at convincing [From.GetHerHim] I had no desire for [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s wife.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]声称我曾用色咪咪的眼神看[FromFrom.GetHerHis]妻子，一种最不当的行为！我的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]选择相信[FromFrom.GetHerHim]，尽管我努力使[From.GetHerHim]确信我对[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]的妻子没有情欲。

original: You really believe [FromFrom.GetHerHim] more than me?
translation: 您真的更相信[FromFrom.GetHerHim]而非我吗？

original: The accusations [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] made, of me having looked inappropriately at [FromFrom.GetHerHis] wife, was dismissed by our liege [From.GetTitledFirstName]! [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s wife has a fine figure but I wouldn't dream of even dreaming of looking at her in an inappropriate way.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]指控我曾不适当地看[FromFrom.GetHerHis]妻子，被吾主[From.GetTitledFirstName]驳回了！虽然[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]的妻子有优美的风姿，但做梦也不会想到用不适当地方式看她。

original: Thank you for believing in me!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] dismissed my concerns, [From.GetSheHe] claimed [Root.GetChancellorName] [From.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] would never look at anyone in an inappropriate manner and would not listen to me as I tried to convince [From.GetHerHim] about [From.GetHerHis] [Root.GetChancellorName]'s guilt.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]驳回了我的关切，[From.GetSheHe]声称[Root.GetChancellorName][From.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]从不会用不当的方式看任何人，当我试图说服[From.GetHerHim]关于 [From.GetHerHis][Root.GetChancellorName]犯下的罪时，他不再听我说的话。

original: But, but... I saw [From.job_chancellor.GetHerHim] do it!

One of my tasks as [Root.GetChancellorName] is to smooth relations between lords. Mostly I try to make other rulers or my liege's vassals like [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] better, but sometimes, as today, I find someone who doesn't like [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] and then I work my magic on...
translation: 我作为[Root.GetChancellorName]的任务之一就是缓和领主之间的关系。大多数时候我会努力让其他领主或者我领主的封臣更加喜欢[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]，不过有些时候，比如说今天，我发现某个人不喜欢[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]然后我就开始做了一些微小的工作……

original: The courtiers at [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s court likes [This.GetHerHim] more

I have had trouble with a vassal of mine and tried everything I could think of to help us get along better. [Root.GetMyChancellorName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to do in one day what I had struggled with for several weeks when [From.GetSheHe] told me to just ask the vassal for forgiveness, that was all that was needed!
translation: 我和我的一个封臣之间有点矛盾，我想尽一切办法让我们相处得更好。[Root.GetChancellorName][From.GetTitledFirstName]用一天就解决了我纠结了几周的事，[From.GetSheHe]告诉我只要求得该封臣的原谅，仅此而已！

original: All it took was a small: 'I'm sorry' from [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], and I do believe it was [From.Liege.GetHerHis] [Root.GetChancellorName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] that convinced [From.Liege.GetHerHim] to ask for my forgiveness.
translation: 一切只需[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]一句简短的「对不起」，我真的相信是[From.Liege.GetHerHis][Root.GetChancellorName][From.GetTitledFirstName]说服[From.Liege.GetHerHim]来求得我的原谅。

original: I'm glad [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] said that [From.Liege.GetSheHe] was sorry

My [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and I had almost stopped talking to each other when [Root.GetChancellorName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] intervened. [From.GetSheHeCap] made [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] start talking to me, even like me a little bit more!
translation: 我[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]和我已经几乎无话可说的时候[Root.GetChancellorName][From.GetTitledFirstName]插了进来。[From.GetSheHeCap]让[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]开始和我交谈，甚至更喜欢我了一点点！

original: Such good work should be rewarded!

I had given up talking to [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] when [Root.GetChancellorName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] intervened and made me realize how silly we had behaved. Now we talk, and we both appreciate one another in a whole new way.
translation: 我已经放弃与[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]谈话时[Root.GetChancellorName][From.GetTitledFirstName]插了进来，让我认识到我刚才表现得多么愚蠢。现在我们谈话了，而且我们都用全新的方式彼此欣赏。

original: If it weren't for [From.GetFirstName] this would have gotten worse

I might have been too harsh to the courtiers at [Root.Location.GetName] but [Root.GetMyChancellorName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to calm them down and even like me more, just by giving them a half-day off!
translation: 我可能对在[Root.Location.GetName]的廷臣太苛刻了，但[Root.GetMyChancellorName][From.GetTitledFirstName]成功让他们冷静下来而且甚至更喜欢我了，方法仅仅是给他们放了半天假！

original: Thank you, but you only did your job
translation: 谢谢你，但你只是做了分内之事

original: I hadn't really expected to be rewarded for what I had done, but it was nice of [From.GetTitledFirstName] to show that [From.GetSheHe] appreciated my hard work.
translation: 我并没有太期待为我所做的事而得到奖励，但很贴心的是，[From.GetTitledFirstName]表现出了[From.GetSheHe]对于我努力工作的感谢。

original: I will work even harder now!
translation: 我现在将更努力地工作！

original: It was true I only did my job, but it would be nice to for once get a 'Thank you,' or at least some sort of appreciation from [From.GetTitledFirstName] for my hard work...
translation: 的确，我只是做了分内之事，但能得到一句「谢谢你」总还是好的，或者至少能得到一点儿来自[From.GetTitledFirstName]的其他方式的感谢……

original: This is worth throwing someone in jail over
translation: 这足以把某人投进监狱了

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] could have avoided jail if [This.GetSheHe] had been less slothful
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]本可以避免进监狱的，假如[This.GetSheHe]当初不那么懒

original: I don't know how [From.GetTitledFirstName] found out about how my slothfulness caused us to miss the opportunity to improve [Root.Location.GetName], but [From.GetSheHe] did. [From.GetTitledFirstName] was disappointed and talked sternly to me for several minutes, chiding me for being slothful.
translation: 我不知道[From.GetTitledFirstName]怎么查出我的懒惰如何导致我们错失了改善[Root.Location.GetName]的机会的，但[From.GetSheHe]做到了。[From.GetTitledFirstName]感到失望并找我严厉训话几分钟，斥责我懒惰。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] can't talk to me that way!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] let me know [From.GetSheHe] knows about how my slothfulness caused us to miss that opportunity to improve [Root.Location.GetName] but that it did not matter. 'What's done is done,' [From.GetSheHe] told me.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]知道我的懒惰是如何导致我们错失改善[Root.Location.GetName]的机会的，但是已经不要紧了。「覆水难收」，[From.GetSheHe]对我说。

original: Before I knew it, someone grabbed me and dragged me to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s prison and threw me into a cell. I sat in that cell for what felt like days but it couldn't have been more than a couple of hours. [From.GetTitledFirstName] finally showed up, told me the reason I was in jail was because of my slothfulness and the missed opportunity to improve [Root.Location.GetName].
translation: 在我弄明白之前，有人抓住我并把我拖进[From.GetTitledFirstName]的监狱的一间囚室。我坐在囚室中几小时却感觉像过了几天。[From.GetTitledFirstName]最终露面，告诉我我入狱的原因是我的懒惰导致错失改善[Root.Location.GetName]的机会。

original: When I had finished talking sternly to [Root.GetMyChancellorName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] I didn't really expect [From.GetHerHim] to talk back, but the anger that filled [From.GetHerHim] fast was vented immediately. I ignored it and left [Root.GetMyChancellorName] [From.GetTitledFirstName], barely able to speak because of [From.GetHerHis] anger.
translation: 当我对[Root.GetChancellorName][From.GetTitledFirstName]严厉地训完话时我并没期待[From.GetHerHim]回话，但[From.GetHerHim]的满腔愤怒立即爆发出来。我没有理睬并丢下了[Root.GetMyChancellorName][From.GetTitledFirstName]，由于[From.GetHerHis]愤怒他几乎开不了口。

original: I was glad to hear [Root.GetMyChancellorName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to amend [From.GetHerHis] ways and start working harder. The slothfulness that caused us to miss the opportunity to improve [Root.Location.GetName] seems to have disappeared over night, and I am glad I talked sternly to [From.GetHerHim] about it.
translation: 我很高兴听说[Root.GetChancellorName][From.GetTitledFirstName]决定改正[From.GetHerHis]方式并开始更努力地工作。那让我们错失机会改善[Root.Location.GetName]的懒惰似乎一夜之间消失了，我很高兴我曾为此对[From.GetHerHim]严厉训话。

original: There's an infidel in my liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s court!
translation: 在我的领主，[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的宫廷中有个异教徒！

original: Demand that [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have the infidel burned at the stake.
translation: 要求[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]把异教徒烧死在火刑柱上。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] decides if the infidel should be burned at the stake or not
translation: 由[This.GetTitledFirstName]决定该异教徒是否该被烧死在火刑柱上

original: Demand that [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have the infidel exiled.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] decides if the infidel should be exiled or not
translation: 由[This.GetTitledFirstName]决定该异教徒是否该被流放

original: The infidel will be burned at the stake!
translation: 该异教徒将被烧死在火刑柱上！

original: I will do no such thing!

translation: 我不会驱逐这个异教徒

original: I watched gleefully as the infidel burned at the stake. The infidel will burn in the [Root.Religion.GetName] Hell as it burns now until the sins has burned from its soul!
translation: 我兴高采烈地看着这个异教徒被烧死在火刑柱上。这个异教徒将在[Root.Religion.GetName]的地狱里焚烧，正像他现在被焚烧一样，直到罪孽被从牠的灵魂中烧却！
不会再有错误的宗教了！

original: Despite my demands, warnings and even pleas, [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to burn the infidel at the stake!
translation: 尽管我多次要求、警告甚至恳求，[From.GetTitledFirstName]还是拒绝把那个异教徒烧死在火刑柱上！

original: The infidel was banished from the lands of [From.GetTitledFirstName] and forced to never return on pain of death.
translation: 那个异教徒被从[From.GetTitledFirstName]的土地上放逐，并且至死也不准返回。

original: It was a happy day for me
[From.GetTitledFirstName] chose to ignore my demands, the infidel I had found was not even banished, the infidel was let go without any punishment!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]选择无视我的要求，被我发现的异教徒甚至没被驱逐，还在逍遥法外！

original: You can't just ignore the infidel!
translation: 您不能无视那个异教徒！

original: There's a heretic in my liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s court!
translation: 在我的领主，[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的宫廷中有一个异端！

original: Demand that [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have the heretic burned at the stake.
translation: 要求[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]把异端烧死在火刑柱上。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] decides if the heretic should be burned at the stake or not
translation: 由[This.GetTitledFirstName]决定是否把该异端烧死在火刑柱上

original: Demand that [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have the heretic exiled.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] decides if the heretic should be exiled or not
translation: 由[This.GetTitledFirstName]决定是否将该异端流放

original: No one will be burned at the stake!
translation: 没人会被烧死在火刑柱上！

original: Don't make me banish you instead!
The heretic must have regretted his sins as he burned at the stake. This will be an excellent warning who challenges the one true faith, the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith!
translation: 那个异端再被处火刑时一定在为他的罪孽后悔。这对挑战唯一的正确信仰——[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰的人将是一个极佳的警告！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] banished the heretic on pain of death if he would ever return!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]放逐了那个异端，如果他回来只得受死！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] ignored my demands about banishing the heretic!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]无视我关于驱逐异端的要求！

original: They shouldn't be bothering me about it!
translation: 他们不该拿这事来烦我！

original: The peasants complains to Steward [This.GetTitledFirstName] about [This.GetHerHis] arbitrariness

[From.GetTitledFirstName] sent the peasants complaining about my arbitrariness to me and they were brave enough to air their concerns about me not being able to understand the concept of rules and laws!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]向我转达了农夫们对我的专断的抱怨，他们竟勇敢到风传我弄不懂规则和法律的概念！

original: Of course I understand laws, I just don't follow them
translation: 我当然理解法律，我只是不遵循

original: I'm very glad to hear that!
Steward [This.GetTitledFirstName] is praised for [This.GetHerHis] sense of justice
translation: 财政总管[This.GetTitledFirstName]为[This.GetHerHis]正义感获得奖赏

original: I can not take credit for the crime reduction, nor the fact the peasants seem happier but I believe that justice must be applied to make a better world.
translation: 我不能把犯罪减少和农夫们看起来更高兴的事实归功于自己，但是我相信公正会被用于创造一个更好的世界。

original: A county in my demesne is riddled with disease! I need to send Steward [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] there, [Root.job_treasurer.GetSheHe] will surely know what to do.
translation: 我领地的一个省份疾病泛滥！我需要派财政总管[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]去那里，[Root.job_treasurer.GetSheHe]肯定知道怎么做。

original: Please save the peasants! Who else am I going to get taxes from?
translation: 请救救农夫们吧！没有他们我还能从谁那抽税呢？

original: Steward [This.GetTitledFirstName] is sent to the county riddled with disease
translation: 财政总管[This.GetTitledFirstName]被派去疾病泛滥的那个省份。

original: I try to work as hard as I can, saving the peasants one at a time. The disease is slowly giving up its hold on the county but it will take time before everyone is healthy again.
translation: 我努力工作，尽我所能，一个一个挽救农民。疾病慢慢得到控制，不过还需要时间让每个人恢复健康。

original: Steward [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] wants to hire ruffians to bully the peasants who are not paying their taxes.
translation: 财政总管[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]想要雇流氓来胁迫不交税的农夫。

original: Any way is good as long as money is entering the treasury
translation: 只要钱能进国库，任何方法都是好的

original: Prevent him doing any harm, even if I will get less tax
translation: 阻止他为害，即使我的税收会减少

original: Steward [This.GetTitledFirstName] is hindered to hire ruffians

[From.GetTitledFirstName] did not like my suggestion to hire ruffians, when I tried explaining it would be easier to squeeze the peasants who are not paying their taxes [From.GetSheHe] still didn't want me to hire ruffians. I tried hiring them in secrecy but [From.GetTitledFirstName] somehow found out and stopped us before we had even started 'persuading' the peasants.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]不喜欢我雇流氓的提议，当我试图解释说那将更容易压榨不交税的农夫时[From.GetSheHe]仍然不要我雇流氓。我曾试图秘密雇佣他们，但在我甚至开始「劝服」那些农夫之前，[From.GetTitledFirstName]以某种方式发现并阻止了我。

original: Come on! I need those ruffians!
[Root.GetMyTreasurerName] [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] had come up with an idea for removing a thieves guild in counties: pay them to move elsewhere.
translation: [Root.GetMyTreasurerName][Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]想出一个移除省份里的一个盗贼公会的主意：给钱让他们到别处去。

original: We do not associate with criminals
[Root.GetMyTreasurerName] [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] has had some interesting ideas on how to improve the economy.
translation: [Root.GetMyTreasurerName][Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]在如何改善经济方面有一些有趣的主意。

original: Working with thieves can be beneficiary, if my liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] does not get wind of it...
translation: 与盗贼共事可以受益，如果领主[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]没有风闻此事……
尽力隐藏你受牵涉的事

original: I followed [Root.GetMyTreasurerName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a distance and saw [From.GetHerHim] meet two rather rough looking men and went with them into a tavern infamous for it shoddy clientele. I watched through the dirty window how money exchanged hands and had the evidence I needed: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was working with thieves!
translation: 我在远处跟踪[Root.GetMyTreasurerName][From.GetTitledFirstName]，发现[From.GetHerHim]会见两个长相颇为粗陋的男子，并随他们进入一家因坑害顾客而臭名昭著的小酒馆。我透过肮脏的窗户看到金钱如何倒手并得到了我所需的证据：[From.GetTitledFirstName]在与盗贼共事！

original: Take [From.GetHerHis] gold and let him go

[From.GetTitledFirstName] waited for me at the gate together with two prison guards when I came back after my little meeting with the local thieves. I was thrown in prison and [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me I shouldn't have trusted the thieves...
translation: 当我与本地盗贼小会回来时，[From.GetTitledFirstName]和两个狱卒一起在门口等着我。我被投入监狱，[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我我本不该相信盗贼……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] confronted me outside the tavern, me still counting the gold the thieves had given me in exchange for my cooperation. Instead of demanding my head or imprisoning me, [From.GetTitledFirstName] took the gold and told me to never associate with thieves ever again.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]在小酒馆外遇见我，而我仍在数着因合作而从盗贼那儿换来的金子。[From.GetTitledFirstName]没有要我的脑袋或监禁我，而是扣下金子并告诉我永远别再和盗贼打交道。

original: [Root.GetMyTreasurerName] [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] probably did not think I'd notice if a few coins here and there went missing, but the steady disappearance made me suspicious. Might it be that the gold is disappearing into [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]'s greedy fingers?
translation: [Root.GetMyTreasurerName][Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]或许认为我注意不到这儿那儿是否有一点点钱币流失，但稳定的消失让我怀疑。也许金子消失到[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]贪婪的手指中去了？

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] accused me of stealing! Coins had gone missing and all current evidence points at me...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]指控我偷窃！钱币流失了而当前一切证据都指向我……

original: I admit it, I stole the money. But you pay me too little!
translation: 我承认，是我偷的钱。但你付给我酬劳太少了！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] declared that [From.GetSheHe] was innocent. Further investigation revealed that the cook, responsible for the purchase of food stuff, had forgotten to account for the extra eggs he had bought during the last month.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]宣布[From.GetSheHe]是无辜的。进一步调查显示，负责买食材的厨子上个月忘了把他多买的鸡蛋算进去了。

original: Now I know I can trust [Root.GetMyTreasurerName] [From.GetTitledFirstName]!

I found some more evidence [Root.GetMyTreasurerName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] had stolen the money and confronted [From.GetHerHim] with it. [From.GetSheHeCap] confessed and begged me to be just when punishing [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 我发现了更多[Root.GetMyTreasurerName][From.GetTitledFirstName]偷钱的证据并和[From.GetHerHim]当面对质。[From.GetSheHeCap]向我坦白并乞求我惩罚[From.GetHerHim]时保持公正。

original: You shall pay back the money you stole, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
[From.GetTitledFirstName] fined me for stealing money and took all the money I had!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]为偷钱而对我罚款并拿走了我所有的钱！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] believed I had stolen the money and put me in prison to repent my crimes and my sins.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]相信我偷了钱并把我关进监狱来忏悔我的罪行和罪孽。

original: I repent, just let me out of here!

A band of highway robbers has been roaming freely in one of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s counties. I am itching to do something about this situation, I should propose to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] that we should deal with it.
translation: 一伙拦路抢劫者一直在[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的一个省份里随意游荡。我很想为这种情况做点什么，我应该向[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]建议我们应该处理它。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is asked to assign some soldiers to deal with the highway robber band
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]被要求指派一些士兵去对付那个公路强盗团伙

original: Me and a bunch of soldiers could easily take them!
translation: 我跟一帮士兵能够轻松解决他们！

original: ...or maybe I shouldn't put myself in danger...
translation: ……或者也许我不应该以身犯险……

original: The band of highway robbers has become more and more audacious, plundering more towns and settlements for everyday. Marshal [From.GetTitledFirstName] has proposed to lead an attack personally to eradicate them from the province.
translation: 那伙公路强盗变得越来越胆大妄为了，每天都劫掠更多的城镇和定居点。军事总管[From.GetTitledFirstName]提议亲自领导一次攻击来把他们从省内连根铲除。

original: Tell [From.GetHerHim] to bring [From.GetHerHis] own retinue only
[This.GetTitledFirstName] decides if [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is guilty or not
Marshal [From.GetTitledFirstName] will be fined for [From.GetHerHis] crime!
I don't believe this. The daughter must be lying
translation: 我不相信这一切。他的女儿肯定在撒谎

original: Let me out! I didn't hurt her!
translation: 让我出去！我没有伤害过她！

original: Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] told me about [Root.job_marshal.GetHerHis] ideas. I couldn't really understand what [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe] was talking about, but [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe] was adamant in [Root.job_marshal.GetHerHis] belief that this would improve the military.
translation: 军事总管[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我[Root.job_marshal.GetHerHis]想法。实际上我不并不太明白[Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe]说的是什么，不过[Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe]坚信[Root.job_marshal.GetHerHis]想法能让军队有所改进。

original: There are less cruel people who would say that my use of unnecessary violence is appalling. Then I would remind them that this is war and war means that there are no such thing as 'unnecessary violence'.
translation: 总有那么一群热爱「和平」的人，絮絮叨叨说说我采取了毫无必要的令人震惊的暴力行径。然后，我就会提醒他们，这就是战争！战争就意味着没有任何「毫无必要的暴力」。

original: Especially when it is used against your enemies...
translation: 特别是把这种手段用在敌人身上时……

original: I interrupted Marshal [From.GetTitledFirstName] while [From.GetSheHe] was interrogating an prisoner to find out where our enemy would attack next. The soldier who brought me to [From.GetTitledFirstName] accused [From.GetHerHim] of using unnecessary violence and looked at me for support.
translation: 军事总管[From.GetTitledFirstName]正审讯一名犯人有关敌人的下一个攻击目标时，我打断了[From.GetSheHe]。领我至[From.GetTitledFirstName]处的士兵，指控[From.GetHerHim]使用了不必要的暴行，同时双眼望向我渴求支持。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap]'s right, we should terrorise our enemy
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]是对的，我们必须让敌人感到害怕

original: Click the nation you wish to play...
Click on the map to select a character...
translation: 点击地图选择一个角色……
玩家$playername$断开。选择你的行动。

original: The server was lost. The game will end.
Your name is taken. Please leave and select another.
translation: 你的名字已被使用。请选择另外一个名字。

original: You have been banned from this game
Enter the name of your game...
$TAG$ is an interesting choice during this period. Click to select it.
translation: $TAG$是一个有趣的选择。点击这里选择。

original: Are you sure you want to delete this save file? There is no way to bring it back once it is gone.
translation: 你确定要删除这个存档？删除后将无法恢复。

original: In order to use the ingame store, you must log on to Paradox Connect
translation: 为了使用游戏内商店，你必须登陆 Paradox 网络

original: You need at least §Y$DUCATS_DIFF$§! more ducats to buy §Y$ITEM$§!
translation: 你还需要至少 §Y$DUCATS_DIFF$§! 才能购买§Y$ITEM$§!

original: No item selected. Select an item from the list to left.
translation: 未选择物品。从左侧列表选择一个物品。

original: Current balance: $BALANCE$ ducats\n$ITEM$: $COST$ ducats\nBalance after purchase: $REMAINING$ ducats
Crusader Kings II needs to be restarted before bought DLC will take effect
translation: 已购买DLC需要重启《王国风云 II》才能生效
欢迎来到《王国风云 II》的世界！

original: Crusader Kings II is a Pausable Real-Time game. This means that you can issue commands both while the game is paused and when the clock is running. To pause or unpause the game, click the date in the upper-right corner or press the Spacebar. Use the plus and minus symbols to speed time up or to slow it down.
translation: 《王国风云 II》是一个可以随时暂停的即时游戏。这意味着在游戏暂停时和时间流逝时你都可以下达指令。点击右上角的日期或者按空格键来暂停或者继续游戏。按下加号和减号来加速减速。

original: Every character in the game has an opinion of every other character. The tooltip for the opinion explains the reasons in detail. Computer controlled characters will act in accordance with their opinions.
translation: 游戏里的每个角色都有对其他人的好感度。好感度的提示框会解释这些好感度的详细原因。计算机控制的角色会按照他们的好感度行动。

original: The Dynasty of the character is shown in the top right of the screen. A valid heir always has to be of your own Dynasty. You should strive to expand your dynasty and make sure members hold as many titles as possible.
translation: 角色的家族在界面的右上部分显示。一个有效继承人必须来自你自己的家族。你应该尽力扩展您的家族并确保他们获得尽可能多的头衔。

original: Some portraits have little symbols on them. A star means it is the character you currently play, a crown signifies your heir, and a little drop means the character is of your dynasty.
translation: 有些角色头像上有小图标，一个五角星表示这是你正在扮演的角色，一个皇冠凸显出你的继承人，一个小血滴则意味着这个角色来自你的家族。

original: Every ruler has a Council to help administer the realm. Each of the five positions on the Council has a primary attribute - Diplomacy, Martial, Stewardship, Intrigue and Learning. The councillor's skill value is added to the ruler's for all matters of state.
translation: 每个统治者都有一个内阁来协助治理领地。内阁里的五个职位都有一个主要的属性——外交，军事，管理，密谋和学习。这些内阁成员的技能值将在统治者处理国家事务时直接增加到统治者的能力上。

original: Councillors can be sent to a county on the map to perform various jobs. For example, the Court Chaplain can be dispatched to convert counties and the characters in them to your religion.
translation: 内阁成员可以被派遣到地图上的某个地区去执行各种任务。例如，宫廷司祭可以被派遣去把某个省份和其中的角色转换为你的宗教。

original: Characters will like you better for being entrusted with a position on the Council, but they will also resent being dismissed from it.
translation: 被指派为内阁成员的角色会更喜欢你，但是他们也会在被解职时觉得不满。

original: This screen allows you to change the laws of your demesne. There are two main types of law - succession laws and regular laws. Succession laws determine who the rightful heir is, regular laws concern matters of governance.
translation: 你可以在这个界面改变你领地的法律。有两种主要类型的法律——继承法和正式法律。继承法决定了谁是合法的继承人，而正式法律则关注与统治相关的一些事务。

original: Succession laws are difficult to change because different succession laws completely alter the dynamic of the game. Different groups of people will tend to like or dislike different succession laws depending on how it affects their chances of succeeding.
translation: 继承法很难被改变，因为不同的继承法将完全改变游戏的互动。不同的人群会倾向于喜欢或厌恶不同的继承法，取决于法律将怎么影响他们的继承机会。

original: Kingdoms are also unique in that they have separate succession laws even if they are currently ruled by the same king. Therefore, united kingdoms might well split up and once more be ruled by two different characters when the old king dies.
translation: 王国在继承法上是独特的。即使由同一个君主统治，每个王国继承法也依然是相互独立的。所以，在老国王去世时，联合王国完全可能分裂并再次被不同角色统治。

original: The characters who are currently second and third in the line of succession are called Pretenders. They will usually dislike the current heir and even the current ruler.
translation: 目前处于第二或者第三继承顺位的角色被称为觊觎者。他们通常不喜欢当前的继承人甚至当前的统治者。

original: Technology was fairly static in medieval times. Nevertheless, certain advances were made over the centuries. In Crusader Kings II, every county on the map has separate levels of technology.
translation: 科技在中世纪基本是静止的。然而，几个世纪里还是有着一些进步的。在《王国风云 II》中，地图上的每个省份都有独立的科技等级。

original: While in the Technology View, hovering over a county on the map will show the advancement levels there rather than in your capital.
translation: 处于科技界面时，在地图中的省份上滑动鼠标将显示当地的科技等级而不是你的首都的科技等级。

original: This screen gives you an overview of all your military assets and allows you to raise your levies and those of your vassals, either one by one or all at once.
translation: 你可以在这个界面看到你军事状况的概览，在这里你可以分别或一次性征召您和您封臣的征召兵。

original: The 'Vassals' tab lists all your direct vassals and their opinions of you. The less they like you, the smaller the part of their levies they will send when you raise them. Vassals will pay for the maintenance of their troops even when under your command. Therefore, vassals will dislike you more for every year you keep their levies raised.
translation: 「封臣」标签列出了你所有的直属封臣和他们对你的态度。他们越不喜欢你，在你征召时他们派遣来的部队就会越少。受你指挥的封臣征召兵的维护费依然由封臣支付，因此在你征召他们的部队持续一年后，他们会越来越不喜欢你。

original: The 'Mercenaries' tab lists all available mercenary companies that you can hire. Mercenaries are professional soldiers who fight well as long as they are paid well, but if your coffers run empty they might decide to abandon you - or even defect to your enemies!
translation: 「雇佣兵」标签列出了所有你可以雇佣的雇佣兵团。雇佣兵是职业军人，只要你提供良好的报酬，他们就会高效的作战，但是如果你的国库见底了，他们可能会抛弃你，甚至倒戈加入你的敌人！

original: Plots are a shady but effective way of achieving less innocuous goals. Unlike Ambitions, Plots require backers, co-conspirators, to succeed. The progress of a plot is measured by its Power, representing the collective influence and position of the plotters.
translation: 要达成不那么无害的目标，不光彩的阴谋是有效手段。不同于野心，成功的阴谋同时需要幕后主使和同谋。一次阴谋的进度以「阴谋力量」计量，其体现了密谋者们的地位和集体影响力。

original: Your Spymaster will discover plots depending on his Intrigue skill (unless he himself is in on it!) Once you know of a plot, you can try to convince the plotter to end his or her scheming, or you can resort to other measures...
translation: 您的间谍总管会发现别人的阴谋，这取决于他的密谋能力（除非他本人就参与其中）当你知道阴谋的时候，你可以尝试让主谋者放弃他/她的阴谋，或者你可以采取其他措施……

original: This view lists all the actions you can take towards another character. Note that, unless a character is a ruler, it is usually their liege who actually responds to your proposals.
translation: 这个界面列出了所有你可以向其他角色采取的行动。注意，除非一个角色本身是一位统治者，否则通常是他的领主来回应你的提议。

original: When you have sent a proposal to a character, it will take them some time to respond. However, you can see their likely answer, and their reasoning, even before you send your proposal.
translation: 当你向一个角色提出了一项建议，通常他们需要一些时间来回应。然而，你可以在提出建议前看到他们可能的反应及其原因。

original: In the tooltip for the target's acceptance, if the number of green plus signs (§G+§!) exceeds the number of red minus signs (§R-§!), the proposal will be accepted.
translation: 在目标的接受程度的提示框中，如果绿色的加号(§G+§!) 的数量超过了红色的减号(§R-§!)，这个提案将可能被接受。

original: This view summarizes the state of your religion. Most religions have a formal head, like the Pope, the Caliph or the Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople. Religions also have a 'Moral Authority' value, which affects how fast heresies spread and how easy it is to convert counties and characters to the religion.
translation: 这个界面概括了你的宗教状态。大多数宗教有一个正式的领袖，例如教宗，哈里发或者君士坦丁堡普世牧首。宗教同时还有一个「宗教权威」的值，影响着宗教的传播速度以及把地区和角色转换成这个宗教的难易度。

original: The chief pontiff of a religion has various special abilities, like calling for a Holy War, or granting a divorce. If the moral authority of a religion is too low, these abilities are disabled. It is a good idea to have good relations with your chief pontiff in order to make use of his powers.
translation: 宗教的领袖拥有各种特殊能力，例如发动一场圣战，或者允许一桩离婚。如果一个宗教的权威过低的话，这些能力将无法被施展。如果你想利用你的宗教领袖的力量的话，与其保持良好关系将是一个好主意。

original: This upper part of this screen contains information about a landed title. Titles are organized into a tree-like structure with Empire tier titles on top and baronies at the bottom. There are both 'de facto' and 'de jure' trees, and you can toggle between them.
translation: 这个界面的上半部分显示了一个实地头衔的信息。头衔以一个树状的结构组织起来，帝国级别的头衔在最上方，男爵在最下方。您可以在「实际」或是「法理」的结构树之间切换。

original: There are quick buttons to Create, Usurp, Claim or Revoke titles from this screen, if applicable. There is a also a button to display all living claimants to the title, and a button to show a list of previous holders.
translation: 在这个界面里有一些快捷的按钮来创建、篡夺或是剥夺头衔，如果可实施的话。同时也有显示这个头衔所有活着的宣称者和历史持有者的按钮。

original: The lower part of the Title View shows information about the title holder's entire Demesne and its budget.
translation: 这个界面的下半部分显示了头衔拥有者的直辖领和财政预算。

original: The Character Browser allows you to search for various categories of characters.
translation: 角色浏览器允许您按不同分类寻找角色。

original: 'Search All' includes absolutely every character in the game, except dead ones.
translation: 「搜索全部」包括所有游戏中的所有角色，除了那些已死亡的。

original: 'Search Realm' includes all characters under your top liege.
translation: 「搜索领地」包括所有在您最高领主下的所有角色。

original: 'Search Vassals' includes all characters under you.
translation: 「搜索封臣」包括您属下的所有角色。

original: The map is divided into a number of Counties, each containing a number of landed Holdings - Castles, Cities and Temples. Counties are ruled by Counts, and holdings are ruled by Barons (or cultural equivalents.)
translation: 地图被分为许多省份，每个都包含一些地产——城堡，城市或神殿。省份（伯爵领）由伯爵统治，而下属的地产（男爵领）则由男爵来统治。（或相应文化中同等的爵位）

original: The Holdings are the basis of the game's economy and military systems. Holdings provides tax income and a military levy. Castles have the best levies but the least tax. Cities are rich, but have poor levies. Temples are both rich and provide good levies, but are hard to defend.
translation: 地产是游戏经济和军事系统的基础。地产会提供税收和征召兵。城堡拥有最好的征召兵但提供最少的税收。城市很富裕，却没有很好的征召兵。寺院既富裕又提供良好的征召兵，但是很难防守。

original: Counties have a religion and a culture, representing the broad population layers. The people of a county tend to dislike rulers of a foreign culture or religion, which can cause peasant uprisings.
translation: 省份拥有一种宗教和一种文化，代表着省份内大多数的人口。省份的人民倾向于厌恶不同文化或不同宗教的统治者，而这可能导致农民叛乱。

original: Counties also have different levels of technological advancement, which tend to spread from one county to its neighbors.
translation: 省份也拥有不同的科技进步，而科技倾向于从一个省份传递到其临近省份。

original: The capital Holding of a County is always held by the count. The other holdings can be held by anyone.
translation: 省份的首府总是由省份持有者控制，其他的地产则可能被任何人拥有。

original: This view shows details about a Holding and allows its owner to build various improvements.
translation: 这个界面显示了一个地产的详细情况并允许拥有者建造各种设施。

original: The collection of Holdings held by a single character is called a Demesne. You can cycle through the holdings in your demesne with the arrows.
translation: 一个角色的地产的集合称为领地。你可以通过箭头在你的领地中的地产内循环。

original: Some buildings cannot be built until a certain technology exists in the county. Others might have another building as a prerequisite.
translation: 一些建筑物只有在省份存在某个科技时才能建造。有些还可能需要另外一个建筑物做为前置条件。

original: The owner the Holding, or his liege and above, can change the name of the Holding by clicking the name and editing it.
translation: 地产的拥有者，或他的直接领主以及更高级领主，可以通过点击编辑改变男爵领的名字。

original: Units are collections of regiments or ships, which can be raised from Holdings or provided by Mercenaries or Holy Orders.
translation: 单位是军团或船只的集合，他们可以在男爵领中征召，也可以由雇佣兵或骑士团提供。

original: Armies are organized into three parts - left flank, centre, and right flank. Each part is led by one of the regiment commanders. The commander of the Centre is considered commander of the whole army.
translation: 军队被组织成三个部分，左翼、中军和右翼。每一部分由一位军团指挥官指挥。中军的指挥官被认为是整支军队的指挥官。

original: Armies take attrition losses in Counties that cannot supply them. Check the supply limit in the County View.
translation: 军队在无法补给他们的省份上会受到损耗，在省份界面里查看补给上限。

original: During combat, the three parts of both armies face off - left flank against right flank, centre against centre, and right flank against left.
translation: 在战斗中，军队的三个部分面对面交锋——左翼面对右翼，中央对抗中央，右翼面对左翼。

original: Combat starts in Skirmish Phase, when archers and horse archers are paramount unit types. Eventually, the flanks will close with each other and enter Melee phase, where heavy infantry and knights shine. When a flank flees, its opponent will be in Pursue phase, trying to run down as many enemies as possible. Here, light cavalry is best.
translation: 战斗在遭遇战阶段开始，这时弓箭手和弓骑兵是主要的兵种。最终，军队将互相接近并进入肉搏阶段，这时重步兵和骑士将闪耀光芒。当一支军队撤退时，他的对手将进入追击阶段，试图消灭尽可能多的敌人，这时，轻骑兵将是最好的。

original: During each combat phase, flank commanders will pick a tactic depending on their Martial skill, which largely determines how effectively their troops fight.
translation: 在每个战斗阶段，各个部分的指挥官会根据他们的军事能力选定一个战术，这将很大程度上决定他们军队战斗的效率。

original: The length of a Siege is mainly determined by the fort level of the Holding, the number of defenders and the number of besiegers.
translation: 一次围攻的时长主要取决于地产的堡垒等级、守军的数量和围攻军队的数量。

original: If the besiegers have fewer troops than the defenders, the siege will be ineffective.
translation: 如果围城军队的数量比守军要少，围城将不是很有效。

original: Siege ends when the morale of the defenders reaches zero (or the attackers leave or are driven off.)
translation: 当防守者的士气为零（或者攻击者离去或被赶走），围攻就会结束。

original: Do you wish to permanently disable hints?\n(You can reactivate hints from the Settings screen.)
translation: 你确定要永远关闭提示吗？\n（你可以在设置面板里重新打开提示）

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is a child of or betrothed to a child of §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!是§Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!的孩子或者与其孩子有婚约

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not part of a Matrilineal marriage
§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is married to a daughter of [Actor.GetDynName]
§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! must be able to marry a daughter of [Actor.GetDynName]
§Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! has a daughter that can marry [Recipient.GetDynName]
§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! must have same religion as a child of [Actor.GetDynName]
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!做为[Actor.GetDynName]的孩子必须拥有相同的宗教信仰

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! must have a landed title to claim
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须拥有一个可宣称的实地头衔

original: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! must have a valid Casus Belli to declare war
translation: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须有一个有效的宣战理由才能宣战

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! cannot already be part of active plot
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!不能正在参加进行中的密谋

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! cannot be target of active plot
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!不能成为进行中的密谋的目标

original: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! must have a landed title which §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! can hold
translation: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须拥有§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!可以持有的实地头衔

original: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! must have a job title which §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! can hold
translation: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须拥有§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!可以持有的职位头衔

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! believes in a different religion than §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!
§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§! believes in the same religion as §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!
§Y[ThirdPartyTitle.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]§! has the same religious head as §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!
§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§! has the same religious head as §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!
§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is currently considering another offer from us
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!目前正在考虑另一个来自我们的报价

original: We cannot declare war if we have raised any army levies
translation: 征召兵已动员时不能宣战

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! can afford the ransom of §Y$GOLD$§W gold
We must select a valid §YCasus Belli§W to declare war
translation: 我们必须选择一个有效的§Y宣战理由§W来宣战

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! holds none of your close relatives hostage$WHO$
§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! must be our liege or a vassal of our liege
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须是我们的领主或者我们领主的封臣

original: Cannot invade mercenary, holy order or religious head titles
translation: 不能夺取雇佣兵、骑士团或宗教领袖的头衔

original: We cannot call our liege(or above) to war
translation: 我们不能召唤我们的领主（或者更高级别的领主）参战

original: We cannot call our subjects to war
translation: 我们不能召唤封臣参战

original: Cannot take hostile actions against your Regent
translation: 不能对你的摄政采取敌对行动

original: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! and §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! cannot be allies in another war
translation: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!与§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!不能是另一场战争中的盟友

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! must be able to govern this type of holding
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须能够统治该类型的地产

original: Cannot disinherit your Heir by making [Recipient.GetObjectPronoun] a $TITLE$
translation: 不能通过给[Recipient.GetObjectPronoun]一个$TITLE$来剥夺其继承权

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! can be granted land under the current succession laws
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!可以根据目前的继承法赐予土地

original: Cannot declare war on your spouse
Religious Authority must be at least §Y$VALUE$§W
We have any honorary titles to grant §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!
Crown Laws allow vassals to wage war
translation: 王权法允许封臣发动战争

original: Crown Laws allow vassals to wage war on each other
translation: 王权法允许封臣互相发动战争

original: The Crown Authority of §Y$CROWN_TITLE$§! allows Revocation
Cannot declare war on them while employing their troops
translation: 在雇佣他们的军队期间不能对他们宣战

original: A message about [GetName] has been received from [Actor.GetDynName]

Try to imprison [Recipient.GetBestName].\nWe have a §Y$CHANCE$%§W chance of success based on our relative §YState Intrigue§W.\nIf we fail, [Recipient.GetSubjectPronoun] might declare war on us or flee to another court
translation: 尝试逮捕[Recipient.GetBestName]。\n我们有§Y$CHANCE$%§W的成功率，这基于我们的§Y国家密谋能力§W。.\n如果失败，[Recipient.GetSubjectPronoun]可能对我们宣战或者逃往国外。

original: Throwing characters in prison can be convenient, but will give you a reputation as a tyrant.
translation: 把某些人扔进监狱可能会省事，但也会使你被视为暴君。

original: Try to imprison §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W. We have a §Y$CHANCE$%§W chance of success based on our relative §YState Intrigue§W.\nIf we fail, [Recipient.GetSubjectPronoun] might declare war on us or flee to another court.
translation: 尝试逮捕§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W。我们有§Y$CHANCE$%§W的成功率，这取决于我们的§Y国家密谋能力§W。\n如果失败，[Recipient.GetSubjectPronoun]可能对我们宣战或者逃往国外。

original: Since §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W is excommunicated, no one will care.
translation: 由于 §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W被绝罚，没有人会关心。

original: Since §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W has acted dishonorably toward you, no one will care.
translation: 由于§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W对你做出了不名誉的行为，所以没人有意见。

original: Since we have evidence that §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W is the leader of a plot, no one will object.
translation: 由于我们有证据证明§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W是一个阴谋的策划者，所以没有人会反对。

original: Since §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is from an enemy country, no one will object.
translation: 由于§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!来自敌国，所以没有人会反对。

original: Releasing a prisoner is honorable, but remember that in the dungeon they are unlikely to cause any trouble...
translation: 释放囚犯是光荣的，但请记住，他们在地牢里才不会造成任何麻烦……

original: Sending characters to the headsman is a convenient way of getting rid of them permanently. However, it is bound to upset more than a few people, and, unlike banishment, titles and wealth will not be confiscated.
translation: 砍掉某个人的头是摆脱他的最有效的方法。不过，这必然会使很多人感到失望，而且不像驱逐一样可以没收头衔和财产。

original: Since §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W is excommunicated, no one will mind.
This will upset the lords of §Y[Recipient.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§!, lowering their opinion of you by §R$OPINION$§!.
translation: 这会激怒§Y[Recipient.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§!的领主们，他们对你的好感度将会降低 §R$OPINION$§!。

original: Since §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W is from an enemy country, no one will object.
translation: 由于§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W来自敌国，没有人会反对。

original: You can demand that one of your subjects converts to the true faith, but if they refuse their opinion of you will be lowered.
translation: 你可以要求封臣改宗，但是如果他们拒绝，对你的好感度将下降。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W agreed to the demand from §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W and converted to [Actor.Religion.GetName]
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W declined the demand from §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W to convert to [Actor.Religion.GetName]
We demand that you convert to the true faith, [Actor.Religion.GetName].
translation: 我们要求你改宗正信，皈依[Actor.Religion.GetName]。

original: You can always invite landless characters to join your court, though they will probably not accept unless they like you much better than their current liege.
translation: 你可以邀请没有领地的人加入你的宫廷。不过有时他们会拒绝，除非他们比起现在的领主来更喜欢你。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! has agreed to join the court of §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! declined the invitation from §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! to join [Actor.GetPossPronoun] court
Make one of our vassals subject to §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W.
translation: 将一个直属封臣转封给§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!。

original: Characters with landed titles will dislike you for having vassals and owning titles that are de jure part of their domain.
translation: 当你或你的直属封臣占有某人法理上的领地时，他会变得不喜欢你。

original: Select a vassal to transfer to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W.
Make §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W a vassal of §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W, increasing [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by §G$OPINION$§W.
§Y[Actor.GetDynName]§W has transferred the vassal contract of §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetDynName]§W to §Y[Recipient.GetDynName]§W
translation: §Y[Actor.GetDynName]§! 已经将对于 §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetDynName]§! 的附庸关系转移给了 §Y[Recipient.GetDynName]§!

original: Invent a reason for why a certain title should belong to you. It will cost Prestige to make people accept this (though less if you have a de jure claim to it, or if your [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] is high.) The current title holder will not be pleased...
translation: 编造一个关于特定头衔理应属于你的理由。这将消耗威望以使人们接受（如果有法理宣称，或者如果你的[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]较高，则只会消耗较少的威望。）头衔的现有者将会不高兴……

original: Select a title to claim. Claiming a title costs Prestige and will lower §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W's opinion of you.
translation: 选择宣称一个头衔。宣称头衔会消耗威望并降低§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!对你的好感度。

original: Claim the §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W for §R$PRESTIGE$§W Prestige. This will lower §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W's opinion of you by §R$OPINION$§W.
translation: 宣称§Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§!，消耗§R$PRESTIGE$§!威望。这将降低§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!对你的好感度§R$OPINION$§!。

original: Revoke a landed title from a character
translation: 剥夺一个角色的实地头衔

original: Revoke a title from one of your vassals. It will infuriate the vassal, and, unless you have a claim on the title, will cost you Prestige and anger your other vassals too.
translation: 剥夺一个封臣的头衔。这将激怒封臣，而且除非你对这个头衔有宣称权，还将损害你的威望并激怒其他封臣。

original: Select a title to revoke. Revoking a title will lower §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W's opinion of you. If you do not have a claim on the title or high enough Crown Authority, it will cost you Prestige and anger your vassals.
translation: 选择剥夺的头衔。剥夺头衔将降低§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!对你的好感。如果你没有这个头衔的宣称权，或者王权法不够高，还将损害你的威望并激怒其他封臣。

original: Revoke the §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W for §R$PRESTIGE$§W Prestige. This will lower §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W's opinion of you by §R$OPINION$§W, and your other vassals' by §R$OPINION2$§W.
translation: 剥夺§Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W，损耗 §R$PRESTIGE$§W 威望。这将降低§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W对你的好感度 §R$OPINION$§W，降低其他封臣对你的好感度 §R$OPINION2$§W。

original: Revoke the §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W. This will lower §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W's opinion of you by §R$OPINION$§W.
translation: 剥夺§Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W。这将降低§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W对你的好感度 §R$OPINION$§W。

original: There is a §R$RISK$%§W chance that [Recipient.GetSubjectPronoun]§W will revolt!
translation: 有 §R$RISK$%§W 几率 [Recipient.GetSubjectPronoun]§W 将揭竿而起！

original: Award an honorary title to a character
translation: 授予一个角色荣誉头衔

original: You can hand out honorary titles to your courtiers, which will raise their opinion of you. Some honorary titles also come with minor estates (a source of income) and monthly prestige gain.
translation: 你可以授予荣誉头衔给你的廷臣，这将提高他们对你的好感度。部分荣誉头衔附带次级产权（一种经济收入来源）和每月的威望收入。

original: Select an honorary title to grant to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W.
translation: 选择一个荣誉头衔授予 §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!。

original: Grant the title of §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W. This will increase [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by $OPINION$.
translation: 将 §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§! 授予 §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!。这将提高[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]对你的好感度$OPINION$。

original: Assassination is a convenient way of removing a troublesome character for good. However, the risk of discovery should be carefully weighed against the potential benefits - the dishonor is not soon forgotten...
translation: 暗杀的好处是能方便地去掉麻烦角色。然而，应当慎重权衡利弊风险——一旦暴露，这污名将被铭记……

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W is rumored to be involved in an assassination attempt on §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W
translation: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W据传言卷入了针对§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W的一场谋杀企图

original: War is where men prove their mettle! Just make sure you are ready...
translation: 战争是证明勇气的场所！只要你做好了充分准备……

original: You have subjects in §Y[Recipient.GetFirstName]'s§! court. [Recipient.GetSubjectPronounCap] might execute them!
translation: 你有臣民在§Y[Recipient.GetFirstName]§!的宫廷。[Recipient.GetSubjectPronounCap]可能会处决他们！

original: Attacking an ally would cost us §R$PRESTIGE$§! prestige
translation: 攻击盟友会花费 §R$PRESTIGE$§! 威望

original: Attempt to negotiate an end to our current war.
translation: 试图以谈判来结束眼下的战争。

original: [Actor.GetBestName] has presented us the following peace offer:
translation: [Actor.GetBestName]向我们提供了下列和平条件：

original: Send a gift of §Y$COST$§W¤ to §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!.\nThis will improve our relationship.
translation: 赠送价值 §Y$COST$§W¤ 的礼物给§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!。\n这将改善我们的关系。

original: Send a gift of §Y$COST$§W¤ to §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!, increasing [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by §G$OPINION$§!.
translation: 赠送价值 §Y$COST$§W¤ 的礼物给§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!，提高[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]好感度 §G$OPINION$§!。

original: [Actor.GetBestName] has presented a gift of §Y$COST$§W to us!
translation: [Actor.GetBestName]赠送了价值 §Y$COST$§W 的礼物给我们！

original: Please accept this humble gift of §Y$COST$§W.
Send an offer to §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!, asking them to become a vassal of ours.
translation: 向§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!发出一个提议，要求他们成为我们的封臣。

original: We can offer to vassalize all landed nobles of lower rank than us, though they will probably not accept unless they are much weaker than us and of our religion and culture.
translation: 我们可以向级别比我们低的有地贵族提议附庸，尽管他们很可能不会接受，除非他们比我们弱很多，或是与我们宗教和文化相同。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W agreed to become a vassal of §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W declined to become a vassal of §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W
We have received an offer to become a vassal of [Actor.GetBestName]
We wish to extend our protection as your new liege [Actor.GetLordLady]. All we ask in return is your oath of fealty...
translation: 我们愿意扩大我们的保护范围，让[Actor.GetLordLady]成为你的新领主。你的效忠誓约就是我们要求的全部回报……

original: Send an offer to §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!, asking for [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] protection as my new Liege.
translation: 向§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!发出一个提议，请求[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]作为我的新领主提供保护。

original: We can ask to become a vassal of any independent lord of higher rank than us. They are unlikely to refuse.
translation: 我们可以向级别比我们高的贵族宣誓效忠。他们不太可能拒绝。

original: This will greatly upset our old liege, §Y$OLD_LIEGE$§W.
translation: 这会使我们的原领主 §Y$OLD_LIEGE$§! 非常失望。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W agreed to become the new liege [Recipient.GetLordLady] of §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W declined to become the new liege [Recipient.GetLordLady] of §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W
We have received a request to accept [Actor.GetBestName] as our vassal.
We humbly ask that you accept our oath of fealty as our new liege [Recipient.GetLordLady].
translation: 我谦卑恳求你接受我们的效忠誓言，成为我们的新领主，[Recipient.GetLordLady]。

original: Arrange a Betrothal between two characters
While children are not allowed to marry, they can get betrothed. The betrothal will last until the characters get married, one of them should die, or it is explicitly broken.
translation: 儿童不得结婚，但他们可以订立婚约。所订立的婚约有效至双方成婚，一方去世，或是婚约被撕毁。

original: Select a future bride and groom.
translation: 选择未来的新郎和新娘。

original: Select a character from the court of §Y$CHAR$§W.
translation: 选择一位§Y$CHAR$§W宫廷里的角色。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W accepts the suggestion by §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W that §Y[ActorExtra.GetBestName]§W and §Y[RecipientExtra.GetBestName]§W should get betrothed
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W declines the suggestion by §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W that §Y[ActorExtra.GetBestName]§W and §Y[RecipientExtra.GetBestName]§W should get betrothed
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W拒绝了§Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W提出的关于让§Y[ActorExtra.GetBestName]§W和§Y[RecipientExtra.GetBestName]§W缔结婚约的提议

original: [Actor.GetBestName] proposes that [ActorExtra.GetBestName] and [RecipientExtra.GetBestName] should get betrothed
We propose that [ActorExtra.GetBestName] and [RecipientExtra.GetBestName] should get betrothed.
Break a Betrothal with a character
translation: 撕毁与一个角色所订立的婚约

original: A Betrothal can be broken at any time, though the other party will not be pleased...
translation: 婚约随时都可以被撕毁，不过另一方会不高兴……

original: This will lower §Y$OTHER$§W's opinion of you by §R$VALUE$§W.
translation: 这将使§Y$OTHER$§W对你的好感下降 §R$VALUE$§W。

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W has broken the betrothal between §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W and §Y[Recipient.Betrothed.GetBestName]§W.
We have decided to end the betrothal between [Recipient.GetBestName] and [Recipient.Betrothed.GetBestName].
Arrange a Matrilineal Marriage between two characters
translation: 为两个角色安排入赘婚姻

original: Under the terms of a Matrilineal Marriage, any children born of the union will be of the mother's dynasty rather than the father's. This is a way of ensuring the continuation of your dynasty if your ruler or heir is female.
translation: 入赘会使夫妻生育的孩子成为母亲家族的成员。如果统治者是女性的话，这是保证家族延续的一种很好的方法。

original: Select the potential bride and groom.
translation: 选择潜在的新娘和新郎。

original: Select a character from the court of §Y$CHAR$§W.
translation: 选择一位§Y$CHAR$§W宫廷里的角色。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W accepts the suggestion by §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W that §Y[ActorExtra.GetBestName]§W and §Y[RecipientExtra.GetBestName]§W should marry matrilineally
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W接受§Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W的提议，§Y[ActorExtra.GetBestName]§W和§Y[RecipientExtra.GetBestName]§W缔结入赘婚姻

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W declines the suggestion by §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W that §Y[ActorExtra.GetBestName]§W and §Y[RecipientExtra.GetBestName]§W should marry matrilineally
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W拒绝§Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W的提议，§Y[ActorExtra.GetBestName]§W和 §Y[RecipientExtra.GetBestName]§W不会缔结入赘婚姻

original: [Actor.GetBestName] proposes that [ActorExtra.GetBestName] and [RecipientExtra.GetBestName] should marry matrilineally
We propose that [ActorExtra.GetBestName] and [RecipientExtra.GetBestName] marry matrilineally.
Arrange a Marriage between two characters

Marriage and the choice of a spouse is important for several reasons:
- You need to produce heirs lest your line end, and the game with it!
- Half of your spouse's attribute values are added to your own.
- You can call your in-laws to war (including those of your children and siblings)
- Characters gain prestige by marrying above their rank
- Characters gain prestige by marrying into a prestigious Dynasty
translation:
婚姻和配偶的选择非常重要，因为：
－你需要继承人以防止血脉断绝。
－配偶能力的一半将加到你的能力上。
－你可以召唤你的姻亲在战争中支援你（包括你孩子和兄弟姐妹的姻亲）。
－与等级更高的贵族联姻可以获得威望。
－与声名显赫的家族联姻可以获得威望。

original: Select the potential bride and groom.
translation: 选择潜在的新娘和新郎。

original: Select a character from the court of §Y$CHAR$§W.
translation: 选择一位§Y$CHAR$§W宫廷里的角色。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W accepts the suggestion by §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W that §Y[ActorExtra.GetBestName]§W and §Y[RecipientExtra.GetBestName]§W should marry
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W declines the suggestion by §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W that §Y[ActorExtra.GetBestName]§W and §Y[RecipientExtra.GetBestName]§W should marry
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W拒绝§Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W的提议，§Y[ActorExtra.GetBestName]§W和§Y[RecipientExtra.GetBestName]§W不会结为夫妻

original: Imprisoned characters from a foreign court can be ransomed for substantial amounts of money...
translation: 可以从来自其他宫廷的囚犯身上敲诈出一笔可观的赎金……
选择一个囚犯以获得赎金。

original: Offer to ransom [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName] to [Recipient.GetBestName] for §Y$GOLD$§W gold.
We offer you the safe release of [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName] for the modest sum of $RANSOM$¤
translation: 为了让[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]得到安全释放，您只需支付赎金 $RANSOM$¤

original: Demand that a character abandon their plot.
translation: 要求他人放弃正在策划的阴谋。

original: We can demand that a character gives up on their plot. If they fear or respect us enough, they might comply.
translation: 我们可以要求别人放弃正在策划的阴谋。如果他们足够畏惧或者敬重我们，他们可能会应允。

original: [Actor.GetBestName] demands that we end our plot to [Recipient.GetPlot].
Your plot to [Recipient.GetPlot] is known to me. I would have you end this little conspiracy of yours immediately.
translation: 你[Recipient.GetPlot]的阴谋已被我知晓。我要你立刻终止你的小把戏。

original: Ask that a character stop backing a plot
translation: 要求他人停止参与阴谋

original: We can diplomatically ask conspirators to abandon a known plot.
translation: 我们可以用外交手段要求密谋者放弃一场人尽皆知的阴谋。

original: [Actor.GetBestName] asks that we stop backing [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]'s plot to [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetPlot].
I am aware of your involvement in [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]'s plot to [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetPlot], and feel that it would be in your best interest to abandon that mad scheme.
translation: 我知道你参与了[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName][ThirdPartyCharacter.GetPlot]的阴谋，尽快退出这个疯狂的计划才是明智的选择。

original: Invite a character to join me in my scheme to §Y[Actor.GetPlot]§W.
translation: 邀请他人参加我§Y[Actor.GetPlot]§!的阴谋。

original: Characters who back your current plot can be called to war. They will also be very likely to help you achieve your goal, and will start getting events that move the plot forward.
translation: 参与你当下阴谋的同谋们可以被召唤加入战争。他们也很有可能帮助你实现目标，并通过事件推动阴谋发展。

original: We would like you to back our plot to [Actor.GetPlot]
translation: 我们希望你支持我们[Actor.GetPlot]的阴谋

original: Grant a landed title to the character
Grant one of your landed titles to another character. This will significantly improve their opinion of you.
translation: 将你拥有的其中一个实地头衔授予他人。这会显著改善其对你的好感。

original: Select a title to grant to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W.
The capital will change from §Y$CURRENT$§W to §Y$NEW$§W.
§RMaking [Recipient.GetObjectPronoun] a $TITLE$ will disqualify [Recipient.GetObjectPronoun] from the succession!§!
We offer you the landed title of [ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]
translation: 本座授予你[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]的实地头衔

original: Appoint a character to a position on your Council
translation: 任命一个人担任内阁大臣

original: We would like to appoint you to [ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName], what do you say?
translation: 我们希望任命你为[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]，你同意吗？

original: Resign from my position on the Council
You can decide to retire from your current office in your liege's council at any time.
translation: 你随时都能辞去你在你的领主内阁的现有职位。

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W chose to retire from [Actor.GetPossPronoun] job as [Actor.GetJobTitle] of §Y[Recipient.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§W
translation: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! 选择从 §Y[Recipient.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!辞去 [Actor.GetPossPronoun]作为[Actor.GetJobTitle]的工作

original: Regrettably, the needs of my own domain makes it impossible for me to continue as [Actor.GetJobTitle] of [Recipient.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. I am afraid I have to resign my position on the council.
translation: 非常遗憾，我领地上的一些问题使我不再可能继续担任[Recipient.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的[Actor.GetJobTitle]了。恐怕我不得不辞去我的内阁职位。

original: The head of a religion has the power to grant a special Casus Belli allowing the full scale invasion of a realm. If the attacker wins such a war, all occupied counties and attached vassal baronies will be cleared of their current owners and given to the invader to hand out to his loyal followers.
translation: 宗教领袖可以授予特殊的宣战理由，允许发动对一个国家的全面入侵。如果进攻者赢得战争，所有被占领的领地和封臣将不再属于他们原来的领主，而是被转交给入侵者，以犒劳其部下。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W accepted a request from §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W to invade the [ThirdPartyCharacter.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W declined a request from §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W to invade the [ThirdPartyCharacter.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].
[Actor.GetBestName] asks for permission to invade the [ThirdPartyCharacter.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].
We would like your permission to invade the wicked ruler of [ThirdPartyCharacter.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]
translation: 我们恳请您的允许，入侵邪恶的[ThirdPartyCharacter.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]

original: Ask §Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W for a divorce from §Y[Actor.Spouse.GetFirstName]§W. This will cost you [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and, if granted, will be viewed as an insult by [Actor.Spouse.GetPossPronoun] relatives.
translation: 向§Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W请求准许你与§Y[Actor.Spouse.GetFirstName]§W离婚。这将花费[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]，若申请被批准，将被[Actor.Spouse.GetPossPronoun]亲属视为侮辱。

original: The head of a religion can grant rulers [Actor.RelHead.GetSheHe] likes enough a divorce. However, the very act of asking will cost you [Player.Religion.GetPietyName].
translation: 宗教首领会批准[Actor.Relhead.GetSheHe]喜欢的统治者的离婚申请。然而，这一行为会消耗你[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]。

original: We humbly ask for your permission to divorce [Actor.Spouse.GetBestName]
translation: 谦恭地恳请您准许本座与[Actor.Spouse.GetBestName]离婚

original: Characters from religions that accept it (or currently have no religious head) can simply arrange a divorce settlement with their spouse.
translation: 某些宗教（或者宗教领袖空缺时）允许自由离婚。

original: Our marriage is a travesty. For both our sakes, let us end it with our dignity intact.
translation: 我们的婚姻不再有未来。为了我们双方，请让我们保有尊严地结束这一切吧。

original: Ask §Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W to excommunicate §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W. This will cost you §R100§W Piety and, if granted, will be viewed as an insult by [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetPossPronoun] relatives.
translation: 向§Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W请求绝罚§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W。这将花费你 §R100§W 虔诚，如果请求被批准，将会被[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetPossPronoun]亲属视作侮辱。

original: An excommunicated character will be despised by all characters of the same religion, and is fair game for declarations of war. However, characters in kingdoms with antipopes can only be affected by the antipope.
translation: 被处以绝罚的人将被同宗教的所有人鄙视，并给予他们宣战理由。不过，尊奉对立教宗的人只会受对立教宗行动的影响。

original: Ask §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W to excommunicate §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W. This will cost you §R$COST$§W Piety and, if granted, will be viewed as an insult by [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetPossPronoun] relatives.
translation: 要求 §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W绝罚§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W。这将消耗你§R$COST$§W虔诚，并且一旦成功，将被[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetPossPronoun]亲族视为侮辱。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W granted the request by §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W to excommunicate §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W declined the request by §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W to excommunicate §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W
The actions of [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName] can no longer be tolerated, I humbly ask that [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetSubjectPronoun] be excommunicated.
translation: [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]的行为不能再被容忍下去了，我请求绝罚[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetSubjectPronoun]。

original: We request that you honor your obligation and answer this call to arms against
translation: 本座请求你遵从义务，响应战争召唤对抗

original: §RDeclaring war on someone on a crusade will costs us an additional §Y$PIETY$ Piety§W
translation: §R对正在参与十字军的人宣战会额外花费§Y$PIETY$虔诚§W

original: §RDeclaring war on someone defending against heathens costs us an additional §Y$PIETY$ [Player.Religion.GetPietyName]§W
translation: §R对正在抵抗异教徒的人宣战会额外消耗§Y$PIETY$[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]§!

original: Ask §Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W to lift the excommunication of §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W.
Lifting the excommunication of a character requires that your religious head likes you enough, or is your vassal.
translation: 撤销绝罚要求宗教领袖足够喜欢你，或者是你的封臣。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W granted the request by §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W to lift the excommunication of §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W同意了§Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W免除对§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W的绝罚的提议

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W refused the request by §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W to lift the excommunication of §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W拒绝了§Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W免除对§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W的绝罚的提议

original: [Actor.GetBestName] wants us to lift the excommunication of [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]
Surely it is time for the virtuous [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName] to once more be allowed communion. I vouch for [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetPossPronoun] fidelity.
translation: 显然是时候准许纯洁的[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]再次领受圣体圣事了。我可以为[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetPossPronoun]担保。

original: Ask §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W to accept our ransom and release §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W.
translation: 请求§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!接受我们的赎金并释放§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§!。

original: Characters imprisoned abroad can be ransomed for a sufficient amount of gold.
translation: 在国外被拘禁的犯人可以用一笔钱赎回。

original: Offer [Recipient.GetBestName] a ransom of §Y$GOLD$§W to release [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName].
[Actor.GetBestName] offers us $RANSOM$ gold for the safe release of [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]
[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName] deserves freedom. Surely, $RANSOM$ gold would suffice to convince you to release [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetObjectPronoun]...
translation: [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]应该获得自由。当然，$RANSOM$金钱应该可以说服你释放[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetObjectPronoun]……

original: The people in [Root.Location.GetName], or, at least, most of them, have embraced the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith!
translation: [Root.Location.GetName]的人们，或者说，至少是其中的大多数，已经皈依了[Root.Religion.GetName]！

original: My hard work has paid off!
Send a letter to my liege!
Due to my tireless efforts, a humble subject in [Root.Location.GetName] has embraced the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith!
translation: 在我的不懈努力下，一名位于 [Root.Location.GetName]的卑微臣民已经皈依了 [Root.Religion.GetName]！

original: No one can resist the true faith!
translation: 没有人能抗拒真正的信仰！

original: The [From.GetJobTitle] of [From.Host.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [From.GetTitledName], has strongly influenced me and I have decided to convert to the [From.Religion.GetName] faith!
translation: [From.Host.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的[From.GetJobTitle]，[From.GetTitledName]，极大地影响了我，而且我已决定改信[From.Religion.GetName]！

original: Who dares lead my subjects astray like this!
translation: 何人胆大包天，将我的封臣带入歧途！

original: Heathens, aggravated by my preachings in [Root.Location.GetName], are breaking into my room, screaming ungodly curses!
translation: [Root.Location.GetName]的异教徒被我的布道所激怒，他们大叫着不敬神的咒骂，破门闯入了我的住宅！

original: Will I escape with my life?
I managed to flee the heathen savages by escaping through the backdoor.
translation: 我成功从后门逃离了那些异教蛮人

original: My prestige however did not go unscathed by the incident...
translation: 希望我的威望不会因此事而受损……

original: I did manage to survive the heathens attacking me, but the incident has left me severely wounded.
translation: 我成功地从异教徒的袭击中幸存下来，但是这次袭击也让我身受重伤。

original: I thank the Lord for saving me
These savages must be converted or put to the sword!
translation: 这些野蛮人要么皈依，要么受死！

original: I must send a letter to inform my liege
translation: 我必须向我的领主写一封信告知情况
他们怎么敢做出这种事！

original: I have found a heretic among the nobles in [Root.Location.GetName]!
I better let this particular one off...
Send a letter to my liege informing [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] of the heretic!
