translation: 他们已经处于战争状态

original: We do not have any special task at this time.
translation: 我们当前没有激活的任务

original: Not possible against your legal heir.
translation: 不能针对你的合法继承人。

original: Not possible against your ruler's spouse.
Not possible against your ruler's offspring.
Not possible against your own ruler!
Against foreign characters, you must use the corresponding Diplomatic Action.
translation: 对外国的角色你必须使用外交。
统治者可以$DURATION$被重新选中.

original: You cannot grant titles to foreigners
translation: 你不能授予外国人头衔

original: You cannot grant titles to imprisoned characters
Characters can be §Y$TITLE$§W if the following is true:\n
translation: 角色可以成为§Y$TITLE$§!，如果满足下列条件：\n

original: You cannot imprison foreign dignitaries once they have been allowed into the country.
translation: 当你允许外国高官入境后，你不能逮捕他们.

original: We cannot cancel our tribute while we have a truce.
translation: 停战期间不能取消贡金.

original: We have no titles to grant this character
translation: 你没有头衔可以授予给这个角色。

original: This Centre of Trade is worth a total of §Y$TOTAL$§W¤ each year. Our §Y$NUM$§W merchants are taking in §Y$VALUE$§W¤ of this.
translation: 这个贸易中心每年贸易额为 §Y$TOTAL$§W¤。我们的§Y$NUM$§W 个商人从中获得 §Y$VALUE$§W¤。

original: When our §Y$NUM$§W additional merchants arrive, our profits should increase. \n The first one will arrive on $DATE$.
translation: 当我们§Y$NUM$§!个后续的商人抵达，我们的收入将增加.\n其中第一个将在$DATE$抵达.

original: This army currently $COMMANDER$ and is standing in §Y$PROV$§W.
translation: 该部队当前指挥官是$COMMANDER$，现驻扎在§Y$PROV$§!。

original: It is on the move towards §Y$DEST$§W.
This navy currently $COMMANDER$ and is located in §Y$PROV$§W.
translation: 这支舰队的司令是$COMMANDER$，现在停泊在§Y$PROV$§!。
我们的传教活动有§Y$CHANCE$§!%的成功率.

original: You will receive messages regarding your close family
translation: 你将会收到关于你的近亲的消息

original: You will receive messages regarding your extended family
translation: 你将会收到关于你的近亲和远亲的消息

original: You will receive messages regarding all dynasty members
translation: 你将会收到关于你所有家族成员的消息

original: You will not receive messages regarding independent rulers
translation: 你将不会收到关于其他独立统治者的消息

original: You will receive messages regarding independent rulers of the same religion as you
translation: 你将会收到关于同宗独立统治者的消息

original: You will receive messages regarding all independent rulers
translation: 你将会收到关于所有独立统治者的消息

original: You will not receive messages regarding your vassals
translation: 你将不会收到关于封臣的消息

original: You will receive messages regarding your direct vassals
translation: 你将会收到关于直属封臣的消息

original: You will receive messages regarding your entire realm
translation: 你将会收到关于所有封臣的消息

original: You will not receive messages regarding your liege
translation: 你将不会收到关于领主的消息

original: You will receive messages regarding your direct liege
translation: 你将会收到关于直属领主的消息

original: You will receive messages regarding all lieges above you
translation: 你将会收到关于直属领主以及以上领主的消息
你将会从以下角色处收到消息：

translation: 你将不会从以下角色处收到消息：

original: An unsigned letter arrives.\n\n'My $HONORIFIC$, a little bird has whispered in my ear that you have a $SPOUSE$ you wish would just...go away, and that you might be in need of assistance. Or should I say, assassins...? Should you choose to acquire my services, leave a satchel with the money and the victim's name under the bridge just north of town.'
translation: 收到了一封未署名的信件。\n\n「我的$HONORIFIC$，一只小鸟在我耳边轻声告诉我你想让你的$SPOUSE$消失，你可能需要帮助。或者说得直接点，一场暗杀……如果你选择接受我们的服务，只需要把装有钱和目标名字的包放到城北的桥下就好了。」

original: Maybe riding alone through the woods wasn't such a good idea after all, as I now find myself surrounded by a band of brigands.
translation: 也许独自一人骑马穿过森林根本不是一个好主意，我发现自己被一伙强盗包围了。

original: Maybe I should hire them to kill my $SPOUSE$?
translation: 也许我应该雇佣他们去杀死我的$SPOUSE$？

original: Today at lunchtime the [Root.GetMyChancellorName] suddenly burst through the door.\n\n'My $HONORIFIC$, something terrible has happened! While out riding, your wife was killed in an accident as $OPPOSITE_HE_SHE$ was thrown from $OPPOSITE_HIS_HER$ horse! Oh, and it looks like $OPPOSITE_HIS_HER$ saddle might have been tampered with...'
translation: 今天午餐时间我的[Root.GetChancellorName]突然闯进门。\n\n「我的$HONORIFIC$，大事不好！您的妻子在骑马外出的时候死于一场意外，$OPPOSITE_HE_SHE$从$OPPOSITE_HIS_HER$马上摔了下来！哦，还有$OPPOSITE_HIS_HER$的马鞍看上去很可能被人做了手脚……」

original: This morning one of the chambermaids came rushing in.\n\n'My $HONORIFIC$, a terrible accident has occured! Your $SPOUSE$ was found at the bottom of the staircase with a broken neck! Obvoiusly $OPPOSITE_HE_SHE$ must have slipped...'
translation: 今天早上，一个侍女突然跑了进来。\n\n「我的$HONORIFIC$，大事不好！您的$SPOUSE$被发现死在楼梯下面，摔断了脖子！显然$OPPOSITE_HE_SHE$从上面滑了下来……」

original: This afternoon the sheriff burst through the door, looking pale.\n\n'Black news, my $HONORIFIC$! While out riding your $SPOUSE$ was attacked and robbed by brigands! Showing no mercy, they cut $OPPOSITE_HIS_HER$ down and left $OPPOSITE_HIM_HER$ by the road...'
translation: 今天下午一个治安官突然脸色苍白的闯进门。\n\n「坏消息，我的$HONORIFIC$！您的$SPOUSE$在骑马外出的时候被强盗攻击和抢劫！没有一点怜悯心，他们杀害了$OPPOSITE_HIM_HER$并把$OPPOSITE_HIS_HER$尸体留在路边……」

original: Brigands? In my realm? What has the world come to...
translation: 强盗？出现在在我的领地里？这个世界怎么了……

original: Waking up this morning, I found my $SPOUSE$ more cold than usual. I guess $OPPOSITE_HE_SHE$ must have been hiding some illness from me...
translation: 今早起床的时候，我发现我$SPOUSE$的身体已经冰冷了。我想$OPPOSITE_HE_SHE$一定掩饰了一些疾病没有告诉我……

original: The sheriff suddenly burst through the door looking exited.\n\n'My $HONORIFIC$, I have splendid news! My men discovered a band of brigands hiding in the forest nearby. I'm glad to report we killed every last one of them!'
translation: 一个治安官突然闯进门，他看上去十分激动。\n\n「我的$HONORIFIC$，我有一个好消息！我的人发现了躲藏在附近森林中的一伙强盗。我十分高兴的向您汇报他们都被杀死了！」

original: The cook of all people have thwarted my plans.\n\n'My $HONORIFIC$, my $HONORIFIC$! I found a man sneaking around the kitchen trying to poison the lunch I had prepared for your $SPOUSE$! Luckily I happened to catch him.'
translation: 居然是这个厨子破坏了我的计划。\n\n「我的$HONORIFIC$，我的$HONORIFIC$！我发现了一个想要在我为您的$SPOUSE$准备的午饭中下毒的人！幸运的是我恰好抓住了他。」

original: I apparently visited the local tavern yesterday, which would explain the hangover... What is worse though, is they tell me I may have blabbered about a certain 'plot'...
translation: 显然，我昨天去了本地的酒馆，我的宿醉正是这个原因。更糟糕的是他们告诉我，我昨天胡扯了一堆关于「阴谋」的话……

original: [From.GetTitledName] let everyone know about my plot to [Root.GetPlot] during a drunken stupor at the local tavern. I never should have included that drunken blabbermouth in a plot this delicate!
translation: [From.GetTitledName]在酒馆喝的酩酊大醉，让每一个人都知道我密谋[Root.GetPlot]。就不该让那个爱喝酒的大嘴巴参与这种精细的阴谋！

original: The other plotters haven't lifted a finger against $AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$! Maybe it is time for me to strike...
translation: 没有其他的密谋者插手针对$AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$的阴谋！也许到了我发动的时候了……

original: I can't miss an opportunity like this.
translation: 我不能错过这样的机会。

original: A better opportunity will present itself.
translation: 会有更好的机会出现的。

original:
Good news, my $HONORIFIC$! Our plan to let your wife meet $OPPOSITE_HIS_HER$ maker has finally come to fruition.

Sincerely,

FROM_CHARACTERNAME
translation:
好消息，我的$HONORIFIC$！我们送您的妻子去见$OPPOSITE_HIS_HER$造物主的计划就要成功了。

真诚的，

FROM_CHARACTERNAME
哦我的天，多么美妙的消息！

original:
My $HONORIFIC$, I write to you with both good and bad news. The bad news is that my attempt to murder your wife failed... The good news is that $OPPOSITE_HE_SHE$ was seriously wounded! So give it a little time and I am sure that the good lord will come and collect $OPPOSITE_HIM_HER$!

Sincerely,

FROM_CHARACTERNAME
translation:
我的$HONORIFIC$，我写给您的信中既有好消息又有坏消息。坏消息是我谋杀您妻子的企图失败了……好消息是$OPPOSITE_HE_SHE$受了很重的伤！所以我确信很快主就会把$OPPOSITE_HIM_HER$带走了！

真诚的，

FROM_CHARACTERNAME

original: At least we are making progress.

Unfortunately I am writing to you with bad news. Our plan to assassinate your wife has met with failure. The man I trusted to carry out the attempt failed miserably.

Sincerely,

FROM_CHARACTERNAME
translation:
很遗憾，我写给您的信带来了坏消息。我们暗杀您妻子的计划失败了。我所信任的计划执行者不幸失手了。

真诚的，

FROM_CHARACTERNAME

original: Do I have to do everything myself?
translation: 难道每一件事情都要我亲自出马么

original:
My $HONORIFIC$, despite what you may have heard, I assure you that the moment just wasn't right for carrying out our plan against $AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$. Any half-hearted or ill-conceived attempts at this moment would only risk exposing our intentions without accomplishing our goals. Therefor I deceided it was best to wait for a better opportunity.

Sincerely,

FROM_CHARACTERNAME
translation:
我的$HONORIFIC$，不管您听说了什么，我向您保证这不是执行我们针对$AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$的计划的恰当时机。此刻任何粗心的考虑欠妥的尝试只会使我们的意图有曝光的危险，而无法达到我们的目的。因此我决定最好还是等待一个更好的机会。

真诚的，

FROM_CHARACTERNAME

original: That was probably for the best.
translation: 这可能是为了做到最好。

original: That was a missed opportunity, you bloody fool!
translation: 你这个蠢货，你失去了一次绝佳的机会！

original: I will send a letter informing $CHARACTERTITLE$ $CHARACTERNAME$ why I didn't act.
translation: 我会寄给$CHARACTERTITLE$$CHARACTERNAME$一封信件告诉他为什么我没有行动。

original: An unsigned letter arrives.\n\n'My $HONORIFIC$, a little bird has whispered in my ear that you wish a certain person would just...go away, and that you might be in need of assistance. Or should I say, assassins...? Should you choose to acquire my services, leave a satchel with the money and the victim's name inside the old oak tree just south of town.'
translation: 收到了一封未署名的信件。\n\n「我的$HONORIFIC$，一只小鸟在我耳边轻声告诉我你想让某人消失，你可能需要帮助。或者说得直接点，一场暗杀……如果你选择接受我们的服务，只需要把装有钱和目标名字的包放到城南的老橡树里就好了。」

original: That bird must have read my mind!
translation: 那只小鸟一定读取了我的思维！

Or should I say, assassins...? Should you choose to acquire my services, leave a satchel with the money and the victim's name under the bridge just north of town.'

translation: 也许独自一人骑马穿过森林根本不是一个好主意，我发现自己被一伙强盗包围了.

original: Maybe I should hire them to kill $AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$ instead?

Oh, and it's rumored that $AMBITION_HIS_HER$ saddle might have been tampered with...'

translation: 今天下午我的[Root.GetMyChancellorName]突然脸色苍白的闯进门。\n\n「坏消息，我的$HONORIFIC$！$AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$在骑马外出的时候被强盗攻击和抢劫！没有一点怜悯心，他们杀死了$AMBITION_HIM_HER$并把$AMBITION_HIS_HER$尸体留在路边……」

original: What has the world come to...
$AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$ was found a bit more stiff than usual this morning. Apparently $AMBITION_HE_SHE$ died of illness during the night, even though no one knew $AMBITION_HE_SHE$ was sick...
translation: 今天早上，$AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$浑身僵硬地被人发现.显然$AMBITION_HE_SHE$昨晚死于疾病，尽管并没有人知道$AMBITION_HE_SHE$生病了……

original: The sheriff suddenly burst through the door looking exited.\n\n'My $HONORIFIC$, I have splendid news! My men have captured a band of brigands. I piece of paper found on them revels they were on their way to kill $AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$!'
translation: 一个警官突然闯进门，他看上去十分激动.\n\n「我的$HONORIFIC$，我有一个好消息！我的人抓住了一伙强盗.从他们身上找到的一张纸显示他们正要去杀害$AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$！」

original: My [Root.GetMyChancellorName] told me a cook of all people have thwarted my plans.\n\n'News my $HONORIFIC$! They tell us the cook caught a man sneaking around the kitchen trying to poison $AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$ lunch! Luckily though they caught him red-handed.'
translation: 我的[Root.GetChancellorName]告诉我居然是一个厨子破坏了我的计划。\n\n「好消息，我的$HONORIFIC$！他们告诉我们厨子抓住了一个在厨房附近偷偷摸摸的人，他想在$AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$的午饭中下毒！幸运的是他被逮了个正着。」

original: I apparently visited the local tavern yesterday, which would explain this hangover. What is worse though, is they tell me I may have blabbered about a certain 'plot'...
translation: 显然，我昨天去了本地的酒馆，我的宿醉正是这个原因。更糟糕的是他们告诉我，我昨天胡扯了一堆关于「阴谋」的话……

original: Honey and water, you have screwed me again!
translation: 亲爱的酒，你又误了我的大事！

original: I never should have included that drunken blabbermouth, FROM_CHARACTERNAME, in a plot this delicate!
translation: 我就不该让那个爱喝酒的大嘴巴FROM_CHARACTERNAME参加到这个精细的阴谋中来！

translation: 没有其他的密谋者插手$AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$的阴谋！也许这是我发动的时候了……

original: I can't miss an opportunity like this.
translation: 我不能错过这样的机会.

original: A better opportunity will present itself.
translation: 会有更好的机会出现的.

Sincerely,

FROM_CHARACTERNAME
translation:
好消息，我的$HONORIFIC$！我们让$AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$去见$OPPOSITE_HIS_HER$造物主的计划就要成功了。

FROM_CHARACTERNAME
哦我的天，多么美妙的消息！

FROM_CHARACTERNAME

original: Do I have to do everything myself?
translation: 难道每一件事情都要我亲自出马么

original:
My $HONORIFIC$, despite what you may have heard, I assure you that the moment just wasn't right for carrying out our plan against $AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$. Any half-hearted or ill-conceived attempts at this moment would only risk exposing our intentions without accomplishing our goals. Therefor I deceided it was best to wait for a better opportunity.

Sincerely,

FROM_CHARACTERNAME
translation:
我的$HONORIFIC$，不管您听说了什么，我向您保证这不是执行我们针对$AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$的计划的恰当时机。此刻任何粗心的考虑欠妥的尝试只会使我们的意图有曝光的危险，而无法达到我们的目的。因此我决定最好还是等待一个更好的机会。

真诚的，

FROM_CHARACTERNAME

original: That was probably for the best.
translation: 这可能是为了做到最好.

original: That was a missed opportunity, you bloody fool!
translation: 你这个蠢货，你失去了一次绝佳的机会！

original: I will send a letter informing $CHARACTERTITLE$ $CHARACTERNAME$ why I didn't act.
translation: 我会寄给$CHARACTERTITLE$$CHARACTERNAME$一封信件告诉他为什么我没有行动.

original: An unsigned letter arrives.\n\n'My $HONORIFIC$, a little bird has whispered in my ear that you wish $AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$ would just...go away, and that you might be in need of assistance. Or should I say, assassins...? Should you choose to acquire my services, leave a satchel with the money and the victim's name inside the old oak tree just south of town.'
translation: 收到了一封未署名的信件。\n\n「我的$HONORIFIC$，一只小鸟在我耳边轻声告诉我你想让$AMBITION_TARGET_NAME$消失，你可能需要帮助。或者说得直接点，一场暗杀……如果你选择接受我们的服务，只需要把装有钱和目标名字的包放到城南的老橡树里就好了。」

original: That bird must have read my mind!
translation: 那只小鸟一定读取了我的思维！

original: My tedious research is finally done. I have managed to fabricate a claim on a title that one of my fellow co-conspirators should be very interested in.
translation: 我单调乏味的研究终于完成了。我成功地伪造了一个针对某个头衔的宣称，我的一位共谋者一定会对它很感兴趣。

original: This should be worth quite a lot!
My spymaster tells me that information about my plot to [Root.GetPlot] might have leaked to someone outside the conspiracy. We do not know who yet, but maybe we will hear from him...
translation: 我的间谍总管告诉我，我密谋[Root.GetPlot]的事情可能已被外人所知。我们还不知道被泄露给了谁，但是可能我们很快就会收到他的信件了……

original: Can my spymaster never bring me good news?
translation: 难道我的间谍总管就不能带给我一些好消息么

original: I have learned that [From.GetTitledName] has started a plot to [From.GetPlot]. What should I do with this information?
translation: 我听说[From.GetTitledName]想要密谋[From.GetPlot]。对此我应该作何反应呢？

original: A little blackmail can't hurt, can it?
translation: 一封小小的敲诈信对他不痛不痒，难道不是么？

original: It does not concern me. Let it be.

It has come to my attention that you are the leader of a plot to [Root.GetPlot]. I find this most fascinating, and I bet that others would too... I suspect that you wish to keep this a secret, but my silence comes with a price.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我听说你想要密谋[Root.GetPlot]。我觉得这很有意思，一定会有别的人对这件事情感兴趣的……想要让我保守机密的代价可是很高的哦。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Bastard! But I don't have a choice...
translation: 杂种！但是我没有选择的余地……

original: I have no choice but to accept your despicable blackmail attempt. You have been given payment in full, and I expect your silence in this matter from now on.
translation: 我没有别的选择，只能接受你的卑鄙的敲诈。你已经拿了足够多的钱，我希望你从此以后别再向别人提起这件事。

original: I will never succumb to blackmail! I rather face the embarrassment of having my plot exposed than giving you a single coin.
translation: 我绝不会向讹诈屈服！我宁可面对阴谋败露的尴尬也不会给你一个硬币的。

original: I guess I have no choice...

Rather than risking civil war tearing the realm apart, I have decided to give in to your demand and hand my title over to you. But this treacherous act of blackmail will not be forgotten...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免内战分裂国土的危险，我决定同意你的请求并把头衔交给你。但是我永远不会忘记这种背信弃义的讹诈行为……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Rather than risking civil war tearing the realm apart, I have decided to give in to your demand and change the laws of inheritance to Seniority. But this treacherous act of blackmail will not be forgotten...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免内战分裂国土的危险，我决定同意你的请求采用年长者继承法。但是我永远不会忘记这种背信弃义的讹诈行为……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Rather than risking civil war tearing the realm apart, I have decided to give in to your demand and change the laws of inheritance to Primogeniture. But this treacherous act of blackmail will not be forgotten...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免内战分裂国土的危险，我决定同意你的请求采用长子继承法。但是我永远不会忘记这种背信弃义的讹诈行为……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Rather than risking civil war tearing the realm apart, I have decided to give in to your demand and change the laws of inheritance to Elective Monarchy. But this treacherous act of blackmail will not be forgotten...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免内战分裂国土的危险，我决定同意你的请求采用选举君主制。但是我永远不会忘记这种背信弃义的讹诈行为……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Your shameful attempt at blackmail has not succeeded. No matter how many corrupted souls you have enticed to help carry out your plan I will not give in without a fight. I'd rather die defending what is rightfully mine!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
你这可耻的敲诈企图绝不会得逞。无论你收买了多少腐败的卑鄙小人来支持你的阴谋，我绝不会不战而降。我宁愿战死在捍卫自己利益的战争中！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Actually going to war was not my plan...
translation: 其实我并没有计划走到战争这一步……

original:
Rather than risking civil war tearing the realm apart, I have decided to give in to your demand and change the laws of inheritance to gavelkind. But this treacherous act of blackmail will not be forgotten...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免内战分裂国土的危险，我决定同意你的请求采用均分继承法。但是我永远不会忘记这种背信弃义的讹诈行为……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Rather than risking civil war tearing the realm apart, I have decided to give in to your demand and lower the crown authority. But this treacherous act of blackmail will not be forgotten...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免内战分裂国土的危险，我决定同意你的请求并降低王权。但是我永远不会忘记这种背信弃义的讹诈行为……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]
收到了一封表示拒绝的信件。

original: Put the plot into motion by sending an ultimatum to [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
translation: 执行这个阴谋，对[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]发出最后通牒。

original: Put the plot into motion by sending an ultimatum to [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
translation: 执行这个阴谋，对[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]发出最后通牒。

original: Put the plot into motion trying to assassinate [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. Failure will have dire consequences...
translation: 执行这个阴谋，暗杀[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].失败会导致严重的后果……

original: Put the plot into motion trying to assassinate [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. Failure will have dire consequences...
translation: 执行这个阴谋，暗杀[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].失败会导致严重的后果……

original: Put the plot into motion trying to assassinate [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. Failure will have dire consequences...
translation: 执行这个阴谋，暗杀[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].失败会导致严重的后果……

original: Put the plot into motion trying to assassinate [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. Failure will have dire consequences...
translation: 执行这个阴谋，暗杀[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].失败会导致严重的后果……

original: Put the plot into motion trying to assassinate [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. Failure will have dire consequences...
translation: 执行这个阴谋，暗杀[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].失败会导致严重的后果……

original: Put the plot into motion trying to assassinate [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. Failure will have dire consequences...
translation: 执行这个阴谋，暗杀[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].失败会导致严重的后果……

original:
Rather than letting civil war tear the realm apart, [FromFrom.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] has agreed to step down and let me [FromFrom.GetPlot]. Your valuable support in this conflict will not be forgotten.

Sincerely,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免国家因内战而分裂，[FromFrom.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]已经同意下台并让我[FromFrom.GetPlot]。你在此次冲突中的宝贵支持我们将谨记于心。

真诚的，
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

original:
Despite my threat of war, [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] rejected my demand to [From.GetPlot]. In light of this I have decided that open war might not be the best way to achieve our goal and so I have disolved the plot.

Sincerely,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
translation:
无视我的战争威胁，[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]拒绝了我的[From.GetPlot]计划。有鉴于此，我觉得战争也许并不是达成目标的最佳方案，所以我放弃了这项计划。

真诚的，
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
阿斯图里亚斯 德 桑蒂利亚纳
阿斯图里亚斯 德 奥维耶多
诺夫哥罗德谢韦尔斯基
佩列斯拉夫尔扎列斯基

original: You can only build in your own Holdings
translation: 你只能在你自己的地产内建造
§W（§R持有者属于错误的地产类型§!）
最高水平：(直辖/国家/世界)

original: And an additional §Y$CHANCE$§W% increase for §Y$FOCUS$§W as it is set as the focus for this group
translation: §Y$FOCUS$§!设为重点将提供§Y$CHANCE$§!%的额外增长

original: Improved Armour for heavy infantry and knights.
Improved armament for light infantry, heavy infantry, and pikemen.
translation: 改良型轻步兵、重步兵和长枪兵武器

original: Improved armament for light and heavy cavalry
translation: 为轻骑兵和重骑兵改进军备
制造更大更好的攻城器械。

original: Bigger and better walls for Castle holdings.
translation: 为城堡建设更大更好的城墙

original: Better tactics result in battles won with fewer losses.
translation: 更好的战术可以减少伤亡。

original: Improved farming methods result in greater income from Castle holdings.
translation: 改进的农业技术可以为城堡带来更多收入

original: Encourage trade to gain more taxes from City holdings.
translation: 鼓励贸易可以让城市获得更多税收

original: Investigate new ways to wring your dues from the local Clergy.
translation: 研究压榨当地牧师们的新方法

original: Various training grounds and barracks to improve the size and quality of Castle levies.
translation: 建造各种训练场和营地来提高征兵品质和规模。

original: Improved relations with vassal feudal lords
translation: 改善封建领主和封臣的关系
改善和城市封臣的关系
改善和宗教封臣的关系

original: Our dynasty grows ever more prestigious.
Acceptance of those of a different faith.
With clearly codified laws people are more likely to accept new rulers as rightful.
translation: 明确的成文法律可以使人更愿意承认新统治者的合法性。

original: We are focusing our efforts on §Y$TECH_NAME$§!, increasing the chance of new discoveries by §Y$CHANCE$%§!.
translation: 我们努力的重点 §Y$TECH_NAME$§!，将增加 §Y$CHANCE$%§! 新发现的几率.

original: Sets the $GROUP$ focus on this advance, increasing the chance of new discoveries by §Y$CHANCE$%§!
translation: 设置$GROUP$为焦点，将提高新发现的几率§Y$CHANCE$%§!
显示§Y平均水平§!和§B最高水平§!：
名称：§Y等级§! ( % 增加几率 / 10 年 )

original: Martial skill is important for generals, and also affects the outcome of tasks given to the Marshal.
translation: 军事能力对将军至关重要，也会影响军事总管执行任务的结果。

original: With a Martial skill of §Y$VALUE$§W, §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§W is considered $DESC$ commander.
translation: 军事能力为§Y$VALUE$§W的§Y[GetTitledFirstName]§W被认为是$DESC$将领。

original: Diplomatic skill affects other characters' opinion of you, and is important for tasks given to the Chancellor.
translation: 外交能力影响其他角色对你的好感，也会影响外交总管执行任务的结果。

original: With a Diplomacy skill of §Y$VALUE$§W, §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§W is considered $DESC$ diplomat.
translation: 外交能力为§Y$VALUE$§W的§Y[GetTitledFirstName]§W被认为是$DESC$外交家。

original: With an Intrigue skill of §Y$VALUE$§W, §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§W is considered $DESC$ schemer.
translation: 密谋能力为 §Y$VALUE$§W 的§Y[GetTitledFirstName]§W被认为是$DESC$阴谋家。

original: Stewardship skill controls your tax income and is the primary attribute of your Steward.
translation: 管理能力决定税收数额，是你的财政总管的主要属性。

original: Learning is the primary attribute of the Court Chaplain and affects the rate of technological innovation.
translation: 学识能力是宫廷司祭的主要属性，并且影响科技创新速度。

original: With a Learning skill of §Y$VALUE$§W, §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§W is considered $DESC$ scholar.
translation: 学识能力为 §Y$VALUE$§W 的§Y[GetTitledFirstName]§W被认为是$DESC$学者。

original: Prestige is a measure of your success and can be spent to carry out special actions. The Prestige of each successive ruler you play is summed up and used to calculate your final score.
translation: 威望用于衡量你有多成功，可以被用于某些特殊行动。你扮演的每个角色的威望都将被累加起来，计入你的最终得分。

original: Piety is respected by the clergy and especially the head of your Church. It can be spent to petition the head of your Church. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.
translation: 虔诚为宗教领袖和你手下的神职人员所看重，可以被用于向宗教领袖请愿。像威望一样，虔诚在你扮演的角色死后将被计入总分。

original: Your Demesne consists of all your personal landed holdings (Castles, Cities and Temples.) If your demesne is unacceptably big, you will start to take taxation penalties and your vassals will grow resentful.
translation: 你的直辖领地包括你个人的所有实地地产（城堡，城市和神殿。）如果直辖领地过大，你将遭受税收惩罚，封臣也会表示不满。

original: This is the total number of Holdings (castles, cities and churches) under the control of you and all your vassals.
translation: 这是在你和你所有封臣控制下的地产（城堡，城市以及教堂）的总量。

original: Go on a Grand Hunt with the best hunters in our domains!
translation: 和最好的猎人在疆域内一起大狩猎！

original: Are you sure you wish to build $BUILDING$ in $SETTLEMENT$?
Have your [GetMyChancellorName] sow dissent between local nobles and their lieges.
translation: 派遣[GetChancellorName]去离间当地领主和封臣的关系。

original: Send your [GetTreasurerName] to ensure efficient taxation in the county.
Send your [GetTreasurerName] to speed up the construction of buildings and holdings in a county.
translation: 派出你的[GetTreasurerName]去加速建筑和领地的建设。

original: Have your [GetTreasurerName] research Economy advances in a county.
Send your [GetSpymasterName] to study technological marvels in a county, increasing the chance of spreading them to your capital.
translation: 派出你的[GetSpymasterName]学习科技进步，提高科技传播到你的首都的机会。

original: Have your [GetSpymasterName] focus his attention on the local nobles in a county, increasing the likelihood of intrigue events against them.
translation: 派遣[GetSpymasterName]在当地建立情报网络可以增加密谋事件的发生几率。

original: Have your [GetMarshalName] research Military advancements in a county.
translation: 派出你的[GetMarshalName]研究军事技术。

original: Send your [GetMarshalName] to increase the size of your levies in a county.
translation: 派出你的[GetMarshalName]增加当地的征召兵数量。

original: Send in your [GetMarshalName] with enough troops to suppress revolts and facilitate arrests of local vassals.
translation: 派遣[GetMarshalName]带领部队镇压叛乱并帮助逮捕当地封臣。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] would like to treat with foreign dignitaries in the court of [This.GetPossPronoun] liege.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] dreams of leading troops in the service of [This.GetPossPronoun] liege.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] loves intrigue and would like to put [This.GetPossPronoun] skills to formal use.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] would like to advise [This.GetPossPronoun] liege in spiritual matters.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]希望能在神学领域帮助[This.GetPossPronoun]领主.

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has decided it is time for [From.GetPossPronoun] spouse §Y[This.GetFirstName]§! to depart this world.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!决定是时候让[From.GetPossPronoun]配偶§Y[This.GetFirstName]§!离开这个世界了。

original: When an event happens to us.
translation: 当一个事件在我们身上发生时。

original: §Y[GetBestName]§! is building a new §Y$HOLDING$§! holding. It should be finished on §Y$DATE$§!.
translation: §Y[GetBestName]§!正在建设一座新的§Y$HOLDING$§!地产。完成日期：§Y$DATE$§!。

original: September 20, 1066 AD. King Harold Godwinson rushes to defend the shores of England against the forces of his traitorous brother Tostig and the Norwegian king Harald IV, nicknamed 'Hårdråde' (Hard Ruler). Meanwhile, William, Duke of Normandy, is about to launch his own invasion of England, sanctioned by Pope Alexander II himself. Saxon, Norse, or Norman - who shall rule Albion?
translation: 公元 1066 年 9 月 20 日。英格兰国王哈罗德·戈德温森挥师北上防卫英格兰海岸，急行军防御他叛逆的兄弟托斯蒂格和挪威国王「无情者」哈拉尔三世的军队。与此同时，诺曼底公爵威廉也在教宗亚历山大二世支持下跨越海峡发起入侵。撒克逊人，挪威人，诺曼人，谁将统治阿尔比昂？

original: Victorious at the hard-fought Battle of Hastings, William, Duke of Normandy, has proclaimed himself King of England. Displaced Saxon lords rage against the French speaking usurpers as fief after fief is given to William's loyal followers. In Anatolia, the Seljuk Turks under the great sultan Alp Arslan are about to invade the Byzantine Empire in a struggle that will determine the fate of Asia Minor...
translation: 在黑斯廷斯艰难地获得胜利后，诺曼底公爵威廉加冕为英格兰国王。威廉将大片领地分封给他的忠诚追随者们，激起了失势的撒克逊贵族对说法语的新统治者的反抗。在安纳托利亚，伟大的苏丹阿尔普·阿尔斯兰正计划着率领塞尔柱突厥人对摇摇欲坠的拜占庭帝国发动致命一击，以决定小亚细亚的命运……

original: Jerusalem has fallen to the forces of the great infidel, Saladin, but Henry II of England, Philip II of France, and Holy Roman Emperor Frederick 'Barbarossa' have, in their righteous zeal, ended their petty disputes and stand ready to march against the Moor in the most powerful Crusade yet... Deus Vult!
translation: 圣城耶路撒冷沦陷于伟大的异教徒领袖萨拉丁之手。但是英王亨利二世，法王菲利普二世和神圣罗马帝国皇帝「红胡子」腓特烈一世在信仰的感召下，停止了内斗，秣马厉兵，准备对摩尔人发动有史以来最大规模的十字军远征……神的旨意！

original: The death of French King Charles IV in 1328 with no immediate heir triggered a succession dispute that would last for over a hundred years. Edward III of England was the closest living male heir, but the French nobility, balking at the prospect of a foreign king, claimed the line could not pass through a woman, and crowned another pretender - Philip. Nine years later, war broke out...
translation: 1328 年去世的法王查理四世没有留下直系继承人，引发了一场持续百年的继承争端。英王爱德华三世是第一顺位的男性继承人，但是法国贵族对接受一位外国国王的统治并不热心，宣布王位不能通过女性亲属继承，转而加冕另一个继承人腓力六世。九年后，战争爆发了……

original: You need to control §Y$REQ_PERC$%§! of its de jure Counties to create this title. Currently, you control $PERC$ ($HELD$/§Y$ALL$§!). Creating this title would give you §G$PRESTIGE$§! Prestige and cost you §R$GOLD$§! Gold.
translation: 我们需要控制这个法理上的领地的 §Y$REQ_PERC$%§! 土地才能创建头衔。目前我们控制了 $PERC$（$HELD$/§Y$ALL$§!）。创建这个头衔将带来 §G$PRESTIGE$§! 威望，花费 §R$GOLD$§! 金币。

original: You need to control §Y$REQ_PERC$%§! of its de jure Counties to usurp this title. Currently, you control $PERC$ ($HELD$/§Y$ALL$§!). Usurping this title would give you §G$PRESTIGE$§! Prestige and cost you §R$GOLD$§! Gold.
translation: 我们需要控制这个法理上的领地的 §Y$REQ_PERC$%§! 土地才能篡夺头衔。目前我们控制 $PERC$（$HELD$/§Y$ALL$§!）。篡夺这个头衔将带来 §G$PRESTIGE$§! 威望，花费 §R$GOLD$§! 金币。

original: The title must have de jure vassals.
translation: 该头衔必须拥有法理上的封臣。

original: Creating this title would give you §G$PRESTIGE$§! Prestige and cost you §R$GOLD$§! Gold.
translation: 创建这项头衔将给予你 §G$PRESTIGE$§! 威望并花费你 §R$GOLD$§! 金钱。

original: Usurping this title would give you §G$PRESTIGE$§! Prestige and cost you §R$GOLD$§! Gold.
translation: 篡夺这项头衔将给予你 §G$PRESTIGE$§! 威望并花费你 §R$GOLD$§! 金钱。

original: This map mode highlights your own Realm (your holdings and those of your vassals.)
translation: 该地图高亮显示你自己的国家(你和你封臣的直辖领)。

original: This map mode highlights your own Demesne (your own holdings).
translation: 该地图高亮显示你自己的直辖领地（你自己控制的地产）。

original: This map mode shows the distribution of distinct cultures.
This map mode shows all geographical and traditional ('de jure') duchies.
translation: 该地图模式显示所有地理和传统（「法理」）上的公国。

original: This map mode shows all geographical and traditional ('de jure') kingdoms.
translation: 该地图模式显示所有地理和传统（「法理」）上的王国。

original: This map mode shows your diplomatic relations with other rulers.
translation: 该地图将显示你和其他统治者的外交关系。

original: This map mode shows all the counts.
translation: 该地图将显示所有伯爵领。

original: This map mode shows all the dukes.
translation: 该地图将显示所有公国。

original: This map mode shows all the Kings.
translation: 该地图将显示所有王国。

original: This map mode shows direct vassals under independent rulers.
translation: 该地图将显示独立统治者的所有直属封臣。

original: This map mode shows all the players and their realms.
translation: 该地图将显示所有玩家及其王国。

original: §RChanging Succession Law will displease all vassals, especially those whose stand to lose.§W
translation: §R更改继承法会使所有封臣不满，尤其是那些失去权利的.§!

original: was elevated to the heavenly mansion
has been grasped by honorable death
rests in the arms of the Lord
has steadfastly fallen asleep in the Lord
translation: 在主的身边沉沉睡去了

original: §RWill not be inherited unless pressed in war.§!
translation: §R除非在战争中公开否则不能继承.§!

original: Emperors cannot create kingdoms or empires.
translation: 皇帝不能建立王国或帝国。

original: The title can only be held by §Y$RELIGION$§W characters.
translation: 该头衔不能被非§Y$RELIGION$§!角色持有.

original: The Prestige and [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] of each successive character you have played is added to your score at the time of their death. Your score will determine your final rank when the game ends.
translation: 每个角色死亡时的威望和[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]都将计入你的分数。你的分数会在游戏结束时决定你的排名。

original: §RThe Kingdom must have the Free Investiture Law§!
translation: §R王国必须有自主神职叙任权§!

original: §RHe likes the Pope (§Y$POPE$§R) more than us (§Y$US$§R)§!

translation: §R我们已经控制了一位对立教宗§!

original: Creating an Antipope will allow us to excommunicate any character in our realm, and protect them from excommunication by the official Pope. Bishops who like the Antipope better than the Pope will pay taxes to us instead. However, creating an Antipope will cost §R$PRESTIGE_COST$§! Prestige and will lower the Moral Authority of the Church by §R$AUTHORITY_LOSS$§!.
translation: 扶植对立教宗既可以允许我们随意绝罚本国人，也能保护他们不被真正的教宗绝罚。比起教宗来更敬重对立教宗的主教们将向我们缴税。不过扶植对立教宗会花费§R$PRESTIGE_COST$§!威望，并降低§R$AUTHORITY_LOSS$§!宗教权威。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to amass a substantial amount of wealth
[This.GetTitledFirstName] strives to become a beacon of chivalry and honor - a paragon of virtue.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]努力成为骑士精神与荣誉感的榜样——一个美德典范。

original: The ambitious [This.GetTitledFirstName] thinks that marrying a ruler would be an excellent way to climb the social ladder.
translation: 野心勃勃的[This.GetTitledFirstName]认为与领主结婚是提高社会地位的捷径

original: The ambitious [This.GetTitledFirstName] thinks that marrying a heir would be a good way to secure the future.
translation: 野心勃勃的[This.GetTitledFirstName]认为与继承人结婚是确保未来地位的好办法

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to be granted a fief of [This.GetPossPronoun] own.
With the current heir being ill fit to rule, [This.GetTitledFirstName] thinks [This.GetSubjectPronoun] should be the prime candidate in line.
translation: 现在的继承人并不适于统治，[This.GetTitledFirstName]认为[This.GetSubjectPronoun]应该成为第一继承人。

original: The army has already been raised
Raise our standing Army. (It will arrive in §Y$CAPITAL$§W.)
translation: 动员我们的常备军.(将会抵达 §Y$CAPITAL$§!.)

original: The §Y$TITLE$§W are currently in fief to §Y$EMPLOYER$§W.
The culture of characters determines whether their subjects and other characters consider them foreigners.
translation: 角色的文化决定了他的臣民和其他人是否将其看作外国人。

original: Religion is a defining attribute of characters and determines which community they belong to, regardless of how observant they are. Characters of other faiths are at best considered untrustworthy...
translation: 宗教是角色的关键属性，决定他们属于哪个共同体，无论他们是否严守教规。异教徒总是被认为不可相信……

original: Straits can be crossed by armies without the use of fleets. When attacking over a strait, the attacking army will get a significant combat penalty
translation: 陆军不需要船只就能通过海峡。不过跨海峡攻击会使进攻方受到严重的战斗惩罚

original: A river flows between this county and §Y$PROV$§W
translation: 在本省份和§Y$PROV$§W间有一条河流

original: When attacking over a river, the attacking army will get a combat penalty
translation: 跨河攻击会使进攻方受到战斗惩罚

original: Not possible to usurp County or Barony rank titles
translation: 不能篡夺伯爵和男爵头衔

original: Landed titles have a De Jure hierarchy that never changes, representing ancient and traditional geographical regions.
translation: 实地头衔有永远不会发生变化的法理层次体系，代表着自古以来传统的地理区域。

original: Crown Laws can only be passed by Kings and Emperors, and concern everyone in the geographical (de jure) kingdom or empire, even if they are not de facto part of it.
translation: 王权法只有国王和皇帝才能通过，一旦通过就会影响到这个王国或帝国法理领地上的所有领主，即便这个领主不是事实上的封臣。
我们现在可以动员$NUM$名士兵
针对$WHO$的$NAME$宣战理由在 $DATE$ 失效

original: The family of $NAME$, including guardians and wards.
translation: $NAME$的家人，包括监护人和被监护人。

original: These lords are in direct fief to $NAME$, and may have vassals of their own.
translation: 这些领主是$NAME$的直属封臣，可以拥有自己的封臣。

original: The Court mainly consists of various unlanded nobles, but also the councillors (who can be landed vassals), imprisoned characters, and children being tutored by one of the courtiers.
translation: 宫廷主要包含没有封地的贵族，也有被委以要职的内阁成员（可能拥有领地），被拘禁的囚徒，以及接受某位廷臣教育的孩子。

original: Characters can reside at a foreign court if they are imprisoned or being educated there. Furthermore, councillors, even if rulers themselves, will reside at the court of their liege.
translation: 角色可以暂时居住在外国，作为囚犯或者接受教育。此外，内阁成员们，有时候甚至包括统治者自己，也有可能居住在其领主的宫廷。

original: Do you wish to dismiss this unit?
translation: 确定要解散这个单位吗？

original: The $NAME$ will stand down and all levies will return home.
Supply is the number of troops that a county can support before they start to suffer attrition.
translation: 补给上限是一个省份能支持的部队数量（以千为单位），超过上限的部队会开始遭受损耗。

original: The revolt risk is the chance of a peasant uprising in the county.
translation: 叛乱风险是这个省份的农民叛乱的几率。

original: The §Y$PROVINCE$§W is traditionally considered a part of the §Y$DUCHY$§W.
Currently, this duchy is held by no one.
§Y$DUKE$§W is the current duke, and also de facto controller of §Y$PROVINCE$§W.
translation: §Y$DUKE$§!是现任公爵，也是§Y$PROVINCE$§!事实上的控制者。

original: §Y$DUKE$§W is the current duke, who will strive to regain actual control of §Y$PROVINCE$§W.
translation: §Y$DUKE$§!是现任公爵，正在试图夺回§Y$PROVINCE$§!的控制权。

original: The §Y$PROVINCE$§W is traditionally considered a part of the §Y$KINGDOM$§W.
§Y$KING$§W is the current king, and also de facto controller of §Y$PROVINCE$§W.
translation: §Y$KING$§!是现任国王，也是§Y$PROVINCE$§!事实上的控制者。

original: §Y$KING$§W is the current king, and, while not in de facto control of §Y$PROVINCE$§W, still has the authority to pass Royal Laws that affect it.
translation: §Y$KING$§!是现任国王，但不是§Y$PROVINCE$§!事实上的控制者，不过王权法还是能影响这里。

original: §RCannot assign a new job while leading troops!§!
translation: §R指挥部队时不能指派新任务！§!

original: Seek approval for a new Law from the affected lords. Until enough of them have approved, the law will not be passed and you cannot propose any other law changes.
translation: 向与新法律有关的领主寻求支持.如果没有足够领主支持，法律将无法通过，你也不能改变其他法律.

original: Has not previously changed the succession law
translation: 以前没有改变过继承法

original: Has reigned for at least §Y$REIGN$§W years
No vassals are fighting each other
No vassal has a negative opinion of you
translation: 没有封臣对你的好感为负

original: The prestige of a dynasty is measured by the number and rank of titles ever held by its members, living and dead. A fraction of this sum is given to each new member of the dynasty at birth, and to anyone who marries a member of the dynasty.
translation: 家族威望由已去世和尚健在的家族成员所拥有的头衔等级和数量衡量。家族的每个新成员将在出生时得到这个数值的一部分，与家族成员结婚的人也能得到。

original: You must build one of each type of Holding first
translation: 你必须首先建造所有种类的地产各一个

original: A guardian is a teacher and mentor to a child character. The skills, traits, culture and religion of the guardian are likely to be passed on to the young ward.
translation: 监护人是儿童的老师和顾问。监护人的技能，特质，文化和宗教很有可能影响年轻的被监护人。

original: Adult characters can take on two children as their wards, passing on their skills, traits, culture and religion.
translation: 成年人可以指导两个被监护人，影响他们的技能，特质，文化和宗教。

original: Rulers who are incapable of governing themselves due to youth, illness or absence get a regent assigned. During a regency, the skills of the regent apply rather than those of the ruler.
translation: 由于过于年幼，疾病或者不在国内而不能亲自统治领地的君主会任命一个摄政。在摄政期间，摄政者的技能将代替君主的技能。

original: Half the skill values of the spouse are added to those of a ruler for purposes of government.
translation: 配偶技能的一半将增加给君主以更好地统治领地。

original: This is the Dynasty of this character. Some dynasties are more prestigious than others, depending on the number and rank of all landed titles ever held by their members, living and dead. A fraction of the Prestige of both the mother and father's Dynasty is carried over to children born in wedlock. Spouses also get a fraction of each other's dynastic prestige when marrying.
translation: 这是角色的家族。一些家族比另外一些更显赫，这取决于已去世和尚健在的家族成员所拥有的头衔等级和数量。新生儿在出生时将同时得到父母家族威望的一部分。夫妻结婚时也能得到对方家族威望的一部分。

original: These characters are promised to each other and cannot marry anyone else unless the betrothal is broken.
translation: 这两人已经订婚，除非撕毁约定，否则不能另寻新欢。

original: Cannot usurp a title from someone who is at war
translation: 不能篡夺战争中领主的头衔
邀请男性神职人员前来宫廷

original: Scour the land for a holy man to join my court and advise me on religious matters.
translation: 寻找男性神职人员加入我的宫廷，在宗教事务上给我建议。

original: Invite a promising nobleman to court, to aid with matters of administration.
translation: 邀请文武兼备的贵族加入我的宫廷，帮助我管理领地。

original: A young noblewoman who has caught your eye makes her début at a formal ball.
translation: 一位年轻的贵族名媛吸引了你的眼球。在一场正式的舞会上引荐她。

original: Declare that §Y[This.GetBestName]§! is a legitimate child and not a bastard after all...
translation: 宣布§Y[This.GetBestName]§!是合法的继承人，不再是不知出身的私生野种……

original: This county is your capital, where you and your court resides. When you send your Spymaster to study technology, discoveries will be made here. Capitals are worth more war score.
translation: 这个省份是你的首都，你的宫廷居住于此。当你派间谍总管窃取科技时，窃取到的科技将被送到这里。首都的战争分数价值更高。

original: $SETTLEMENT$ is building a §Y$CONSTRUCTION$§!, which will be done in $DAYS$ days
A §Y$BUILDING$§W will be finished at the $SETTLEMENT$ in §Y$DATE$§W.

translation: 你的首都§Y$CAPITAL$§!的科技发展水平。

original: You have already raised all levies from this county.
translation: 你已经动员了这个省份的所有征召兵。

original: You have no Holdings in this county
translation: 你在这个省份没有地产

original: You have already raised all ship from this county.
translation: 你已经动员了这个省份的所有船只。

original: You have not raised any levies from this county
translation: 你没有动员这个省份的士兵

original: You have not raised any ships from this county
translation: 你没有动员这个省份的船只

original: This is a regular marriage. Any children born of the union will be of the father's Dynasty.
translation: 这是普通婚姻，孩子将跟随父姓。

original: Yearly Tax Paid to Us / Total Yearly Income
translation: 每年上缴给我们的税收 / 每年总收入

original: Levy Raisable by Us / Total Max Levy
translation: 我们可以动员的兵力 / 总兵力
与 §Y[GetBestName]§! 的和平协议在 §Y$DATE$§!过期

original: This truce was signed after the §Y$WARNAME$§!
translation: 这个和平协议签署于 §Y$WARNAME$§!结束后

original: The war against §Y$LOSER$§! was won by §Y$WINNER$§!
translation: 针对 §Y$LOSER$§! 的战争的胜利者是 §Y$WINNER$§!

original: The war between §Y$ATTACKER$§! and §Y$DEFENDER$§! ended with a §Ywhite peace§!
translation: §Y$ATTACKER$§! 和 §Y$DEFENDER$§! 的战争以§Y无条件和平§!告终

original: §YHostile§! towards §Y$ATTACKER$§! due to conflicting wars for the throne of §Y$TITLE$§!
Invite potentially useful characters to your plot
translation: 邀请有用的角色参与你的阴谋

original: Show a list of all current claimants to the §Y[GetFullName]§!
§GWould accept an invitation to our Court§!
§RWould not accept an invitation to our Court§!
Saves the game as §Y$FILENAME$§W into a new folder called §Y$FOLDERNAME$§W
Saves the game as §Y$FILENAME$§W into the §Y$FOLDERNAME$§W folder

translation: 有宗教封臣的封臣好感

original: §Y$NAME$§! is a Bastard of your Dynasty
§RCannot transfer subunits to moving unit(s) or unit(s) in battle§!
translation: §R不能将部队转给移动中或作战中的单位§!

original: [catholic.GetName] Bishops are not obliged to pay any taxes - or provide levies - to their secular liege. They will pay the Pope, their secular liege or even an Antipope depending on who they like best.
translation: [catholic.GetName]的地区主教们并没有义务向他们的世俗领主缴税或是服兵役。他们向最有好感的人纳税，这个人可能是教宗，封建领主甚至对立教宗。

original: You cannot dismiss your Regent from office!
translation: 你不能解除摄政者的职务！

original: The nobles of §Y$TITLE$§! are too autonomous to accept being replaced as leaders.\n(Crown Authority is too low.)
translation: §Y$TITLE$§!的贵族有权利拒绝更换将领。\n（王权等级太低）

original: The following tactics can be used by this flank:
translation: 此路军队可以用下列战术：

original: As a vassal, you can only call other vassals in the same realm.
translation: 作为封臣，你只能召唤同一国家的其他封臣参战。

original: You cannot call vassals to war (unless you have the same liege.)
translation: 你不能召唤封臣参战（除非你们有同一个领主。）

original: Hold the biggest feast ever seen in the Kingdom!
translation: 全国上下大吃大喝尽情享乐！

original: The Summer Fair brings merchants, peddlers and all sorts of entertainment to your county.
translation: 夏季集市将商人，小贩和各种娱乐人员吸引到了你的领地。

original: Abandon the attempt to change this law, allowing you to try instituting another.
translation: 放弃通过新法律的尝试，可以让你转而通过另一项法律。

original: You need §R$COST$§! $PIETYNAME$ to create a Kingdom.
§RWe are obligated to try to see this law change through§!
translation: §R我们有义务推动这项法律通过§!

original: I am sure my liege would be pleased if we had the same faith...
translation: 如果我们有相同的信仰，领主肯定会感到高兴……

original: I am impressed with the language and customs of my liege. I wish I were like that...
translation: 我对我的领主所使用的语言和文化习俗印象深刻。我希望我也能变成那样……

original: With Swan meat being without doubt the finest meat available from either beast or fowl, the need to ensure a steady supply of Swans is important. The post of Master of Swans carries a certain amount of prestige.
translation: 在一切飞禽走兽之中，天鹅肉是公认的第一美味。因此提供稳定的天鹅肉供应也相当重要。养殖天鹅的职位可以带来一定量的威望。

original: Although most of the household duties were passed over to servants, the butler had the right to pour the liege's wine when at his table. With the ability to grab the liege's ear at the same time, the butler was an important man.
translation: 大部分家务工作都有仆人负责，而仆役长有权享有为领主在餐桌上倒酒的荣耀。以此为契机仆役长可以向领主进言，因此显而易见这是位重要人物。

original: Poison is always a danger, so being entrusted with serving drinks is a great honor.
translation: 毒药永远是一个大威胁，因此能得到领主的信任成为斟酒人是个很大的荣耀。

original: This paragon of chivalric virtue is the envy of the realm - every man wants to be like him and sees his friends as their friends
translation: 这位骑士精神的典范是整个领国的偶像——每个男人都想成为他那样的人，因此他的朋友也就是大家的朋友

original: Despot is the highest honorary title in the Byzantine Empire, second only to the Emperor. It can only be granted to close relatives, traditionally the oldest son.
translation: 共治皇帝是拜占庭帝国的最高荣耀头衔，仅次于皇帝本身。它只授予皇帝的近亲，一般是皇帝的长子。

original: The title of Sebastokrator was created as an even higher honor than that of 'Caesar'. It can only be granted to close relatives of the Emperor.
translation: 至尊者的头衔甚至比「凯撒」还要高贵，它只授予皇帝的近亲。

original: Originally the highest honor in the Roman Empire, the title of Caesar can now be awarded to anyone.
translation: 传统上原本是罗马帝国的至高荣誉头衔，但是现在「凯撒」头衔已经可以被授予任何人。

original: Kouropalates - 'the One in Charge of the Palace' - is a very prestigious title in the Byzantine Empire.
translation: 原本是希腊语，意为「在宫廷中掌握话事权的人」，在拜占庭帝国中是一个非常高贵的荣誉头衔。

original: Anthypatos is Greek for Proconsul. However, the office no longer denotes a provincial governor but is purely honorary.
translation: 总督是资深执政官的希腊语翻译，如今只是一个荣誉头衔，而不是真正指某一地区的行政长官。

original: This character burns with religious fervor and cannot tolerate heretics, infidels, or heathens.
translation: 这个角色对宗教热情如火，对异端分子、异教徒和不信者绝无怜悯。

original: The character has a well developed sense of justice - a trait much respected by vassals and courtiers.
translation: 此人对正义和公平有着坚定信念，因而备受封臣和廷臣尊敬。

original: This character could not care less about justice - a character flaw that is not appreciated by vassals and courtiers.
translation: 此人对公平不屑一顾，封臣和廷臣们对此并不欣赏。

original: Due to advanced age, head injury or other mental disabilities, this character is not fit for any kind of work. Incapable rulers must employ a regent.
translation: 由于年事已高，头部受伤或是精神失常，此人无法承担正常工作。无能的统治者必须由他人摄政。

original: Lust, or 'Luxuria', the first deadly sin, enflames this character. These carnal desires are not appreciated by the Church, and might also cause problems out of the marital bed...
translation: 色欲，即「Luxuria」，人最初的原罪，正在灼烧着此人。沉浸肉欲将为宗教人士所唾弃，也会对除了床上技巧之外的其他技能产生消极影响……

original: Chastity, or 'Castitas' is the first of the seven virtues. Chaste characters are admired for their virtue and are unlikely to have extramarital affairs.
translation: 忠贞，即「Castitas」，是七种美德之首。忠贞之人因其德行而广受称赞，不大可能发生出轨行为。

original: Pride, 'Superbia' is the seventh deadly sin according to the Church. However, proud characters tend to be ambitious and work hard to increase their Prestige.
translation: 骄傲，即「Superbia」，教会所述人的第七宗罪。不过，骄傲之人往往野心勃勃，会为了提高威望而更加努力工作。

original: Humility, or 'Humilitas', is the seventh virtue and the opposite of Pride. Humble characters gain [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] where the proud gain Prestige. Humble characters tend to dislike prideful ones.
translation: 谦卑，即「Humilitas」，是第七种美德，也是骄傲的对立面。谦卑者获得[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]，骄傲者则得到威望。谦卑者不喜欢骄傲的人。

original: Lies do not come easily to this character, who values truth above all else. It is not a good trait for spymasters and plotters, but is respected among diplomats.
translation: 此人并不擅长撒谎，视诚实的价值高于一切。对于间谍总管和阴谋家来说诚实不是好品质，不过对外交家来说诚实的品质很值得尊重。

original: This character has a manipulative and dishonest nature - an excellent trait for spymasters... as long as they remain loyal.
translation: 此人天生狡诈，擅长玩弄他人于鼓掌之间。对于间谍总管来说这难能可贵……只要他们能对自己领主保持忠诚。

original: Gluttony, or 'Gula', is the second deadly sin and lacks positive effects. The Church despises gluttons, and so do members of the opposite sex.
translation: 暴食，即「Gula」，在七宗罪中位居次席，对人毫无积极影响。教士鄙视暴食者，异性也是如此。

original: Ambitious characters work harder, making them better at everything. However, their drive to reach the top means that they tend to make poor vassals...
translation: 野心勃勃的人工作更勤奋，在各领域都能出类拔萃。不过，他们永不满足的野心意味着他们不会是称职的封臣……

original: Content characters are satisfied with their lot in life. They make loyal vassals but are unsuited to intrigue.
translation: 安于现状的人对生命中的一切都感到满意。他们是忠诚的封臣，但不适合承担密谋工作。

original: Trusting characters make poor spymasters, but good friends.
translation: 轻信他人的角色不是称职的间谍总管，不过可以当好朋友。

original: This character is cursed with a humpback, which is despised by vassals and ugly in the eyes of the opposite sex.
translation: 此人身体佝偻，不仅饱受封臣蔑视，而且在异性眼中极为丑陋。

original: This poor character suffers from the effects of inbreeding, leading to disfigurement, mental retardation and probable sterility.
translation: 这个可怜人饱受近亲结婚的后果之苦，身体天生畸形，精神发育迟缓，很有可能不育。

original: This character has a face that brings a tear to the eye...
Afflicted with the horror that is leprosy, this character is experiencing Purgatory on Earth. Hideous and sterile, procreation is most unlikely.
translation: 由于身患麻风，此人正在经历人间炼狱般的生活。丑陋不堪，无法生育，延续后代几乎是不可能的事情。

original: This character finds the burdens of work and life almost too much to handle.
translation: 工作和生活给此人带来了难以承受的压力。

original: This character has been seriously injured, but the damage should heal, given time.
translation: 此人受到了严重的伤害，不过只要假以时日，一切伤痛都可以复原。

original: This character has been maimed. It would take a true miracle to heal such an injury.
translation: 此人的身体已经残疾，只有真正的奇迹才能使其恢复正常。

original: This character never shies from personal danger, enjoying the respect of vassals but the envy of cravens.
translation: 此人临危不惧，受到封臣敬重，同时也被懦夫所嫉妒。

original: The Amateurish Plotter has received an education emphasizing intrigue skills. Unfortunately, it didn't stick.
translation: 业余阴谋家接受以密谋知识为主的教育。不幸的是，此人并不适合这种教育。

original: Flamboyant Schemers thrive on court intrigue and fancy themselves masters of the trade. However, their lack of secrecy tends to endanger even their best efforts.
translation: 浮夸的谋士依靠宫廷阴谋发家，并喜欢炫耀在贸易方面的知识。不过，他们保守不住秘密的天性总是令他们的努力功亏一篑。

original: The Intricate Webweaver is a master manipulator, well suited to a life of intrigue.
translation: 暗中策划者是操控别人的专家，天生适合生活在阴谋诡计中。

original: The Elusive Shadow has mastered the art of Intrigue and should make a perfect Spymaster - as well as an ideal mentor for prospective schemers.
translation: 难以捉摸的影子是阴谋的大师，可以成为最好的间谍总管，也是未来阴谋家的最好导师。

original: Naive Appeasers want to be well liked and fancy themselves diplomats. Unfortunately, everyone else just tends to bully them.
translation: 天真的外交家总想要左右逢源，幻想着他们自己是优秀的外交家。不幸的是，其他人通常只是欺侮他们。

original: The Underhanded Rogue is a rough but decently effective diplomat.
translation: 狡猾的无赖举止粗俗，不过不失为有效率的外交家。

original: The Charismatic Negotiator is an excellent diplomat, impressing dignitaries with elegant dress and persuasive rhetoric.
translation: 魅力非凡的说客是优秀的外交家，其优雅外表和滔滔雄辩往往能令政要印象深刻。

original: The Grey Eminence is the epitome of statesmanship having fully mastered the art of diplomacy.
translation: 幕后操控人是典型的精通外交的政治家。外交总管的职位为此人量身打造，同时也能成为儿童在外交领域的最佳导师。

original: The Indulgent Wastrel was groomed to become good with money, and if good means spending it quickly, the Indulgent Wastrel certainly is.
translation: 放荡的浪子被期望培养为精通金钱之道的人。如果精通是花钱如流水的意思的话，那么放荡的浪子的确很精通此道。

original: The Thrifty Clerk is a dutiful, if not particularly skilled, administrator.
translation: 节俭的职员做事兢兢业业，但不是有卓越技能的管理者。

original: The Fortune Builder came out of adolescence armed with a well honed business sense, determined to live a life of luxury.
translation: 财富创造者在青少年时期就展露出非凡的商业天赋，一生注定享尽荣华富贵。

original: This character is truly Midas Touched, never seeming to run out of funds - an excellent choice for Steward and mentor to children destined to become administrators.
translation: 此人被赞誉为能够点石成金，绝无财富耗尽之时。此人可以成为优秀的财政总管，也能成为希望从事管理的孩子的最好导师。

original: The Misguided Warrior was trained in warfare and the martial arts, but sadly lacks all talent for it.
translation: 鲁莽的战士在战争和军事技艺方面受过训练，但是毫无天赋可言。

original: The Tough Soldier is fearsome on the battlefield, but only a mediocre commander.
translation: 坚强的战士在战场上令人生畏，不过指挥官资质则非常平庸。

original: The Skilled Tactician is an adept in the art of war - a valiant warrior and reliable commander.
translation: 优秀战术家是战争艺术的行家，既是勇敢的战士，又是可靠的将领。

original: The Brilliant Strategist has an almost preternatural understanding of all things martial, having the perfect makings for a Marshal or a military tutor.
translation: 天才战略家有着超乎寻常的军事天分，是绝佳的军事总管和军事导师的候选人。

original: The Detached Priest received a clerical education but displays no talent beyond basic literacy.
translation: 清高的圣职接受过神学教育，但除了基础文学之外毫无天赋。

original: The Dutiful Cleric is learned and possessed of beautiful penmanship, but lacks particular interest in theology.
translation: 尽职的教士学习并掌握了优美的书法，不过对神学理论毫无兴趣。

original: The Scholarly Theologian is wise and well read, with a deep understanding of philosophy and theology.
translation: 渊博的神学家博学多才，对哲学和神学都有很深造诣。

original: Life has lost its luster to this character.
translation: 对此人来说，生命殊无乐趣可言。

original: This character is stark raving mad.
translation: 此人满口胡言乱语，疯疯癫癫。

original: This character experiences frequent violent episodes, speaking in tongues, spitting and assaulting those nearby, as if possessed by evil spirits.
translation: 此人经常经历暴力事件，喃喃自语，对附近的人口出恶言甚至拳脚相加，好像被恶魔附身了一样。

original: Illness plagues this character. It could be serious... or just a nasty cold.
translation: 疾病使此人备受折磨。病情可能很严重……也可能只是一次重感冒。

original: This character suffers from pneumonia - a life threatening condition in medieval times.
translation: 此人身患肺炎，在中世纪的条件下是严重的生命威胁。

original: This character suffers from 'Great Pox,' the venereal plague, later known as Syphilis.
translation: 此人身患梅毒，一种严重的性病。

original: This character is infirm and suffers from a sickly disposition.
translation: 此人体弱多病，性格病态。

original: This character is a veteran Crusader.
This character was born out of wedlock and has not been legitimized - and is thus disqualified from the line of succession.
translation: 此人非婚所生，地位不被人承认，因此被取消继承资格。

original: This character was born a bastard but has been legitimized. Legitimized bastards can inherit, though the stain of bastardy can never be entirely cleansed.
translation: 此人非婚所生，但已获得合法地位。合法私生子可以继承爵位，但私生子的出身污点永远无法被抹去。

original: This character has been excommunicated - excluded from the Church - a terrible stain on honor and respectability.
translation: 此人已被绝罚——逐出教会——这将在荣誉和体面上留下重大污点。

original: This character is known to have slain a close relative - an unforgivable crime in the eyes of gods and men alike.
translation: 这名角色杀害近亲的行为臭名昭著——这是一桩人神共愤、不可饶恕的罪行。

original: This character was born with a clubfoot - an unattractive disability.
translation: 这个角色天生足内翻——一种丑陋的残疾症状。

original: This character was born with a harelip - a less than charming trait.
translation: 这个角色天生兔唇——影响其魅力。

original: This unfortunate character was born a dwarf.
translation: 这个不幸的角色生来就是侏儒。

original: This character is blessed with a towering intellect.
This character is brighter than most.
translation: 这个角色比大多数人聪颖机灵。

original: This character is not exactly blessed with a towering intellect.
translation: 这个角色显然没有出众的思维能力。

original: This character is a drooling imbecile.
translation: 这个角色是个流着口水的低能儿。

original: This character is a bit queer...
translation: 这个角色的性趣有些古怪……

original: This character has chosen a life of celibacy.
translation: 这个角色选择了独身主义的生活方式。

original: This character has chosen to lead a life of debauchery and sin. The Church is unlikely to approve...
translation: 这个角色纵情酒色，选择了充满原罪的生活道路。教会不会喜欢这样的……

original: This character likes nothing better than to putter away in the garden, growing herbs and exotic fruit trees.
translation: 这个角色最大的爱好就是在花园中干活，种植草本植物和异国水果。

original: This character has delved into the mysteries of the occult, treading a fine line between heresy and orthodox approval.
translation: 这个角色潜心钻研神秘学，游走于异端与正统信仰之间。

original: This depraved character likes to spend the nights in the dungeon, inventing new ways of torturing unfortunate victims.
translation: 这个堕落的角色喜欢花一整个夜晚呆在地牢里，发明折磨可怜囚徒的新方法。

original: This character is a masterful fencer and duelist - a dangerous lifestyle to be sure.
translation: 这个角色是剑术和格斗的大师，过着危险的生活。

original: This character only feels truly alive when killing God's little creatures.
translation: 这个角色只有猎杀上帝创造的其他生物时才会充满活力。

original: This character likes to write and declaim poetry.
translation: 这个角色热衷于创作和朗诵诗歌。

original: This character is an avid falconer - a well respected pastime.
translation: 这个角色热心于驯鹰，一种值得尊敬的业余消遣。

original: This character is a drunken sot.
translation: 这个角色就是个大酒缸。

original: This character believes in the virtue of 'Temperantia', moderation - a valuable trait in rulers and Stewards.
translation: 这个角色相信「Temperantia」的美德，即适度——对统治者和财政总管来说弥足珍贵的特质。

original: The character is infamously greedy. 'Avaritia', the third deadly sin, while not respected, does help squeeze out some extra tax income.
translation: 这个角色因贪婪而臭名昭著。「Avaritia」，七宗罪之三，虽然并不受人喜爱，却能榨出一些额外的税收。

original: This character is famously charitable. 'Caritas' is the third of the seven virtues and a most chivalrous trait.
translation: 这个角色以慷慨而闻名。「Caritas」在七美德中位居第三，也是最有骑士精神的特质。

original: This character is shockingly lazy. 'Acedia', the fourth deadly sin, is an altogether negative trait.
translation: 这个角色令人惊叹的懒。「Acedia」，七宗罪之四，是一项完全负面的特质。

original: This character is dutiful and diligent, the fourth of the seven virtues - 'Industria'.
translation: 这个角色勤奋而充满责任感，拥有七美德之四——「Industria」。

original: This character is envious, the sixth deadly sin - 'Invidia'.
translation: 这个角色嫉妒成性，具有七宗罪之六——「Invidia」。

original: This character is kind and full of empathy. The sixth virtue, 'Humanitas', is popular with vassals, but makes for a rather poor Spymaster.
translation: 这个角色仁慈而体贴。七美德中的第六种美德，「Humanitas」，在封臣中很受欢迎，作为间谍总管则不太称职。

original: The fifth deadly sin is Wrath, 'Ira', and this character certainly has a hot temper.
translation: 七宗罪之五即是愤怒，「Ira」，这个角色确实脾气很暴躁。

original: Patience, or 'Patientia', is the fifth of the seven virtues and the opposite of Wrath. Patient characters are just a little bit better at almost everything.
translation: 耐心，即「Patientia」，是七美德之五，愤怒的对立面。充满耐心的人能把每一件事都做得比别人稍好一些。

original: This character is a craven and a coward.
translation: 这个角色胆小如鼠，是个懦夫。

original: This character is shy and reclusive, suffering a penalty to diplomacy.
translation: 这个角色内向害羞，极大影响其外交能力。

original: This character is gregarious and socially competent.
translation: 这个角色是群居生物，在社交方面很有能力。

original: This character is a cynical unbeliever, disliked by the clergy but good at intrigue.
translation: 这个角色愤世嫉俗，被神职人员厌恶，但是擅长密谋。

original: This character has a most pleasing physique, most attractive to the opposite sex.
translation: 这个角色外表出众，对异性充满吸引力。

original: This character sees enemies in every shadow, unable to trust anyone.
translation: 这个角色杯弓蛇影，不相信任何人。
这个女人的腹中怀有新生命。

original: This character is wracked with the bloody cough known as consumption (i.e. Tuberculosis).
translation: 这个角色饱受肺痨（即肺结核）困扰。

original: This character suffers from the terrible disease known as the Slow Fever (Typhoid Fever).
translation: 这个角色深受慢性热（伤寒）困扰。

original: This character is inflicted with the plague known as Camp Fever (Epidemic Typhus).
translation: 这个角色染上了露营热（斑疹伤寒）。

original: This character has the dreaded Bubonic Plague.
translation: 这个角色患有可怕的黑死病。

original: This character has contracted the Measles, a fairly dangerous type of pox.
translation: 这个角色感染了麻疹，一种相当致命的痘瘟。

original: This character has the dreaded Smallpox, which kills almost half of those infected.
translation: 这个角色感染了可怕的天花，其致死率超过一半。

original: This character is blessed with a powerful physique.
This character is an evil sadist, taking pleasure in the suffering of others.
translation: 这个角色是一个残暴的虐待狂，从别人的痛苦中汲取快乐。

original: One of these must be true
translation: 必须满足以下任意条件

original: The number of revolts are less than
The number of revolts are more than
The number of revolt fraction is more than
The number of revolt fraction is less than
Have at least one owned neighboring county
translation: 至少拥有一个临近的省份

original: Have at least one empty neighboring county
translation: 临近的省份至少有一个空地

original: is equal to or less than
Have a unit with a leader
translation: 拥有一个已率领部队的将领

original: Have no units with a leader
translation: 拥有一个未率领部队的将领

original: Does NOT have Wealth of at least
Has Personal Wealth of at least
Does NOT have the character flag
Have a navy of at least
Have an army of at least
Is the current heir to the §Y[GetFullName]§!
Is NOT of the ruling dynasty
Has different religion than the Liege
Has the same religion as the Liege
Would NOT be the Heir under
Cannot be held as a secondary title
translation: 不能作为第二头衔来持有

original: Can be held as a secondary title
translation: 能作为第二头衔来持有

original: Combat has lasted less than §Y$DAYS$§! days
Combat has lasted at least §Y$DAYS$§! days
Religion has Authority of at least
Is NOT the Plot target of
Had flag '§Y$FLAG$§!' for less than §Y$DAYS$§! days
Had flag '§Y$FLAG$§!' for at least §Y$DAYS$§! days
Had global flag '§Y$FLAG$§!' for less than §Y$DAYS$§! days
translation: 拥有全局旗标「§Y$FLAG$§!」少于 §Y$DAYS$§! 天

original: Had global flag '§Y$FLAG$§!' for at least §Y$DAYS$§! days
translation: 拥有全局旗标「§Y$FLAG$§!」至少 §Y$DAYS$§! 天

original: Had flag '§Y$FLAG$§!' for less than §Y$DAYS$§! days
Had flag '§Y$FLAG$§!' for at least §Y$DAYS$§! days
Do NOT have the global flag
Is NOT the parent religion of §Y$RELIGION$§!
Does NOT have an epidemic disease
Does NOT have higher tech than

translation: 在战争中未使用「§Y$CASUSBELLITYPE$§!」的战争理由
在战争中使用「§Y$CASUSBELLITYPE$§!」的战争理由

original: Fewer than §Y$NUM$§! claims on titles held by §Y$TARGET$§!
At least §Y$NUM$§! claims on titles held by §Y$TARGET$§!
Does NOT view §Y$WHO$§W as religious head.\n
Powerbase is less than §Y$VAL$%§W of liege.\n
Powerbase is at least §Y$VAL$%§W of liege.\n
translation: 力量根基至少是领主的 §Y$VAL$%§! .\n

original: Does NOT have room for new holding.\n
Skip forward to the §Yintermediary§W part of this chapter
translation: 跳过本节进入§Y中级§!部分

original: Skip forward to the §Yadvanced§W part of this chapter
translation: 跳过本节进入§Y高级§!部分

original: Already on the advanced stage of the chapter
translation: 目前已在本章节的高级部分

original: End of the Intermediary Budget Tutorial
Learn about counties, landed holding and taxation
Learn about the councillors and their jobs
translation: 了解内阁成员和他们的工作

original: Learn about inheritance, laws and dynasties
Learn about ambitions, plots, revolts and the intrigue view
translation: 了解野心、叛乱和阴谋界面

original: Learn about papal abilities, crusades, holy orders, investiture and antipopes
translation: 了解教宗的能力、十字军远征、骑士团、神职叙任权和对立教宗
欢迎来到《王国风云 II》的世界

original: This is an introduction to Crusader Kings II, a Grand Strategy Game set in medieval Europe. As emperor, king, count or duke, lead your dynasty to glory! \nSo where do you come into all this? Click next to find out.
translation: 本节是《王国风云 II》的序章部分，本游戏是一个以中世纪欧洲为背景的战略游戏，你将以皇帝、国王、公爵或伯爵的身份，创造属于你的辉煌家族！\n那么该从哪里开始呢？请点击继续。

original: To the upper right you can open the family and dynasty trees. Above that you'll see a small 'W' icon. Sometimes you can click this and it will link you to the actual character on Wikipedia. You can also see the titles and claims here, as well as the stats and traits the character has.
translation: 在右上角可以打开家庭谱系和家族树。在那上面你可以看到一个小小的「W」标志，有时你可以通过这个按钮打开真实觉得的维基百科。你也可以看到头衔和宣称权，以及角色的属性和特质。

original: Here you can get a quick overview of your realm.
translation: 这里你可以快速浏览你的王国。

original: From left to right, we have:
Wealth. How much money you have. Hover over the sum to see your monthly income or loss.
translation: 财富。你拥有多少金钱，当鼠标悬停在总额数字上时，你能看到每月的收益或者消耗。

original: Prestige. This is a measure of your success. Hover over the sum to see your monthly gain or loss. Hover longer to see exactly what the sources are. You can also gain or lose prestige from actions.
translation: 威望。这是一个对你的成就的衡量值，鼠标悬停在数字上你能看到每月的增减，悬停稍长的时间后还能看到更详细的信息，以弄明白具体的增减来源。

original: Demesne Size. If you go over the limit, your vassals will dislike you and you will get taxation penalties. Remedy this by handing out landed titles to decrease the size of your demesne. Hover over the number to see where the max size is coming from.
translation: 直辖领大小。如果超过限制，你的封臣会厌恶你，并会遭到税效惩罚。作为补救，你可以分封领地以减少私有领地的大小。鼠标悬停在数字上可以看到这个数字由哪些部分构成。

original: Realm Size. This is the total number of holdings owned by you and your vassals.  Hover over the number to see holdings per vassal.
translation: 领地面积。这是你和你的封臣们控制的总地产。悬停在数目上可以看到每个封臣控制的地产。

original: On the world map you can see your troops, borders and buildings. To move the map you can move the mouse pointer to the edges or use the arrow keys. You can zoom by using the mouse wheel. By default this will zoom in to the cursor position. You can try that now before clicking next.
translation: 在世界地图上，你可以看到你的军队、疆域和建筑。你可以将鼠标指针移动到地图边缘或者用键盘上的方向键来移动地图。你能使用鼠标滚轮来缩放地图，默认情况下缩放是以鼠标指针为中心进行的。你可以尝试一下，或者点击「继续」。

original: You can easily navigate over long distances using the minimap. Click on it and you will be transported to that location. There is also a 'Go to home province' button to transport you home immediately. Press that now.
translation: 你能很轻松地观察很远的地方，在小地图上点击，你能直接观察该区域。你可以使用「回家」按钮以返回你的领土，现在，请点击一下吧。

original: As you can see the current date is September 15, 1066. Next to the date you see a pause symbol and a plus and minus sign. By clicking the pause symbol you can start the time and by using the + and - signs you can increase or decrease how fast the time moves. The keyboard shortcut to pause/unpause is space. You can also use the + and - signs on the numpad part of the keyboard to increase/decrease speed. Unpause now to continue.
translation: 如你所见，现在的时间是1066年9月15日，在时间旁边可以看到一个暂停标志和一个加号还有一个减号，按暂停标志可以使时间走起来，按加减号可以增减时间运行的速度。键盘上对于控制暂停与继续的快捷键是空格键，按小键盘上的+-两个按键可以对时间的运行进行加速和减速。现在就让时间走起来吧！

original: There are a lot of things going on in the world. Some very important, some less. There are a few different ways to be notified:
translation: 世界上会发生许许多多的事，有些很重要，有些则不然，你可以通过多种渠道来了解它们：

original: Popups. Large messages that pop up and usually demands that you take some kind of action. Read the tooltips on the buttons before you choose.
translation: 弹窗。大型信息弹出的时候通常会让你做一些选择，在做出决定前最好阅读选项上的帮助信息。

original: Messages. To the upper right you have the more important messages on top, less important below. You can change the settings for when these show up.
translation: 消息。在界面右上方，分别分为比较重要的消息和不那么重要的消息，你可以在消息显示时修改相关设定。

original: The income you have comes from provinces, both the ones you control directly and those owned by your vassals. Each province gives you money and troops, so the more provinces you have, the more troops and money you can have.
translation: 你的收入来自于各个省份，包括你的直属私有领地和封臣的领地。每个省份都可以给你金钱和军队。所以拥有更多的领地，也意味着更多的军队和金钱。

original: Your expenses are any military that you have raised, and if you have a liege, you might pay taxes to them. You can click the realm view now to get an overview of your economy. Then click next.
translation: 你的所有军事行动都需要金钱来支持。如果你是一个封臣，你还需要向君主缴纳一部分。你可以点击打开领地界面，了解详细的收支。然后请点击继续。

original: For example, a city gives you more money but fewer and lighter troops.
translation: 例如，一个城市，可以提供更多的金钱以及较少的军队。

original: We now have holdings in the provinces instead of buildings. These holdings can be improved upon, or you can build new ones.
translation: 我们拥有省份中的男爵领地而非建筑物本身。这些男爵领地可以进一步改进，你也可以建设一个新的男爵领地。

original: To build a new holding you need three things:
translation: 想要建设一个新的男爵领地，你需要满足三个条件：

original: 3. A balanced province. You can't build a second city holding if you do not have one of each already. Click on a province to view some holdings. York down in England has one of each.
translation: 3. 安定的省份。你不能在一个省份中同时建设第二个男爵领地。点击一个省份你可以看到一些男爵领地。

original: In the province view you can see how much income the province has, and also how much of it goes to you in taxes.
translation: 在省份界面中，你可以看到全省有多少收入，以及你能收到多少税。

original: You can also hover over each holding slot to see how much tax it yields and its fort level.
translation: 你还可以将鼠标悬停在各个男爵领地上看它的产量以及要塞等级。

original: Now it is time to learn more about each type of advisor. Click the council button to see your appointed advisors.
translation: 现在来了解每个类型的顾问吧。点击该按钮可以查看你所指定的顾问。

original: Chancellor. Your diplomatic advisor. Select one with as high diplomatic skill as possible since this person's value, plus your own, plus half of your wife's is what makes up the state diplomacy value. That affects how all characters not employed by you view you.
translation: 外交总管。你的外交顾问，尽量选一个外交能力高的，他的外交能力，加上你自己的，以及你妻子的一半，就是整个国家的外交能力值。影响着除你手下之外，所有人对你的看法。

original: Marshal. Your military advisor. This one will also command your levies, so make sure you pick one with a high military score.
translation: 军事总管。你的军事顾问，他将指挥你的军队，所以请尽量选择一个军事能力分值高的。

original: Steward. Your treasurer. Choose one with high value for stewardship, and you will increase your tax income.
translation: 财政总管。您的财务主管，选择一个管理能力出色的，能够增加你的税收收入。

original: Spymaster. An unofficial position as the advisor in the darker things a regent might need to do. Choose one with a high intrigue skill. This is important even if you do not have plans to have anyone assassinated, as it will help you to uncover plots against your own person as well.
translation: 间谍总管。这是一个官面上不存在的位置，作为一个隐藏在阴影中的顾问，拥有很高的阴谋技能是很重要的。即便你没有任何暗杀计划，他也能帮你发现叛乱以便更好地应对。

original: Court Chaplain. Your personal advisor to turn to in question concerning faith. This advisors important trait is learning, and a higher value will help your technological research.
translation: 宫廷司祭。你的个人信仰顾问，这个顾问的重要特点是学识能力，高学识能力值有助于技术研究。

original: All members of the council have three unique missions you can send them on. They can only go on one mission at the time, you will still get their stat bonus though.
translation: 每个顾问都有三个特有的任务可以完成。当然，同一时间他们只能干其中的一件事。这期间内你仍然可以获得他们带来的能力加成。

original: Let's go through all of them in short. Click the council button to continue.
translation: 让我们去看看吧，点击顾问按钮继续。

original: There are three missions per advisor, you can hover over them to the right on this screen to get a more extensive explanation of what all of them does:
translation: 每个顾问都有三任务，你可以将鼠标悬停在上面了解详细的信息，它们是：

original: Chancellor - Improve diplomatic relations, fabricate claims and sow dissent.
translation: 外交总管 - 改善关系、伪造头衔和散布谣言。

original: Marshal - Suppress revolts, train troops and research military tech.
translation: 军事总管 - 镇压叛乱、训练军队和研究军事科技。

original: Steward - Collect taxes, oversee construction, research economy tech.
translation: 财政总管 - 征收赋税、监督建设和研究经济科技。

original: Most of the missions also has the risk of a negative effect, so be sure to check the numbers in the tooltip before you send everyone off.
translation: 大多数任务同时也可能会产生负面影响，所以交付任务前一定要注意提示中的数字。

original: There are two kinds of succession laws. The agnatic/cognatic ones, that decide who will inherit, and then you have the other ones, that decide how the inheritance will work. Your children, dynasty and vassals will have an opinion on which ones you have. Press the laws button to continue.
translation: 有两种基本的继承规则，男性继承和男女均可的。这将决定谁拥有第一顺位继承权，以及其后的继承权顺序。你的孩子、领主和封臣会对你的选择有不同看法，点击法律图标以继续。
男性继承法。只有男性能够继承。

original: Absolute Cognatic. Women inherit on the same terms as men do.
translation: 男女平等继承法。女性和男性拥有相同的继承权。

original: Agnatic Primogeniture. This one means that the oldest male child of the ruler will inherit all their titles on ruler death.
translation: 长子继承法。由现任君主的最年长的儿子继承。

original: Agnatic-Cognatic. If you have this, women can also inherit, but only when there are no eligible males.
translation: 男性优先继承法。只有当没有可选的男性继承者时，女性才有继承权。

original: Gavelkind. This law will give the primary title to the oldest male child, and then divide the rest of the titles among the other children.
translation: 均分继承法。最重要的头衔由长子继承，然后其余头衔由其他孩子分别继承。

original: Seniority. The oldest member of the entire dynasty inherits all titles.
translation: 年长者继承法。由整个家族最年长的成员继承所有头衔。

original: Elective. The ruler and his/her vassals one step down can nominate one successor each.
translation: 选举继承法。由统治者和他的封臣各提名一名继任者。

original: For you to be able to change succession laws, you have a few things to consider.
translation: 你能修改继承权规则，但有几个问题你必须考虑。

original: The same ruler can only change succession laws once, must have reigned for at least 10 years and there must be peace in your realm.
translation: 一个统治者一生只能修改一次继承法，必须有至少 10 年的在位时间，而且在领内和平。

original: The ruler must be an adult, i.e. no regency. No vassals can be fighting and no vassal count or above can have a negative attitude of you.
translation: 统治者必须是一个成年人，即没有摄政。没有伯爵及以上级别的封臣互相开战，或对你好感为负。

original: These demands can be hard to fulfill, so changing succession law is not something to do on a whim, it is often something you need to work for.
translation: 这种改变是很困难的，所以改变继承法不是一时兴起就能搞定的，它往往需要你为此做很多的工作。

original: When you click, you will see above what effects it will bring if you award your brother this title. When you are done looking, click send and then click the next button below to end this part.
translation: 当你点击选项时，你会在上面看到它会带来什么影响。如果你要将这个称号送给他，当你选定后，再点击发送。请点击继续，以结束这部分教程。

original: There are two kinds of diplomacy. The state level, and then the personal level. Your vassals and other people you employ are affected by personal diplomacy, all others by your state diplomacy. Click your ruler portrait to continue.
translation: 有两种类型的交涉，国家级别的，和私人方面的。你的封臣和其他人都能通过私人交涉影响。点击你的统治者头像继续。

original: Let's take a look at personal diplomacy first. You have a tab in the middle that says 'Vassals', click that.
translation: 让我们先看看个人交涉，点击你的统治者头像，然后你能在中间找到一个「封臣」选项卡，点击它。

original: Now, if you hover over the opinion values, the green or red numbers towards the right, you'll see why each person has a particular opinion of you.
translation: 现在，你将鼠标停留在他们头像右方的好感度上，这些或绿或红的数字上，你就能了解每个人对你的好感及其原因了。

original: To be able to declare war, there are a few different methods including plots and holy war, but the most common way is to simply claim the title you are interested in.
translation: 为了能够宣战，也有一些不同的方法，包括阴谋和圣战，但有个更简单常用的方法是宣称你感兴趣的头衔。

original: Now you have the claim, but if you want the land, you will need to take action. The claim is held by your current ruler, so as soon as you change ruler, the claim will be gone. Click next to end this part.
translation: 现在你拥有了宣称权，但如果你还需要土地本身，那么你还需要进一步的行动。你可以向土地的当前所有者索取，你要尽快，因为这项权力很快就会消失。点击继续以结束这一部分。

original: There are no formal alliances in Crusader Kings II, it is all a matter of bloodlines, dynasty and prestige.
translation: 在《王国风云 II》中，并没有正式的联盟，这一般由血统、家族和威望来决定。

original: Our wife is dead, so now would be a good time to marry into another dynasty to form bonds that can be used. Click your ruler portrait to continue.
translation: 我们的妻子已经死了，所以现在是一个与其它家族联姻的好机会。点击统治者的头像继续。

original: If you know what dynasty you want to marry into, sort by dynasty. If you are primarily looking to up your military score, sort by martial skill. Right now we are looking for a way to expand our influence though, so sort them by rank.
translation: 如果你有既定的目标要和某个家族联姻，那么可以按家族排序，如果你主要看军事评分，则按武力排序.现在我们准备扩大影响力，所以按照她们的身份进行排序。

original: Now you are a full-fledged diplomat, time to move on! Click next to end this part.
translation: 现在你已经是一个全面的外交官了，是离开的时候了，点击继续，以结束这一部分。

original: This part of the tutorial will teach you how to move your troops around and a little bit about combat. Click the military tab to continue.
translation: 本教程将教你移动军队，以及了解部分战斗相关的知识。请点击军事按钮以继续。

original: This is the military screen. Here you can see how many troops you have, how many you can raise and what they will cost you.
translation: 这是军队窗口，你能看到你有多少军队，可以征召多少，他们将花费多少钱。

original: For this exercise, we need troops, so click the button with an up arrow here to raise your personal retinue. Now you'll see your new troop in the province Gowrie. Select the troop by clicking on the shield.
translation: 在这个练习中，我们需要军队，所以点击带有向上箭头的按钮，征召属于你的军队。现在你会在地图上看到你的新军队，在地图上点击盾牌选中军队。

original: Now you get some information about this army. The name is 'Army of King Malcolm III', and it has a number of people in it. At the top you have the organization bar, that tells you in how good condition the troops are. Then you have the regent shield and buttons to manage the army. The next row contains information about what kind of troops you have in this unit. Then you have three parts on the lower part of this screen. The army is usually divided into three flanks, but this is such a small army, so that is not neccesary. Open the military tab again to learn about handling your army.
translation: 现在你可以看到一些关于这支军队的信息。它的名字是「国王 马尔科姆III军」，还有它的人数等资料，在顶部还有它的状态、你的家族标记以及管理军队的按钮。下面一行，则是这支军队的构成。再往下被分成了三个部分。军队通常是分成正面和两翼的，但这只军队规模很小，所以这没有必要。再次点击军事按钮，以便处理你的军队。

original: Now what is this? A neighboring count has declared war on us! We must defend ourselves and let us do that by attacking. Take your army and move it to Argyll to the west. Unpause to continue.
translation: 什么？邻国已经对我们宣战！我们必须保卫自己，让我们进行攻击。将你的军队移动到西部的阿盖尔，取消暂停以继续。

original: When we run into the enemies troops, we will start to fight them. The stages of the battle will be covered in the advanced tutorial. For now, lets just wait until the battle end screen shows up.
translation: 当我们的部队遭遇敌人部队时，战斗即刻开始。战斗阶段包括在高级教程中，所以现在，我们只需要等待，直到显示战斗结束画面。

original: You won! Here you can see how many troops both of you had before the fight, how many casualties there were on both sides and then how many troops are remaining. Click ok. Now we stand in an enemy province with no troops in it. That means our troops will automatically start to siege. Click the province to continue.
translation: 你赢了！你可以看到你有多少部队被投入到战斗中，双方有多少伤亡，剩下多少部队。点击「确定」，现在我们的军队站在敌人的省份上，它没有军队，则意味着我们的部队会自动开始围攻。点击省份继续。

original: The province screen will look different now that we are sieging. You'll see how many people you have attacking the holding, and you can see the number of defenders remaining. The attackers must outnumber the defenders, or the siege will not progress. Now, lets speed up the time a bit so the sieging goes faster. Increase the speed to maximum to continue.
translation: 省份窗口看起来有些不同了，我们正在围攻。你能看到有多少人正在攻击地产，你可以看到有多少防守者。攻击者必须超过防守者，否则围攻将没有进展。现在，让我们把游戏速度加快一点，围攻的进度看起来更快了，请继续增加速度直至最大。

original: Eventually the siege will end, and since the enemy had no more troops and you outnumber him, we know you will win. Once the end screen is displayed, you'll see how much prestige and gold the siege won you, your casualties and the enemies casualties. Press next to end this part.
translation: 最终的围攻即将结束，因为敌人没有增援部队且你的军队数量大于他的，所以我们知道你会赢的。一旦最终结果在屏幕上显示出来，你会看到胜利之后赢得了多少威信和黄金、你和敌人的伤亡人数等。点击继续以结束本节。

original: Levies are what we call the usual kind of troops in Crusader Kings II. Other kinds will be discussed in the advanced Military tutorial. Exactly how many and what kind of levies your vassals send you depends on the holding composition and how much the vassals like you. Open the military tab to continue.
translation: 征召兵是《王国风云 II》中最常见的军队类型。在这个中级教程中将讨论其它的类型。你从封臣手里能征召多大数量和哪些种类的军队取决于领地类型和他对你的好感度。点击军事按钮以继续。

original: Castle gives you the most troops, period. They also reinforce faster. These holding give you some light cavalry, light infantry and most heavy infantry.
translation: 城堡能给你最多的部队。它们能提供轻骑兵、轻步兵和大量的重步兵。

original: Cities give you some galleys, archers and most light infantry.
translation: 城市能够提供船只、弓箭手和大量的轻步兵。

original: Temples give you some galleys, and then archers, light infantry and heavy infantry.
translation: 修道院能够提供船只，以及弓箭手、轻步兵和重步兵。
