original: Exactly what levies you will get from a province also depends on other things, like who the vassal is. Since castles are so occupied with providing troops, they yield less taxes for you than the other two, while cities give you much more. Click next to end this part.
translation: 究竟能征集到什么兵还取决于其他的一些东西，比如这是谁的封臣。由于城堡能提供较多的军队，所以只能提供较少的金钱，而城市正相反。点击继续以结束本节。

original: We have some concepts that are new to this installment of Crusader Kings. Open the military tab to learn more about mercenaries, holy orders and flanks.
translation: 我们在王国风云里有一些新的设置和概念。打开军事窗口以了解雇佣兵、骑士团和三军的概念。

original: Mercenaries are hired troops under your direct control. Click the Mercenaries tab to see what kind of mercenaries are available to you. Here you can see that when you hire them, they cost a rather hefty sum of money. Then below each hire button, you can see the monthly cost, which is smaller but still substantial. If you find yourself unable to pay them when the time has come, they might attack you and take provinces. Their loyalty lies with the gold only. Click the holy orders tab to continue.
translation: 雇佣兵是由你雇佣并直接控制的军队。点击「雇佣兵」选项卡以了解你可以雇佣什么样的雇佣兵。在这里可以看到，当你需要雇佣他们时，需要支付巨额的资金，而且之后每个月还要支付一笔数额相对小一点但仍非乐观的雇佣金。当你无力支付这笔钱的时候，他们可能会开始攻击你，并占领你的领地，他们只忠诚于黄金。点击「骑士团」选项卡以继续。

original: Well, you don't have any holy orders active to choose from now, but when you do, it will look like this:
translation: 你现在还无法雇佣他们。当你能使用时，他们的存在类似于这样：

original: The armies are divided into three flanks, each flank can have a leader and it's own tactic. When one of the flanks win, it can join one of the other two to reinforce them. Click next to continue.
translation: 军队划分为三部分，每部分都拥有将领和自己的战术。当一路军队赢了，它可以加入到其它两路，以加强他们。请点击继续。

original: Each flank has a commander that will choose the tactic to use. When deciding this he is considering what kind of troops he has and what kind of troops the enemy have and adapts. How good he is at this depends on his military skill. Click next to end this part.
translation: 每路军队都有一个指挥官，会选择使用的战术。决定这一点时，他会考虑军队的构成，敌人的军队种类，并作出改变。他做的好不好取决于他的军事技能。点击下一步以结束本节。

original: War is the other kind of diplomacy in this game. It is an important tool to grow your realm, and to protect what is yours. Click next to continue.
translation: 在游戏中，战争是外交的延续。这是一个用以增长领土和保护领土的重要工具。请点击继续。

original: For you to be able to declare war, you first need some sort of casus belli. The most common kind is to get a claim. Other methods involve plots and events, but lets focus on claims. To see where our borders go, click the independent realms and we'll continue.
translation: 你要宣战，首先必须有一些宣战理由。最常见的一种，是宣称所有权。其它的方法还包括阴谋和事件。但让我们把注意力放在宣称所有权上，为了更便于观察边界，点击独立领主地图按钮然后继续。

original: The diplomatic map mode shows your diplomatic relations with other realms. Make sure you have your own province selected, then go to diplomatic map mode to see who you are at war with.
translation: 外交地图模式会显示与其他国家的外交关系。确定你选中了自己的，然后去看正与你交战的家伙。

original: At the bottom of the screen you can see an icon. That is showing you the leader of the opposite side in any war you are engaged in. Click the icon to see how the war is coming along.
translation: 在屏幕的底部，你可以看到一个图标，那是敌人的君主。点击图标可以看到战争的进展情况。

original: Here you can see how individual battles went, and also the warscore percentage. Warscore is the sum of how the war is going. To be able to claim provinces you'll need to get that number up so high that they will have to agree to your demands. Click next to continue.
translation: 在这里你能看到单独的战斗，和战争得分百分比。战争得分是有关战争态势的综合。为了能够要求领土，你需要获取一个非常高的分数以让对方无法拒绝。请点击继续。

original: For now, lets end this war. Press offer peace.
translation: 现在，让我们结束这场战争，点击和平提议。

original: Once you want to end a war, there are a few different outcomes. Press next to learn about them.
translation: 战争的结局，也有一些其它的可能，点击继续以便了解它们。

original: Attacker wins. The attacker get the claimed province or title, plus prestige and a higher score.
translation: 攻击者胜利，攻击者获得声称的省份或者头衔，增加威望和更高的分数。

original: Attacker loses. The attacker lose prestige which lowers the score. They also lose the claim.
translation: 攻击者失败，攻击者损失威望并降低分数，同时他们也失去了这项宣称权。

original: Truce. White peace. The attacker loses prestige.
translation: 休战，无条件和平。攻击者损失威望。

original: Press next to end this part.
For the advanced part of war, let's discuss some finer points of warscore and de jure claims. Click next to continue.
translation: 作为战争的高级部分，我们讨论一些战争得分的细节和法理上的宣称权。请点击继续。

original: When at war, you will get warscore for winning a province in battle and siege. After that not much happens though. To make it easier to claim parts of a vast empire, this changes after three years though. If you hold an enemy province for more than three years, the warscore starts to rise.
translation: 在战争中，你赢得战斗和围攻能获得战争得分，分值在获得之后并不会有多少变化。为了更容易的从一个庞大帝国获取这块土地，被占领的敌人领土，所带来的战争得分在占领三年后会开始提升。

original: After three years, the warscore will start to rise for just holding the province in question. This will enable you to win over a remote province that the ruler you are fighting can't or won't send troops to defend, without you having to siege all of their other provinces. Click next to continue.
translation: 超过三年后，战争得分将会开始升高，问题只在于能否坚守，这已足以让你获取这块土地。如果其统治者不打算，或无能力出兵保卫他的领土。而你也不必继续围攻他所有的其它领地。点击继续。

original: De jure is a term used to describe what is legally considered part of a landed title, even if it de facto is controlled by another ruler right now. That means that if, for example, a county is de jure considered part of your duchy, you will always have a casus belli to go to war and take it. The de jure hierarchy is static and can never change. E.g. the Kingdom of France will, de jure, always consist of the same duchies, which will consist of the same counties, etc. Click next to end this part.
translation: 法理是一个术语，用来描叙什么是合法的被承认的头衔，即便这块土地被另一个统治者所事实拥有。这意味着，例如某地法理上被承认属于你所拥有的头衔，那你将永远拥有一个宣战理由以获取它。这个法理制度是静态且无法变更的。例如法兰西王国，在法理上永远由那几个公国组成，包含着特定的那些地区。点击继续以结束本节。

original: This is an overview of your current ambition or plot, you have a list of decisions, and towards the bottom you have three tabs.
translation: 这是一个有关您的野心以及阴谋的所在，你有一份清单，在下面还有三个选项卡。

original: Threats - People who are possible risks are listed here.
translation: 威胁 - 所有可能出问题的人，都会在此列出。

original: Prisoners - A list of people you have imprisoned, and some information on them.
translation: 犯人 - 已经被你监禁的人的名单，以及他们的一些信息。

original: Plots - This is where revealed plots against you are listed.
translation: 阴谋 - 这是一个已被发现的，针对你的阴谋的清单。

original: Click next to end this part.

Once you have completed an ambition, you can select a new one. Keep in mind that some of them can be really hard to obtain, so then you need to start planning ahead to be able to complete them. Click next to continue.
translation: 一旦你完成了野心，你可以选择一个新的。但必须要注意，有些野心真的是非常难以完成的，所以一开始就要有计划，以确定未来能够完成。点击下一步继续。

original: You are not the only one with ambitions, all your vassals can potentially have them too. Sometimes it will be something you can fix, sometimes not. If a character has the ambition to get married, and you arrange a marriage for them, they will like you more. They can also have ambitions you can do nothing about, or ambitions you do not want to fulfill.
translation: 不只是你拥有野心，所有的领主都可能会有。有些时候这些东西是你能操纵的，有些时候则不行。例如某个角色有结婚的野心，你可以为他们安排婚姻，他们也会更喜欢你。他们一直会有某种野心，你可以选择为此做些什么，也可以什么也不做。

original: To see a vassal's ambition, click their portrait and it will be listed above the stats. Click next to end this part.
translation: 想要看一个封臣的野心，点击他们的头像，将会列出来。点击继续，可以结束这一节。

original: Plots in Crusader Kings II can help you accomplish things that might have been hard or impossible otherwise. Going to war and winning against a foe with superior firepower for example. Unlike ambitions, it is often an aggressive act towards someone else. Often secret and illegal as well. Click the intrigue tab to continue.
translation: 阴谋在《王国风云 II》里能帮你完成很多困难的，甚至是几乎不可能的事情。例如在战争中对抗敌人的优势兵力。不同于野心，阴谋往往是针对别人的侵略行为，且往往是秘密的、非法的。点击密谋按钮以继续。

original: Once you have selected a plot, you will see the target to the left, which backers you have acquired in the middle and the plot power to the right. Plot power is your strength relative to the target. To invite backers and strengthen your plot power, use the plus sign in that row. It will appear when you have selected a plot. Click next to continue.
translation: 一旦你选择一个阴谋，你将看到目标出现在左边，支持者在中间，而阴谋力量在右边。阴谋力量是你实现目标的相对能力，点击该行的加号，邀请支持者能加强阴谋力量，它们会在你选择了一个阴谋后出现。点击下一步继续。

original: There are two kinds of plots, and they use different plot power. The military ones simply rely on military might. You make sure you and your backers have more of it, then threaten to wage war against them if they do not comply. The other kind relies on intrigue power, and there it will be the relative intrigue score of both sides that comprises the plot power. Click next to end this part.
translation: 这里有两种阴谋的类型，他们利用的是不同的阴谋力量。军事单纯地依靠军事力量，你确保你和你的支持者更多，然后威胁对方如果不答应则发动战争。另一种则更依赖于权力，这是一种比较双方能力分值的相对的阴谋。点击下一步，以结束这一节。

original: Here you will see that you are part of the catholic church, and you can also find the pope here and see whether he likes you or not. A high moral authority is good for the church, and bad for those who oppose it.
translation: 这里你会看到，你是天主教会的一部分，你还可以在这里找到罗马教宗，看他是否喜欢你。如果有比较高的宗教权威，就对教会有利，对反对教会的势力不利。

original: If the pope has called to a crusade, that will be listed here. The bottom part of this window lists your vassal bishops and lets you appoint successors for each one of them. Click next to end this part.
translation: 如果教宗号召十字军远征，则会在这里列出。该窗口的底部列出了你的宗教封臣，而且由你来为他们指定继承人。请点击继续。

original: This part of the tutorial will teach you about opinions, laws and crusades. Click next to continue.
translation: 本节将讨论有关好感、法律和圣战的事。请点击「继续」。

original: If you happen to be an independent ruler and have had a really bad fallout with the pope, you can appoint an antipope. This antipope can then be used to go to war with the current pope, and if you win, you can replace the pope with your antipope. Click the religion tab to continue.
translation: 如果碰巧你是独立的统治者，并且已经与罗马教宗交恶，你可以指定一个对立的对立教宗。你可以利用这个对立教宗与罗马教宗开战，如果你赢了，你就能将教宗更换为你指定的对立教宗。点击宗教按钮继续。

original: What you need to create an antipope is: free investiture and a bishop that likes you more than the pope. As you can see here, you have a bishop. Unfortunately, he does not like you very much. Had he done that though, we could have clicked the little button to the right and made him an antipope.
translation: 指定一个对立教宗的条件是：自主神职叙任权，以及一个喜欢你更甚于罗马教宗的主教。正如你所见，你有一个主教，但不幸的的是，他并不是很喜欢你。如果条件符合，我们可以点击好感值下面的小按钮让他成为对立教宗。

original: Once you have your very own antipope, people who like your antipope more than the pope will pay taxes to you instead, you can circumvent excommunications and you can go to war against the pope in your antipopes place. Click next to end this part.
translation: 一旦你有了自己的对立教宗，喜欢这个对立教宗更甚于罗马教宗的人都会缴税给你，你可以避免被绝罚，而且可以利用对立教宗开始一场反对罗马教宗的战争。点击继续结束本节。

original: The Feudal System - Basic and Intermediate Level
translation: 封建制度 - 初级和中级

original: The hierarchy is divided in three sets: city, temple or castle. If your capital is city based, you are a burgher. If your capital is temple based, you are a prince-bishop. If your capital is castle based, you are a feudal lord. This matters in the laws screen, where you have two laws for each kind of ruler. More details on all ranks are available in the manual. The playable ranks are: Count/Countess -> Duke/Duchess -> King/Queen -> Emperor/Empress. Click the laws tab to continue.
translation: 基础的被统治单位分为三类：城市、修道院和城堡，如果首府是城市，则领主是一个骑士。如果你的首府是修道院，则领主是一个主教。如果首府是城堡，则所有者是一个有爵位的封建领主。在法律页面里有些针对性的法律，玩家手册中有更多的等级细节。游戏中爵位的等阶顺序是：伯爵 ->公爵 -> 国王 -> 皇帝。点击法律按钮以继续。

original: The changes from the previous game are two new hierarchy levels and crown laws. Click next to continue
translation: 相比上一个游戏，两个变动是两个全新的等级和王权法。请点击继续

original: The two new hierarchy levels are emperor/empress and baron/baroness. The emperor sits in the absolute top above kings, and this is a playable character. The barons on the other hand are towards the lower end of the scale. They are beneath counts, and they are not playable. Lets move on to the crown laws. Click the laws tab to continue.
translation: 两个新的阶级是皇帝和男爵。皇帝的阶级比国王更高，而且是一个可玩的角色。另一方面，男爵则是可玩阶层中最低端的存在。现在先去了解王权法，请点击法律标签以继续。

original: The other crown law is investiture. It can be either you or the pope that appoints bishops. Either choice will have some side-effects as well, so be sure to check the tooltip before you change. Click next to end this last part of the tutorial.
translation: 另一项王权法事关主教任免权。它可以是由你或者教宗来任命主教，两种选择都有一些副作用。所以改变它之前，请注意提示。点击继续以结束本节。

original: End of the basic economy tutorial
End of the intermediary economy tutorial
End of the basic council tutorial
End of the intermediary council tutorial
End of the basic succession tutorial
End of the intermediary succession tutorial
End of the basic diplomacy tutorial
End of the intermediary diplomacy tutorial
End of the basic war tutorial
End of the intermediary war tutorial
End of the basic military tutorial.
End of the intermediary military tutorial.
End of the basic plots and intrigue tutorial
End of the intermediary plots and intrigue tutorial
End of the basic religion tutorial
End of the intermediary religion tutorial
End of the intermediary feudal system tutorial
translation: 进阶封建制度教程结束

original: Choose how you wish to proceed.
translation: 请选择从何处开始入手

original: Disbanding an army will reduce the amount of money your nation is spending on maintenance. If the unit is under-strength it will free manpower to reinforce units in more important areas.
translation: 解散一支军队能降低国家的维护支出费用，如果单位兵力较少将能腾出人力来增援重要区域的单位。

original: Create new unit and open the reorganization window.
translation: 创建新单位并打开编组窗口。

original: Split the unit roughly in half.
translation: 分割出大约一半的单位。

original: Loads the selected armies onto a Fleet in port
translation: 让选定的军队从港口上船

original: Choosing the merge option will take the current selected units and convert them into a single unit.
translation: 点击合并，将当前选中的军队合并成一个单位。

original: You can only reorganize when 2 units are selected.
translation: 在重组时，你只能同时选中两个单位。

original: Reorganizing these two units will allow you move regiments between the two units
translation: 重组时将允许你自由移动这两个单位中的小队

original: Number of subunits in this flank
translation: 此路军队中次级单位的数量

original: Number of ships in this subunit
The number of troops that can be transported on this fleet
translation: 这支舰队的军队运输能力
阶段：遭遇战/肉搏战/追击战

original: Levy must be at least at $PERC$% strength before it can be raised
translation: 征召兵必须大于 $PERC$% 才能动员

original: We cannot raise our levy while §Y$SETTLEMENT$§R is occupied
translation: 当§Y$SETTLEMENT$§R被占领时，我们无法动员征召兵

original: This siege has been abandoned and will not resume until the attacking force is larger than the defending one
translation: 围攻将暂时停止，在攻击力量大于防御力量之前无法恢复
